1b1: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya A mo g+ha pA sha ka la pa rA dzA/ bod skad du/ 'phags/
1b2: pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang
1b3: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
1b4: chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis
1b5: zos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri bo pi ti lan/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
1b6: pho brang shing sa la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / a ti mug ta ka sA/
1b7: tshogs mang pos legs par rgyan pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya stong dang / byang chub
1b8: sems dpa' sa la bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rgyang gu dang babs gcig tu bzhugs te/ gnas

2a1: gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su skor cing mdun gyis bltas pa na/ dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lci'i bu rnams kyi dbang du mdzad nas
2a2: chos ston par mdzad do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
2a3: lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang 'di don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po
2a4: zhes bgyi ba na mchis te/ bdag gis bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi sngon logs su 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par lta bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po las mnos nas 'di ltar
2a5: bdag gis dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po la stsogs pa lha'i bu rnams dang / gnas gtsang mi'i lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dzin du brtsal nas/ bdag
2a6: gis rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes bkod pa la stsogs te/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu thob par bgyis lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang sa phyogs gang du snying po 'di spod pa'i sa phyogs
2a7: der dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i bu khri nyi stong bsrung ba dang / sba ba'i slad du gnas par rig par bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang na don yod pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i snying po 'di/
2a8: spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du bkur bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrag stong phrag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur lags so// gang zhig don yod pa'i

2b1: zhags pa'i snying po 'di nyan par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das sdig pa spyod pa 'am sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa'am/ 'phags pal bskur ba 'debs pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba 'am/ mnar med par
2b2: gzhol ba 'am/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad spong ba de 'gyod par 'gyur zhing / ma 'ongs pa na sdom pa thob par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das re
2b3: zhig de nyid kyis zhag gcig spang ba bgyis te/ bzlas brjod bgyis na/ tshe 'di nyid la las de rnam par dag pa dang / gtugs pa dang / gsal bar 'gyur ro// rims nyin gcig pa 'am/ rims nyin gnyis pa
2b4: 'am/ nyan gsum pa 'am/ nyin bzhi pa'am/ de bzhin du rims nyin bdun pa 'am/ mig nad dang / rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dam/ so dang mchu'i nad dam/ lce dang rgan na gyi nad dam snying nad dam/ lto nad dam/ ro rgyab
2b5: dang / sked pa'i nad dam yan lag gam nying lag gi nad dam/ gzhang 'bru ma 'am/ pho ba'i nad dam/ chad pa'am/ lag pa 'am/ rkang pa'i nad dam/ snA nad dam/ glad pi'i nad dang / sha bkra chen po 'am/ sha gzig gu
2b6: 'am/ ma dza'am/ rkang shu'i 'bruM bu pra mo 'am/ lhog pa'am/ mtshan par rdol ba 'am/ 'brum bu 'am/ brje byed dam/ byad dam/ gzhan gyis bgyis pa'i gsod pa'am/ 'ching ba'am/ sdig pa'am/ skrod pa
2b7: 'am/ bden pa ma lags pas/ skur ba 'debs pa 'am/ bcom ldan 'das mdor na lus kyis gdung pa'am/ sems kyis gdung ba'am/ rmi lam ngan pa'i las de yongs su gtugs par 'gyur na/ sems
2b8: can dag pa lhag par dad pa rnams kyis yongs su byang bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das gal te 'khor bzhi 'am rigs bzhi las gang dag rgyu dang / g.yo dag gis don yod pa'i zhags

3a1: pa'i snying po 'di nyan par bgyid/ 'dzin par bgyid/ 'chang bar bgyid// klog par bgyid/ 'dri bar bgyid/ 'drir 'jug par bgyid/ kun chub par bgyid/ sems can gzhan la yang /
3a2: sgrogs par bgyid cing / than dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa rnams kyi rna bug tu btab ste/ rna bar zlas brjod pa gyid la rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnams sems par bgyid de/ skur ba ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa
3a3: dang / rnam par mi rtog pa dang / kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / ring du 'gro ba ma mchis pa dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang / gos pa ma mchis pa dang / sems mnyam pa nyid dang mi bral ba dang / phung po lnga dang bral ba ste/
3a4: rnal 'byor 'di sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyid na de la phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas stong zhal ston par mdzad par 'gyur zhing / nongs pa 'chags par 'gyur ba la sogs pa rgyas par sbyar ro// glegs bam
3a5: du bgyis te khyim na 'chang bar bgyid dam/ rje dpon gyis skrag pas bgyis sam/ gzhang gang tsam gyi rgyus nyan par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das mkhas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus
3a6: de dag gi rna khung du sgra de grag pa legs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das dper na/ skyes pa 'ga' zhig gis tsan dan+da nAm/ ga bur ram g+ha N+DI zhig la khros sam yongs su smad de rdol btags nas bdag nyid
3a7: la byugs na/ tsan dan nam ga bur ram gla rtsi de 'di snyam du 'dis bdag la khros sam/ yongs su smad pas dri mnam par mi bgyi'o// snyam du mi sems kyi gzhan du na de nyid la dri ba da' bar bgyid lags so// bcom
3a8: ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gi den yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di yang gang su yang rung bas/ gzhan gang tsam gyi zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro// bcom ldan 'das g.yo dang sgras mchod pa bgyid na yang de nyid sems can dmu

3b1: rgod dag gi dge ba'i rgyur 'gyur lags so/ / gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bar tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dri dang bral bar mi 'gyur te/ tshul khrims kyi dbada' bar bgyid/
3b2: lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong pa 'am/ dge slong ma 'am// da bsnyen pa 'am// dege bsnyen ma'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can su yang rung bas/ don yod
3b3: pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ched du yang ro'i tshes brgyad la spyang ba bgyis te/ gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan 'dun bzlas brjod bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das des tshe 'di nyid la phan yon/ nyi shu rA gci
3b4: 'thob par 'gyur te/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ de'i lus la nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de'i lus la las kyi dbangags nad rnams byung yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur zhing / lus mdangs dang ldan pa dang yid du
3b5: mchi bar 'gyur ro/ / skye bo mang po'i snying du sdug pa dang dbang po sbas par 'gyur ro// de'i don rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// de'i don grub pa yang chom rkun gyis mi 'phrogs te/ zhugs kyis mi 'tshig/ chab kyis mi 'tshal/ rgyal
3b6: po'i mthus 'brog par rngo mi thog par 'gyur ro/ / de'i las kyi mtha' rnams rgyas par 'gyur te/ ser bas ma lags so// chab kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rlung dang char gyi 'jigs pa ma lags so// don yod pa'i zhabs pa'i snying po
3b7: thal ba 'am/ tshul lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhing gi phyogs mtshams dang / steng 'og tu bcing ba bgyis na gnod pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// gzi brjid dang mdangs 'phrog par sngo mi thog par 'gyur zhing sems
3b8: can thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang yid la 'thad par 'gyur ro/ / de la dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de la dgra'i 'jigs pa byung yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// de la me ma lags pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/

4a1: byad kyi 'jigs pa ma lags mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa ma lags te/ de la nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa drag po 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// me dang mtshon dang dug gis 'gum par mi 'gyur ro// de la yang
4a2: lha rnams kyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang sbed pa'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bar byams pa dang / snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang / 'bral bar mi 'gyur te/ de la
4a3: phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di dag thob par 'gyur lags so/ / gzhan yang tshes brgyad 'thob par 'gyur te brgyad gang zhe na/ 'gum pa'i dus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong gi gzugs su mngon sum
4a4: du zhal ston par 'gyur ro/ / bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// lta ba 'khrul par mi 'gyur ro lag pa mi g.yob pa dang / rkang pa mi g.yob pa dang / gau shang gcim mchis pa dang / khri'i steng du 'chi ba'i dus byed par
4a5: 'gyur ro/ / dran pa shin tu nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// kha bub du 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// 'gum pa'i dus na yang spobs pa mi bas par 'gyur ro// de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du smon pa der skye bar 'gyur zhing dge
4a6: ba'i gshes gnyen dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ / nyin cig bzhin du dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// chang dang sha dang kun dong dang ke'u dang sgog skya dang 'dres pa dang / lhag rol dang / 'di rnams khyad par du don du gnyer bas
4a7: spang bar bgyi'o/ / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang sems can rnams la mthu mchis pa dang / mthu ma mchis pa la 'tshal bar bgyis nas skrag par bgyi'o// slob dpon gyis dpe mkhyud
4a8: mi bgyi'o/ / 'di ltar dri ma dang / bral zhing phrag dog dang ser sna spangs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams lags te/ sems can rnams kyi don bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur bas/ byang chub sems

4b1: dpa' rnams kyi tshogs kyi nang du gtogs so/ / byang chub ces bgyi ba ni shes rab lags te/ sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba ni thabs lags so chos 'di gnyis sems can rnams kyi don bgyi ba'i slad du kho nas thob pa lags so//
4b2: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la/ rjes su gnang na 'di ltar bdag gi snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'khor bzhi rnams dang / gzhan sdig pa spyod pa rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bsgrub/
4b3: par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can dag pa de de'i lus la bab par shes na khyod smros shig/ de bzhin
4b4: gshegs pas rjes su yi rang bar mdzad zin te/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can rnams la pha'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
4b5: phyug mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang
4b6: po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don du bdag la gsan du gsol// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/
4b7: rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / yang dag kyar bzhags pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// shAr tra
4b8: ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ / byams pa la sogs pa ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la/

5a1: phyag 'tshal la// dkan ma togagasusul phyug 'anal la// byang nu bsams dbu'as sa su pa bajugs rdzu bu dang ldan pa 'bags pa sanangs gangags dbang blags phrag 'tshal lo// nga yahA/ mtha
5a2: tsa tsi r-i/ dur nurA/ ets+tshi ma tA ka ra ti ka/ tsi ri tsi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ tsur d+hA r+ya/ maH ka ru Ni kA ya/ si ri se re/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri pi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ sa hA pa da ma t+tAH/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ kA lu ku lu/ mahA bAdA d+hA sat+sa/ bri dru bad/
5a3: ba// kaNaka/ r+N+NaH/ bar ma krung d+hasarba/ ka rakaraM/ kiM kr-i / sa pa d+he/ sahas+thA ma thab // tsal la u las la/ ye !8u0f7f/ u0f7f/ zhwa rban de/ ma / dr-i m
5a4: aM hA pe shA ba ta sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa ngas ra/ tsAr tsa / ha ha ra/ trahAH/ hi hrI hrI/ du bAg+sa d+ha so/ kad+hA rbeng+ga/ ke n+yang d+ha da/ d+hi rid+hi bid+hA d+haH/ tarata/ sa ra sa ra/ bar ba ra/ tsa tsa ra/ rA b+hI ga tas hasa? u0f88u0f90 te pa ta/ shA d
5a5: uy-i/ la/ b+ha bas/ ma pa / bar ba ba / sa// @#/ rnarnams dras / za bu sa pa d+hAd+d+haH/ thAs pa da ga lag
5a6: be shad+ha re/ d+hir drang/ d+hir d+ho / d+hAr drAr/ thang thar/ g+har g+har/ yar yang/ la ra lar/ 1raH8/ sa sar/ khar bar/ bar bar/ khar d+ha ya ka/ sa man ta ma ba lo kita/ bi lo ki ta/ lo ke shr-ir ma hAshwan+d+ha/ mr-ir+tha ma tu/ mu mre/
5a7: pra sa prA ya/ pan rba mAr+thA nA~M/ com ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug kyi pa ga nga gas khams cad dang 'tsho bathams cad dang / gdon thams cad las
5a8: srings sheg/ srungs shig/ gsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / ga sa/ ma sa // rkun po dang / mdang chud pa/ dug dang mtshon las yongs su thar bar mdzad pa/ ka Na kaN/ ki Di ki Ni/ krarba ku r+tha/ tsa tsar/ oM dral/

5b1: bol po// d+h+r-i ga mdur Ar+yaswA trAs praSh+TA sha ka/ t+ya btag dam dam/ sam sa ma/ sams sa/ man+t+raHso an d+ha kA ra/ bi d+ha man Na ta bA ra mi tA ba ri b+hu ra ka/ me le me le/ TaTaTaT/ tha rba thatha/ tsaT To// Ta Tu Ta/ man
5b2: ya tsa ra ma kr-i tA ba daM gA ra/ a r+ha ti/ ai shwa ram te shA ra/ sa rba b+hUd+b+ha gA Na/ saM b+hany+dza// ku ru kaH/ pA ru p+ta ra/ karak+ShA ra/ ka Ta kaH/ saHsaT/ bri shrang d+ha/ bi Sha ya/ bA se na ma hakA ra Ni ka/ she tA yats+tshe pa bi ta/ ra da na prA kaT+Ta/ mAl
5b3: d+har/ sarba R+sha shar si kri ta ma k+ShaT/ sA la d+ha ra ma hAd thA tA ma ma mA la u0f7f/ kar d+hi ya/ nAnas margya bo mo wa s+ya pra kaM bya/ bdus zas na rbati pa ri bA tsa ka/ mA hA ka ru Nik+Sha/ sarba kengs a par ni bi shed+ha kas rba thAn+ti pa ma tsaka/
5b4: sa par byer ka/ sar+thas tra sa ma shA a sa kar/ na ma s+t+rai ta swA hA/ grags pas las thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// ngas gsam du bzlas brjod bgyis na/ 'tshams mdu pa lta byang bar 'gyur zhed/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad
5b5: kyang yongs su dag par bgyid do/ / mtshams bcad pa ni a ka ru'i bdug pa'am/ thal ba dang / chab pa mnyungs kar dang / seng ldeng gi phur bu la sogs pas so// rims thams cad las ni skud pas so// nad thams cad/
5b6: la ni mar ra ma/ 'bru mar ram/ chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor bar bgyi'o// byad dgrol ba mtshon gyis so// ljon pa la ni srung ba'i skud pas so// dug gsang ba la ni sa 'am chab kyis so// mig na la ni skur pa dkAr
5b7: zos rna thal gdags par bgyi'o/ / son pa la ni shing kar bi ri'i so shing gis so// mtshams bcad pa ni mtshon sna ldi 'askud pal lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ ser lde dag phur bu bzhi la bcings nas/ phyogs bzhir
5b8: gzugs par bgyis na/ mtshams chen po bcing bar 'gyur ro// thams cad srung ba ni skud pa'am/ chab pas/ thal bas so// gdon thams cad la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pas so// rims thams cad lan skud pa dkar pos so//

6a1: gsan pa dang / kyairnga dang / lhags pa dang / mthun pa gags pa thams cad lan tung byu u0f7fpo 'i mas mas lagan 'dra ngas/ nga pal 'i rlu ma// shing ma kyis nusas// lan gam/
6a2: gyis so// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / cod par 'gyed pa dang / skur ba 'debs pa thams cad la ni chab la zlas brjod bgyis te// ba bshal bar bgyi'o// dpung dang yul dang / rgyal srid dang / yul 'khor thams cad su
6a3: bal ni bum pa gang pa bzhag la gos gtsang ma bgos pas mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas/ klag par bgyis na ni ba chen por 'gyur ro// der yang chab kyis gtor bar brdzis te/ sems can thams cad la gung pa bgyis par
6a4: 'gyur lags so/ / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa dang / glags lta ba rnams la ni tsan dan la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ snying khar byug par bgyi'o// mtshams med/
6a5: pa'i las thams cad bas par bgyi ba ni/ rtag tu bzlas brjod kyis so// khyim bsrung ba la ni pad mi'i sbyin bsreg gis so// sems can thams cad bsgyur ba dang / 'byung po'i 'jigs pa dang / gdon thams cad las cu
6a6: ba la ni tsan dan gyi sbyin sreg gis so/ / dza ya dang / bi dza ya dang / na ku la dang / g+han d+ha na gu li dang / ba ru nau dang / tse 'gra ba ru Ni dang / a b+ha ya ba Ni dang / i nau tra ba ni dang / g+han d+ha bri yang gu dang / rgya spos dang / tsakra dang / mahA tsa
6a7: kra bi Sh+Ta kran ta dang / saM mar dzi dang / su na nad rnams la lan rgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ nor bur bgyis nas spyi ba'am / dpung pa la btags pas bsrel bar bgyi'o// khye'u rnams la ni mgul b.ro// bu mo rnams la
6a8: nista zong gnas ste/ dpal dang ldan par bgyid pa dang / bkra mi shis par rabasazhi bar bgyid pa'i nor bu 'di srel na thams cad las bsrud par bgyis par 'gyur ro// dug dang mas mi tshugs lags so// rug gi gnad payang /

6b1: bar mi 'gyur ro// skyes na yang gnod pa skyed par mi bgyid cing / myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// gdon nams zhi bar 'gyur ro// rlung dang 'brug dang / ser ba gcad pa dang / chab kyi rgyun dang ser ba bzlog la ni shing kar bi ri'i lcug masaste// las thams
6b2: cad bgyid pa 'bags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po grub pa dam pa ma sgrubs par las 'di rnams bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ / de nas bsgrub par 'tshal ni ni a la lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsis/ sangs rgyas dang 'phags/
6b3: pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan ral bi'i thor tshugs dang / a na ya'i pags pa dang / phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang la/ rgyan thams cad kyis stan pa bri bar bgyi ste/ ri mo mkhan gos sbyong can 'drir srul tha
6b4: bgyi'o/ / de nas sgrub pa pos sku gzugs de'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ me tog dkar po'i sil ma bkra ma la/ spos kyis bkad pa'i gasnod brgyad bzhag par bgyi'o// sna brgyad pa 'am drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa'am/ gzhan/
6b5: yang lha bshos sha dang / khrag dang ma 'dres pa bshams shing drangs la/ a ka ru'i bdug pas bdugs te/ lan stod rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// nyin zhag gcig gam nyin zhag gsum du smad par gyis nas zas dkar gsum
6b6: 'tshal te/ dus gsum du khrum bgyis nas/ gos gtsang ma bgos na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid mchis nas/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// ldong ras sam mig sman la
6b7: bzlas brjod bgyis te/ mig sa smras na de nas mi gdang bar gyur nas nam mkha' la mche bar 'gyur zhing / da ni yod par le ga/ gangam sa bgyi ba'i ting nge dzin zab par 'gyur te/ lan sa sa su ga sus po rnas
6b8: kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spun ras gzegs dbang phyug dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lta bude dag dang / mi brjod kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen

7a1: ngo'i lci bu rnams yid ras te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pal mngon par bstod do// don yod pa'i nags pa rdzogs so//
7a2: de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtshor ba 'byams thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig du gzar
7a3: nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ nyi mi'i 'od ltar 'od zer stod 'phro zhing / 'od zer sna tshogs pa 'gyed pa'i lus kyis bcom ldan 'das gal ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas
7a4: zhing rdzogs la zhi ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis byams pa dang snying rje chen po yi mthu yid la byed pa/ rigs bzhi yi 'jig rten la phan pa dang snying rtse bas don thams cad grub par rigs sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi bla na med pa
7a5: de kho na nyid grub pa mchog sbyin pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i snying po 'di mchis te/ 'di pad ma
7a6: rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor de kho na nyid chen po snying por 'phags pa snying por gyur pa de kho na nyid grub pa dam pa dkyil 'khor chen po 'di phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po rim par phye ba gsang ba dam pa rnam par grol ba'i
7a7: dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang bsgrub pa gsang ba 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bklag par bgyi'o/ / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto phye chen po mang po'i 'khor
7a8: chen po'i mdun dang / rig sngags grub pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun 'dir yang bsgrag par bgyi'o// gang yang dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha dang gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / drang srong gi tshogs/

7b1: dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang / rgya skar dang rigs sngags 'chang grub pa'i lha mo rnams kyi mdun du de kho na nyid kyi snying po yang dag pa 'jig rten las 'das pa dngos su bsgrub bklags pas grub pa dang / sgoms pas
7b2: grub pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rigs sngags chen po 'chang ba'i tshogs kyis yongs su skor ba'i mdun du de kho na nyid kyi snying po gsang ba dam pa bsgrags shing brjod par bgyi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
7b3: pa shA ga kya thub pa'i bsod nams stong gis brgyan pa mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis rnam par smras pa/ phyag dpung pa'i mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu 'od zer 'phro ba du mi 'phreng ba dang / spos kyi glang po che'i sna lta bu'i phyag rgyang
7b4: ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor bzhag nas glad pa la byugs te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can dag pa dam pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod spros shig/
7b5: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ ngas kyang de ltar byin gyis rlob kyis khyod gsang ba dam pa 'dam tshig spros shig/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang zhing byin gyis brlab
7b6: pa gang ga'i klung gi 'bum phrag me brgya stong gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs shing rjes su yi rang bar mdzad do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
7b7: ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcur bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang gi snying po de kho na nyid gsang ba'i gsang sngags 'di dag gsol to// oM pad ma tasta/ ma hA a mo g+ha pA sha sA d+ha ya ma ma ya hri da yan tsa
7b8: ra tsar hUM/ don yod zhags pa'i rang bzhin gyis gzungs kyi snying po yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i snying po 'di brjod ma thag tu ri'i rgyal po po ta la 'di

8a1: brag dang nags tshal dang / rtsi shing du bcas pa dang / ri rab khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang bcas pa rnams rnam pa drug du rab tu g.yos shing lha'i gnas rnams ldeg par gyur te/ thams cad 'dar 'dar bar gyur to// klu gnas dang
8a2: gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas rnams kyang ngakhrug par gyur to// rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs kyang 'khrug par gyur to// chu gter nam kyang 'khrug par gyur to// de ma thag du phyogs bcun sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs brnyan bzhugs pa rnams kyis legs so zhes bya
8a3: ba byin ste/ 'di skad ces kyang bka' stsal to// rgyal ba'i bdag nyid du skyes pa don yod pa'i nags pa gsang ba'i snying po klags pas 'grub pa/ bla na med pa smras pa legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shA kya thub pas 'di
8a4: skad ces bka' stsal to/ / sems dpa' dag pa khyod kyis gsang ba klag pa'i cho ga de kho na nyid sgrub pa rgyas pa dang bcas par smros shig/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di lan cig/
8a5: brjod pa tsam gyis de'i mod la phyogs bcu tha dad pa nas gang gA klung sa ya bye ba brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag brkyang ste/ spyi bor bzhag nas legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra gsungs te/ gsungs pa tsam gyi mdo la sngon bskal pa brgya stong du
8a6: bsags pa'i sgrib pa rnams nyams par bgyid zhig par bgyid do/ / sdig pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / de bzhin du gnod pa'i bar bgyid do// sdig pa dang sems can gdug pa rnams dang / phas kyi rgol ba rnams dang / dzab pa rnams 'jig
8a7: par babyed de/ 'de la the tsam pa bgyi'o// ga du 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug mchod sbyin lta 'tshal bar 'gyur lags so// gasngags 'i'i chog bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ rigasngags 'chang gcang mar gyur pas shin tu khrus bgyis te/
8a8: gos gtsang ma bgos par bgyi'o// byams pa dang / snying rje yid la bgyis pas 'byung po thams cad la mchog tu snying brtse bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mi'i gzugs la mchod par bgyi'o// matog dang / bdug pa

8b1: dang / dri dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mar me dbul bar bgyi'o// tshes brgyad dam/ cho Thacwa lnga la bsgrub pa'i bzlas brjod kyi chog bgyi'o// ri me'i gzugs kyi mdun du thog mar dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po la na#
8b2: brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / tshig gzhan mi smra bar khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te cha ba dang / nyungs kar gyis dbang skur bar bgyi'o// phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi ste/ lan nyi shu gcig du bcing bar bgyi'o// gsang sngags kyis
8b3: ning bang skur bar bgyi'o/ / phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og du don yod zhags pa'i gsang ba'i dmatshig gi snying po steng rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod pagyi'o// bzlas brjo go/ tsam gyis de'i mod la don yod pa'i nags pa'i snying
8b4: khro bo'i rgyal po dang bcas pa 'bum 'gyur du bzlas brjod bgyis par 'gyur ro/ / bzlas brjod rdzogs nas ri me'i gzugs 'bar zhing sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus las 'od zer sna tsho gra
8b5: pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lag na thogs pa'i zhags pa/ 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / rag sngags 'chang snying dga' ba dang / spyi bo'i gtsug 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni grub pa'i rtags yin no// zhes grub pa'i rtags
8b6: dang / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin no// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i che ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas dgos pa thams cad dang las thams cad brjod pa tsam gyis de'i mod la 'grub par 'gyur lags so// de
8b7: bzhin gshegs pas ya bye ba brgya stong gang gA'i klung gi byem ste nga mnyam pa'i phyag gser gyi kha dog 'dra bas spyi ko'o gtsug du 'jog par rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang bzhin gyi lus
8b8: shin tu dri ma dang bral ba yongs su dag pas/ dri ma med pa'i bdag nyid kyi lus rang bzhin gyi mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad du grub par rtsol bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags/

9a1: pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar snying las skyes pa'i bu bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob kyi bar du yongs su skyong bar bgyid do// de lta bas na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi
9a2: dkyil 'khor mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing legs par brgyan pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su skor ba dang bcas pa na/ khang pa brtsegs pa legs par brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri'i mchog la 'phags/
9a3: pa rgyal ba 'od dpag med 'od zer brgya stong phrag 'bum 'phro ba'i skus bzhugs shing chos ston par lta bar 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des legs par bkrus te/ gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ cho 'phrul gyi zla
9a4: ba yar ngol byams pa'i sems dang snying rje lhag pa'i bsam pas gus pa dang / dang ba dang / zhe sa dang / bla mar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la ci 'byor pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang /
9a5: phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / lhab lhub dang / pa dan gyis mchod par 'gyi'o// tshes brgyad nas tshes bcu gsum gyi bar la zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum
9a6: du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / tshig gzhan mi smra bar khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas ri me'i gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du mchis nas nyal bar
9a7: bgyi'o/ mchod yon dang yon cha bdus gsum du dbul bar gyi'o// a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka dang / gu gul gyi me tog khu ba dang / bcas pa k+Sha ci dang lhan cig bsres nas blang bar bgyi'o// dug pa'i sngags lan stong rtsa brkyang bzlas
9a8: brjod bgyis te/ don yod khams gsum rnam par grags/ bdug pa'i rgyal po bla na med/ gang phyir bdug pa tsam gyis ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bdug pa'i sprin chen po

9b1: 'khrigs pas rgyas par 'gyur ro/ / 'khrigs pa de dag gis sangs rgyas dang / byang chu ba sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto'i phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa
9b2: rnams la dri chen po'i mchod pa dang / bdug pa chen po'i mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur zhing / de dag thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// gang yang dung 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can gang dag gis bdug pa'i tshad ni de dag thams cad ngan song nga ste
9b3: bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro/ / thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang mug dang / rtsed pa dang 'byed pa dang / nang 'khrug pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / yams kyi na dang / gnodapa dang / 'tshe ba dang / gdung ba dang
9b4: mi bde ba thams cad dang nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / rlung dang ser ba dang grang ba dang tsha ba'i sprin thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// byad dang g.ye sa byed dang / sngags kyi sbyor ba thams cad dang / dug
9b5: dang dbyig dug dang / dug sbyar ma thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad dang rjed byed thams cad dang / rims dang / bza' nyes dang / sgom nyes dang / gnod sgri bdang na thams cad ga par 'byung zhing rmi lam na pa thams cad ni 'gyur ro// na sa thams pa da dug pa dris 'bros
9b6: bar 'gyur rdeg par khrung byes par gyur ste/ chung sti po'o mchis kyi bar du lan 'ga' yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// badrag pa'i rgyal po 'di rtag du sbyar bar bgyi'o// 'di ltar tshas bcu bzhi'i nub mo mchis la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rgyad ga/
9b7: khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma ci 'byor pa dbul bar bgyi'o// snying po dang nye ba'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la// dri dang 'bru mar gyi mar me dbul bar bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs de
9b8: nyid kyi mdun du nam langs kyi bar mchis nas nyal bar bgyi ste/ rmi lam du dbyig gi mtshon mthong ngam/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal med khang dang bcas/ rin po che'i shing dang bcas// rini tshe'i ri das cas rdzi dang cas/ gnas dang bcas/ khang pa

10a1: brtsegs pa dang bcas/ gzhal med khang dang bcas/ rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa mthong ngam/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs
10a2: su skor cing khang brtsegs pa na bzhugs la lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
10a3: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med de yang rig sngags 'chang de la dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing / legs so zhes bgyi ba yang stsol bar mdzad de/ kye skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis rig sngags 'chang gi
10a4: skyes bu'i byed pa mang du byas pa dang / khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mang du bskrun pa dang / khyod kyis lhag par mang du byas pa dang / khyod kyis bya ba gang yin pa byas pa dang / khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor
10a5: phyag rgya chen po dang / gsang sngags rnam par phye ba'i snying po sgrub pa ni grub zin te/ legs so legs so// khyod rig sngags 'chang gi sangs rgyas nyid du gyur cig/ khyod 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal gyi skyo ba blangs te/ tshe brjes nas nga'i sangs rgyas
10a6: kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// zhes phyag g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub thams cad stsol cing 'jig
10a7: rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa ste/ 'di ni dam pa sgrub pa yin no// zhes bdag nyid sad nas dga' bar mthong ste/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bram ze'i gzugs
10a8: kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / gzugs kyi ri mo de yang 'bar zhing 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yon tan brgya stong mang po gzhan yod 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i phun

10b1: sum tshogs pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / skye bo dang rgyal po dang / blon po dang bram ze dang / khyim bdag thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing cher mchod par 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams las don yod pa'i grub pa chen po thob
10b2: bar 'gyur ro/ / grub pa chen po bla na med pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o// de nas tshes bcu bzhi la thog mar dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams la ci 'byor pa'i yon dang / bcas pa'i mchod ston
10b3: stsal bar bgyi'o/ / de nas bdag nyid longs spyod par bgyi'o// gang gi tshe yang sangs rgyas la blta ba dang / byang chu sems das pa dang / lha rnams la blta bar 'tshal ba na/ de'i tshe bdug pa'i rgyal po la dgug pa'i gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
10b4: bzlas brjod bgyis ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bdug par bgyi'o// bdug pas bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la zhal ston par 'gyur zhing dge ba'am mi dge ba thams cad dam nyams pa'am bri ba de thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro//
10b5: ji tsam tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du gsung ba'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba gsung bar 'gyur ro// de nas gsang sngags kyi cho ga dang / bsgrub pa'i don dang las kyi cho ga yang ji lta ba bzhin du bshad par bgyi'o// oM pad ma d+ha ra a mo g+hA dza ya tsuru tsu rA
10b6: swA hA/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i nye ba'i snying po'i gsang sngags so// oM pad ma bA sha d+ha ra ya/ a mo g+ha bar san tso da ya hU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin
10b7: dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang 'alto phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa bskul ba'i gsang sngags te/ bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdugs nas cha ba dang nyungs dkar bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/
10b8: phyogs bcu dkor na thams cad skul bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// oM tI lo kya a b+hA hA na/ a mo g+ha bA sha/ pad ma bi lo ka ki A yAn tu b+hu ba ne su ra/ su ru su ru/ bi ma le hUM dgugs pa'i gsang sngags te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa la bad brgya rtsa brgyad

11a1: bzlas brjod pa gyis nas chung matog bsres pas phyogs bcud gtor bar bgyi ste/ thams cad nas dkrug/ padam pa grub pa lagasaso// ma padam b+hu dzam y+Ya sha d+had Ni man tra ya me/ am b+hA ba la yan b+hu ba swA hA du
11a2: ru su ru hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad na gnas pa'i lce tshogs la sogs pa spyan drang ba'i gsang sngags te/ ri la pa spyi blugs
11a3: dang / chab dang / me tog dang / tshems shing la bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdugs te/ thams cad la lan brgya ma rgya bzlas brjod bgyis de/ thams cad spyan drang pa'i rig sngags so// oM pad ma a mo g+ha badz+ra a d+hiSh+Tha na/ ku ru ku ru swA hA/ si'i dkyil 'khod
11a4: bcing ba ste cha ba dang nyungs dkar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas sa la gtor na dpag tshad sum brgyas kun nas 'khor ba'i si'i dkyil 'khor rdo rjer byin gyis rlabs par 'gyur ro/ / de thams cad bsrung ba ni rdo rje sra ba'i sems su
11a5: 'gyur ro/ / dgra rnams kyis mi mthong ba dang / bgegs dang log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / ro langs dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can thams cad kyis mi mthong ste/ rnam pa
11a6: thams cad du mi mthong bas rdo rje ltar sra bar 'gyur ro/ / oM a mo g+ha pa sha pad mo tu ra sid nA/ san tu Ti si ri si ri hU~M/ gdan gyi gsang sngags te nyungs dkar la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ sa la gtor na pad ma chen po'i gzhal
11a7: yas khang gi gdan du byin gyis brlabs nas legs par phul bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i seng ge'i gdan du byin gyis brlabs na legs par phul bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags
11a8: 'chang gis rang gi stan la cha ba dang / nyung skar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor te/ rig sngags 'grub pas pad ma'i stan gsang ba'i gsang sngags so// oM ma hA ku ru Na pad ma a mo g+hA pA sha dri d+ha badz+re a d+hiSh+Tha ta b+hu ru b+hu ru/

11b1: b+han d+ha re swA hA/ dkyil 'khor mtha' dag na khyim dang / nags tshal dang / kun dga' ba dang / gtsug lag khang dang / bstig nas dang 'chags dang / phug dang / dgon pa dang / gnas gsang pa'i phyir dri cha ba dang / zhus dkar la lan brgya rtsa
11b2: brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor bar bgyis te/ gnas su gtogs pa thams cad gsang pa chen po bgyis par 'gyur ro// nyes par bgyid pa dang / bgegs dang log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad
11b3: 'bros par 'gyur te/ gnas gsang ba'i gsang sngags so// oM pad ma a mo g+ha pA she nas man tAd shA su shrA sim bAn d+ha ya/ tu ru tu ra hUM/ lcags kyi phur bu sor brgyad pa'i tshad lnga la/ mtshon sA ldi skud pas dkris te lan stong
11b4: brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas phyogs bzhir gzugs par bgyi'o/ / lnga pa ni dbus kyi bzhir gzugs par bgyi ste/ rgyang grags bdun khor bar mtshams bcing bar bgyi bar 'gyur ro// ji srid du phur bu ma phyung ba de srid du
11b5: mtshams chen po bcing bar bgyis par 'gyur ro/ / oM a mo g+ha man la ban d+ha ya sa man ten/ pad ma ma hA pa de me/ d+hu ru d+hu ru swA hA/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba ste/ dri chab dang / nyungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas dkyil
11b6: 'khor mtha' dag dang / de bzhin du 'og dang steng du yang gtor te/ dkyil 'khor chen po bcing bar bgyis par 'gyur te/ bgegs dang log 'dren dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za mchi bar 'os pa thams cad kyis mchi bar
11b7: mi 'gyur ro/ / sems can gdug pa dang lha 'am klu gdug pa gang su yang rung ba de dag thams cad zil gyis gnan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i bgyi ba ngan pa dang / sngags ngan pa dang / sems ngan pa dang / bgyid pa ngan pa thams cad
11b8: yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro/ / oM a mo g+ha pa ri shud d+he sho d+ha ya sa man te na/ d+hi ri d+ha ri shud d+ha satwa ma hA pad me hUM/ 'dis pa'i rnam lnga la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i cha mtha' dag na/ gtsug lag khang

12a1: ngam/ dgon pa'am bya skyibs sam/ tshang tshing dam/ 'chag sa 'am/ gnas sa mtshal lam/ nags tshal lam/ skyed mos tshal lem/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ brang sa'am/ skyabs sam khang pa la gton na stong pa 'am mi stong pa
12a2: 'am/ 'dam rdzab dang / mi gtsang ba dang / phyag dar gyis gang ba dang / 'byung po dang sha za dang yi dgas la sogs te rigs ngan pa thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro// gtsang ba dag par 'gyur ro// gnas tsang mar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid la
12a3: dbang skur na bza' nyes dang / bgo nyes dang / gnod ltas dang / gnod sgrib kyi gnas ngan pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// gtsang ma dag par 'gyur ro// mi gtsang ba gtsang bar 'gyur ro// tshangs par spyod pa ma lags pa tshas
12a4: par spyod par 'gyur ro/ / bsnyen gnas ma bgyis pa ni bsnyen gnas bgyis par 'gyur ro// de la lha thams cad bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang sra ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug dang /
12a5: gshin rje dang chu lha dang / lus ngan la sogs pa bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang / sra ba'i slad du rtag du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa thams cad snying du sdug pa dang / mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// tshig btsun par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral
12a6: bar 'gyur ro/ / sdig pa dang sgrib pa dang / chad pa la sogs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bzhir kun tu gtor na/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge dang / mings dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang /
12a7: 'tshe ba dang 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// nyin cig bzhin bdag nyid la dbang skur ram/ reg par bgyis na/ rig sngags dang phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rim par dbye ba dang / las chen po grub par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i grub pa chen po
12a8: 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / gang yang gang du mchis pa de dang der char mchod par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyis mi zlog par 'gyur ro// nyin cig bzhin gzhal med khang rgya chen po bkra zhing rnam par bkra ba chen po rmi lam du mthong ba dang / rnam pa thams

12b1: bad du mchog rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mong 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// rtag tu gam pa
12b2: spyod pa gtsang zhing dag par 'gyur ro/ / rtag par dus kun tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug blta/ tshal bar 'gyur ro// 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rtsol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
12b3: sangs rgyas 'od dpag med rmi lam du rtag du mthong zhing shi 'phos nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / oM pad me sa ra sa ra tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ma hA a mo g+ha sa ma yA sA hA/ gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig gi gsang sngags so//
12b4: oM bi bu la pad ma a mo g+ha sar pa bi sha tu ku ru ku ru sA hA/ 'jug pa'i gsang sngags so// oM a mo g+ha a nu sha ya ma hA pad ma ban d+hu re hUM/ slob mi'i gsang sngags so// oM a mo g+ha pad ma shi ge tu ru tu ru tiSh+Tha badz+ra ban d+he swA hA/ spyi gtsug
12b5: bcing ba'i gsang sngags so/ / lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha pad ma dza lo k+She ba/ b+hi ri b+hi ri hU~M/ cha ba bteg pa'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha bi ka Ta saM b+ha ra pad ma a sa Ne dza la ba ti/ ku ru ku ru hU~M/
12b6: bum pa'i gsang sngags ste/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM pad mo bra sa ra a mo g+ha bi ma lo b+ha ra b+ha ra swA hA/ chab kyi rgyan gyi gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha pad me su pad me pU Na kari d+hi ri d+hi ri bi mi le swA hA/
12b7: lag pa'i gsang sngags te/ lag pa gnyis la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo dang bsgrub pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyi ste/ sgrub pa thams cad la bsgrub
12b8: par bgyi zhing las thams cad la dus thams cad du bgyi'o/ / oM a mo g+ha bi ma le/ dzi hA dra sa~M shod+ha ni sang sho d+ha ya d+ha ra d+ha ra bi ma le pad ma ka ma la dzi hA swA hA/ lce sbyang ba'i gsang sngags te dri chab la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod

13a1: bgyi snyed kha bshal la kye'i drim yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ da ma dang / ku mu ti'i 'dab ma dang / 'dra bar lce mnyen par 'gyur ro// so dang kan dang 'gul ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// o a mo gan d+ha bsti su ru su ru/ mad+hu
13a2: rung bya gan d+he pad ma pra bi swA hA/ gsang sngags 'dis khar stsal ba'i ri lu tsan dan dang / nal dang / smi ka dang / ud pal dang gung gum dang gA ci lhan cig blang bar bgyis la/ phye ma zhib mor btags nas ri lu zho gnyis tsam pi'i tshad du
13a3: sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig sbyar la gseng sngags stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas brjod bgyis te zangs kyi snod kyi nang du bstsal nas bzlas brjod bgyid pa'i tsho khar stsal nas skad cig tsam sdud ba bgyis na rtag du kha nas/ ud pa la'i dri 'byung
13a4: bar 'gyur te/ rgyang grags tsam du the tsom med// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dgyes/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mgon po mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa/
13a5: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// / bam po gnyis pa/ bzlas pas bde bar 'grub 'gyur bas/ don yod rig sngags bla na med/ rig sngags 'chang dang gtam bgyis pas// dus kun rdul dri spang bar
13a6: bgyi/ mkhris pa pad kan snabs dag dang / de bzhin kun 'jigs myur du ni/ kha nas lha yi dri 'byung 'gyur// su la tshig dag smras pa ni de ni myur du dbang du 'gyur/ lha rnams dbang du mchis pa dang / bde stsogs bdag po dbang po dang / gshin/
13a7: rjechu lha de bzhin du tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang / zla ba nyi ma nyid dag dang thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis// 'di ni la mur bgyid na/ tshig ldan lce yi rtse mon/ mchis sam chig ni gsal bar 'gyur/
13a8: rtag tu mi min dbyangs 'gyur te/ dri mi'i skyon ni rnam par spangs// tshig bcad stong klags nyams mi 'gyur/ hU~M zhes bgyis pas lha kun dang / lha gang dkyil lokhor gnas pa'ang mchis/ phaT ces bgyis pas bdug pa dang /

13b1: bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad 'jig gnod sbyin srin po sha za dang / brjed byed 'byung po gsang ba pa/ thams cad mod la 'byer 'gyur zhing / khas bub du lnga 'gyel bar 'gyur/ ri lu kha na thogs na ni/ dus kun du ni mkhas par 'gyur/
13b2: grub pa myur du thob 'gyur te/ thams cad du yang tshe ring 'gyur/ tshig snyan 'jam zhing mnyen par 'gyur/ ri lu 'di ni bcang bgyis nas/ don yod pad ma dri ma med/ ri lu zhes bgyi 'grub par 'gyur/ oM ma la bi ga te/ pad ma pa
13b3: pa re/ san tsa ra ba tsa raswA hA/ a mo g+ha sid d+he/ sho d+ha ya spr-in gabus pa'i shun pa dang / u shi dang / tsan dan dang / pad ma ge sar dang / li shi dang / ka ko la dang / sprang spos dang / rgya spos dang / gur gum dang / pra bun da ri ka dang /
13b4: e la dang / sa ma ka dang / u gra dang / su gan d+hi ga 'di rnams cha mnyam par bgyi ste zhib tu btags nas/ gsang sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas char ba'i chab dang bsres pas khrus bgyis shing 'tshal ba'am/ chab dron
13b5: pos khrus bgyis pa 'am/ 'tshal bas shin tu khrus bgyis pa gtsang ma shin tu dag pas bag tsha ba ma mchis par ston pa tsam gyis sngon gyi drag po'i las rnams dang / gdon kun 'joms pa 'grub pa dang / nad kun rnam par
13b6: nyams pa dang / / 'dod chags zhe sdang ti mug gi/ mun pa mi zad spong bar gsungs// bkrus 'tshal tsam gyi mod la ni// dri ma kun zhiso ma nyi med// dpal gyi lha yi bzhin du 'bar// bsod nams phung po rnam par 'phel// gzi brjid pung
13b7: po rtag du 'bar/ / zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes// gtsang mi'i lus su gyur pa na/ lus ni lha yi bzhin du 'gyur/ mi gtsang ba ni gtsang bar 'gyur/ ma dag pa ni dag par 'gyur// tshangs par spyod min tshangs spyod 'gyur// thub min thub pa kho nar
13b8: 'gyur/ / tshangs par mi spyod tshangs spyod 'gyur/ mgo skya gnyer ma spangs pa dang / rtag du bro nad ma mchis 'gyur/ lus la lha yi dri dag 'byung // pad ma ku mu mnyen pa'i lus// sngon gyi dri ni rab spangs te// lha yi tsan dan dri dag ni/

14a1: mda' rgyang gang du som nyi med// rtag du bde bar nyal ba dang // bde bar yang ni sang bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po dang / lha min gdug pa log 'dren dang // gdugs pa'i bgegs rnams mthong mi 'gyur// mi zad
14a2: sgra rnams kyis kyang min/ / lus nyid sbyang ba bgyis nas su// sngags smras brjod pa'i sgrub pa bgyi// legs par sgrub pa'i las bgyis na// de nyid bde bar 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal ba byang chub sems dpa' kun// de bzhin mod la
14a3: gzigs par 'gyur/ / lha rnams kun dang gang dag gzhan// dkyil 'khor gnas pa myur du 'chi// ci 'dod yid la bzlas pa yis// rtag tu don yod grub par 'gyur// thog mar lus sbyang chog bgyi// de nas gsang sngags
14a4: legs par spyad/ / oM a mo g+ha pad ma lo tsa ni dib bya driSh+Ti pa ri shud d+he su ru su ru pad ma a k+Shi bu ru bu ru sa man ta bya ba lo ka ni swA hA/ ldong ros g+hi hang rgya mtsho sU ba sa ha dza// ud pa la sbrang tsi lhan cig reng bu 'di bgyis la// gsang
14a5: sngags sum stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i mig sman 'di/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mchog tu bzang zhes gsungs// 'di ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin gyis// kun pas bkra shis 'di ni mig nad kun// 'joms par
14a6: bgyid de g.yar lam bzang po rmi/ / yid du mi mchi ba nyid mthong mi 'gyur// ngan par snang dang ngan par lta// nam yang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// gtum po 'joms pa gtum po dang // lhag ma sbags pa bsgo mnyes dang // bza'
14a7: nyes gnod sgrib gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang ni sdig sbal dang / thams cad nyin dang mtshan dag tu/ mi snang bar ni the tsom med// mig gis bzang po mthong ba dang / rmi lam bzang po mthong bar 'gyur// zla bsrid ngurabasgyur nas/
14a8: lha rdzas dag ni mthong bar 'gyur/ mig yongs su sbyar ba'o// oM b+hu d+ha b+hud d+ha/ bi b+hud d+ha pad ma a mo g+hA mu khi ba ra ba de sAhA/ rig sngags 'dis g+hi hang la lan stong rtsa brgyad zlas so// don yod pa'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig

14b1: brjod par bgyi'o/ / khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi'o// snying po dang nye ba'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyid pa'i tshe yang 'di blangs te dpral ba'i dbus su thig le bgyis te/ thig le lan cig
14b2: bgyis pas dpral ba'i steng na skar mi dbyibs lta bur gnas par 'gyur ro/ / bdug pa thams cad dbang 'gyur mchis// gnod sbyin 'byung po gang dag dang / srin po bgegs dang log 'dren nyid thams cad 'jig 'gyur the tsom med// sems can gdug
14b3: pas gdug bsam kyang / / phyir zhing bzod par mi nus pas// de dag thams cad 'jig 'gyur te// me la phye ma leb bzhin no// rtag tu rgyal po skye bor bcas// 'khor bcas blon por bcas pa dang // blon po che dang mdun na 'don// btsun mo'i tshogs
14b4: bcas dbang du gyur/ / dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dang // thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur// rgyal rigs dmangs rigs dag dang ni thams cad dbang du mchi bar 'gyur// mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyur// rig sngags lha ni thams cad dang //
14b5: gang ltar dkyil 'khor gnas pa ste// de dag thams cad dam tshig gi/ rjes su bsgrub cing skyong bar 'gyur// phyogs bcur bsrung ba bgyid 'gyur ba// rtag tu bsgrub pa bla med stsol// thig le 'di bgyis grogs med rgyu ba dag/ chom rkun
14b6: dang ni chom po g.yon can dang / / g.yul 'gyed nyid kyi 'jigs pa gang yin pa// kun nas sgral bar 'gyur te so ma nyi med// seng ge stag dang dom dang ni// glang chen khro bo mi bzad dang // wa dang gdug bcas srog chags dang // so gdug sbrul kun
14b7: mgo nas za/ / gang dag srog chags gdug par bcas// de dag thams cad nub 'gyur// nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// ser pa me dang tshig bdang // char pa mi zad mtshon chu byang // mkhas pa thig le 'chang ba'i lus// khyim rdib
14b8: pas kyang non mi 'gyur/ / mkhas pa rig sngags 'chang ba'i don// thams cad 'di yis bgyid par 'gyur// shin tu ma grub gsal bar yang // 'grub par 'gyur te the tsom med// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang gis bdag

15a1: dran par bgyid cing / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de ma thag du rig sngags 'chang de'i kun du bdag mchis nas/ yid la bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o//
15a2: thams cad kyi mchog thams cad ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du stsal bar bgyi'o// dgos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyi'o// don yod pa grub pa rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// bden par dam bcas pa sa dam tshig rjes su bskyang bar bgyi'o//
15a3: bcom ldan 'das gal te rig sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo bsgrub par bgyid na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin brlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' rjes su gnang ba de dag thams cad bdag gis
15a4: stsal bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te rig sngags 'chang sgrub pa dang bral bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gis ma nongs so// de lta bas na rig sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo sgrubs
15a5: pas gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya bsgrub par bgyi ste/ dgos pa de dag thams cad the tsom ma mchis par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas gsang sngags bzlas te/ oM a mo g+ha bA sha d+ha ra sar pra sa ra hU~M/ mchod phyir thogs pa'i skad
15a6: pa'i gsang sngags te/ gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ mdun pa gsum dor bar bgyi'o// oM a mo g+hA pra ba ra Na mu ru mu ri dbi bya ka shi kaM/ sa~M b+ha ba tu ta ta sAr+tha/ gos kyi gsang sngags te
15a7: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ / oM a mo g+ha pra sta dz+yod shi bA mi bo d+hi ni pad me sA tA/ gom stegs pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM dib byo ta ka sr-i b+hA ta a mo g+ha b+ha ru na tsa ri b+hi shin ts+ya hUM/ khrus kyi sngags snga
15a8: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ / oM a mri ta a mo g+ha pad ma a sa ne ba ri sha ni/ tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ nye reg gi sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha rak+Sha Ni ku ru ku ru swA hA/ bdag bsrung ba ste/ kus dkar dang cha ba la

15b1: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/ rang gi lus la dbang skur ro// oM a mo g+ha sa ma ya/ ma hA pa da me tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha tAM/ dam tshig gi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM sarba tA a mo g+ha ba ba ti tiSh+Tha rak+Shad+hA hUM/ slob ma dang grogs bgyi dpa
15b2: bsrung ba ste/ thal ba la lan bdun bzlas nas dpral bar thig le bgyi'o// oM trai lo kya pad ma a mo g+ha kra ma Ne mi'i mi li swA hA/ gom pa 'dor ba'i sngags ni lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// oM pad me ma hA pad me sa r+ya sa ra/
15b3: sa man te na ba ri be shA ya/ a mo g+ha ba she na su ru su ru swA hA/ tshon skud lnga lnga la lan bdun bzlas te bkri bar bya'o// oM bi tsing tre a mo g+ha ba tan na ra da ga bi shud d+ha ya/ ki Ni ki Ni sA hA/ ba dan gyigasang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM a mo
15b4: g+hA sha ra badz+ra tuN Da tha ra tha ra swA hA/ mda'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM bi bu la a mo g+ha ma hA d+ha ra bi shude d+he si ri si ri swA hA/ rta babs kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// su dag der zhugs na/ mtho ris kyi sgor
15b5: zhugs par 'gyur ro/ / sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// oM nA nA bi tsi tra a mo g+ha bus pa/ pha la la tI ki rna bA ra ya pa ra pa ra hUM/ bum pa gang ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha rang na bim
15b6: DA d+ha tsa a d+hi d+hi bi byA lhan do dz+wa la s+pha ra u0f7f/ sa man te na dz+wa la dz+wa la swA hA/ pog zor gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM dz+wal ba ti ngang nag+ha ta/ sa ri Ni Ti Ti Ti swA hA/ gtor mi'i snod kyi gas sngags te/ lan bdun bzlas so//
15b7: oM di bi bya b+ha tsan a mo g+ha pad ma ba re bu ru ya hU~M/ kham por gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha saM pU ra Ni droN g+han d+ha ba ti swA hA/ thig le'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM sa ra ni sA ra ya/ a mo g+ha b+hA dza ni mA da na
15b8: hU~M/ ril pa 'grin rings kyi gas sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM rang na dib bya rangan kr-i b+ha Niwe ga ra sa pU ra Ni sA hA/ bum pa'i gsang sngags te len bdun bzlas so// oM bi tsi tro d+hal nAn ro g+ha bi b+ha ga ta ya saM shod+ha ya d+ya ti sA hA/ tshon ci'i

16a1: gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ / oM dib bya a ba lo gi Ne bi b+ha dza ya tu sa man te nas mar Ne swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ so sor dbye bar bgyi'o// oM na nA pra ha ra Na a mo g+ha mud tA dz+wa la dz+wa la swA hA/
16a2: phyag mtshan bri bste lan bdun bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha ra nga na su trad+ha re ki Ni ki Ni swA hA/ thig skud kyi gsang sngags te lan cu rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te dkyil 'khor ram ri mo bris pa'i ras saM gzhan bzhi gang yang rung ba la gdab par
16a3: bgyi'o/ / oM bi bul ba la re bra pre sha ya/ a mo g+hA pad me hUM/ sgo'i cha dbye ba te sgo re re yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM su ba b+ha ga ti sum mang gal dA ra ba ba na ti/ oM dibi byA badza na/ a mo g+ha bA shan ba na ba re/ gi ri gi ri hU~M/ oM sa ma b+harma/
16a4: rU bya dib bya b+ha dza ni/ a mo g+ha pad me swA hA/ lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o// oM bi bi d+ha ru ba ha ro ba ka ra na/ tsa la tsa la/ a mo g+ha ba ti swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtse gcig bzlas so// oM di ba bya g+han d+ha nu sa ra ni a mo g+ha ba le d+ha ra d+ha ra swA hA/ mchod yon
16a5: gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ / oM g+han+d+ha s+pha ra ni sa man ta a mo g+ha pra bur hU~M/ dri'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM ni ra ma la kA ya sho d+ha ni dib bya gan d+ha pra pU ra ya ni pA ra ya hU~M/ byug pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun
16a6: bzlas so/ / oM g+han d+ha tsuN+Da pra bA ra ni/ tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ dri'i phyi ma'i gas sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM sa man te na bi ma le g+han d+hod ta re swA hA/ bskul ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM dbe bya g+han d+ha pra bA ra ni sA ga ra dza li di babya
16a7: a d+hiSh+Thi te ka la sho dar brA rna b+hA ra ya dza ya sad d+he swA hA/ bum pa'i dri chab kyi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM ra sa sA gra ba ti/ sarba bid+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te sa~M bu ra ya hU~M/ gtor maro sna tshogs can gyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
16a8: bzlas so/ / oM dib bya b+ho tsan/ sa~M bA ra yA/ bi bu la pra be swA hA/ kha zas kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM tri shukra b+ho dza na pa li'i ru la ra sa gra ba ti/ su ra pra sur hU~M/ zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma'am/ gzhan yang lan

16b1: nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ / oM ba la ba ti sa ra ba ti dpe bya ba na sma ti/ ta ra ta ra/ tu ni swA hA/ 'bras bu'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlaso// oM dpe byaban su mod pa la nA nA puSh+pe pra bar Sha ne b+ha ba swA hA/ me tog gi gsang sngags te lan bdun
16b2: bzlas so/ / oM bi bi d+ha la ta pun+d+ha pa kun bri ta ba nas pa te a ha ra saM pUr+Na kum b+he swA hA/ me tog tor ba'i sngags te lan bdun zlas so// oM mahA d+hU ba me g+ha phaT la sa na tsang ya/ sa man ten hU~M swA hA/ bdug pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa/
16b3: gcig bzlas so// oM atha ba ne dz+wal dz+wa la de mu khe swAhA/ me'i gas sngag/ len bdun pa zlas so// oM bi bi d+ha ma Nikan ka rang no rdul pAl Na ni oM b+hUm sA hA/ cha zhing rgyan pa'i gsang sngags te la na bdun
16b4: bzlas so/ / oM pad ma ka re bi ma lan kha ang gu li sa ma sa ma sarba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Thi ti swA hA/ thal mo sbyar ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM sarba guno bran ta shi ro bi dan yan maska ro mi li mi li tu ri ni sA hA/ phyag bgyi ba'i
16b5: gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ / oM da sha di sha a bi band na pra sa ra tu hUM/ bskor ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM bi bi d+ha yu d+ha dz+wa li ta ba ni/ pra dz+wa la pra s+phu ra hU~M/ thal mo'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu gcig bzlas so//
16b6: oM de ba bya a mo g+ha bi bu la swa re ma tAr nir g+ho Sha ru te na ra Na ra Na hU~M dril bu'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// ngan brgya rtsa brgyad do// oM rashrI dza la sa man te sa a ba b+ha sa ya mahA ma Ni rad ni shi khe swA hA/ mar me'i gsang sngags te lan
16b7: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ / oM d+hA ru d+hA ru a bA ha ya shi g+hA dza be hUM/ thugs pa'i gsang sngags te gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM duSh+Ta sa do bi bo d+ha ni sa ma sa ma ya ba re swA hA/ dam tshig gi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so//
16b8: oM bi tsi tra ma ni bi pu la pra ba ra ta ni hUM/ bgrang phreng gi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM bi tsir tra rang no dz+wa lo bidi bya/ ku su ma ba ri puSh+pa ra ti swA hA/ me tog phreng ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM dib bya lo tsa ne a mo g+he pra ba

17a1: re/ sarba dibi bya a d+hiSh+Thi te/ sid d+he shud d+habi lo ga ti swA hA/ dgug pa'i gas sngags te la na te bye rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha pad me sa man ta shu ba ne ta ra ta ra gats+tsha swab+hA ba na sA hA/ skar gshegs su gsol ba'i gsang sngags te
17a2: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ / oM rib byas bA ra Ni na ga bi lo ki na tAM/ 'khar gsil gyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM par tra m+bAr ni s+phA ra ya/ a mo g+ha btis man ta pra be swA hA/ lhung bzed kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/
17a3: oM dur b+ha sad s+phar bi d+ha ba.iSh+Thi ta pra sa ra su ra su ra/ ri Shi bA dzi te swA hA/ rtsa gding ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM dz+wa la du ma dz+wa la shai Shi rash+mi gar b+he swA hA/ sbyin sreg gi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM pad me ni pad/
17a4: mas ne ba re pra ba re nA ga b+hu ba ne sA hA/ 'bab chu dang mtsho'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM kha ga tsa ri ni/ ga ma ga ma ya prad pra tsa rare ne hUM/ len pa'i gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM sarbad tra a mo g+ha b+hi Sha ka ma hA tsuT bi ma le/
17a5: a b+hi shiny+tsi tu maM/ pra ba ra pa Ni b+hu dze bad marba dze swA hA/ dbang skur ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// rig sngags 'chang gis gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad so sor cho ga zhib mo'i sgrub pa ci lta ba bzhin du thams cad so sor sbar nas tshe
17a6: gsu bran dgos pa rgya chen po'i 'byor pa'i mthu 'di dag dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rin po che'i snod sna tshogs pa dang / nor bu sna tshogs pa'i gzhal med khang rgya chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lI'i me tog
17a7: dang / jug pa dang / bdan sna chags pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas kyi mchog dang / ra sna chags pa'i mchog rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gtar ma mang po rnam pa sna tshogs pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nitsa me bzhin gshes
17a8: ba la 'os pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa'i gzhal med khang ce lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam ci nga med na / bla ga sungs gru / ma da/ sun yangad / la yi / ma rji pa ya yis ci rnams

17b1: dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / so so'i gzhal med khang ci lta ba de lta bu dag 'azung bar 'gyur ro// mi rnams kyi khang pa ci lta ba dang / kha zas kyi mchog ci lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na dgos pa'i rnam pa thams cad dang de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i ci skad
17b2: gsungs pa cho ga zhib mo dang / chog dang gsang sngags sgrub pa rnams bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa bla na med pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang gis las yongs su grub par bgyis te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po
17b3: 'di brjod pa tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bdag rang gi gzugs kyis nye bar mchis nas bsam pa dang re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ / sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / gnod pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ yongs su dag pa'i lha chen po
17b4: ltar lus dag par bgyi'o/ / cho gzhib mo dang phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i mchog thams cad stsal bar bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang 'khor lo
17b5: sbyar ba chen po'i dbang skur bas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ / de kho na nyid yang dag pa sgrub pa'i grub pa stsal bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i nags pa'i 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa bsgrub pa'i sgrub pa chen po stsal bar bgyi'o// shin tu rgya che zhing bag cha
17b6: ba ma mchis pa dang / mchod pa dang bkur sti chen po 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog khyad par du 'phags shing nor 'du ba'i bkra shis dang dpal stsal bar bgyi'o// 'di la yid gnyis dang / som nyid bskyed par mi bgyi zhing / dngos po gzhan du yang yid la mi
17b7: bgyi'o/ / sems can thams cad la bams pa dang / snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis brtse ba la mchog du brtson par bgyi'o// bu cig pa bzhin du sems can dgyur pa thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o// bden par smra ba dang / bden pa la dga' ba
17b8: rag/ snyan par smra ba dang / snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pas dmigs nas/ don yod pi'azhags pa'i snying po bzlas par bgyi'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi zhing / phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kya zlas par bgyi'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi

18a1: zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yid la bgyis nas/ sangs rgyas yid la rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bgyi'o// 'phags pa mgon po spyan
18a2: ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag bgyis nas/ mngon sum du mchi bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo gzugs la phyag bgyis te/ mdun du rtsa'i gding pa bting nas dkyil mo dkrung bcas te mchis nas
18a3: gzhan mi smra bar bzlas par bgyis te/ 'di ni gsang 'i de kho na nyid sgrub pa'o// de nas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o// bdag la don yod pa'i nags pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid 'grub par gyur cig/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po thugs
18a4: rje can sems can la byams pa/ sems dag pa lag na pad ma can sems can thams cad la byams pa'i bdag nyid can gyi byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis rlabs pas/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs kun dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /
18a5: srin po lha min gsad ba pa/ 'jig rten skyong dang tshangs pa dang / drag po khyab 'jug gzhon nu stsogs// gzhin rje chu lha lus ngan dang / drang srong sogs dang de bzhin du/ zla nyi kun 'gyed gzhon nu dang / de bzhin dbang phyug dbang chen dag/ phyag rgya bcings btsam
18a6: gyis ni/ de dag myur du 'du bar 'gyur// sgrol ma bdun ni 'du bar 'gyur// de bzhin pha rol phyin bcu dang / mgrin sngon de bzhin gos dkar can/ de bzhin pad ma gar gyi dbang / rgyal dang rnam rgyal nyid dang ni/ lcags sgrog rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / lha mo
18a7: khro ga nyer mA ma kI/ / dpe med pho nya mo dang ni// 'jigs med dpal dang dbyangs can dang // pad ma ko ti ud pa la// pad mi so can de bzhin du// ti si yi ni rtse mo na// 'phrog ma 'byung ba'i mdag dang // de bzhin lagan rdo rje brgya/ mthu chen de bzhin rig 'dzin dbang
18a8: rdo rje 'chad chen de bzhin du/ / bcu gsum lha dbang lhan cig dang // sum bcu gnyis nas lha dag ni// gsang sngags phyag brgya bcings tsam gyis// de dag thams cad 'du bar 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs

18b1: cing ston par mdzad do/ / de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par gzigs shing rtag tu mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu mgon po 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyug spyan stong phyag stong dang // phyag rgya sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa lta 'tshal bar/
18b2: 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ bram ze'i cha lugs don yod zhags// mthong bar 'gyur te som nyi med// mgrin sngon dang ni rta mgrin dang // de bzhin rgya mtsho'i glong dang ni// mgon po'i zhal ni bcu gcig dang // de bzhin zhal ni bzhi dag dang /
18b3: mgon po 'jigs pa brgyad 'phrog dang // de bzhin 'jigs pa bsam mi khyab// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang ni// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// mgon po thams cad ston par mdzad// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams/
18b4: rgyal ba 'dren pa 'od dpag med// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs skor ba// mgon po mod la mthong bar 'gyur// gzhan yang sangs rgyas stong gi zhing dag ni// chu ba gang gI'i bye ma dang snyam pa'i// de bzhin gshegs 'bum bye ba brgya phrag stong// byang chub
18b5: sems dpa'i tshogs bcas yongs skor mgon/ / phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis mthong bar 'gyur// mthong ba chen po'i rnam par gzhan mthong te// nyin gcig bzhin du byang chub snying po dang // chos kyi 'khor lo de bzhin rdo rje'i gdan// de dag mi lam
18b6: snang ba mthong gyur par/ / de la yid gnyis som nyi the tsom med// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshud pa'am 'tshams med lnga// mgon po che la gdug sems nyid dang ni// byang chub sems dpa'i bar chad 'phags pa la// kha zer ba dang dam chos bslu ba dang /
18b7: rgyal bas gsungs spong mnar med gzhol ba dang / mi bzad dmyal ba bcu drug gnas pa dang / skal ba 'bum po thams cad skal cig 'gro la// phyag rgya gsang sngags zlas pa tsam gyis sam/ thos sam mthong ngam ming ni bzung bas kyang // sdig pa de
18b8: kun 'jig 'gyur som nyi med/ / don zhags snying po'i phyag rgya mthong ba yang // 'jig rten mgon dang mtshungs te khyad par 'phags// sangs rgyas 'bum phrag stong dang gang gA yi// bye ba brgya stong dag ni mthong bar 'gyur// byang chub snying por gtog

19a1: pa'i thams cad dang / chom kyi khor por ba skor bar mtshung sa// don mong rgyal po snying po phyag rgyud // gsang sngags mthong na bsod namam thang chen ci// sod nams phung po 'di dag 'phel bar 'byur// do tsham
19a2: rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/ / de ni dpag tu med pa so mnyi med// de nas rig sngags 'chang pa gas gyur nas// gtsang ma'i gos gos napa ni thog mar yang // yo byad bsgrub pa gtsang zhing spyod pa gtsang // rtag tu yan lag spos ni sna tshogs dang //
19a3: chags badrug/ bas rab tu badrug bgyis zhing // dpung pa lhag pasti'i spos kyis byug/ gtsang mo'is phyogs gcang mi'i gdan pa shams par// dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas ni byams sems dang // snying rje ljags sa de nyi mnyam bzhag nas/
19a4: phyogs bcu dus gsum gshegs pa'i sa sa rgyas dang // rtag tu 'jig rten dbang la phyag bgyi zhing / rtag tu bla ma mchod cing chos brtson// shin tu rig pas gagazhan mi smra bar// shin tu rig pas bsrung ba'i chog bgyi// shin tu bkra shis bla ma de'i
19a5: gAs/ bden par smra zhing snyan par smra ba dang // sems can kun la snying rje'i bdag nyid can// lhan cig rjes 'thun gyur nas de nas ni// phyag rgya 'di bcing bar bgyi ste// lag pa pad ma'i tshul du bzhag la/ sor mo rnams mnyam par cings te mthe'u chung zla
19a6: ba'i tshul du snying khar bzhag go/ / phyag rgya 'di ni don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste// byang chub snying po'i bar du rtsol bar bgyid do// mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug dgug pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM a mo g+ha bi kur bi ta sa man
19a7: ta/ a ba lo ka ya man sde yang a d+hiSh+Ti ti a mo g+ha ba me/ tsa bi tsar sa na tsar hUM tAM/ de ma thag tu ngus gsum la rnam par lta ba don yod pa'i rgyal po pad ma 'bar ba gsal ba'i tshe 'phrul dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyal pos shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang /
19a8: mnyam pa'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po mtha' dag cher g.yos par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'bum phrag brgya stong

19b1: du ga jugs/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ba tu dgyes shing sang sa rgyas kyi zhing mdzad pa'i thugs rjen pos phyag gser kyi 'dog ga brgyang nam/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyo bong ldog par 'gyur ro// sgrub ba dam pa don mod yinapa
19b2: par 'phrul pa'i khyo kya ba dzum gyur ro/ / dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / gshin rje dang / chu la dang lus ngan dang / khyab bdag dang / kun 'gyed gzhon nu la sogs bstan sa bsrung ba dang / skyob pa
19b3: dang sred pa bgyid par 'gyur ro/ / phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyi modo la sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad dang / 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang / chad pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// de'i grub pa yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro// las thams cad
19b4: bgyid pa'i phyag rgya thams cad du mchog lags par grags pa lags so/ / don yod dam tshig mchog grags pa// pad ma rgyas pa'i phyag rgya ba cing // 'dzub mo gung rnams pad ma lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyis la/ sen mo mnyam par bzhag pa'i
19b5: phyag rgya 'di bstan te/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor rtse ba'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM a mo g+ha ba da maM ku sha sa man yAn gri d+ha grihA/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA twa hUM/ phyag rgya bcings te bcings ma thag du'am/ bzlas pa tsam
19b6: gyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis legs so zhes bgyi bsnol bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dgyes pa dang mnyes pa dang / rab tu dgyes pa dang / tshim pa dang thugs dgyes pa
19b7: skye bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang la zugs rje chen po rgyas pa'i snying po grub pa dam pa stsol bar 'gyur zhing / yang nas yang du mthong bstsol bar 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa 'dam tshig grub pa stsol bar gyur sa/
19b8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyigasang pa'i dkyil 'khod kyi cho ga zhib mo phyag rgya dang gsang sngags badzin pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor bzung btsam gyis dam tshig rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// thams cad du 'phags bstan pa

20a1: gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du dgos pa'i gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa rtag tu ba/ 'tshal
20a2: bar 'gyur ro/ / lag mthil pad ma ltar bgyis la 'dzub mo gung mo rdo rje ltar bgyi zhing mthe'u chung brkyang ba'i phyag rgya ni// pad ma 'chang la bdug pa dang // me tog la sogs dri rnams dang // phreng ba byug pa phye ma dang // ba dan gos dang rgyan dang ni// gtor
20a3: ma mchod yon rab tu dbul/ / bum pa gang ba'i dri sogs dang // tshon skud sna lnga mtshon dbye'o// gzhan yang zas ni sna tshogs la// phyag rgya 'di ni kun la mchog/ 'di ni dbul ba'i phyag rgyar gsungs// thams cad du ni den yod mchog/ go bar bgyi
20a4: pa'i phyag rgya 'di/ / pad mi'i phyag gis byin gyis brlab// gung mo nor bus dkris pa lta bu'i phyag rgya 'di ni// bag tsha ba med pa'i pad ma rin po che'i phyag rgya lags te// 'di ni grub pa dam pa lags so// spyan drang ba'i gsang sngags te/ oM a mo g+ha
20a5: pad ma ma hA sat+ya a ya tu mi ha maN Da le/ / bi ri bi ri bi ri pad ma b+hu dze swA hA// dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// gsol ba gdab pa'i gsang sngags te// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang // phyag na pad ma gsol gdab dgug/ lha
20a6: rnams kun dang de bzhin du/ / dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha rnams dgug/ phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis// phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'ang 'du// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za lha min de bzhin du// nam mkha' lding dang
20a7: mi 'am ci/ / lto 'phye chen po nyid dag de// de kun skad cig 'du 'gyur zhing // srung ba'i phyir ni som nyi med// lag pa rdo rje'i tshul du bzhag la lag pa'i the'u chung rnams pad ma'i mtshams su bya ste// gung mo rnams yid tsa bskums pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa ni/
20a8: grub ldan 'di ni phyogs bcing dang // dkyil 'khor bcing bar bgyis pa yi// bsrung ba'i las la bag tsha med// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam dang // gsang sngags stong ni bzlas tsam gyis// dpag tshad bdun ni khor yug du// mtshams bcing dkyil 'khor bcing

20b1: ba dang / bsrung ba'i las ni bgyis par 'gyur// oM a mo g+ha badz+rad d+ha pad ma ban d+has man ta/ nam ha sa man tra/ shan du mAn/ tsu du tsu ru du phaT de nas don yod phyag rgya ste// grub ldan sems can kun sman// don yod pa yi phyag rgya ni// khyad par 'phas
20b2: ga nas / / da rgyal ma byung song pornamasasas pang bdag mi lag skye sa la yang marnams yid ma gyus pade// do me migs rgyal pa 'i/ pa'i phyag rgya na pang / gas// phyag tu de pas can du/
20b3: 'drug pa'i las kun sbyang ba dang / dkyil 'khor phyag rgya mchog kun gsungs// phyag rgya 'di ni gzang tsas dang // gsang sngags dam pas bsrung bgyis nas// rig sngags 'chang ba 'jug par 'gyur// dus gsum gshegs pa rnam thar bar/
20b4: dkyil 'khor dam pa grub par 'gyur// oM badz+re badz+re/ a d+hiSh+Thi ti pad ma bi shwa rU pa d+ha re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra hU~M/ pra be sha tus tri yang rA ga dan d+hi ri ru Ti sA dA// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis// de nyid grub pas phyogs bcu yi// sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam
20b5: drug du/ / g.yo bar 'gyur ba som nyi med// phyag na pad mi'i lus 'bar nas// mgu ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang la 'dzum bzhin gyis// rtag du lta zhing mdun na mchis// sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun dang // mtho ris sgo rnams
20b6: 'byed par 'gyur/ / sum cu rtsa gnyis gnas rnams na// gnas pa'i lha rnams sgo 'byed cing // sum cu rtsa gsum gnas sgon// gnas pa thams cad sto 'byed do// bad can 'jig rten khams dag ni// sgon gnas pa sgo 'byed do// phyag rgya 'di
20b7: ni bcings tsam gyis/ / gnas kun tu ni 'jug par 'gyur// phyag rgya sdig pa thams cad 'phrogs// nye ba'i nyon mongs thams cad 'joms// sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol// gnod pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid// dmyal ba bcu drug rnams
20b8: las thar/ / phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// mi bzad 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang // nyes byas thams cad 'jigs par byed// dmyal ba'i sgo ni bcing bar 'gyur/ mi bzad 'jigs las sgral bar 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam gyis/

21a1: mtshams med lda ni bgyis pa dang // sdig pa kun las rnam par thar// sems can kun las rtag sdug/ de bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis rlog/ phyag brgya 'di ni mthe bo'i rtse mo rung zad bkug la gzung ste// gung mo ba ni
21a2: ral pa'i tshul du bkyi ste/ / spyi bo'i ngal pa la bzhag pa na pad mi 'dil pa'i phyag rgya lags te// 'din don yod pa'i lag pa zhes skrags te// sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du gsang sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o// mi a mo g+ha pad mo
21a3: le bi shod+ha ya t+na/ bi ri bi ro ba ma le swA hA/ phyag rgya spyi bar bzhag nas cha ba dag gis bkrus nas gtsangams gsang sngags 'di rgyan brgyad du bzlas nas su// phyag nga lngags do/ sa med pas// rtag du bkrus pa'i mod tsam gyis// mi gtsang ba ni
21a4: gtsang bar 'gyur/ / mi gtsang spyod pa gtsang bar 'gyur// tshangs spyod ma yin tshangs spyod 'gyur// mi thub pa ni thub par 'gyur// bsod nams phung po lha bzhin 'bar// zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes// 'jig rten kun snying rtag du sdug gsad sngags blan
21a5: med pa 'grub/ / grub pa don yod zhags pa yi// don yod de nyid grub par 'gyur// lha rnams kun ni 'du 'gyur te// bsrung ba'i phyir ni som nyi med// mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// sems pa mchog sbyin dag pa po// mchog sbyin
21a6: rgyun du thams cad du/ / nyi ma re re mthong gyur zhing // tshe 'phel rtag tu nad med 'gyur// de bzhin mgu dang rgyas par 'gyur// thams cad du ni las 'grub te// gnod pa kun las rnam par grol// sdig pa kun las rnam par thar// thams cad du ni ba
21a7: shes mchog khrus kyi rnam pa di gni do mod khrus kyi mchog yin no/ / lag gnyis bsdams pa 'og/ du bstan// srin lagaganyis spya pa yum pa ni dang sa shor baphrag rgya lags te/ nas kya gis la bar bag/ phyag tu 'i
21a8: swa bu'adi/ / dkyil mod kyang ba cas mchis nas su// phyag brgya dag bcing bgyi zhing // mnyam par bzhag nas gsang sngags bzlag// bcings pa tsam gyi mngonas ni// dkyil dkrung rdo rje spun su 'gyur// kun nas go chang gyur nas ni// kekra

21b1: dang log khyen thams cad dang / / gdod kyi mi po byung po bcas// mnas pa' sdang gas mi mthong // phyogs dang phyogs kyi marnams dgang // de dag thabs cad rgyang ring 'brob// bgags med par ni las 'grub pas// bzlas pa'i lam la
21b2: som nyi med/ / oM a mo g+ha brda ni rtsa pa da ma thar dI/ thal mo mnyam par gyur la 'dzub mo dang // glang mo bkug nas mthe bo pad ma kha bye ba ltar bgyis te// don yod pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
21b3: mngan drags sngags dang phyag rgya bcings par bkyi'o/ / oM pad me shwa ra a mo g+ha ba ra d+ha/ b+hi ri b+hai ri swA dA/ 'dis thog mar bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyi'o// de'i 'og du phyag rgya bcings nas// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po de kho na nyid sems
21b4: dpa'i bsam pa rtse gcig du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / lan cig zlas pa tsam gyi mod la dus gsum du rgyun tu gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas 'bus phrag brgya stong gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa g.yo bar 'gyur zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
21b5: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ / rig sngags 'chad de la legs so zhes bgyi ba rtsol bar 'gyur ro// dbugs 'byin par mdzad do// rigs sngags 'chang de la 'od zer sna tshogs gtod pa mdzad do// mgon po 'phags
21b6: pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dran par bgyis pa tsam gyis mod la mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro/ / 'di ltar bcings pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
21b7: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad yongs su dag pa thob
21b8: par 'gyur ro/ / phyag rgya 'di bcings la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la/ yon tan dang phan yon rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis la phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad bcings nas/ zhag

22a1: gcig paspang ba bgyis te/ bzlas brjod pakyis na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin du mdun na ma chis nas rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya bstsol te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so//
22a2: 'di ni bzlas brjod kyi dam pa yin no// zhes dpung pa g.yas pa brkyang pa'i lag pas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas dbugs 'byin par mdzad de tshur shog bu/ gang 'dod pa'i mchog slongs shig dang sbyin no khyod rjes su gzu shing
22a3: byin gyis rlabs pas/ nga'i bu rig sngags 'chang gi thu bor gyur cig/ rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub pas/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rim par dbye ba dang / cho gzhib mo'i rgyal po
22a4: la brtan par gyis shig/ snying rje chen po'i sems kyis sems can thams cad la goms par gyis shig/ khyod 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal du gnas nas/ shi 'phos te 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / khyod par
22a5: ma'i nang du rdzus te skyes nas/ rgyan thams cad kyis ldan cing mtshan dang dpe byad kyis rab tu btsun pa byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
22a6: bgyis te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang na nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los sbyar bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'changar 'bum phrag bye ba stong phrag paca brgyad kyis yong
22a7: gaskor bar 'gyur ro/ / cod pag tum mchis par 'gyur ro// don rgya cher snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gang gi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpung bgus pa las brkyang bcam
