43b2: kyis dkyil 'khor brko bar gyi'o/ tig gi sil ma dang / dri dang rol mo cha byad dag 'god par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gi zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bathung ba ngan pa dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / gnas ngan pa dang lhag ma
43b3: dang sngags pa rnams blang bar bgyi'o/ / den yod pa rgyal po'i snying po nya khri cig stong gas nas/ lag pa g.yas pas chos kyi stan gyi sted du bzhag pa'i gags pa la gan to// lan nyi khri cig stod chad pa dang / de nas rag sngags 'chang
43b4: gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas te/ nyung sa da/ ra re re nas dbang yang bar bgyi'o// lan stod rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri ma'i gzugs la
43b5: mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang de bzhin gshegs pa shA kya thub pa la yang mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes bcwa lnga'i nya la nyin zhag gcig spang ba bgyi ba nam mchod
43b6: brgya cher bgyis te/ mchod pa'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad re re nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po la lan nyi shu rtsar re nas bzlas brjod bgyis nas dbul bar bgyi'o// de nas dkyil mod krung bcas te
43b7: mchis nas/ nyin mtshan kun tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ nyungs dkar re re nas brdeg par bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshad pa dang / cher g.yo bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
43b8: dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs las kyang 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / nor bu 'i zhags pa de yang 'bar bar 'gyur rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'bar ba tsam gyi mod la rig sngagra/

44a1: 'chang gi lag pa g.yas pas nor bu'i zhags pa blangs pan/ sgra chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lci'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na
44a2: mchis par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 'od kyi rgyal po'i sku gser gyi kha dog gi nam mkha' la rdzu
44a3: 'phrul gyis bzhugs nas/ rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur/ phyag dpung pa gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba brkyang pa'i phyag gis/ rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bor bzhag nas/ rig sngags 'chang la
44a4: dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par dag pa grub po// khyod kyis 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das
44a5: pa'i las sgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa grub ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'dod dgur bsgyur ba thams cad de 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod grub pa yid bzhin nor bu chen po'i zhags pa thogs nas/
44a6: rig sngags 'chang gis 'bad mi dgos par yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa grub pa'i rang bzhin 'dis/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrub par byed
44a7: pal ltos shig/ yid la ci ltar bsams pa bzhin rdzu 'phrul dang / tshe 'phrul sna tshogs la bltos shig/ rig sngags 'chang khyod shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du stong shig// 'on te bde ba can lta bar 'tshal
44a8: lam ci ltang de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i/ rdzas kyis mchod par 'tshal lam/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod par 'tshal lam/ lha'i me tog dang / lha'i dri dang / phreng ba dang / thug pa dang /

44b1: phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dral bu dang / ba dan dang lha ba lhub dang rgyan dang gos kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bgyi ba 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des spyi bo'i gtsug du da'i
44b2: dkyil 'khor bgyis la me tog dang bdug pa yang dbul lo/ / yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa zhags pa'i mchog 'di lag pa g.yon pas mnan la/ lag pa g.yas pas don yod pa yid bzhin gyi no
44b3: mchog bzung nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ 'di lta bu yid la bgyid pa chen po ci lta bu'i bsam pa yid la bgyid pa de lta bu yang bsams nas/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te/
44b4: phyag bgyi'o// yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po rgya chen don yod pa 'di bzlas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po 'di/ lan rgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen pos yongs su gdungs pa'i snying
44b5: gis sems can thams cad la mchog tu ba'artse bar bgyis nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / // 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// bam po lnga pa// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i madra
44b6: rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal po// yang dag par song ba dang /
44b7: yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// blo gros chen po shA ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas kyi mchog dga' ldan na gnas pa 'phags pa byams tha la sogs pa'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo//
44b8: bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags

45a1: paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dbang phyug la sogs pa'i lha'i bu gzugs sna tshogs mnga' ba spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo//
45a2: tad+ya thA/ oM ma hA pad ma tsin ta ma Ni ma Ni pa/ a bo g+h+ra ma Ni su ma Ni ma hA pa Ni/ sarba da thA ga da/ a la ka ra/ mahA a mo g+ha ma Ni/ tsad tsa ra san tsa ra/ na sha ts+tsha sha ra ma hA/ pad ma b+hu dza ba ra da/ ma hA bA ra nika/ mahA bi shwa ru pa d+ha ra/ pra pa ra
45a3: mahA bo d+hi sad dra pad pa d+ha ra pad ma a sa na pad ma ma ku Ta/ pA lA d+ha ra/ pad ma gaur/ pad ma a laM kr-id ta rA/ sahA swa neH/ nAnA b+hud/ pra pa ra na/ mud dra bi b+hU She da sa hA swa b+hu dza/ dza ya dza ya/ shad sa ha srang shi pra di man TaM da sha rI rA/
45a4: bA ra b+ha ra/ be tsod dra a b+ha ran d+ha ra/ ma Ni ka nA ka/ badz+ra bi dUr+ya ma ra ka da/ in d+ha rti la pad ma dAg b+hU Shi da shi dIr/ tsau raM tsa ra~M/ bi tsid dra tsa rat+ne/ ma hA b+ho de sa twa ba rad prab+da/ gI ma he shwa ra du pa d+ha ra pad me shwa ra/ lo ka shwa ra/ ya ma an+te shwa
45a5: pa ru Na/ ku be ra ri Shaka NA ku pa rA/ se nA ba di be sha d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA da b+ha da pe sha d+ha ra/ sarba da thA ga da a b+hi Shi ka da sa ma ya ma Nu smar b+ha ga ban/ bu ra ya ma sha na tA rA ya pu ran/ shA ya ya sad dran/ ta ra dza ya
45a6: tash+ma na/ b+ha da ya b+hi ga nAn/ ma ra ya pro do Sha ma laM sa ra sa ra/ pA paM hAM hAM hrI phaT phaT phaT/ sid d+ha sid d+h+ya/ ma hA tsin tA pa Ni/ a po g+ha pA sha d+ha ra/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi bu la sid d+haM/ ma ma pra yats+tsha/ ma hA kA ru ni ka/ bud d+ha
45a7: bud d+ha/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ sa bo d+ha ya sa bo d+hA ya/ ma hA pa shu ba ti b+hai Sha~M d+hi ra/ a na da bi kur pa na/ de d+his nad ri sha ra/ tu ru tu ru tar hU rA/ gag ne bi bu la bi mAn/ sad d+ha ri sha ka/ namo stu ste/ bi pu la pun d+ya/ ko shwa d+ha ra/ @
45a8: a mo g+ha sid d+he hAM hUM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM/ bi pu la ki d+hi ka re swA hA/ b+hu swA hA/ b+ha ra b+hA pa swA hA/ a mo gA pi pu le swA hA/ mahA tsin tA pa Ni/ sid d+he swA hA/ sarba sid d+hi ba ra d+he swA hA/ oM bi pu pe shwa ra/ lo ke shwa rA ma hA tsid ta

45b1: maNam hA a mo g+ha sid d+he hUM phaT swA hA/ / don yod nor bu'i zhags pa chen po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang gi lus thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa lag pas mnan na/ na ma khI
45b2: ngos la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro/ / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med
45b3: kyang tshogs dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang gzhal med khang mchog dang bcas pa rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// bde ba can gyi gnas mtha' dag tu
45b4: mchod pa'i char sprin gyi tshogs chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med kyi mthus mchod pa'i sprin chen por gnas par 'gyur ro// bde ba can na gnas pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag
45b5: med des rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang des kyang sgra de dag thams cad thos par 'gyur zhing / mchod pa'i char chen po de yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags
45b6: 'chang nam mkha' las chu shes par 'tshal na/ de'i tshe bsams pa tsam gyis 'bab par 'gyur ro// 'on te mi 'tshal na nam mkha' de nyid na mkha' la grub pa dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog don yod rgyal chen
45b7: gru pa yin nyi nor bu lag pa zhes bya ba'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ / dpag du ma mchis pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// tshe bskal pa chen po brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu
45b8: cha gnyis su 'gyur ro/ / 'on te bababs na lo khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra bar mchod pa dang / gus pa chen po bgyis par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bo gcig por 'gyur ro// lha rnams

46a1: kyang babs nas/ rig sngags 'chang de la mchod pa'i mchog rgya chen po dag bgyid par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro// /
46a2: lha thams cad kyis kyang kun tu srung zhing phyag bgyi ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por yang 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa byang
46a3: chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su ga pa dang / bcas pa rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad dang lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am
46a4: dang lto 'phye chen po sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa dang bcas pa la mchod pa bgyid par 'tshal bas/ phyogs bcu dus gsum du gtogs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsod nams kyi phung po
46a5: chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'tshal ba dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'tshal ba 'am/ lha ga bzas kyi mchog ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang / lha'i bcud kyis len gyi mchog gis de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang
46a6: chub sems dpa' dang rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la bstabs par 'tshal ba 'am/ sbyin pa mang po dang chen po gtong bar 'tshal ba 'am/ nyin re zhing mchod pa'i sprin bgyid par 'tshal na
46a7: rig sngags 'chang des legs par bkrus te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ ci 'byor pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bgyis la/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du me tog dang
46a8: bdug pa yang dbul bar bgyi'o bus mo gtsugs te thal mo sbyar nas zhags pa gzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bgyi'o// yid bzhin nor bu chen po rgya chen don yod 'di yang mchod par bgyi'o// ngakra

46b1: baspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o/ / yid la bgyid pa yangs pa rgya chen po mchod pa'i sprin chen po dang / sbyin gtor chen po dang / kha zas dang btung ba dang dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang
46b2: chos gos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang pa dan dang gos dang / rgyan dang ltab lbub dang / rgyan 'phyang dang rol mo dang sil snyan dang pheg rdo ba dang rin po che'i ljon shing dang / 'bras bu'i ljon shing me tog ljon shing dang / mar me'i ljon
46b3: shing dang dpag bsam gyi ljon shing yid la bgyis te/ gsang sngags kyi gzungs bzlas nas ci ltar yid la bsams shing don du gnyer ba bzhin phyogs bcur 'phangs na/ de'i tshe phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa dkyil
46b4: ' khor mtha' dag tu gtogs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'kho ba'i yo byad thams cad ma tshang ba ma mchis par ci bsams pa bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i
46b5: char gyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du 'kho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po ma tshang ba ma mchis par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mthu chen po'i nor bu rgya chen don po la mchod pa'i gzungs bzlas
46b6: shing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'di yang nyin cig bzhin du bzlas par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag
46b7: mnyes par bgyis pa dang / mchod pa bgyis pa dang / rim 'gro bgyis par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshogs chen po dang dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
46b8: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis rig sngags 'chang la dran pa dang / blo gros dang stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang gzi brjid stsol bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong

47a1: bar 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag du mchog sbyin pa mthong bar 'gyur ro//
47a2: mthong ba'i chos la 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'jigs pa 'jigs su rung ba dang / skrag pa dang / dngang pa rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro// nad kyis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro// rims kyis ma lags drug gis ma lags/ dug sbyar
47a3: mas ma lags/ sbyor bas ma lags/ mtshon gyis ma lags/ mes ma lags chus ma lag ste/ lus la ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro// dgras 'jigs par mi 'gyur te// pha rol gyi dpung gis 'jigs pas ma lags
47a4: pha rol gyi sde'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ phas kyi rgol ba dang mi 'dzar ba'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ lha'i 'jigs pas ma lags klu'i 'jigs pas ma lags te/ gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha'
47a5: ldi dang / mi'am ci dang lto phye chen po dang / srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba dang sbyor ba mo'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// dpag tshad gcig gi nang tshun chad bzung bar mi nus shing / rgyad ring por 'bros par
47a6: 'gyur te/ de la bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// gang dag mnar med par gnas par 'gyur ba'i sems can nam// mtshams med pa lnga bgyid pa'am/ 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa 'am/ dam pa'i
47a7: ches spong ba'am/ skal pa bye bar bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pas lus yongs su dkris pa gang lags pa de yang mthong ba'i chos la thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su gtugs par
47a8: 'gyur/ yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// gas tor gzhazhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyid cing / smyung ba lan gcig bgyis te/ bzlas brjod byas na/ de skal pa bye ba phrag brgya

47b1: stong du 'khor bar skye ba las phyir zlog par 'gyur ro/ / gzungs kyi bzlas brjod kyis las snga ma rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur zhing / skal pa stong du bsags pa'i sdig pa rnams nyams par 'gyur ro// 'khor ba'i nyes pas
47b2: phyir yang gos par mi 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad kyis pad ma bzhin du gos par mi 'gyur ro// mthong ba'i chos las lnga pa thob par 'gyur ro// bsnyen pa tsam mam/ cho ga'i bzlas brjod la ngas par
47b3: gnas na phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro/ / dran pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i rjes su mchi bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du lan brgya rtsa
47b4: brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ mthong ba'i chos la kun tu bzang po nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor phyag rgya thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / dam tshig thams cad la
47b5: zhugs par 'gyur ro/ / yang dag par skyed pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang mthong tsam gyis/ mnar med par gnas pa rnams kyi sdig pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// chung ngu na rig
47b6: sngags 'chad dur khrod du zhugs nas gum pa'i rus pa'am/ gum pa'i sha'ag/ gum pa'i ro rul pa 'am/ chung ngu na gum pi 'gos bor ba 'am/ cig pa'i ri mal rig sngags 'chang de'i grib mas phog par gyur na/ sarba
47b7: can de gang dang gang gis dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ba de dang de nas mod la thar nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis sam so mnyi skyed par mi bgyid na/ gang dag ches mang
47b8: lhag par byed par gyur pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ gang rigs kyi bu'am// rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong pa 'am/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba 'ga' nig gzungs 'di

48a1: 'chang bar bgyid dam/ brjod par bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ 'don par bgyid sems par bgyid/ bsgom par bgyid/ mchod par bgyidakhri bar bgyid/ 'drir 'jug par bgyid na/ de nges par bla na med pa yang/
48a2: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// mthong ba'i chos la yon tan chen po brgya stong mang po mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'di nyid bcangs na mthong ba'i chos la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / pha rol
48a3: byin pa drug dang rjes su mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / gzungs 'di nyid re zhig kun chub par bgyis nas/ 'kho ba'i yo byad thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur na/ dgos pa mang pos
48a4: grims par bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas rig sngags 'chang don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa bsgrubs nas yid la bsams te/ bsams pa'i las thams cad bgyis na rnas cu ba gyung / dgos/
48a5: pa dang bgyi ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// ci ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mngon sum du mthong nas/ lung bstan pa bzhin du don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhags pa 'di de bzhin
48a6: du blta bar bgyi ste/ 'di la yid gnyis mi bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa mgrin par btags la/ lag pa g.yas pas no bu'i zhags pa zlas te/ lag pa g.yon pas lcags kyu blangs na mi gda' bar gyur/
48a7: nas/ gang dga' ba der 'jug par 'gyur te mtshan mo yang nor bu'i 'od kyi snang bas nyin par blta ba bzhin mthong bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du lha'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin
48a8: dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci'i gnas dang / lho phye chen po'i gnas dang / ri sul gyi phug dang ri dang / nags tshal dang thang gi sgo rnams dbye bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du mi don par zhugs nas slar ldog par 'gyur

48b1: zhing ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro/ / mi rnams kyi nang du lci'i tshe lo brgyar tsho bar 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa dang nyes pa'i skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro// 'on te rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa'i don la brtags par
48b2: 'tshal na/ zla ba yar gyi de'i tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi la legs par khrus bgyi'o// gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// gtsang ma'i gnas sam phyogs su ba'i lci ba ste/ ba'i rnam lngas yongs su sbyang bar bgyi'o//
48b3: gnas de'i nang logs kyi dbus su dri'i dkyil 'khor bgyi'o// me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing bum pa gad pas brgyan cing / spos sna tshogs kyis dgos pa'i bdug pa bzhag par bgyi'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras
48b4: gzigs dbang phyug gis mdun du stan bzang po bshams te shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas zhags pa sbrul 'khyil ba'i tshul du zlum por dkyil nas bzhag par bgyi'o/ / dbus su nor bu bzhag par bgyi'o// de nas
48b5: rig sngags 'chang gis mchod par bgyi'o/ / don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas// khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas don yod yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i snying
48b6: po lar brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na de'i 'og du tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang du ru ki'i bdug pa dbul zhing nor bu la brtags par bgyi ste/ zhags pa dang de thams cad nor bu'i nang nas gda' bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa ga
48b7: pa'am/ / byang chub sems dpa' gda' ba 'am/ lha gda' ba'am klu gda' ba 'am gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci gda' ba dang / 'byung po dang / lto phye chen po
48b8: gda' ba 'am/ g.yul 'gyed pa gda' ba'am/ tshe ring ba gda' ba'am/ tshe nyasra ba gda' ba 'am/ tshe 'phos pa gda' ba 'am rgyal srid gda' ba 'am/ grong 'thob pa 'am/ yul 'thob pa dang / grong khyer 'thob pa dang / dbyig

49a1: dang gser dang nor bu dang mu tig dang be dur+ya dang / shang ka shil dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang dngul dang gos dang lhab lbub dang rgyan gda' ba 'am/ nor bskur ba smra ba dang mig 'phrul smra ba 'am/ zhing
49a2: smra ba'am/ gter smra ba 'am/ 'bru smra ba 'am/ bud med 'phrog pa'am/ las sgrub pa'am/ gsang sngags sgrub pa 'am/ dbang du bgyi ba 'am do tshar ba de dag thams cad nor bu'i nang nas gda' bar 'gyur zhing
49a3: dge ba'am mi dge ba dag thams cad kyang gda' bar 'gyur ro/ / lo'am lo phyed dam gnod pa'am/ la la ma yangs la/ mings chen po'am/ phyugs ngas sam/ gor ram tand dam glang po che'i nang ngam/
49a4: rang gi dpung ngam gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa chen po de dag thams cad me long gi dkyil 'khor la ci lta ba bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur lags so// bsams shing gang gnyer bar 'grub pa 'am/ mi 'grub
49a5: pa'am/ / dge ba'am mi dge ba thams cad gda' bar 'gyur te/ de la the tsom dang yid gnyis dang som nyi mi bgyi ste/ dngos po don gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// char mi 'bab pa'i dus su klu'i gnas su nor bu bzhag na/
49a6: ci tsam 'tshal bar char gyi rgyun 'bab par 'gyur ro// ha cang char ches na nam mkha' la nor bu bstan na char chen po 'chad par 'gyur ro// nyi ma 'char bar nyi ma la bstan na/ nyi ma babs nas mchog thams cad
49a7: rtsol bar 'gyur ro/ / zla ba tshes pa la bstan na zla ba tshes pa babs nas 'dod dgu thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar bgyid do// chu klung chen por bstan na rin po che rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nags khung du bstan
49a8: na/ sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis nas gang gnyer ba de len par 'gyur ro// ri phug du bstan na sman thams cad 'bab par 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de blang bar 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de

49b1: bar bgyi'o/ / bru'i phung po la bstan na 'bru thams cad 'du bar 'gyur/ gang du 'tshal ba der 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ma mo'i gnas sam nag po chen po la bstan te/ spyi bo'i gtsug du bzhag na nag pa chen po mamo tshogs kyi 'khor
49b2: dang bcas par gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas/ dbang du 'gyur zhing dgos pa thams cad dang / las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i mngon su ma du bstan na yan lag sha'i dpung dang bcas pa/ blon pa'i tshigs
49b3: dang bcag / btsun mo'i 'phor dang bcas pa/ dbyig dang gser dang / nor bu dang / macig dang / ben n+ya dang / sha kA shIl dang byi ru dang / sa le sna ma dang / dngu la dang / gos dang rgyan da / lbab ltab dang / rdzun 'chang ba dang bang ba dang /
49b4: ngo 'tshar du bcas pa dbang du gyur nas/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen skur bgyid par 'gyur ro// skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i nang du zhags pa 'phangs te don yod pa'i yid bzhin nor bu'i gzungs bzlas na ci ltar 'tshal ba yod la bsarba/
49b5: pa bzhin me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / gzhal med khang 'bab par 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan skyed ba'i rtse mor bzhag ste/ rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang srung ba khyam gyi steng ngam khyams su bzhag la/ 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad
49b6: kyi snyen gnas kyis sems can thams cad la mchog du brtse bar bgyid do/ / don yod rgyal po'i snying po la na nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bgyi'o// de nas don yod pa'i
49b7: yid bzhin nor bu'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad dgas dab stod de bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang nas/ ci ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin char du bab par 'gyur ro// nor dang 'bru dang gos dang lha ba lbub la stsog
49b8: ba me tog dang 'bras bu'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ / 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang mu ge'i dgon pa'i 'jigs pa dang / yams dang gnod pa de dag thams cad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

50a1: gi mthus babs par 'gyur ro/ / thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa rtsol bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang sha 'khoran thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// gdug pa nas gcan
50a2: zan khro bo'i thams cad kyi bar du yang byams pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ / sems can thams cad mthun par bgyid par 'gyur ro// yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags
50a3: pa chen po sgrub pa'i cho ga'o/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang ral gri dang zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang gis lcags chen po las ral gri sor bcu drug gi tshad du bgyis la la gzungs kyi ngos la dngul las bgyis te/
50a4: gser gyis 'bar bar bri'o// shing shun gyi skud pa 'am/ arga'i skud pa dang / kha che dar gyi skud pa lhan cig tu sgril la khru bcu drug byung ba shin tu tshad la bab par dkum pa bsgrub pa'i dgos pa yongs su rdzogs pa la sum sgril du
50a5: bkal bar bgyi'o/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang legs par khrus bgyis te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ zhags pa dang ral gri mnan la lag pa g.yas pra dkyil 'khor la bzhag ste bzung bar bgyi'o// khros pa'i gnyer gyi
50a6: bzhin gyis skyil mo dkrung bcas ste mchis nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad zlas par bgyi'o// bzlas brjod lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang na/ ral gri
50a7: 'bar bar 'gyur nas/ rig sngags 'chad nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur zhing / ral gri grub po'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi mthus zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro// lo khri brgyad
50a8: stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / 'on te lag pa g.yon pas zhags pa gzud la g.yas pas ral gri gzung ste/ khros pas hUM zhes bgyi bas mnan na mi gda' bar gyur nas/ mi gda' ba dang zhags pa dang ral gri grub pa'i rig sngag/

50b1: 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// tshe lo khri thub par 'gyur ro// 'on te rig sngags 'chang khros pas ral gri bskor na/ bgegs dang log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po sdug pa thams cad dang /
50b2: 'thung po thams cad kyi rig sngags bcad par 'gyur ro// g.yul gyi dbus su lan gcig skor na/ g.yul 'gyed pa'i mtshon cha thams cad bcad par 'gyur rengs par bgyis par 'gyur te/ thams cad phyogs bcur dbyer bar
50b3: 'gyur ro/ / dur khrod kyi nang du skor na dur khrod na gnas pa'i gdug pa rgyu ba thams cad kyi rig sngags btubs par 'gyur zhing / gnas thams cad stongs par 'gyur ro// phug gi skor na 'khrul 'khor dang sgo glegs thams cad bkrugs lnga
50b4: 'gyur ro/ / gtan pa thams cad gtugs par 'gyur ro// bdug pa'i mi ma yin pa bar chad bgyid pa thams cad bcom par 'gyur thal bar brlag par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos pa thams cad du ci ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du
50b5: bgyid par 'gyur ro/ / ral gri sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// de nas yang rig sngags 'chang sbrul gyi zhags pa sprul par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chad des skud pa lnga las sgrubs te/ tshon rtsis kha bsgyur ba'i skud pa tshad bzhin du btubs la/
50b6: sgrub par shin tu 'os par las sgrub par bgyi'o// de nas zas bzang po'i phye ma dang / ma d+hu'i me tog dang / ras si'i me tog dang / ldong ros dang / pad ma ge sar dang na ga pus pa dang / shing arka'i 'o ma de ltan gcig tu sbyar ba der btsag stsal te/
50b7: dus gcig tu lhan cig tu mnyam du btags shing spyi bor legs par smras te/ de la don yod rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas sbrul 'khyil pa mgo gsum gyi gdengs ka can yongs su 'khyil pa gser gyis
50b8: g.yog pa legs par sprul ba ni zhags pa'i mchog lags so/ / rig sngags 'chang gis legs par khrus bgyis la/ gtsang mas gos btsang ma dgos te/ ba'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi tshad bzhin bgyis te/ dris mchod snga

51a1: bgyi'o/ / kho tog gisil ma dang bum pa gang bas rgyan par bgyi'o// ba dan gyis kun nas rgyan par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gnas su snyan bzang po bshams te/ de'i steng du klu 'i zhags pa skyil nas bzhag
51a2: par bgyi'o/ / sbrul gyi mgo gdengs ka rabs pa ni kha shar phyogs su bstar to// dkar gsum gyi gtor ba bzhag par bgyi'o// mchod yon dkar po'i snong dang bdug pa rnam pa gsum po tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang du ru rnams
51a3: srag go/ / 'bras yos dang / nyungs skar kram pa'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ 'phags pa mun ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du bzhag la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis te/ rig sngags 'chang gis dkyil mo bkrung bcas te/
51a4: mchis nas bzlas brjod mang du bgyi'o// thog mar don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas khro bo'i rgyal po/ lan stong rtsa brgyad zlas pa'i nyungs skAr re re nas sbrul gyi mgo la gtor bar
51a5: bgyi'o/ / sgrub pa thams cad tshang nas ni/ rgyun tu sbrul gyi 'bar bar 'gyur/ bstan las zhags pa g.yo ba ni/ sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad tsam du bstan las gyen du 'phar bar 'gyur/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis gzung nas mi gda'
51a6: gyur nas/ gli gnas su mchis te/ klu'i mtsher mchis na/ klu'i gnas kyi sgo rnams dbye bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis zhugs te don yod rgyal po bzlas nas/ sbrul gyi zhags pa lan gsum du skor bar bgyi'o// de nas
51a7: klu rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa mchis nas rig sngags 'char la mngon du skabs rig sngags 'ang zhugs shig/ ces smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sbrul gyi zhags pa bzung ste bskor nas 'jug par
51a8: 'a/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis klu'i skyon de mi mthong zhing nub par 'gyur ro// 'khrul 'khor dang sgo glags dang gtan thams cad bdubs shing bcad par 'gyuraro zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la klu'i bu mo gzugs pa pang po 'angs pa

51b1: brgyan babs cad kyis brgyan cing klubs pa 'dzes ma mchis nas/ rin po che'i 'phreng ba thogs te/ rig sngags 'cha la dbul bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas skye bo la bzhag ste/ bzhag pa tsam gyi med la klu'i bu mo nam
51b2: mkha' la 'phur nas nam gnyis nas 'o ma gzags pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gis gzed nas btung bar bgyi ste/ tshe nyi khri thub par 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor
51b3: los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ / mthu dang brtson 'grus chen pos pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sbrul gyi zhags pa bzhag la don yod rgyal po'i snying po shing ka ra bi ri'i balcug ma la bzlas nas byab par bgyi ste
51b4: gang dang gang gi ming nas drangs shing yid la bsams pas mod la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / char mi 'bab pa'i dus du sbrul gyi zhagra pra mthon por skor bar bgyi ste/ lan gcig skor ba tsam gyis char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par
51b5: 'gyur ro/ / ha cang char ches pa'i dus su sbal gyi zhags pa gnas mthon por bzhag na char ha cang che ba las 'chad par 'gyur ro// grang ba'am/ klung ngam ser pa 'bab pa'i dus su nad par dngar klu'i zhags pa phyogs bzhir bskor nas/
51b6: dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug du ser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro// grang ba'i klung dang ser ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// lo khyud 'khor tshong bar 'tshams chen po bcings par 'gyur ro// nyin cig bzhin don yod rgyal po'i snying
51b7: po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhags pa lag pa g.yas pas brdegs la/ lag pa g.yon pas bskrad par bgyis na/ nyin cig bzhin lci'i zhal zas dang / btung ba 'dod dgu thams cad klu'i gnas nas byung
51b8: nas skye bo stong stong tsam la stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / de'i dug thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis dug ma lags par 'gyur ro// sbrul gyi zhags pa lag pa g.yas pas gzung la/ lag pa g.yon pas klu gzung nas/ dpyid dam ston kha

52a1: 'am/ sprin chags pa'i dus su zhags bskor la khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis te nam mkha' la 'phangs na me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog bzang po gang ci yang rung ba bzang po shin tu smin pa/ khabs shin tu bzang
52a2: po thams cad nam mkha'i ngos las sa la 'bab par 'gyur ro/ / gal te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig skor nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na/ klu'i gzhal med khang dang gos dang lha balbub dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / rgyan
52a3: thams cadas pa 'bab par 'gyur ro/ / gal te rig sngags 'chang gis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig las lhag par bskor cing khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de'i tshe klu 'khor dang bcas pa gzhal med khang dang bcas pA si'i steng du ltung byar/
52a4: 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang gis rgyal po brdzun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ zhags pa bzhag la nyungs skar la don yod rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas bsnun la/ de nas sprul
52a5: kyi zhags pa blangs te/ rgyal po'i khyim gyi phyogs gang lags pa der lhag par zhags pa skor na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas/ ji srid mtsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa na khri
52a6: po'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhags pa g.yul gyi dbus su 'phangs na sbrul gdug pa mig bskrad pa/ / lce sgyur ba mig me mdag ltar dmar ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam gyi mod la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa phyog bcur
52a7: dbye ba 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang ci lta ci ltar yid la bsam+ba pa'i don de lta de lta bur thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro// sbrul gyi zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// de nas 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi zhag pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ 'bri'i rtser pa dang / rtsing
52a8: pa chen po lhan gcig du skal pa dang / lcags las 'dud rtse gsum pa sor bzhi'i tshad tsam du bgyis la/ de nas don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ nyin zhag gcig mchi

52b1: la legs par khrus bgyis te/ tsang mas gos bcang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// zla ba mar gyi de'i tshes bcu bzhi'i nyin zhags gcig gis sgrub par bgyi'o// de nas bdud rtse gsum pa'i nags pa blangs nas 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi gzugs 'dabar/
52b2: 'gyur ro// 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po lo rgya stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'byung po'i gnas kyi gzhal med khar thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// zhags pa lag par thogs nas du khrod du thugs na/ du khrod na gnas pa thams cad 'dun du
52b3: mchis te/ gnas kyi sgo thams cad dbye bar gyur zhing khyod ci dgar zhugs shig ces ci 'tshal bde bgyid par 'gyur ro// de'i 'gul du btags nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na de nas ro langs nas ci dris pa de smra bar 'gyur zhing // ci dge bde
52b4: bgyid par 'gyur ro/ / dkrol na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi 'gul du btags nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas la khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas la khros pos drangs nas gnod sbyin de yang mdun du mchis nas/ rig sngags la rje gtsan bkra stsol cig/
52b5: dang / thams cad bgyi'o// zhes smra bA 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis khyod ji srid 'tsho bar du khro bo'i mngag bzhugs pa'i las bgyis shig ces smra bA bgyi ste/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes de nas nyin gcig bzhin sgo ba bgyis na las
52b6: thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ / gnod sbyin mo'i 'gul du btags te/ khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na gnod sbyin mo mchis nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'dun du mchis te rig sngags 'chad la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing / rig sngags
52b7: 'chad ci zhig don du gnyer zhes smra bar 'gyu ro/ / rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo la ma dang chung ma dang / sring mos bsgrubs par bya ba'i dgos pa gsum byos shig ces sgo bar bgyi'o// gal te ma zhig du bgyis na bu gcig pa bzhin du gza'
52b8: pa dang / btung ba dang / mal dang / gos dang / nor dang / 'brus yongs su skyod par bgyid do// chung ma zhig du bgyid na 'kho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi dbang phyug dang bdag por bgyid cing / de dang lhag par dga' bar rtse bas phyi bzhin 'thang bar 'gyuraro

53a1: gal te sring mo zhig du bgyid na/ yid la brnag pa'i 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// thams cad du rgyug cing slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro// nyin cig bzhin lta ba lhub
53a2: dang / gos dang / rgyan thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// nyin cig bzhin gzhan yang lha'i bu mo dag rtsed mo'i don du dgug par bgyid do// rnam thos kyi mgul du btags te khros pas drangs nas// khro bo'i rgyal po'i zlas brjod bgyis nas
53a3: denas rnam thos mchis nas nyin cig bzhin dong rtse stsol bar 'gyur/ gsar stong stsol bar 'gyur te/ des nyin bzhin sbyin pa yang stsol bsod nams kyang bgyi'o// nag po chen po'i 'gul du btagasal khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas
53a4: brjod bgyis te/ / khros pas lag pa g.yas pa'i thal cag gis brdeg par bgyi'o// nag po chen pos sgra phyung ba dang / rig sngags 'chang skrag par mi bgyi bar slar yang khros pas brdeg par bgyi'o// de mchi ma zags pa dang / rig
53a5: sngags 'chang gis mchim bzed de/ thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar gyur nas gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis slar yang thal mos brdeg par bgyis te/ de nas nag po chen po khrag skyug pa
53a6: rig sngags 'cha gas byugs na nam mkha' la mchis nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen por 'gyur ro// gu gul gyi bdug pas sngags nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlab na nag po chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis
53a7: nas ci 'tshal ba'i mchog thams cad rtsol bar bgyid cing / ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ci 'tshal ba bgyid pa dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// mdung
53a8: cegasum pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o/ / de nas gzhan yang zhags pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i ri mo'i cho ga de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa brjod par bgyidade ste/ 'jig rten mgon pos sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa'i kha dog gzugs

53b1: bstan pa'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ cho 'phrul sna tshogs gzugs stan te/ lag pa stong dang mi stong dang / mtha' yas pa yi phyag rgya bstan/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa yi gzugs// khams gsum dag du bstan pa ni// gdul bya gdul/
53b2: phyir gzugs bstan to// gsar pa 'di yi gzugs ston pa/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ rig sngags sgrub pa bla na med/ de nyid zhags pa sbubs phyir ro// de bas rig 'dzin shes rab can// 'jig rten pha rol rjes mthun pa/
53b3: sangs rgyas nyid don gnyer ba dang / de bzhin gshegs kun blta ba dang // bde can lta bar 'tshal ba dang // de nyid 'jig rten 'das pa yi// 'jig dbang mgon po mthong 'tshal ba// mchog du gus par bgyi ba yi cho ga'i rgyal po 'di
53b4: brjod kyis/ / de nyid gus par dad pa dang / shin du dang pa nyid du bgyi// grol ba sna tshogs 'tshal ba la// sna tshogs pa yi gzugs stan ste// sna tshogs thabs kyis grol bar 'gyur// don yod rgyal po cho ga'i mchog/ don yod
53b5: grub pa'i 'jig rten 'das/ / don yod 'bras bu dam pa po// don yod kun tu grub pa thob// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// don yod 'jig rten 'jig rten mgon// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa// don yod 'jig
53b6: rten ci 'tshal ba/ / mchog 'tshal pa ni grub par 'gyur// don yod rgya chen rdzu 'phrul gyi// cho 'phrul rnam 'phrul rgyun mi 'chang // de lta bas na kun bsgrims te/ bdag nyid yongs su dag bgyis nas/ ci ltar cho ga bgang ba bzhin/
53b7: rjes su mthun par ri me'i gzugs// rtag tu ri mo'i gzugs blta zhing // zhags pa gzugs ni sna tshogs dang // de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po dang // rig sngags rgyal pos de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor lha dang me lha dang // sprin sreg
53b8: rlung lha chu lha dang / / khro bo'i gzugs dang zhi ba dang / lha dang klu dang / ston pa dang / gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs dang ni// 'byung po lha min dri za dang mnam mkha' lding dang mi 'am cis// lto phye chen po'i gzugs kun du//

54a1: 'jig rten mgon po mchog sbyin bstan// gshin rje dang ni lus ngan dang // tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// gzhon nu dbang phyug lha dang mi dbang phyug chen po nyi ma dang // zla gzugs rgyu skar tshe grangs lha//
54a2: 'di dag rnams sna tshogs pa'i gzugs su 'jig rten mgon pos bstan// sems can rnams la phan 'tshal bas// gdul ba'i don du grol ba'i lam// sems can rnams la bstan pas na// de bas som nyi nyid mi bgyi// mchog
54a3: du dang par bgyi ba lags/ ci ltar mthun pa'i dgos pa rnams// ji ltar mthun pa bzhin du 'grub// ci ltar mthun pa ri mo'i gzugs// ji ltar mthun pa'i zhags pa bsgrub/ gnas 'di gang du 'os pa dang // gang du sems ni dga'
54a4: bar 'gyur/ / goms pa gang gi phyag rgya dang // gang gi dkyil 'khor char dbye ba// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon// kun tu grol ba 'dren pa'i gtso// don yod 'bras bu rtsol ba'o// don yod grub pa'i grub pa thob/
54a5: don yod dgos pa thams cad dang // grub pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni// mchog nyid la yang reg par 'gyur// zhags pa dang ri mo bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// de nas don yod pa'i wa dang dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga bsha
54a6: par bya ste/ sdig pa thams cad mod la 'phrog pa// sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa// dgra thams cad 'joms pa// bgegs thams cad nam pA 'joms pa// bdug pa thams cad zlog pa'i mchog/ sdig pa thams cad 'jig
54a7: lnga bgyid pa/ / dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bcu drug las grol ba bgyid pa// 'jigs pa mi zad brgyad rtag du 'phrog pa mi zad pa rnam 'joms pa// pha rol gyi dpung ldog pa'i mchog/ nad thams cad 'jom pa// mod la 'thab pa dang /
54a8: 'thab mo dang // rtsod pa dang / 'i gyed pa zhi bla bgyid pa// mu ge'i dgon pa 'jig pa bgyid pa// yama? kyi nad dang // gnod pa 'jom pa// lci'i bde ba 'dren par bgyi pe mchog de kho na nyid kyis dra rgyas sgrub pa// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med TI

54b1: mchog thag cad sgrub par bgyid pa/ / sems can thams cad kyi thun mong mchog sbyin shin du rnyed par dka' ba// lha namra rtag tu 'gu bar 'gyur ba// klu rnam dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur ba// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rtag tu nyin
54b2: mtshan du gzag par somanyi ma mchis pa/ / nga chub sems dpa rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba// sa kun tu shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas// 'jig rten dbang lhag mchog sbyin tagadum chis par sos tam mchis pa// rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor pa
54b3: bcas pa blon po dang bcas pa snang ba'i don du thams cad du rtag du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur lags so/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang shes rab dang ldan pas// gtsang ma'i gnas su mchis nas sbyin sreg bgyi ste// gtsang ma yi nis phyogs sam// ca tsam
54b4: mchis dben par ni/ / zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / drag shul spyod pa rnams bgyi'o// zhi ba semra can thams cad kyi// don du sdig pa thams cad 'joms// rgyas pa rgyas pa thob 'gyur te// tham+ba cad phun sum tshog par 'gyur// dgra dang log 'dren pa drug pa dang
54b5: gnod sbyin srin po gsang pa pa/ / gdug sems can rnams bred pa dang // skrag par sdig pa drag shul spyod// gsang sngags sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg te// gsang sngags sgrub pa'i bla na med// 'jig rten 'jig rten pha rol gyi// spyan sreg gi ni las bgyi'o// me
54b6: lde lha dang klu dag dang / de bzhin rig pa 'dzin pa'ang dgag// khung bskos de la pad mi 'tshul// pad ma rtag du bri bar bgyi// cho ga ji bzhin khung nang gi/ pad ma la ni ge sar gyi// gru bzhi 'am ni zlum po ste// de lta bu ni bsko bar bgyi// legs par byuH
54b7: shing shin tu sdug/ shin tu sbas shing tshad la dbab// chos grangs rgyu skar nyid dag dang / shin tu bkra shis dag la bgyi// bkra shis phyag rgya chen po ste// bzang pos gtor mi las bgyi'o// bdug pa me tog la sogs pa// bzang po dag ni 'khor bar dgod
54b8: thog mar me lha bkug nas na/ / de nas sbyin sreg las rnams bgyi// rig sngags 'chang la gtsang gyur pa// legs bkrus gtsang mi 'gos bgos nas// gsang sngags zlas pa'i cho ga bgyi// de la ma thams kyang bcing bar bgyi// bdag srung gtsugator

55a1: bcing ba dang / / gzhan srung dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / de bzhin grogs bgyid bsrung ba dang // rgyun tu a kir shing dpar te/ dri yi shing rnams nyid dag dang // mang dang nyungs dkar 'bras yos dag/ nyi shu gcig dbus po ston bgyi// de nas /
55a2: lha dgug go// oMn ma ag ni dz+wa la ma ha dz+wa la d+hod s+t+wa pra b+h+ra man Da la/ sarba bidi a hu ti/ pra tu ti rag ni rang tut+tadz+wa la d+hu ma shwa sa?/ a rtsiSh+Tha mu kha t+kaSh+Tha/ ra shrI ba ag ni byA bid tu ta sh+tsa tu ta sha mu mu kha na te/ sarba de bA rA/ sarba yak+Sha ma hA bIr+yam
55a3: tAdza/ ma ta pa ni ra ma ri shan/ sarbad ta ni pra phul la a kA shas phrag gang kas sh+tsa a ba pra sa kA sha na/ man Da la pA dzi / ma Ni Da sa rba tra di ba bya rub/ bi sha rA da/ A bA ta na sarbad tra bAn/ de bat+yata/ shan tuH/ shan tam si bi d+ha ma ka na/
55a4: en d+ha kA rAn/ mug ta rash+mi ma pri yang gu g+hanad+hapha lA ha rA/ sa ra sa ra/ a gra dza/ sug shwa mu tigany+tsa mri ti san tsi bi na/ pri yo bash+ma pu shwa b+ha sma b+has+thA tsa b+ha sma bsA ni/ se ba kaM/ b+ha sma sa na tsa d+ha nid t+yan d+hu mam+ba ku yA/ dzA ya se/ ba ka sid d+ha ras
55a5: thacang sacad ma pa ste/ sa cang mi ma rig // de i d+ha kun mu tsasi TI ka/ b+ha ba no pa lag ni gra d+hAnA ta/ sa na du pal bdag bdun// mtha par nid ba bar/ bi kA rang a Ar tra sa shi b+ha ka mas dus
55a6: ta/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ tiSh+Tha sa ma yan/ hu ru d+ha ra drA phaT swA hA// gsang sngags 'di lan bdun du// bzlas nas ma ni dgug par bgyi// gu gu la nyungs skar mar sbyar la// spar bdun sbar bas me la dbul// mchod yon/
55a7: snod rnams dbul ba yang / de bzhin spar bi'i spar bas so// dri rnams dang ni byug pa dang // bdug pa rgya cher dbul bar bgyi// de bzhin 'bras bu spang bar dbul// de nas chab kyis bsad pa bgyi// ci ltar lha rnams rim bzhin du// nye reg dag kyang
55a8: dbul bar bgyi/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis su// sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtson// dri zhim shin tu dag pa dang // bag sha u dum 'bar dang // snga ma'i me tog tsam pa dang // kar ni kar nyid dag dang // pad ma u ta pa la thang shing dang // de bzhin du

55b1: bda'i tsan dan dang / byang chub ljon shing shing dag dang / de bzhin gzhan yang dri ga da'i shing / 'on te 'bras bu'i shing mang dang / sha mi shi ba'i las lags pas// mchod yon de bzhin rtsa dag ste// de dag gis ni me spar nas sbyin sreg gi ni wa rnam
55b2: bgyi'o/ / bras yos tsan ngan phye ma dang / a ka ru dang ru ruka/ kun du ru la sogs pa dang / du dka' bcas smri ka dang / spang smos sprin yang gu blangs te// de dag lhan cig sbyar sres shing / mar dam mang sar lhan cig kyi don yod rgyal nI
55b3: gsang sngags ni/ brgyan brgyad bzlas ma la dbul// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad kyi sbyin sreg bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / nam phyed na me lha rang gi gzugs 'bar bar shin tu gnas la lagras
55b4: phyogs bcur lta zhing kun tu brtags nas/ / rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba rtsol bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// bdag tshim par byas pas rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga grub
55b5: kyis mchog slongs shig dang / / thams cad sbyin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ci lta bu'i 'dod pa'i mchog rnams blang bar bgyi ste/ ci ltar blang ba bzhin thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod yon
55b6: gyi snod dag dbul zhing gtor ma dbul ba'i las bgyi'o/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mar dang bsres pa'i gong bu chen po dag gis sbyin sreg bgyi zhing / 'bras bu'i shing spa ra nas// don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa
55b7: brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / stong u0f7fbrgyad tshang ba dang / thab kyi dbus nas skyes pa zhig lus phyed tsam phyung nas// rdul gyi zhong ba kha zas kyis bkang ste/ pus mod mad dbul bar 'gyur ro/ rig sngag 'chang gis blang bar gyi te/
55b8: spangs pa tsam gyis na mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngag 'chang gi lus la me 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de 'tshal na tshe lo khrir 'gyur ro/ nam ma khA rig sngags 'chang gis 'khor los bsgyur ba 'gyur ro// skal pa bcu tshun tshod

56a1: kyi sngon gyi skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ / don yod rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor kha ton du gnas par 'gyur ro// gal te snod me len na de'i tshe yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis
56a2: na cher g.ye bar 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gyi gzugs kyi mdun du mchis na/ rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par bgyi ste/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis
56a3: sprin sreg ga cho ga de bsgrubs zin byes/ mchog slongs shig dang / sbyin no zhes de'i tsher rig sngags 'chang gis ni bsams pa'i mchog smras pa/ de'i tshe thams cad stsol bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang thug
56a4: gis skyes pa de la snod zings te/ rang gi la gnas rig sngags 'chang stsol bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gis spangs nas zas kyi gong byu bza' bar bgyi'o// 'tshal ba tsam gyi modo la nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis
56a5: mchi bar 'gyur ro/ / lus las me'i snying po 'bar ba'i kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don yod rgyal po'i rig sngags 'dzin 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// / 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i
56a6: cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po drug pa// // gang gA'i klung bye ba khri phrag brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba rnams kyi rig sngags 'chang gis yongs
56a7: bskor bar 'gyur ro/ / gang gA'i klung gi bye ba khri phrag brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang don yod rab tu gnas pa'i gnas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rin po che sna bdun rtsig nas
56a8: med khang ri dang tshal dang nags tshal dang bcas pa me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs yal ga dang / sbal mig dang / lo ma dang / tsa ba dang / myu gur bcas pa'i kha cig ni gser gyi me tog/ kha cig ni dngul gyi me tog/ kha cig

56b1: ni rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i me tog dag go/ / gzhan yang lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag dang / ta ma la dang tsam pa ka dang lcag ma'i me tog dang / ta la dang glan d+ha bar shika dang / sna ma dang yu thi ka dang / tar na dang / kub s+yA ka'i
56b2: me tog dag dang tshal dang nags tshal dang / bskyed mos tshal dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang gis mdzes par bgyis pa'i gzhal med khang thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur zhing dga' ba dang yid mgu ba dang / yid du mchi bar
56b3: 'gyur ro/ / lha'i chu klung dang 'bab chu dang / rdzing lha'i tsan dan gyi dri'i chab kyis yongs su gang ba de la rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i gzhal med khang dang / lha'i pad ma dang ud pa la dang ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar pos legs par
56b4: rgyan pa'i cha ba gser gyi bye ma lags par rdal ba'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / lha'i bu mo dang mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang dri za'i tshogs kyis dga' bar bgyis pa/ lha dang lha ma yin dang dri za dang / klu dang rig 'dzin dang /
56b5: mi 'am ci'i tshigs kyis yongs su skor cing lha'i 'byor pa gzhal med khang legs par bstabs pa'i gnas na thams cad du rtse bar bgyi dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur sbyor bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug pa nas byang chub la
56b6: mchis kyi bar dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba na yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du che'itshed gcig tsam du skyong bar bgyid do// de bzhin du grub pa bla na med pa chen po/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid byang chub kyi snying /
56b7: po la thug gi bar du rtag du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te/ de ltar zas kyi gong bu bsgrub pa'i cho ga shin tu rnyed par dka' lags so// phyogs bcu mtha' dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang ldan
56b8: cig 'grogs nas mchi bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las mngon sum du chos nyan pa thob par 'gyur ro// de'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar 'gyur ro// don

57a1: y od pa'i zhags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang sngags dang phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs
57a2: par bsgrub pa'i cho ga thams cad dang / cho ga zhib mo rgya chen po mtha' dag gi dkyil 'khor 'di kho na nyid du gnas par 'gyur lags so// klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag brgya stong rnams de'i dbang du gyur nas rtag par rgyun du mchi bar 'gyur ro// lha dang klu
57a3: dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// 'og min gyi gnas kyi lha rnams rig sngags 'chang de'i phyi bzhin rtag tu 'brang zhing rtag par
57a4: kun du yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ / lha'i ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang rnam pa sna tshogs dag lhun gyis grub par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gos dang lha ba lbub dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal med
57a5: khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa sbyin sreg gi cho ga don yod pa sgrub pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i grub pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'on te skal ba chung pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa bon ma mchis pa zhig mchis la
57a6: des snod de blangs pa tsam gyi mod la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 'thob par 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// reg pa tsam gyi mod la tshe lha'i lo brgya khri bzhi stong thub par 'gyur ro// de la phyis kyang nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur/
57a7: te/ thig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyis nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro// phas kyi rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba dang / bdug pa dang rab tu sdug pa thams cad nub par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
57a8: dang / yi dgas kyi yul thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi mchod gnas gcig por 'gyur ro// bud med dang skyes pa dang khye'u dang bu mo dang sems can thams cad lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// thams

57b1: na rgyas byung / / tshig na nga yod pa kho gyur ro// m+bu rjes sa bzhin gagags thams ca gzigs pa shed pa gyung po// phags pastan sa gas dang phru ladon sun tho pa
57b2: 'thar ro/ / dran pa shin gyi bang bzhag nas dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// sa pa gyis nas sprul pa mnyam par 'jig rten gyi khams pade bcan du skye bar 'gyur te/ padamal rdzas to ste pa gaklung ni ste ban par 'byur ro// na ga
57b3: yang phyir ngan song du mchi bar mi 'gyur te/ phyir yang mi'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rtag du mchi ba
57b4: 'gyur ro/ / dpral bar thig le bgyis na thams cad du mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// me lha rtag par rgyun tu dran par bgyis pa tsam gyis/ rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// dgos pa thams cad bgyid
57b5: par 'gyur ro/ / de nas don yod dgongs pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des 'bras dang / ku la ma shar sres te bsgril la bsgongs nas/ mar dang bu ram dang sha kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi ldan du rdzis nas bil ba'i tshad tsam du bgyis te/ de'i 'og tu
57b6: shing ka ra bi ra'i me sbar nas/ bsgongs pa re re la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ me'i nang du sbyin sreg bgyis te/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad tsam sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chad yungs dkar dang / me tog
57b7: kyi rnyid pa dang sres te lan nyi shu cig bzlas brjod bkyis nas ma'i dbus su brtsal bar bgyi'o/ / bras yos dang yungs dkar la khro ba'i rgyal po lan d+han+da brgyad pazlas nas gtor bar bgyi'o// de nas me'i dbus nas me sku lus byed nas byung nas/ rin
57b8: rerje bdun las bgyis pa'i snod zas bslangs pas bskad nas/ rig sngags 'chad la rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis zas bskongs pa sgrub pa'i chog zung zin gyi lha'i zas bskongs pa chen po long shig ces stong bar bgyid// de TI ga ga' rang gi rbas gongs pa sa

58a1: deng ba rnas pacam yodas nga sa me rdzunas rnamapa' la su ra gyu 'o/ / 'phrul pa yang tha ga/ gas pa yongs su gapar 'gyur / gas sngags pa 'a ba bas byu
58a2: rig sngags 'chang gis 'khor los bskur ba drug khri brgya stong gis yongs su skor bar 'gyur ro/ / me lha gnas dang gzhal med khang dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du mchis nas/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang
58a3: gis bskongs pa la reg pa de yang thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro/ / don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par
58a4: dbye ba dang bcas pa chog zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du gnas pa 'di / nyin gcig bzhin shu log stong klog gam 'char bar bgyid na/ tshe rjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// bad ma las rdzus te skyes nas skyebs
58a5: par 'gyur ro/ / lan 'ga' yang phyis dran pa rjed par mi 'gyur ro// tshig btsun par 'gyur ste sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// mchod pa chen po'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro// dpral ba la thig le bgyis na mi bda' bar gyur nas/
58a6: 'byung po dang gnod sbyin dang srin po thams cad dbang du gyur nas/ gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// bud med gang zhig bu'i ched du zas bsgongs pa de 'tshal na bu gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang
58a7: ldan pa snyed nas yun ring du 'tsho zhing yid bzhungs pa dang mkhas pa dang / bstan chos thams cad la bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas skye bo 'bum zas btsal bar sems na/ 'o ma'i phug pa bsgrub par bgyi ste/ gnas gtsang ma gcom
58a8: sbyangs par shing ka ra bi ra'i lcug mas dkrug cing don yod zhags pa'i snying po gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyis te/ de nas khro bo'i rgyal po cheb dang nyungs dkar la bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor bar bya'o// de nas zas bsgongs pa gcig

58b1: brjod kyi nangs phyung sa 'o thag gi dang dbul lo/ / nas char bgos te thogs par na mchog gsum la bsod snyam dbul bar brgya'o/ 'i 'og byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dbul bar
58b2: de'i 'og du 'phags pa 'jam dalal dbul bu gyi'o/ nga'i 'og du dge byang dang bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang rje'u rigs dang / dmang rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang / bkren pa dang / sug 'phongs pa dang lam gyis
58b3: drab pa dang / slong mos pa rnams la rab tu sbal bar bgyi'o// ci tsam du skye bo 'bum ci 'tshal bar kha zas 'tshal du stsal kyang / snod de gang ba 'am bri bar mi sngon zhing de bas par mi 'gyur ro// gang dag zas de 'tshal ba de dag sngon gyi sdig
58b4: bdang sgrib pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad dang las kyi rgol ba thams cad dang / mi mdzang pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang / gnod
58b5: sbyin dang srin po'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ / lus mnyen cing 'jam par 'gyur ro// nga ro lta ltar mnyen cing stan la/ dga' bar bgyid pa ma yin pa'i dbyangs su mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu dub pa'i sdug bsngal thas
58b6: cad yongs su spang bar 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bde ba yang dag par stobs par 'gyur ro// tshe rjes nas bde 'gro thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'o ma'i thug pas lhung gzed bkang nas/ de gnas mthon po bla gab med
58b7: par dkyil 'khor bgyis te dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lhung gzed de dbus par bgyi'o// phul ba tsam gyi mod la chu bo gaM gA'i bye ma 'bum phrag rgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs
58b8: bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar/ lha'i zhal zas ro rgya dang ldan pa'i lha'i zas sgongs pa dang / lha'i thugs kyis lhung bzed bkang ba dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor

59a1: b ya ga sasug sa na sa sa ma sa ga' sa na
59a2: 'dra dang bcas pa lha'i 'al zas dang ldan pa'i mchog gis bsgrubs par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag thams cad
59a3: kyis rig sngags 'chang yon bdag de'i yon spyod par mdzad do/ / gang gi phyir yon sbyangs nas/ skal pa dang 'thun pa'i tshe 'di nyid dang / gzhan du dbang phyug chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// grub pa chen po'i gser gyis 'byor bar 'gyur ro/ tshe
59a4: dang bar 'dzod mang pos rgyas par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis de la srung ba dang / skyab pa dang sba ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// /
59a5: de nas rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang btsas pa dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des legs par khrus bgyis te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ 'o thug mar dang bsres pa 'dis lan
59a6: brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ / sgron shing dang arka'i shing gi yam sreg shing gis me spar bgyi'o// sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad tshad pa dang / rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam/ nor dbang
59a7: dragyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ bags ma dub gyis na klu'i rgyal po thams cad gnas dang 'khor du bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// rab lngar bgyis na 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang /
59a8: nam mkha' ldi dang mi 'am ri dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi ma lags pa thams cad dang / mi thams cad 'khor dang bcas par dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// nub bdun du bgyis na rig sngags 'dzin thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis

59b1: par 'gyur ro/ / nub thams cad du bgyis na/ brgya byin la sogs pa sum bcu rtsa gsum rigs kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs thams cad dang / gtsang ma'i lha'i bu mo thams cad babs nas dbang du gyur te/ ji srid mtsho'i bir du bsnyen bkur
59b2: bgyid cing mchis par 'gyur ro/ zla ba nyanas brtsams te mar gyi ngo'i tshes nyi shu gsum mam gnam stong gi bar du dus gsum du yan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis la/ a ka'i shing ki yam sreg shing gis me sbar nas gnam stong gis
59b3: rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas/ rig sngags 'chad la legs so zhes bgyi ba brtsol bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chad legs so legs so// da mnyes par byas kyis/
59b4: rig sngags 'chang smos shig dang / mchog sbyin te gang gnyer ba de thams cad sbyin no// gter smra ba 'am nor sbyar bar smra ba'am/ zhing smra ba 'am/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ mi snang bar bya ba 'am/ gsang sngags smra ba 'am/ cho ga zhib mo grub
59b5: ba de dag thams cad sbyin no/ / rgyal po nyid dam blon po nyid ma yul bdag nyid dam/ phyug po nyid dam grod rdal 'thob pa 'am/ gos 'thob pa 'am/ ba lang dang rta dang ma he dang rnga mo dang lug 'thob pa 'am/ nor 'thob pa 'am/ 'bru 'thob pa de dag
59b6: thams cad sbyin no/ / nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ mi snang bar bya ba'am rdzu 'phrul 'thob pa 'am / ting nge 'dzin thob pa 'am gzungs 'thob pa'am/ phyag rgya da dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo bsgrub pa dang / ro langs bslang ba'am/ rig 'dzin
59b7: sgrub pa nyid dam ral gri'i rig 'dzin nyid dam/ nam mkha'i rig 'dzin nyid dam/ zug du 'jug pa 'am dur khrod du 'jug pa 'am/ nags su 'jug pa 'am/ ril rgyu ba de dag thams cad sbyin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar
59b8: yid la bsams shing smras pa de dag thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/ / rig sngags 'chang la bstan tsam gyi mod la dri med don yod lta ba zhes bgyi ba lus yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde

60a1: ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad ma'i ze ba'i dbus nas rdzus te pad ma las skyes nas skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor
60a2: phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par dbye ba dang bcas pa cho ga zhib mo mtha' dang bcas pa' rdzogs te/ byang chub kyi snying po la zug gi bar du kha ton du gnas par bgyi'o// de nas la ru'i sbyin sreg gi chog bsgrub par 'tshal na rigs 'chang des
60a3: zas las la du stong rtsa brgyad bgyis la/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stod rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas legs par khrus brtsis te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// de nas la du mar dang sres
60a4: sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ / shin tu dri zhim po'i shing shi yam bsreg shing gi me sbar bar bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshad pa dang mi'i dbus nas khye'u zhig byung nas snod lha'i la rus bkad nas dbul bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yungs dkar ya lan bdun
60a5: bzlas te/ khye'u de'i la du gtor ro/ khye'u des rig sngags 'chang la spras pa rig sngags 'chad khyod ci zhig don du gnyer/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'dod pa thams cad byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// des smras pa rig sngags 'chang snod kyil du khyer cig dang /
60a6: 'dis khyod kyi dgos pa dpag du med pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'di ni khyod kyi mchog yin no// rig sngags 'chad long shig 'di ni khyod kyi grub pa'i mchog yin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis snod gar ba de blangs te khye'u la yang khyed kyis khro bo'i
60a7: grogs kyis shig ces brjod par bgyi'o/ / khye'u yis smras pa// dgos pa thams cad sgrub pa'i thogs paci'o// ga sngags 'chang gang gi che dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe/ gu bral dang tsan dan lhan cig bsres la mar dang zungs dkar sbyar nas don mod
60a8: lugs byas pa dun pa zlas te bzlas brjo kyi'o/ / ma ga'i shing gi me srar ro na cig pa ces pa tsam gyi med la bad/ bkrug pas mod pa ma yinas gos pa thams ma thu par bgyi'o// thams cad kyi'o/ srid pa ci'i bar

60b1: bkur bgyis shing bskur stir spyad par bgyi'o/ / gegs dang log 'dren dang 'byung po dang gnod sbyin dang srin po thams cad zlog par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis la ru de la reg par bgyis na/ nam mkha' la 'phur nas/ rig sngags 'cha
60b2: gis rigs thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ / ga sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis 'khor los sgyur bas ya phrag gnyis dang bye ba phrag bdun gyis yongs su skong bar 'gyur ro//
60b3: tshe'i tshad lha'i skal pa drug khrir 'gyur ro// sgra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// la du lhung bzed kyi nang du stsal te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'dun du bzhag nas/ don yod rgyal po'i khro bos dbang sbyar te de nas dge sbyong dang
60b4: bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang rje'u rigs dang / dam da rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang bu mo thams cad la sul bar bgyi'o// longs spyod du stsal kyang bas par mi 'gyur gyi/ slar zhing slar zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ji srid du lhung bzed
60b5: na la du mchis pa de srid du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ de srid du skye bo 'bum 'bum mang zhing phal cher bar stsal kyang / gtugs par mi 'gyur ro// la ru la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de'i 'og du gang du reg
60b6: pa der yang ga ser bzang por 'gyur ro/ / la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ klu'i gnas su 'phangs na de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po mthar btugs pa'i klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur
60b7: sgo na char 'bar bsgo ba bzhin char 'bebs par bgyid do/ / ci bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// ha cang char ches na bsgo ba bzhin ha cang chang chen po 'gums par bgyid do// rlung dang grangs pa dang tsha ba dang ser ba thams cad bsgo pa tsam
60b8: gyis bcod par bgyid do/ / brag gi sgor la dul lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ phug gi sgor bsnun na phug gi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro// 'khrul 'khor dang gtan pa dang / sgo grogs thams cad dum bur bcag par 'gyur ro//

61a1: gnas na gnas pa thams cad phyir byung nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te bsgo ba bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur ro// nags tshang tshing gi dbus su 'phangs na/ nags tshang tshing gi gnas kyi sgo thams cad phye nas sman gyi rdzas thams
61a2: cad rang gi gzugs kyi 'dun na mchis par 'gyur ro/ / la dul lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dung khrod chen po'i dbus su 'phangs na 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bcas pa'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad dbye bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin
61a3: dang srin po dang 'byung po thams cad sgren mor gyur na/ thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur zhing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyur ro// rma ma byung ba'i mi ro la/ dri chab gyis khrus bgyis la la ru la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
61a4: brjod pa gyis te/ lag pa gnyis su sprul la/ gos dkar pos ro g.yogs nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po tsha ba dang yungs dkar la lan bdun bzlas nas/ dbang bkur na ci dris pa de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ bde ba dang lo legs pa dang / lo nongs pa
61a5: dang / nad dang gnod pa dang 'tshe ba dang / pha rol gyi dbang // phas kyi dgra bo dang / mi 'dza ba'i 'jigs pa dang / mi ngas dang yams kyi nad de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba smra bar 'gyur ro//
61a6: dmyal bar skye ba smra bar 'gyur ro// tshe ring ba 'am tshe thung ba smra bar 'gyur ro// dus ma lags pa'i/ 'chi ba smra bar 'gyur ro// gter gyi gtam smra bar 'gyur te/ nor sbyar ba'i gtam 'am/ zhing gi gtam 'am mig 'phrul gyi gtam smra bar 'gyur
61a7: rochog zhib mo grub pa dang / gsang sngags grub pa dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'grub pa smra bar 'gyur ro// mig sman 'grub par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la mchi ba dang mi ganga' bar bgyi ba dang / ro langs spang ba dang rigs mngag pa dang dgra
61a8: chen pas bsad cing / dbang du bgyi ba de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// smra tha pal smra bar 'gyur ro// nyams pa smra bar 'gyur ro// 'phel ba smra bar 'gyur ba nas bskal pa las 'das pa'i 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i bar

61b1: sra bar 'gyur / / na pa dag sngags 'chang gis rab kyi kha yul la la dra ga sa na kyil bar 'gyur ro// dral lan nyi shu rtsagacig zlas brjod bgyis nas// rgyal ba'i rnam ldanan/ rgyal po'i btsun mo'i lo dang bcas pa
61b2: bdag nyid dam nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ / gong khyer gyi sgor bsnun na/ grong byer na gnas pa'i skyes pa'am/ bud med dmakhye'u dang bu mo thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'grang shing nor chen po 'du ba 'grub pa
61b3: 'thob par 'gyur ro/ mchod pa'i gnas chen por 'gyur ro// la dul lan bdun bzlas brjod pagyis te/ dpal lha mo chen mo'i lag par stsal na/ dpal lha mo chen mo dbang du gyur nas/ no chen po stsol cing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis
61b4: par 'gyur ro/ / la rul lan rgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ lug ma'i nang du stsal te/ mtshan khung du bsrel bar bgyis te/ ci tsam srel ba de srid du mi ganga' bar gyur nas/ gang du stsal ba der 'jug par 'gyur ro// gang na shing
61b5: gcig pa 'am 'bab chu gcig bar bdus khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te dbang skur nas shing gi drung du brdegs na/ 'dod dgur sbyar ba dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// ci ltar bsams pa'i 'dod pa
61b6: thams cad nye bar mchis nas yongs su spyod pa dang ji srid mtsho'i bar du 'chis par 'gyur ro/ / la ru la lan nyi shu bzlas brjod bgyis te/ ma mo'i gnas su nag po chen po'i spyi bo'i gtsug du bzhag pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun zlas te/
61b7: chab dang yungs dkar gyis dbang skur ba bgyis na/ de nas sbyor ba mo thams cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du gyur nas mngag bzhug pa las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te nag
61b8: po chen po'i lte ba'i phyogs su bzhag na ma mo'i tshogs thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas/ mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// la rul lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod

62a1: bgyis nas/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi lhung bzed kyi nang du stsal te/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur bgyis na ji srid du lhung bzed na la du mchis pa de srid du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar/ lha'i zhal zas ro
62a2: sna tshogs kyi ro'i mchog dang ldan pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang bcas pa tshim par bgyis par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / byang chub
62a3: sems dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis rig sngags 'chang de'i yon spyod pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/ / la ru la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i dbang skur la/ lcags kyi'i rgyal pos
62a4: chab la bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ me thab kyi 'tshams bcing bar bgyi'o// de nas arka'i yam shing gi me sbar la/ la du de me thab kyi dbus su bzhag ste/ mar dang yungs da/ dang zho dang sbrang rtsi basbrel lan rgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// lan rgya rtsa
62a5: brgyad tshad pa dang / me lha mI ring bzhin gyi gzugs kyis byung nas/ rig sngags 'chang la smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// bdag tshim par byas so bdag dga' bar gyur to// rig sngags 'chang bdag gis mchog du dga' ba thob
62a6: kyis rig sngags 'chang ci ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin 'dod pa smos shig dang / mchog sbyin no// rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin mchog brjod par bgyi'o// me lha des yang thams cad stsol cing dbang du gyur nas mchis
62a7: par 'gyur ro/ las thams cad grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// me'i phung po'i dbus su zhugs na 'od zer stong 'gro ba rnams gangs bzhin du gsil bar 'gyur te/ chab nas 'byung ba bzhin no// lag pas me rnams tshugs par bgyid do/
62a8: 'bar bzhin du smad pa'i spyi bor bzhag na skra nyag ma gcig kyang 'tshig par mi bgyid do// de'i dbang du mchis par mi 'gyur ro// 'bar bzhin du g.yar gyi nang du bsrel na cung zad dro ba tsam du yang mi 'gyur ro// lus la bab na ci ltar

62b1: tsan ngan bzhin drabs pa zhing bde bar 'gyur ro gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs bgyid par 'gyur ro/ / gos kyi mtha' mar thum po bgyis na tshig par mi 'gyur ro// ba kyi nang du stsa la na 'gum par mi 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg thams cad kyi chog so so
62b2: gzugs su mchis par 'gyur ro/ thams cad du dgas pa grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// dgos pa gang dang gang gA gas pa de dang de dgos pa thams cad grub par stsol bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du gsang sngags dang dkyil 'khor dang chog grub pa thams cad lang
62b3: 'bog par 'gyur ro/ / dra ba dang rlung dang / me 'bar ba'i shugs kyis dpag tshar stong du mchis shing slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad nye bar ston par 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// thams cad du grub pa stsol bar
62b4: 'gyur ro/ / de nas don yod me 'brab bla med 'bar bzang bsgrub 'tshal na/ yid bzhin nor bu lta bu dang / gzi brjid nyi ma dang mnyam pas/ phyogs bcu khor khor yug gi/ kun nas su ni gsal bar bgyid/ sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mchod pa bla na med pa
62b5: 'grub bcud kyi mchog de dam pa lags/ nor sbyar smra ba bla na med// gzhan yang mchod pa sna tshogs pa/ sgrub pa bla na med pa lags// ci ltar nyin bzhin mtshan gda' bas// nyan par gyi ni gdugs dang mtshungs// lan gcig dgos pa sgrub pa na/ legs pa
62b6: las bgyis nor bu dang / rdzas sres legs par bgyis pa la/ gtsang mas bzlas pa'i las rnams dang // gtsang mas sbyang bas sgrub pa dang // don yod chu dang me dang ni// me'i shing rnams brjod par bgyi// me 'bar 'od dang mtshungs pa ste// de dag thams
62b7: cad cig spungs yin/ yam sreg chog bla na med/ tsan dan dang ni seng ldeng dang / ba tang ka ra bi ra dang // arka sha mi skrag ma dag/ shi ri/ ka nA ka ri ka/ 'o ma'i shing dang byang chub shing // p+la ga sha dang ni sna ma dang / g+han d+ha par shi pad ma yi/ rtsa ba dang ni
62b8: lomar bcis/ khad ma dkar ba kram ta/ ud pa lam tig le maH/ bi ca brar bil bshad/ sin ma la pa// drag bcwam rgyams cab sa ci ka/ shi de kun ka bcus pa la// yam theg sheng gis las bgyis te/ sa gang ma dang

63a1: dang ni/ sbrang rtsi 'bras yos sbyin sreg bgyi/ bzang po'i las las srang gsum dang / 'tshal las gnyis 'gyur gang bskus kyang // srang gcig tsan dan dkar po nyid// srang bcu sdong ros srad cig ste// de da/ ba sres pa'i rdzas rnams dang / de bzhin yung ni
63a2: gnyis gyur dag/ zhi ba dag ni bskang nas su// me thab dbus su gzhug par bgyi// sbyin sreg steng ni rtsa brgyad du shin tu mnyam bzhag legs gsal ba// gtsang ma gtsang mar spyod pa yi// gos gtsang lags par khrus bgyis pa// dri zhim dri yis bsgos
63a3: bar bgyi/ ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dang // me tog 'bras bu nyid kyang dgod// bzlas brjod kyi ni sbyin sreg nyid// stong rtsa brgyad ni tshang ba dang // de nas lha bshos gtor ma dang // me tog bdug pa mchod yon sdod// dbul te 'o mas mngag ma 'gum// 'o mas
63a4: zhi gzhi bar bgyi/ de nas rig sngags 'arang gis bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis nas/ yungs dkar gyis bsnun par bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyishu rtsa gcig du dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhig de la mchod par bgyi'o//
63a5: de nas zangs kyi sgrom bu'am// dngul gyi sbom bzhig nas nor ba blangs te/ sgrom bu der bzhag te/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu ci lta ba bzhin du 'di yang don yod pa 'bar ba mthu chen pa'i mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// mtshan mo ni zla ba'i 'od bzhin du gda' bang
63a6: 'gyur ro/ / nyin mo ni nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du ganga' bar 'gyur ro// nam byed pa'i dus kyi tshe nor bu bzhag na 'tsho ba dang sreg pa dang 'tsheng ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// ma hom bsrid pa'i tshe/ thab kyi dbus su bzhag te bsreg blugs kyis smin sreg/
63a7: bgyis na/ ma chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro// thams cad kyi thams cad du dgos pa rnams sgron mas gsal bar bgyis pa bzhin du 'gyur ro// g.yul ngo chen por g.yul 'gyed pa'i dbus su skyes pa dpa' bo legs par khrus bgyis ba gos gtsang ma bgos pa/
63a8: madz+ra dang go char gnams pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po de skye bo'i gtsug tu bzhag nas gcig por g.yul gyi dbus su zhugs na/ nas skyes pa da me 'bar ba gcig bur 'gyur ro// nas g.yul 'byed pa'i pha rol gyi dpung rnams/

63b1: phas par gyur nas phyogs bcur 'khrugs nas 'byer par 'gyur ro// phyi nas lan 'ga' yang pha rol gyi dpung dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dgra dang mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ lag pas nor bu
63b2: gzung nas phug gi gnas su zhugs na gnas kyi sgo thams cad dbye bar 'gyur ro/ / gnas na gnas pa thams cad mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro// klu'i gnas thams cad du mchis nas lag pas nor bu gzung ste/ gnas kyi nang du zhugs rba/
63b3: chab thams cad kyis phyir mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// de nas klu thams cad mdun na mchis nas/ bden par dam bca' bar 'gyur ro// dbang du gyur nas ji srid mtsho'i bar du las bgyis par 'gyur ro// bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// le tog
63b4: dang rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / nags tshal thams cad bde bar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// mnyan cing mdangs dang ldan pa dang gnyen par 'gyur ro// gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang mi bde ba yang chung bar 'gyur ro// sems can
63b5: gang dag gis kyang lo tog dang me tog dang 'bras bu la longs spyod par 'gyur ba de dag thams sha dang / gzhan chos mang po dag gis dgos pa mang po bgyid par 'gyur ba ni/ nor bu chen po don yod 'bar ba'i nor bu me 'bar ba chen po lags so//
63b6: denas don yod snang ba rnam par lta bas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkug ste/ rang gi gzugs su lta bar 'tshal na// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// lus legs par bkrus te/ spros
63b7: chab kyis byugs par bgyi'o/ / shing arka'i yam seg shing gis me spar bar bgyi'o// yungs dkar dang a ka ru dang tsan dan dang zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar sbyar bas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas don yod lcags kyu gu gul la lan nyi shu
63b8: rtsa gcig gi bsreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg bgyis na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis sam// mchog thams cad bsams pa bzhin yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// ci ltar yid la bgyid/

64a1: cing bsams pa'i mchog stsol bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ci ltar yid la bgyis shing bsams pa'i mchog smras pa dang / de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad rtsol bar bgyid do//
64a2: de nas mig sman sgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des legs par 'akrus te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// nub gcig smyung ba bgyis te des zangs kyi za ma tog bgyis la de nas mig sman so'i pir dang / yungs kar nyis 'gyur du
64a3: bsres pas dgang bar bgyi'o/ / de nas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas thab kyi dbus su bzhag par 'gyi'o// de'i steng du u shi ra dang / yungs dkar dang / tsan dan dang zho dang sbrang rtsi dang // mar bsres pas lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o//
64a4: shing arka'i me spang bar bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / de nas mig sman blangs la gtun gyi steng du legs par zhib tu btags la ldong ros dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsir bsres nas slar yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya
64a5: rtsa brgyad zlas brjod bgyis la/ don yod snying po'i rig sngags rgyal pos lan nyi shu rtsag ci bzlas brjod bgyis pa ni/ thams cad du 'gul ba legs par sbyar te/ de nas den yod rgyal pos dbang srur bar bgyi'o// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya la na
64a6: ban phyag rgyab cing / de nas mig sman gyis thugs na nam mkha' la 'brar nas rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro// cung zad la khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// la pa khrir 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// pral bar zi le bgyis nam gda' bang
64a7: ga sa gas sa ma thagasas rgyas pa brgya ma tho nga rnas pa dang ba ma pa gyu / ma pa po rjod gyur ga/ na sa da#
64a8: sna ba'i rnamasapa/ zus bcad kyim ma mig 'a yus na 'ashegs dang log je dang/ na kyi gas kyi lharnams thams cad kyis ma mamang par gyur / rgyas kyang bshegs kyad par mam te/ kha pan cang par 'gyu//

64b1: bde bar grub pa'i cho ga dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga 'grub par 'gyur ro// mig la blugs te skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na de dag thams cad dbang du gyur te nor dang 'bru dang / gos dang lha ba lbu brgyan phal po che 'grub par 'gyur ro// nga me
64b2: kyang mig ma 'dzums par lta bzhin du bdag nyid dang/ no dbang du 'gyur ro// mig lathugs te dgan pa chen por zhugs natshim pa dang g.yon can dang / rkun po dang / gcan can dug pa dang sprus dang / byig drug dang / sbrul gyi du/ gi 'jigs pa thams
64b3: cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ de legs susu ngam mchi bar 'gyur ro// 'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad la mig sman sas na smra ba rnams kyi blan med par 'gyur // thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// yul ngor g.yul 'byed pa'i na
64b4: dumachis nas mig labyugs na/ thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing / 'jigs pa thams cad las bsgral bar 'gyur ro// gdug pas zin pa thams cad la mig la skus na/ gzug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis
64b5: pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang rims zhag bzhi pa thams cad la mig la skus na/ rims thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// dug mi bzad bar 'tshal ba la mig la bskus na// dug ma mchis par 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad kyis zin pa la mig
