64b6: la bskus na/ gdon brgya khri bzhi stong las thar par 'gyur ro// mig bro 'tshal ba la bsdus pa tsam gyi mod la byang bar 'gyur ro// glang pa phyed bro 'tshal ba yang mig la skus pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i srin po'i gdon dang / brjed
64b7: byed kyis zin pa la yang mig la skus pa tsam gyis thar bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po khros pas gsod par 'os pa gang su yang rung ba khrid pa la mig la bskus pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad spangs pa'i thar la cu 'o// nag po chen po'i mig la
64b8: skus na rang gi gzugs kyis ngus nas mdun na mchis nas/ mchog thams cad stsol cing dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// ma mo'i tshogs thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// dpal lha mo'i mig la bskus te/ mig mi

65a1: bya/ 'dzums par don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun pazlas na/ dpal lha mo chen mo mchis nas dgos pa thams cad dang 'bru mang po rab tu stsol bar 'gyur ro// nyal ba'i tshe mig la skus nas nyal na/ rmi lam bzang po mang zhing babab che ba mthong
65a2: bar 'gyur ro/ / phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// dran pa dang blo gros rgya chen por 'gyur ro// mig la skus te tshogs kyi dbus su zhugs na mchod pa chen po thob par
65a3: 'gyur ro/ / phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan gyi mig la skus na// rtag tu mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// gi wa dang lhan cig sbyar te mig la skus te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na
65a4: dbang phyug rgya chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ / longs spyod chen po phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyur ro// don chen po 'grub par yang 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i btsun mo dang blon po'i tshogs dang 'khor thams cad dga' bar gyur nas/ thams cad dbang du gyur te/
65a5: mchis par 'gyur ro// dpal lha mo chen mo'i gzugs brnyan gyi dpal skus na/ 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing / las bgyi ba ci mchis shes thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// nag po chen po'i gzugs brnyan gyi
65a6: dpral ba dang mig la skus na gnod sbyin thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ / mi ro'i mig la bskus na ldang bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang dug sbyar ma dang byad kyis zin pa thams cad kyi mig la skus na dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang gsang sngags thams
65a7: cad bshig par 'gyur zhing lan 'ga' yang slar zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro/ / bkres pa'i mig la skus te/ grong du zhugs na bza' ba dang btung ba'i ston mo lhun gyis grub cing 'thob par 'gyur ro// bsod snyoms pa'i mig la
65a8: skus te bsod snyoms la mchis na/ kha zas sna tshogs mang po dang yon phal po che thob par 'gyur ro// sme ba dang ling tog dang rab rib dang chu bur dang mtshan mo 'thom pa dang g.ya' ba dang / tshag bo dang mig gi rdzi ma rdung ba dang / mig sde

65b1: po de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / mig nad thams cad las sos par 'gyur ro// lha'i mig dag pa 'dab bzang dang / mtshungs pa mda' ba zangs kyi mthong ba thob nas thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang / dbang du gyur nas nor rnyed pa dang don sgyub yang
65b2: thob nas/ dbang phyug bla na med par 'gyur ro// nas nor dang 'bru dang / gos dang lhag lbub dang rgyan 'chang thams cad 'gug pa dang / 'phel bar bgyid pa dang don yod me lha dgug pa'i sbyin sreg rgya chen po brjod par bgyi'o// grub pa kun gyi bla na med/
65b3: don kun grub pas mong la ni// mkhas pa mchog tu dga' bar bgyid// dbang phyug skal ba phun sum tshogs// mod nyid kho nar 'thob 'gyur bar// the tsom du yang mi bgyi zhing // yid gnyis nyid kyang ma lags so// gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos/
65b4: dag dang // legs par bkrul pas las grub po// sbyin sreg bla na med 'phel ba// 'di ni rgya chen bsam mi khyab// ka ran rtsa bsdong bur bcas// 'dab ma me tog 'bras bur bcas// a rka'i shing dang bla ga sha'i shing // ya ma sreg dag gis me
65b5: sbar la/ / sa bon badran po 'bras dang bcas// 'bras yo sa til dang yungs kar dang // zho dang sbrang rtsi mar dang ni// yungs mar dag dang bsres pa yi/ sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad tshang bgyi// khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis dbang skur ba tshang ba dang /
65b6: de nas don yod lug kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ gu gul dang ske tshe'i 'bras bu dang / mar du sbyar bas sbyin sreg bgyi'o// dgos pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang / de'i tshe bza' ba dang btung ba dang / gnas mal dang stan dang nad
65b7: kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad dang nor dang 'bru dang mdzod dang / bang ba 'phel bar yang 'gyur ro// gos sna tshogs dang lhab lhab dang rgyan dang rgyan phreng dang me tog dang dri dang phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams lhun gyis grub pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug gi 'byor
65b8: brgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/ / de nas zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la nyin zhag gcig mchis nas mig la skus te/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu bzlas brjod bgyis la wa

66a1: po'i rgyal pos dbang skur nas/ don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya bcings te/ de nas mig la mig sman bskus na/ nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchis par 'gyur ro// mig sman 'grub pa'i dgi sngags 'chang thams cad
66a2: kye gcog/ rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ban 'gyur ro// zla cung zad yang 'khyil bar 'gyur ro// la bathar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// mig sman 'di mig la byugs na nyin par smra ba bzhi du mtshan mo mthong bar 'gyur zhing mi gda' bar yang 'gyur ngo ro//
66a3: 'byung po dang gnod sbyin dang / srin pa'i gnas thams cad du zhugs na thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro// phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i tshe gzhib mo'i rgyal po// bam po btsun pa// / mig sman 'di mig la byugs
66a4: nas ma mo'i gnas su zhugs na/ lha gtso ba de dag mig mi 'dzums par lta bar bgyid la khro bo'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas par bgyi'o// de nas ma mo dang gtso bo'i lha thams cad mdun du mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol par 'gyur ro//
66a5: jisrid 'tsho'i bar du las thams cad bsgrub par bgyid par mchis par 'gyur ro// ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bkur cing snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// rtag par rgyun tu srung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / sba ba'i phyir gnas shi
66a6: rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas gi wang sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga brjod par bgyi ste/ don yod rgyal po grub pa yis// rig sngags 'chang ba bde myong zhing // lha dang lha min mchod pa dang // sgrub pa'i don kun 'grub pa dang / dbang du gyur
66a7: padam pa dang / mkha' la mchi ba'i dam pa dang // mi sdang shin tu rnyed dka' dang / song la phug du 'jug pa dang / nags kyi nang du 'jug pa dang // ri su la dag tu 'jug pa dang / thang dag la ni rmya ba dang // klu gnas mtshor ni 'jug pa dang /
66a8: de bzhin du klung che sprul dang // rdzu 'phrul grub dang byis pa dang / de zhen 'jigs pa sgri ba kun dang / nga kun zhi bar bgyid pa nyid// sdig pa thams cad nyams par babyed// g.yul de g.yul las rgyal bgyid de// rtag tu dgra kun

66b1: brtag par brjid/ gded rigs kun kyang tshar gan ci// gas rnams thams cad zlog par babyed/ blon gyi slob pa 'jig cing cing // rdzog pa thams cad nyams par bgyid// bang byug stsal cing rgal pa sus/ nor dang na
66b2: 'phel bar bgyid/ thabapa 'thab ma rkyong ba dang / 'byed pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid/ cer bdang ni shing TIg dang // khod skem skyugs srog bye ma rjo// rgyal po bdug pa thos pa yis/ gsang ba sa pasel bar bgyid/ dag 'di la rten
66b3: pas myi bdag bsdug ba'i shA zhi be kun las grol bar 'gyur/ / da can chub pa dang / na kun pa da par // sa ca shin snying // la po btsun po 'khong sa ma pa'i// ga du rnang can dag ca 'gyur /
66b4: dge sbyong bram pa nyid nga ni/ rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dmang rigs dang / bud med kun dang de bzhin pa// skyes pa kye'u dang bu mo le// rtag tugs ce dag su gyur// srang blan med pa po// di la gang dag rtag rtenan/ 'phags pa 'jig rten
66b5: dbang byug ste/ mtshan kyad rtag ta mchod par brjid// tshangs pa kyab 'jug dbang phyug ce// nyin dang mtshan du bzung ba dang // rtag tu mchog col phyir mches so// gzhan yang g+hu ni mang po dang / laM rgyal po mthutshan dang / byung po gnod sbyin/
66b6: po dang // grul bum mi man lto 'phye che// dri za lha min nyid dag dang / nam mkha' lding dbang mthu chen ste// de dag thams cad srung ba yi// ched du nyin dang mtshan dag tu// rang dbang nyid kyis gnas par 'gyur// gi lnga dgrub pa dam pa po// de ltar stobs
66b7: dang ldan pa lags/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang ba yis gtsang gyur legs par khrus bgyis nas// gtsang ma yi ni gos bgos te/ gi spang lags par bsgrubs nas su// dmar po chen po nyid dag dang // gur gram dag dang mnyam sbyar la// /
66b8: zangs kyi snong du bkang nas su// don yod zhags pa'i gzugs bdun du// stong rtsa brgyad ni tshang bzlas nas// rgya dar gyis ni kha 'bum mo// de nas seng ldeng gi shing dang // arka'i shing gi yam shing gis me sbar la 'bras yos yungs

67a1: kang da gu gul dang / 'bras dang til dang bsres la zho dang sbrang rtsi mar du bsres te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad chang ba dang / de nas me zhi zhing me mdag phra mo yang zhi ba dang / thal ba blangs te/ snod kyi nang rtsa/
67a2: sral das de nas spang yang bas tu rtsa brgyad bzlas la// khro bo'i rgyal bas yang sur / phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas kyang dbang blang / denas dpral pa'i bras su thig le bgyis nirnamamapa' la 'phur nas/ rig sngags ra can po'i rnal po
67a3: los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dben par gyur shing / sla rlung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// de dgu khri dgu sbyong du 'tshe bar 'gyur zhing gnas kyi sgo thams cad rtag du 'byed par 'gyur ro// pral ba la thig le
67a4: nami gda' bar gyur nas/ gnas thams cad du zhugs na/ gnas thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing 'byung po dang gdod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po mthu dang bcas
67a5: pa thams cad kyis yongs su skor nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// mig la skus na ci ltar nyin par bzhin du mtshan mo snang zhing thams cad du gter mthong bar 'gyur ro// sa'i phug dang thar
67a6: gi sgo bye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / thang gi gnas su zhugs nas thang gi dgos pa thams cad bgyi ste// slar yang mchi bar 'gyur ro// chu rlung chen po'i nang du zhugs na/ khyim dang gzhal med khang ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro// rin po che thams
67a7: cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / chab la gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// klu' mtsho dang gnas su ci ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lus mtha'
67a8: dag byugs te g.yul ngor g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du zhugs na/ / ya lang dang / go cha bgos pa bzhin du mthong nas/ thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// khar bsrel te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs pa na/ btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du

67b1: gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ / gang la tshig smras pa de dag thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// gang la blangs na de dag thams cad ster 'gyur ro// gang la zho ba de dag thams cad rkob bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// nga tsho nas gang da gang du mchis pa/
67b2: de dang der skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang bu mo thams cad bdag nyid dang / nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas pa la byugs na su reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// nor dang 'byung dang / dbyig dang / bran pho dang bran mo dang wa
67b3: bgyis pa dang zho shas 'tsho ba dang mngag bzhug pa rnams dbang du gyur nas/ bsgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyur ro// 'dzub mo g.yas pa la smras nas/ ser ba dang sprin dang 'brug gi dus su sprin la mngon sum du bstan te bsdigs na grang bdang
67b4: rlung dang ser ba rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / dpag tshad gcig khor yug du zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// tsar ha cang ches na lag pa g.yas pa sprin la mngon sum du bstan pas/ ha cang char ches pa gcod par 'gyur ro// char mi 'bab pa'i
67b5: dus su lag pa g.yas pa'i lag mthil la byugs nas klu gnas pa'i mtsho'i chu la thal mo lan gsum brdabs na/ de'i mod la klu'i rgyal pos char gyi rgyun chen po gtong bar 'gyur ro// gal te mod la char mi phebs na/ de'i tshe lan
67b6: lnga brde bas pa dang / klu de dag thams cad kyis char kyi rgyun gtong bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe chang mi phebs pa de'i tshe/ klu thams cad la klad pa'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gal te lan bdun bsnun na/ klu'i rgyal po thams cad la tshul ma
67b7: yin pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi rigs phung bar bgyis bar 'gyur ro// gdon gyis zin pa thams cad kyi mig la skus na/ zhus pa tsam gyi mod la gdon brgya khri bzhi stong rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// rims kyis thebs pa rnams
67b8: kyi dpral ba la thig le bgyis na/ rims zhag gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa 'am/ nyan gsum pa 'am/ nyin bzhi pa'i rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// nad kyis zin pa rnams la khrus bgyis na/ mod la nang tham cad

68a1: las thar bar 'gyur ro/ / sha bkra dang mdze dang rkang shu dang shu ba dang g.yan pa dang / 'brum bu rnams las thar bar 'gyur ro// lba ba dang lhog pa dang mtshan par brdol ba dang / shub mched pa dang 'brum bu phra mo mched pa la blugs pa
68a2: tsam gyis thang bar 'gyur ro/ / dag pas zin pa thams cad la zugs pa tsam gyis mi gdug par 'gyur ro// dug gis byos par bgyid pa thams cad la 'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la thar bar 'gyur ro// ston pa dang sman dang rmu chu dang mchin
68a3: pan bad/ / rtsibs logs na pa dang / chu so na pa dang / gzhang nad dang tshang ba dang gcin si ba dang / gsung ba dang ma zhu ba dang / rtug skams la sros na 'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la zhi bar 'gyur ro// phyis lan 'ga' yang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur ro//
68a4: 'tshogs mang gi wang gi ri lu bgyis te/ phug gi sgo dang nye bar mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa la byugs te// mgo la thal mo brdabs na phug gi sgo rnams 'byed par 'gyur ro// bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'jug ste/ slar cung zad kyang bgegs
68a5: bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ / gnas de na gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur nas mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// dgos pa sgrub pa chen po thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// rkang pa gnyis la byugs te me 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs
68a6: na me lha rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis nas lag pa nas gzung te/ rig sngags 'chad la rig sngags 'chang bdag gi gzhal med khang gi gnas su zhugs zhig/ rig sngags 'chang gis bsgo ba thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// zhes
68a7: sgrub na de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis bgyi ba ci mchis pa de bsgo bar bgyi ste/ thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// dpung pa gnyis la blugs na glang po che bdun gyi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// brla gnyis la byugs na tshugs pa ma mchis
68a8: ba'i gyad du 'gyur ro/ / byin pa gnyis la blugs na 'bab chu chen po'i pha rol tu rgal bar 'gyur ro// mgrin pa la byugs nas nags khung du zhugs na/ nags khung gi gnam gyi sgo thams cad phye nas sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi

68b1: gzugs kyi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/ / ci 'tshal bde spang bar bgyi'o// gi wang gi raM lu bgyis te/ khar bsrel nas ri sul dang sman gshong du zhugs nas skad drag po lan gsum gdon par bgyi ste/ ri sul dang sman ljongs gi gnas gsang ba'i sgo gang
68b2: dag logs pa bye bar 'gyur zhingag/ de nas gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing / las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas rtsa dang shing gal ba dang / nags tshang tshing gi sman gyi rdzas gang lags
68b3: pa dag rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing / gang dag gi bcud kyi mchog de dag 'dzag la/ bcud srung ba de dag kyang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// ci ltar 'tshal ba bag tsha ba ma mchis
68b4: bar dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ / snying khar thig le bgyis nas snying la cung zad ci bsams pa dang / yid la bsam shing brnag pa'i dgos pa de dag thams cad mod la 'grub par 'gyur ro// lto la thig le bgyis nas kha zas dang
68b5: btung ba'i ston mo 'dod dgu thams cad thob par 'gyur te/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad lhun gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// rtsib logs gnyis la byugs na ci ltar bsams shing don du gnyer ba'i gos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// sgal tshigs
68b6: la blugs na ci ltar yid la bsams pa'i mal dang / stan 'thob par 'gyur ro// rna ba la blugs sam gnang dang gnad thams cad kyi gnas su byugs na/ ci ltar bsams pa'i rgyan dang lhab lhub 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'jug rdo la byugs
68b7: na rta'i bzhon pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / nyin gcig bzhin nang par tshig gzhan mi sgrub/ gi wang gi ri lu re re la don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas nas 'tshal te/ nyi ma dang po la tshigs su bcad pa stong bklags na 'dzin par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig
68b8: bzhin nyis 'gyur du bgyis nas bklags na 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / zhag bdun gyis thos pa mang por 'gyur ro// zhag bcwa bzhi bgyis na ma'am ci mo lta bu'i sgra dbyangs su 'gyur ro// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bgyis na/ thos pa bsags pa'i rgya

69a1: mtsho chen por 'gyur ro/ / ka la bi ka'i dbyangs ltar mnyen zhing snyan la rna ba'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro// bu'i ched du mar dang lhan gcig bstsal na bya rog lta bu dang / mogag ma rnams kyis kyang bu rnyed par 'gyur ro// btson rar stsal ba dang
69a2: shing sgrog dang lcags sgrog dang / gtan pa dang khong sgril la byugs na byugs pa tsam gyi mod la dum bu dum bur 'chag par 'gyur ro// 'thor bar 'gyur ro// chos brgyad dam bcu bzhi 'am tshes rba lnga la don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas la/
69a3: khro bo'i rgyal pos rang la dbang bskur nas gi wang gi ri lu dang spos chab bkres pas khrus bgyi'o// khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// nub gsum du khrus bgyis
69a4: na gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang sgrub pa dang / grub pa'i mchog thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// phas kyi rgol ba dang mi mdza' dang / gdug pa dang sdig pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang thams cad kyis thams
69a5: cad du 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhing yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ / phyis lan 'ga' yang sdig pa'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro// gi wang gi ri lu til mar dang bsres te/ kha gdong la byugs na rgyal po'i mdun du mchis nas/ bu bzhin du bang
69a6: ru 'khyud nas dga' ba chen po thob pa dang / rgyal po khro bo'i 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// lus thog thag ru byugs na gsad par 'os pa'i lus la yang mtshon gyis phog par mi 'gyur te// dum bu rum bur 'chag par 'gyur ro//
69a7: mda' 'phangs na lus la babs par mi 'gyur zhing // gzhu 'chag par 'gyur ro// gi wang gi ri lu 'gul du btags nas 'brog dgon pa dang // ri dang nags tshang tshing bgrod dka' bar zhugs na chom po dang g.yon can dang / rkun po dang
69a8: gnod sbyin dang srin po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa dang gcan can drug pa dang / sbrul dag pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na thams cad du pha rol las rgyal

69b1: bar 'gyur ro thams cad du mched dganas chen por yang 'gyur ro/ / thams cad dumathu dang brtson 'grus chen po rjeb med pas// pha rol zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yon pa la btags na/ skyes pa dang bud med dang / khye'u dang bu me tha mos
69b2: cad kyi gnang chen bya 'gyur te/ thams cad la 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro// dgos pa mang po 'grub par 'gyur ro// byin pa g.yas pa la btags na/ dub pa ma mchis par dpag tshad stong du mchis par 'gyur ro//
69b3: gi wang gi ri lu khar srel la lag pa g.yas pas yungs dkar kyis don yod lugs kyu bzlas nas drangs te tshig gzhan mi smra bar gnas mthon por 'dzegs te/ phyogs gang du bsams pa'i skyes pa dang bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo mchis pa'i
69b4: phyogs der yungs dkar gyis gtong na mod la bkug par 'gyur te/ mchis par 'gyur ro// gal te dpag tshad brgya tsam na gnas pa zhig na yang / gdon mi 'tshal bar de zhag gsum gyis mchi bar 'gyur te/ yid gnyis mi bgyi'o// lag pa
69b5: g.yas pa'am lag pa g.yon pa la gi wang gi ri lu btags na gang du reg par nor dang 'bru dang dbyig dang nor bu dang mu tig dang shad ka shil dang / byi ru dang sa le sbram dang / dngul dang gos dang lhab lbub de dag thams cad bkug nas mchis
69b6: par 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de mchi bar 'gyur ro// phyan tshad du zhugs nas tshang mang gi sgo thal mo brdabs na 'tshed pa dang / 'tshod pa'i kha zas de da/ thams cad bkug nas mchis par 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de mchis par 'gyur ro// spos tshong gi// tshong khang
69b7: sa mchis na tshong khang gi yo byad thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro/ / chang 'tshong gi sgor thal mo brdabs na chang gi bum pa thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro// bang ba'i sgor thal mo brdabs na 'bru thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro// bcud 'byin pa'i khyim du
69b8: zhugs nas 'khrul 'khor la reg par bgyid na/ / bu ram gyi khu ba dang / sha kha ra'i glegs bu thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro// gang du 'tshal ba der mdags par 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgor mun tsha tshu na thal mo brdabs na grong khyer na ga rlab

70a1: thams cad gnyid sgrog par 'gyur ro/ / dam po'i sgor btab na bskrad par 'gyur ro// mtshon cha mkhan gyi khyim du 'phangs na mtshon cha dang / go cha rnams rengs pa dang / rmugs par bgyis par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i sgor gtab na phas
70a2: gyi gol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / sems can gadrug pa thams cad bcings pa dang rengs pa dang / rmugs par bgyis par 'gyur ro// dung la byugs nas bus na sgra gang du grag pa de dag tu 'thab pa dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / byad dang /
70a3: drug sbyar ma dang / drug dang / nad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgor bus na yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / mings thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// phyugs lhas su bus na'o ma thams cad thogs par 'gyur ro//
70a4: gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro/ ra lug gi lhas su bus nar lug gi 'o ma phrogs par 'gyur te/ gang 'tshal ba dar mchi bar 'gyur ro// skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i dbus pas na thams cad sgren por gyur nas gos thams cad bkug par
70a5: 'gyur ro/ / rdza rnga la byugs te khyams mthon po'i steng du brdungs na grang pa dang / rlung dang / ser pa thams cad bcings pa dang gshig par 'gyur te// tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// dpag tshad rgya khor khor yug ru ser ba bkag par 'gyur ro//
70a6: grong khyer ram yul 'khor mtha' dag du bus na nad dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// mings dang mu ge'i 'jig
70a7: pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong dag bgyid par 'gyur te/ thams cad la sbyar bar bgyi'o// de nas sems can thams cad dang thun mong bzhi pa dang / rgyas pa nad thams cad zhi bar bgyid/
70a8: cing sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ yams kyi nad dang gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ mu ge'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdon dang / brjed byed

70b1: thams cad badrag par bgyid pa brjod par bgyi pa'o/ / rig sngags 'char gtsang mar gyur pas legs par khrus bgyis te/ spos dri zhim pos lus blugs la/ gos gtsang ma bgos la spos dri zhim pos bgos nas byams pa'i sems/
70b2: lamanyam par bzhag cing sems canathams cad la lhag par brtse ba dang / snying rje chen pos snying can gangs pas sbyin sreg gi las 'a byas ste/ a ka'i shing dang / sha mi'i shing dang / shing 'o ma can nam ji ltar yang byang chub kyi shing ste
70b3: de dag gi yam sreg shing gis me sbar la/ 'bras yos dang / yungs dkar dang / pad ma dang / pad ma'i ldum bu dang / 'dab ma dang / zho dang sprang ci dang / mar du bsres pas sbyin sreg bgyi'o// don yod zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/
70b4: denas don yod zhags pa khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang skur ste/ don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya lan rgya rtsa brgyad bcid do// de nas sbyin sreg gi dgos pa rnams mthar phyin pa'i modo kho nar dpag tshad gcig khor yug tu yams kyi nang
70b5: gnod pa dang 'tshe ba dang / nad dang mu ge'i dgon pa mi zad pa dang / rang gi dpung dang gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang / chom po dang / g.yon can dang rkun po dang / gcan zan pa dug pa dang
70b6: gdugs pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags kyi 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ / dpag tshad rgya khor yug tu rims mi 'byung ste/ gnod pas ma lags// nad kyis ma lags te gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
70b7: gnod sbyin rnams kyis mi tshugs te/ rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / zab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / nad 'khrug dang / 'khrug pa dang / smod pa dang / mdangs gcod pa dang / 'ching ba dang / sdigs pa rnams kyis mi tshug te/
70b8: rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ro// shin tu lo legs shing mdangs dga' la skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu gang zhing me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// nor dang 'bru

71a1: dang / lo tog rab tu mang po 'grub par 'gyur ro// shin tu ro dang ldan pa dang / shin tu smin pa dang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rtsa dang shing gel pa dang / sman dang nags tshang tshing dang myu gu dang rtsa ba dang / 'bras
71a2: bu bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / phyir zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yul de na yid du mi mchis pa'i rig pa myong bar mi 'gyur ro// yul de na dge sbyong dang bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmang rigs dang skyes pa dang bud
71a3: med dang / / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams rtag tu na ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de bar tsho ba dang yid la dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur ro// byams pa dang snying rje'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin
71a4: dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad kyang legs par srung ba'i phyir rtag du srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir dpag tshad kho ra khor yug du bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang zhi ba dang / bde legs
71a5: su bgyid par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po bzhi yang dpung dang bcas te/ yongs su skyong ba dang / lung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par bgyid par 'gyur ro// gdug pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / srung ba dang / yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug
71a6: chen po'i lha'i bu rnams rtag par rgyun du bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par bgyid par 'gyur ro// lha'i rgyal po sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu 'khor dang tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad
71a7: kyis yul dbeg sa par 'asrungs par 'gyur ro/ / gzi byin stsol bar 'gyur ro// dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu sems can thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dang bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang /
71a8: dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la bsrung ba dang bskyab dang / sbed pa bgyis par 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i las 'di'i mthus sems can thams cad sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar

71b1: 'gyur ro/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yul de la dgongs par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshigs thams cad yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la dbas
71b2: 'byin pa ston par 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ / sems can thams cad yongs su 'azung ba'i don du nyi ma dang / zla ba rgya skar gyi tshegs dang / bcas pa legs par 'byor par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag par rgyun tu skyes pa dang bud
71b3: med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro// yongs su bsrung ba dang / yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par 'gyur te/ yang nas yang blta bar 'gyur ba rten me tsun
71b4: breg ni thal ba dang / ji chu skyo ma bgyis te phyogs bzhi kun tu dbang skur na mtshams chen po bcad pa bgyis par 'gyur ro// nad kyis zin pa thams cad kyi nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// rims thams cad la thig le bgyis na rims
71b5: thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ / dri chab dang thal bas khrus bgyis na thams cad kyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// btsan dang mchis pa 'am phyag sbal na mchis pa'i gos la bskus na ral bar 'gyur ro//
71b6: gdug pas zin pa dang dug gis myos pa thams cad la skus na gdug par mi 'gyur ro// // me dgug pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs s+ho// // de nas pad ma chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir pad ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan/
71b7: ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor cho ga zhib mo rgyal po chen po brjod par bgyi te/ 'di ni ma sgrubs par las brgya stor bgyid par 'gyur ro// tshe sa zas rgyu skar bzang po dang /
71b8: shin tu bkra shis mchog dge la legs par khrus bgyi gos gtsang ba 'o// byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag/ sems can kun pa brtse ba dang / snying rje dam pas brgyan pa dang // don yod zhags pa'i rig sngags che// grub pa bla med

72a1: cho ga'i rgyal/ / bklags papa las rnams thams cad dag/ grub par bgyid de som nyi med// 'jig rten bla ma'i snying po dag/ de bzhin gang 'di rtag brjod na/ lus can rtag du mchog sbyin gyi// phyag na pad ma rtag du 'grur tu/
72a2: wAr gang gA'i bye snyed gi sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong la// bsod nams phung po khri phrag bskyed// dge ba'i rtsa ba ba sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas bya ba bgyid par 'gyur// srung ba bgyis nas bzlas brjod gcig/ mkhas pa'i mis ni
72a3: brjo kying gdage slong pa dang dge slong ma/ dge sbyin po mas de bzhin du bde ba can du byung du mche// sngal mi zad myong 'byung ba'i nyon mongs pa las bar bar 'gyur/ rtag tu sangs rgyas byang chub dag/ mthong bar gyur te som
72a4: med de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snyi ba'i tshig di/ / ba bzhin du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga brjod par bgyi ste// bzlas brjod kyi ni las bgyis nas/ rig sngags 'chang la de nyid 'grub/ don yod zhags pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis// mdun
72a5: du lci ba'i dkyil 'khor bgyi/ / gru bzhi kho ra khor yug du// tshon rtsi dkar po zhib mo yis// gru bzhi lham par thig gdab bo// ngos bzhi rnams su sgo bzhi dag/ dbus nas ngos bzhir gshes su dbab// tsan dan dkar pos bri ba ni
72a6: dkyil 'khor mchog la pad ma dang / / 'dab brgya dgung bum gyis gtor cing // pad ma'i ze ba'i dkyil dag tu// ma zhom pa yi bum pa ni spos chab kyis ni bkang ba yi// yungs dkar ldan pa bzhag par bgyi// a ka ru yi bdug pa
72a7: dbul bum pa gang bar bgod par bgyi/ / mi tog sna tshogs ldan par bgyi/ mchod yon sdod kyang bzhin bzhag go// rig sngags bcang ba gtsang gyur pas gtsang ma'i gos ni bgo bar bgyi// legs bkrus rnam par dag pa dang /
72a8: gso sbyong dag 'ani blangs pa dang / dgang gsum zas ni tshal nas su// dus gsum du ni khrus bgyi'o// dus gsum bzlas brjod pa kyi tshan/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po dag / dus gsum du yang ba rgya rtsa brgyad/ 'phags pa 'jig rten dang

72b1: byug gi/ mdon sum dkyil mo srung ba cas te/ zlas brjod phyag rgya ngas nas su/ grang 'bring dag na blang bar brtse// drub mdag na maHba dag/ brgyad nas ni gang rul ba la// da kyis byams sems mnyam par banag tang 'dzin brtan pas nga/
72b2: snyoms par/ legs par bzhag te zhi bar lta// tshig gzhan mi smra bzlas brjod pagyi// zlas brjod bgyis patsam gyi mod la// sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te// phyag rgya bcings nas sa chen po yang g.yo ba
72b3: 'gyur ro/ / rtan pa'i sems kyis skrag par mi bgyi'o// sems can thams cad la mchog du rtsebs// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa zhabs mthong ba tsam du bris la/ ci tsam na khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas so// lan
72b4: bdun bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la/ sa chen po g.yo zhing sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba nas 'od zer byung nas kun tu snang bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang de yang cher snying dga' ba dang bzhin 'dzum pa dang shin
72b5: tu rab tu dga' bas sgra zing zhe bgyid par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdong du lta bar bgyi ste/ gdong du bltas pa tsam gyi mong la bcom ldan 'das 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ngos g.yas pa nas legs so zhwa bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar
72b6: 'gyur ro/ / mig bsgyur bar bgyid cing kun du legs so// zhes bgyi ba'i sgra byung na/ rig sngags 'chang gis sgrib pa rnam pa dag pa thob nas lus yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa bye bas ya phrag brgya stong la dge ba'i rtsa
72b7: bskyed par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis blta ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// lus 'jam pa dang shin tu gzhon sha chags pa dang mnyen par 'gyur ro// skra cung zad labyil ba dang mnyen pa dang / snyan pa'i tshig smra bar 'gyur ro// mig yongs su
72b8: dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / lus yongs su dag pa dang yid yongs su dag pa dang gnyer ma dang / skra skya bo spangs par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la lta ba dag pa zhe bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// ci tsam du bdug cen dugs rtsen zer 'phags/

73a1: 5 ya // ga/ sa / ma ga / ga nga gan ga 'an/ na na/
73a2: 'tho pa mas sa rgyas kyi pa'as nyid 'di ra kyim pa ma gzus ma pa mdo/ yod 'i snying 'i chogazhib yo gyu bgag sa gyu lagagang gas pa so da
73a3: 'amanor snang ba sla 'am mig 'phrul smrab 'am/ 'jig rten du 'gro ba'am/ phrag du 'jug pa'ang/ klu'i gnas su 'jug pa' ma zhing sla ba'am/ gnod sbyin grags pa pam/ srin po dkrug pa'ag yangs bslang ba ga/ nags khrod du 'dzin
73a4: pa'am ril rgya ba'am grong khyer du 'jug pa 'am/ sman lta ba'i phyir 'jug pa 'am/ ral gri rig sngags 'chang nyid dam grub pa'i rig sngags 'chad nyid dam/ 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dam rgyal po 'thob pa 'am/ com sa da dam kya
73a5: chen po rab tu 'jomam pa 'am bskrad pa 'am rgya mtshor 'jug pa de dag thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / dgos pa grub pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar gang du 'tshal bar yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro// 'tshams ma mchis pa lnga rnams 'byang
73a6: bar 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na sems can thams cad la sta bsgrib pa dang thal ba dag pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// mig sman grub par 'tshal bas/ des zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes rgyad la ldong ros kyi mig sman zangs kyi snod
73a7: kyi nang du stsal te/ tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du bzhag nas legs par khrus bgyis te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun na
73a8: mo dkrung bcas te mchis nas bzlas brjod bkyi'i don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i 'tshams bcing bas 'tshams bcing bar bgyi'o/ / khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o// zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o// rigs kyi

73b1: 'as gas kyi tha mog pa dra bag/ 'ab pa yan lag rgyad bya ba stan gnas lagams par byas nas bzlas brjod cag/ bzlas brjod pam bcam thathong ga nas kyi da ma bar rnam pa dang tha ba byung bang 'thung //
73b2: de blangs nas mig la byugs na/ nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchis nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba dang / rig sngags 'chang 'khor
73b3: la sna chen po tha~Mng pa/ ga gi bdus bya thams thong par gyur ro//
73b4: gter byung ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// lha'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang srin po dang 'byung po dang / sha za dang gdon dang mi dang mi ma yin pa dang phas kyi
73b5: rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// tshe largyad dam bcu bzhi 'am/ bcwa lnga la tshig gzhan mi smra bar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du dkyil mo dkrung bcas te mchis nas/ lan stong rtsa brgyad
73b6: zlas brjod bgyi'o/ / bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis mo la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lnga'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas/ lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag pa dang dri med 'phags kyi lta ba'i
73b7: cho 'phrul zhe bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa'i byin gyis rlabs bkod pa yang dag par lta ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul thob nas/ tshe 'chad lha'i skal pa stong du 'gyur ro// bdag nyid
73b8: lha'i rang bzhin thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis// dam pa'i chos kyi gtam gleng bar mdzad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// bde ba can

74a1: na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad bsrung pa'i slad du/ lha'i gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// pad ma snang ba'i gzhal med khang zhes bgyi ba khang pa brdegra
74a2: pa'i gzhal med lang thob par 'gyur ro/ / de nas rang gi lus rdo rje srab bdag nyid kyi snying po'i rang bzhin thob par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des spos chab des bum pa bkang nas/ lan khri nyis stong lngas brjod bgyis te/ byang chub sems dpa'
74a3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du nyin zhag gcig mchis par gyur pas khrus bgyi'o/ / zus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la/ lus rdo rje las byung ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de las gzigs
74a4: par 'gyur ro/ / tshe lha'i lo khrir 'gyur ro// gnod sbyini dang srin po gdon thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// lha dang klu thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam mam sems skyed
74a5: pa tsam gyi mod la gdon thams cad dang brje byed thams cad babs nas thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ / bden pa'am mi bden pa 'am yang dag pa 'am yang dag pa ma lags pa 'am/ skal pa dang ldan pa 'am skal pa dang mi ldan pa 'am 'byung ba 'am/
74a6: ma byung ba'am 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa de ni thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// de la sogs te las bgyi ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// bran bzhin du las thams cad rtag tu bgyid par 'gyur ro// yang na 'jig rten tham
74a7: cad so sor sgral bar 'tshal ba 'am/ thams cad sems can dmyal ba 'am dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam gshin rje'i 'jig rten las thar bar bgyi bar 'tshal lam/ don yod ye shes dkod pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'tshal 'am/ rnam
74a8: par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor sgrub par 'tshal lam/ / don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des gzugs brnyan so so bzhin du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i gzugs su

74b1: bgyis te/ ngal ba'i thor tshugs dang ri dgas en ya'i lpags pas brgyan pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dkyil mo dkrung ngam 'greng ba dang drung na nor zangs pus mo g.yas pa phab pa/ g.yon pa khro bo'i
74b2: rgyal po gdong gyen du lta ba khro bo'i gzugs lag pa drug pa 'od dpag med kyi dbu rgyan thogs brgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa/ thams cad ring srel dang bcas par bgyi ste// ri'i steng gi pad ma'i stan la mchis par bgyi'o// gtsang mas gos
74b3: gtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du khrus bgyis na nyin zhag gcig mchis te/ rig sngags 'chang gis pa'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o// cha ba dang yungs dkar gyi dbang gur bas dbang gung bar bgyi'o// snying rje chen pos gdungs pa'i snying gis blta bar bgyi'o//
74b4: gal te 'di lta bu'i tshogs mi bgyid na klags pa tsam gyi mod la 'di 'grub par 'gyur na/ bzlas brjod kyi las kyi tshogs lta smos kyang ci 'tshal// yang rig sngags 'chang gang zhig gaM gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma dang / mnyam pa'i
74b5: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod par 'tshal lam/ / blta bar 'tshal lam dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po skyed par 'tshal lam/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba la rab tu bzhag par 'tshal ba 'am
74b6: thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des dge slong pha 'am dge slong ma 'am dge bsnyen pa 'am dge snyen ma'am rgyal po 'am btsun mo 'am gzhan su yang rung bas thams cad cho ga 'di bzhin bgyis
74b7: te/ des ci 'byor pa'i gser las don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyi'o// de nas kha shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la gur gum gyi dkyil 'khor bgyi ste/ gru bzhi cha 'byes par li khris thig gdab par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor dbus su
74b8: pad ma'i phreng ba bgyi'o/ / da ma'i phreng ba'i dbus su ril pa spyi blugs dang / bgrang 'phreng bzhag par bgyi'o// ma rdzon kyis rdo bar gyi'o/ ma ga ma mog ci 'byor pas legs par bdun pa bzhi bzhag par bgyi'o// mchod yon gyi sden

75a1: lnga bzhag par bgyi'o/ / pog phor gyi snod lnga nas a ga ru'i bdug pas bdugs par bgyi'o// dris bsgos pa'i mar me bcu drug spar bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bgyi'o// me tog dang bdug pa
75a2: dang dri dang phreng ba yang dbul bar bgyi'o/ / 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mdun du dkyil mo dkrung bcas te mchis nas/ don yod nags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te bdag nyid la dbang 'thung bar bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig bzlas brjod bgyir
75a3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs pa yid la bgyis nas phyogs bcur yid kyis mchod cing phyag bgyi'o/ / bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis pa dang sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur ro// bdas
75a4: nyi dga' bar gyur nas 'bang bar mthong ngo / de bzhin gsheg pa de dag thams cad kyang zhal mngon sum du ston pa nye bar ston par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs dang phyug gi ral pa'i gas pa'abar bar gyur nas/ legs so/ zhes bya ba'i
75a5: bla 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / nabargya rtsa brgyad pa lan gnyis bzlas brjod bgyis na// grub pa chen po'i rtags ston par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag grang nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro//
75a6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// don yod zhags pa'i rig sngags 'chang bar 'gyur ro// nyi ma'i rtsen de bzhin gsheg pa de dag kyang mthong bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tham
75a7: cad ston par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad pa lan gsum bzlas na 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs skya reng 'char kha'i dus su mdun du mchis rla bdam
75a8: dri ma med pa zhes bgyi ba'i zhags pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / grub pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po 'od dpag med kyang legs so// zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro// gang su yang rung bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzi ga dbang phyug gi gzugs

75b1: mthong na de ni de bzhin gshegs pa drug khril dge ba'i rtsab bskyed par 'gyur ro/ de la lha thams ca dang tshangs pa la sogs te/ dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams rtag tu blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// da thams cad dang bral bar
75b2: 'gyur ro mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing lu sa dang / skyob pa dang sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal go//
75b3: bam po brgyad pa// des ci 'byor pa'i gser las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa byas la// de nas zhal shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la/ gur gum gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa legs pa mdzes pa byas te/ li
75b4: khris thig btab la/ dkyil 'khor dbus su pad ma bri// pad ma'i dbus su ril ba bris nakar dang bgrang phreng bri/ me tog sna tshogs bkram la/ bum pa spos chus bkang la/ me tog ci 'byor pas legs par btsun pa bzhi bzhag/ mchod yon gyi snod lnga bzhag
75b5: par bya zhing / khog phor lnga nas/ a ga ru'i bdug pas bdag par bya'o// spos sna bcu drug dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing / me tog dang bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dag
75b6: kyang dbul bar bya'o/ / 'jig rten dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs te dkyil mo dkrung bcas la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings la bdag nyid la dbang bskur ro// khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig bzlas la/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs
75b7: pa thams cad yid la byas te/ yid kyis phyag byas la/ lus kyis kyang phyag byas te/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la bzlas brjod bya'o// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / bdag nyid snying da la la bar snang ngo / de bzhin gshegs
75b8: bde dag thams cad zhal nye bar ston par mdzad do/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dbu ral pa'i gser 'bar zhing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ngo // brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa gnyis pa ni/ dngos grub chen po'i mtshan ma ston to//

76a1: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyad te rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo'i spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro//
76a2: rig sngags 'chang la don yod pa'i zhags pa grub par 'gyur ro// tho rangs de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi zhal ston par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
76a3: bzlas brjod brgyartsa brgyad gsum pas ni/ skye rangs shar ba'i dus kyi tshe/ 'phag pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang drug ni rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na bzhugs te/ pad ma'i dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i zhags pa sbyin par mdzad cing / dngos grub thams cad sbyin
76a4: par mdzad do/ / rgal ba 'od dpag med legs so the bya ba sbyin par mdzad do// gang la 'phags pa spyan ras gzig dbang phyug gi skur bstan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad dang
76a5: tshangs pa la sogs pa dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po dang lha'i bu rnams rtag du lus ston par 'gyur ro/ / nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rtag tu byi bzhin 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang / skyab gang sgrub
76a6: byed par 'gyur ro/ / sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de nas dngul las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs snga ma bzhin du byas pa la/ tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor du tsan dan dkar po'i dri chab
76a7: kyis bkang ba bzhag par bya zhing mchod yon gyi snod lnga bzhag par bya'o/ / me tog sna tshogs pa bkram zhing / tsan dan dkar po'i bdug spos kyis bdugs ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bya'o// dri sna bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
76a8: dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya zhing / sdug spos kyi snod bzhi bcu bzhag par bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ don yod pa'i zhags

76b1: pa'i phyag rgyal na 'dun pa cing ngo / bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas te/ dkyil mo krung du 'dug la lag pa g.yon pa'i 'dzub mo brkyang pa pad ma'i tshul du byas pa bzlas brjod pab rgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// la bcu rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang shar phyogs nas le gra so
76b2: zhes bya ba'i sgra grags par 'gyur ro/ / bdag nyid dga' bar snang ngo // rgyal po blon po dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur te/ ming brjod pas dpag tshad stong na 'ong bar 'gyur ro// thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis ces bran bzhin du
76b3: 'gyur ro/ / gang go/ bde byed par 'gyur ro// de nyid bla mar 'gyur zhing cher brjod par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas pas brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang rlung lha la stsogs
76b4: pa dbang du gyur zhing sko ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ / gang slob byed par 'gyur ro// rgyal po bzhi 'khor gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gsum du bzlas pas nyi ma dang zla ba nam mkha' lha 'bab cing
76b5: mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro/ / mtshan mo'i lha dang nam mkha'i lha 'ongs rba mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing dbang du 'gyur ro// thams cad ci bgyi zhi ba'i bya ba byed cing 'dug par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa lan bzhi bzlas pas/ klu thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur ro//
76b6: rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang te dga' bo la sogla pa'i bar thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur ro// zangs las byas pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhagra pa la/ tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor byas te/
76b7: me tog dmar po bkram la/ bdug spos kyi snod bzhinas bdug par bya zhing / mar gyi mar me lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bltam par bya'o// mchod yon gyi snod bzhi bzhag la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal
76b8: po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rjes su dran par bya'o/ / don da 'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya la na nyi shu rtsa gcig bcing bar bya'o// ras la bris pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dkyil mo da krung du 'dug te/ sems can thams cad la dmi gra bas de bzhin

77a1: gag thams cad yidi la bya'o/ / phyogs pazhir byams pa'i skabs gapar bya'o// sems can dmyal ba ba dngag shin rje'i 'jig rten du gam yin du yi dgas kyi sa mams cad 'dis phyogasas na myam me pa
77a2: yidal bya zhing snying rje'i sems kyis blta par bya'o/ / zlas brjod kyi phyag rgya pad ma'i tshul du bcings te bzlas brjod bya'o// Na brgyad tshang ba dang / phyogs bzhi ga yo zhing sgra grag par 'gyur la/ dmyal ba'i sems can de dag thams cad yo
77a3: su grol bar 'gyur ro dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur zhing / bcom pa dang thal bar brlag par 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i sems can de dag pade 'gror 'gro gyur ro// dag nyid kyang byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bang du myal ba'i sdug
77a4: bsngar gyi tshor ba thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ / lus kyang mtshan bzang pos brgyan par 'gyur zhing sems can gang dag gis mthong ba de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod
77a5: byas pas ni sa'i 'og gi sems can mun nag snang ba dang bral ba de dag don yod pa'i dgra pa'i snying po'i mthus mun gnag dang bral bar 'gyur zhing / 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yongs su grol ba'i sems can de dag 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
77a6: dbang phyug gi gnas su rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing rga ba dang 'chi ba spangs par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du kun nA mthu 'phags dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur zhing / tshe skal bar thub par 'gyur ro// shi nas bde ba can
77a7: 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro byang chub kyi mthar thug ga bar du de nyid kyi rnams drung na skye bar 'gyur zhing / mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// tsan dan dkar po dang gla tso dang ga par dang spos kyi dgra sna tshogs gzhan dag byas
77a8: zhib por byas te/ yang legs par btags la kun tu ru dang sa ci pog dang gan d+ha ras dang chu dang lhan cig sbyar te/ sha kharang btab la legs par btags pa las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa so nga na

77b1: pa'i tshad du byas te/ rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa ral pa'i thor tshugs dang / e na yi lpags pas bzhag pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'dzin pa/ phyag bzhi gcig na pad ma thogs gnyis pa na zhags pa thogs// gsum par
77b2: gsal shing thogs/ bzhi pa dbugs 'byin pa// gdan par ma 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gis brgyan par bya ste/ g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma/ g.yon du dri med 'gro bya'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi 'og du ni khro ba'i rgyal po'o//
77b3: gdong byi ni 'od dpag med do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos sum phrugs su bgos la tshes brgyad nas chos bcwo lnga'i bar du dus gsum du bzlas brjod bcu rtsa brgyad
77b4: bya'o/ / spos sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor byug par bya zhing mtshon sna lngas bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su don yod pa'i zhags pa dang / rigs sngags kyi lha pus mo btsugs te gyen du lta ba bri bar bya'o// gru bzhir dbang phyug dang
77b5: dbang phyug chen po dang gshin rje dang chu lha bri bar bya'o/ / sgo bzhi'i cha dbyis par bya'o// dkyil 'khor khor yug du pad ma bri bar bya'o// gru bzhir spos kyis bkang ba bzhag par bya'o// sgo bzhir dri dang gtor ma dang bum pa gang pa bzhag go
77b6: dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dang mchod yon gyi spod brgyad bzhag go/ me tog sna tshogs pa bkram par bya zhing / tsan dan gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o spos sa/ rgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya/ 'phan
77b7: gdugs bzang po sna tshogs pas legs par brgyan par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor du zhal shar phyogs su bstan la mchod par bya'o// ras kyi tshon skud sna lnga pa
77b8: srid du khru bcu drug pa thor to cig du gser gyi yang mig thor to cag dun ti/ gi chun bskor btags te/ sprul 'khyil pa bzhin du bsgyel la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma g.yog par bya'o// rig sngag

78a1: 'chad dkyil 'khor la/ / mngon da phyogs te/ dkyil mo dkrung du 'dug la// don yod pa'i rnag pa'i nywa nas su gas pa'i ba byas la bdag srung // bo rgyal pogabacwa rtsa brgyad pazlab par byas pa// dkyil 'khor bcing
78a2: bdang phyogs bcing ba yang bya'o/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bzhin mdzum gyis ldan par byas la/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ mi smra bar yangs dkar 'bru re re na bzlas brjod stod tsa brgyad brjod nas ras kyi srad bu'i steng drug
78a3: bar bya ste/ stong rtsa brgyad tshang pa dang ras kyi srad ba de 'bar bar 'gyur zhing // 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags
78a4: pa grub kyis long la dgos pa thams cad byos shig/ khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po gnyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma 'grub pas/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro// 'phags
78a5: pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku las spos kyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te// spros des dpag tshad tsam du khyab par byed do// gang la dri ba snams pa tsam gyis nad thams cad dang bral
78a6: bar 'gyur/ sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur// sdug bsngal gyi sgrib pa thams cad dang byang dang drug dang dbyig drug dang phye ma'i sbyor ba rnams 'jig par 'gyur ro// lus thams cad dri ma med par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gyi
78a7: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i zhags pa de blangs la/ gab tshe bzang po'i nang du bcug ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du bzhag par bya'o// nam dgos pa byung ba'i tshe/ gtsang mas khrus legs par byas te blang bar bya
78a8: zhing dgos par bya'o/ / nyin re bzhin dus gsum du mchod par bya'o// rig sngag 'chang de yang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing lus yongs su dag pa dang sngon gyi rigs sngags 'chang rnams dang lhan cig rtse zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur

78b1: ro/ ro lo stong thub par 'gyur te/ shi rba bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal pa mnyam pa rnams kyi nang du pad ma'i snyed pas lba rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po
78b2: mab pag ga pa 'azhal pa mag stong sa pa u / larba ba spya yag shes dang gagi sas ma kyi pa mas pa' yogs pa ma 'a ga/ ma'i mataga'i lanas ca sa la/
78b3: paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la ra re nas dpral bar byaste// lan ga Na brgya tshang ba dang / rgyal pa dang / blon po dang / btsun mo 'bor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/ rang nyad na dang bcas dbyig dang bcas 'bru dang bcas bran po dang bcas bran mo
78b4: da babs te lnga byed par 'gyur bsnga ma'i me tog rnying pa bzlas la p+la ci dang nr-i yang ku dang rgya spos dang r+ra ta dang gur dkram dang spang smos dang sram ka dang sgeg ka dang nal dang po la dang / yungs dkar rnams nib du btags pa'i bye ma char ba'i chu dang /
78b5: sbyar ba'i ri la ni drag med par byed pa'i mchog pad ma the bya ste/ thog mar grags pa dang dpal du byed pa nad thams cad sel ba dang rims nad thams cad nye bar sel bar byed do// btsog shu dang 'bras dang me dpal dang rkang shu dang phol mig dang lkog
78b6: pa dang / de thams cad la ni bskus na bde bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// zhe gsang ngo // de de dag thams cad la khrus byas na sdig pa sel to// zhwa thub pas gsungs so// tshe sbyin par byed rgyal po dag yul sbyin par byed do// thig le byas te g.yul dor song na
78b7: khams cad las rtag tu rgyal ba dang bud med rnams dga' ba dang dbang du 'gyur bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/ / byad 'joms shing dug dang dbyig dug dang / phye ma'i dug dang gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba dag kyang de bzhin no// zas zab dang khrus byed pa
78b8: gzig pa'i byug pas rtag du byas na/ de thams cad las grol ba rnams bde bar thar bar 'gyur ro// zhes 'jig rten dbang phyug gsung ngo // grang ba'i nad mi zad pa la ni byug par bya'o// mig nab la ni mig sman gyi bur mas so// son pa la/

79a1: ne khar mung ro// lton pa la ni chu gron dang do// rtsib logs na bal ni mar dang byug go// yan lag dang nyin la gan ba la ni bsrubar bya'o// dbang du bya ba la ni lag thi bstsu bas so// nad tshabs che ba la ni bsku mnye dang khrus bya'o// gnod sbyin gyi
79a2: gdon gsal ba la ni/ snga nas btang ba'i las bya'o// bdug pas ni gdon thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// rgyas thebs pa la ni 'tshogs mar thig le bya'o// snying na ba la ni chu dron dang lan tshwab sres pa'o// khyim zhi bar bya ba la ni 'bras yos
79a3: dang gsum sbyar nas zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ / thams cad du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas so// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa rnams la ni ba lang gi lcibs dkyil 'khor byas la me tog bkram ste/ dri chus bkad pa bzhi bzhag cing 'o mas bkad pa bzhe
79a4: dang mchod yon gyi snod bzhi dang pog bor bzhag ste/ a ka ru dang du ru kas bdug go gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig zlas te bdug par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri chab kyis mchod par bya'o// bre bo'i rgyal po yungs dgra
79a5: la lan tu rtsa brgyad bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o/ / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/ 'thab pa dang rtsod pa rnams la smra ba'i mchog du 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rang gi dpung dang gzhan gyi
79a6: dpung yan lag bzhi pa thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te brgya byin rang dang lha ma yin lhan cig pas kyang ma yin no// mi rnams kyis lta ci smos/ brgya byin 'gugs par 'dod na pad ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ brgya byin gyi
79a7: ming nas brjod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul bar bya zhing / dri chab kyang dbul lo// gu gul dad mar dang yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ shing a rka'i me sbar la/ chos bcu bzhi la sbyin sreg
79a8: bya'o/ / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rdzogs pa dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po 'ongs nas mdun du 'dug ste/ bsgob bzhin byed cing tham cad dbang du 'gyur ro// brgya byin gyi go 'phangs ma gtogs pa gang blangs pa de sbyin par byed de/ de ni sems mi bzod do// tshangs pa

79b1: rjogapas mnan te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na 'cha brgyad cad bdang rangs par gi gzugs kyi mdun 'dug / mchog thams cad sbyin par byed / mdal ci 'ad bsgru par byed/ gragul la lan dgra bcu ba zlas tu bya ba 'jug la badrug //
79b2: chu dang yungs dkar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te spyi bor gtor na khyab 'jug rang gi gzug kyis mdun na 'dug cing / las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// gzugs sna tshogs kyi bar du ston to// ti ran N+ya ka shi bul yang sbyin par byed cing khyab 'ju/
79b3: chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug chen po'i zhal mthong bar 'dod na/ sna ba g.yas par la dbargya rgya rgyad bzlas te/ yungs dkar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas spyi bor gtor ro// gu gul gyi bdug pas btug cing / a rka'i chu
79b4: la lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o/ / de nas dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur zhing / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ngo // de nas dbang phyug chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing / rang gi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa
79b5: thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ / 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// mchog gang 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed do// nag po chen po 'gugs par 'dod pas gu gul la lan bcu rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ khrag dang chad dbul bar bya zhing nyungs dkar la
79b6: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na zhag po chen pa'i steng du gtor na khrugs par 'gyur te/ bran bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing / gar mngadags pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gnas
79b7: thams cad kyi sgo dbye bar gyur zhing gang 'dod pa byed do/ thams cad byams par 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// mi smra bar mtshan mo'i dus mtshams gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas na/ mtshan mo'i lha 'khor dang bcas pa dang
79b8: mtshan mo rgyu ba dang nyin par rgyu ba'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du gyur te/ las thas cad byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad rang

80a1: ba/ / gi gzugs kyis rtag tu mdun na nye bar gnas so// mtshan mo longs spyod par gzhal med khang thams cad sbyin par byed do// gtsang ma gos bcang ma bgos te/ khrus legs par byas bden par smra zhing byams pa'i sems nye bar
80a2: bzhag nas sems can thams cad la rtag tu brtse ba dang snying rje chen pos lhag par dmig te/ / bzlas brjod rtag du bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rim par phye ba'o// de nas rtag tu las thams cad byed pa/ dge bzhi pa rgyas pa/ drag shul spyod pa srung ba
80a3: nang thams cad sel ba/ byad 'jig pa/ dbang du byed pa/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya'o// khyim srung bar 'dod pas/ a rka'i lam sreg shing dang pad ma dang yungs mang bsres pa las sbyin sreg lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/ don yod 'i gags pa'i
80a4: snying po lan rgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ khyim chen po srung bar 'gyur ro 'thab pa dang chod pa dang / khrag zhug thams cad da pyir rgol pa dang mi 'dza ba thams da'i mas thams cad dang yams kyi na dang na 'gro
80a5: bathams cad dang gdon thams cad dang / mu go'i gnod pa dang / mi ngas dang bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i mings thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang srung da sgrub pa dang sba bar 'gyur ro// bang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po yang rtag
80a6: dbyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang rtag du rman mi 'chad par sku ston par bzhed par 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg gi mar dang yungs dkar dang gu gul gyi sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ yul dang
80a7: yul 'khor dang / grong khyer dang bul gru dang ri khrod dang ljongs rnams zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zla ba nya la me tog dkar po dang g+han d+ha spri yang ku dang rgya spos rnams yungs mar dang bsres te sbyin
80a8: sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ rgyal po dang blon po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang yul gru dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang ljongs dang rta dang glang po che dang ba lang dang ma he rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// shing ab marga'i ye sreg shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi

80b1: dang mar sres pa dang me tog dkar po rnams las lan tu rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na yul gru stong 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zhe dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar bres pa dang / pad ma'i sdang pa
80b2: yam sreg shing rnams las brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ mtshan mo zad pa dang tin rabargyad brgya thob par 'gyur ro// me tog ku mu dang pad ma sdong bu dang rtsa ba dang 'dab mar bcas pa dang yungs dkar bsres te/ shing ser snang gi
80b3: me spar la sbyin sreg tu rtsa brgyad byas na/ log 'dren thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// zla ba yar gyi ngo chos brgyad la smyung ba bgyis te/ gtsang mas khrus legs par byas la/ gos dkar po bgos te tsan dan dang bri
80b4: yang ku'i shing dang 'bras yos dang mar dang nyungs dkar sres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na nam phyed kyi dus su gnod sbyin mo 'ongs nas zod lnga stong sbyin par 'gyur ro/ / zla ba mar gyi de'i tshes bcu bzhi la nyin zhag cig smyud
80b5: ma byas ste/ rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gram du song la shing bili ba'i me sbar te/ shing ba li ba'i me tog dang mar sres pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na de'i 'og du gnod sbyin mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro//
80b6: nam phyed na rin po che'i za ma tog thogs nas 'ong bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang des blang bar bya'o// gdod du mig blta bar bya'o// yang brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa dang / rkang pa'i drung du snod bor nas gtung de rig
80b7: sngags 'chang 'gram mo/ / zhes zer ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas gang gi tshe dgos pa byug pa de'i tshe na ma phyed la lan tu rtsa brgyad zlas brjod byas na gnod
80b8: sbyin mo 'ong bar 'gyur te/ dgos pa thams cad byed cing zan bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi la gdan gter yod pa der song ste/ stong rtsa brgyad zlas brjod byas la/ gtor ma'i

81a1: chog yang bzhag par bya zhing 'phags pa dan yod pa'i zhags pa la mchod pa byas la sna ma'i ma tog dang pad ma'i 'dab ma dang lungs dkar dang mar sres pa rnams las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas te/ chu dang yungs dkar lalan/
81a2: nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nasas la brdabs na/ de'i 'og du ter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ blangs la dkon mchog gsum gyi sku skal dbul bar bya zhing // lhag ma rang gis blang bar bya'o// ru'i shing gi me swar la ti la dang /
81a3: 'bras so ba dang / mang sres pa las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang dpung gi yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa dang nor dang 'bru dang bcas pa dang dbyig dang gser dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/ ji srid
81a4: 'tsho'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro/ / yungs dkar dkar po dang tsam pa ka'i me tog dang pad ma'i yam sreg shing dang sbrang rtsi dang mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ yul thams cad dbang du gyur zhing bud med dang skyes pa dang khye'u dang bu mo
81a5: dbang du 'gyur ro/ / bras phub lan cha dang ldan pa las lan dgra bcu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na/ rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur ro// a ga rda'i shing gis me spar la sbrang rtsi dang mar sres pa dang a ki'i me tog las sbyin sreg
81a6: brgyad byas la/ / phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na/ nyin re bzhin tin rab rgya thob par 'gyur ro// pa la sha'i yam sreg shing dang 'bras yo sa las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na gser brgya phrag stong thob par 'gyur ro//
81a7: dkon mchog gsum la mched pa bya zhing bgo ba sha byas na/ yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos bco ldan pa nya la sprang ba byas te/ rgyamatshor 'bab pa'i chu klung dam/ chu krung chen po'i nang sbed pa cu btsam du zhugs ste/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brji/
81a8: byas nas/ yungs dkar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na khros pas chu klung de la brdab par bya'o// de nas chu'i nang nas bu mo zhig byung nas rin po che mang po zhig sbyin par byed de blangs la phyed kyis dkon mchog gsum mchod par bya zhing 'phagrab

81b1: spyan sa gcigs dpang phyug la yang mched par bya'o/ / ras bcwa lnga zla bta ba la spyad ba byas te/ ma byed na bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dpang phrag la mchod pa byas nas/ a ba mar ka'i lam thag shing dang sbrang rtsa dang mang//
81b2: dngas ci pog sreg pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la rang gi ming gi sbyin sreg stong byas na// sdig pa slob pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur zhing / nad thams cad du gnod pa mas na las grol bar 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba
81b3: thams ca dang minga' pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/ / shing a rga dang til dang l+r-ings dkar dang gu gul dang mer sris pa la sbyin sreg byas na zhib chen por 'gyur ro// bras yos dang 'o ma dang mar dang / lungs dkar dang tsan dan dkar po sras la
81b4: sbyin sreg lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/ rgyas pa dang mchog du dge bar 'gyur ro// ches bcu bzhi la kar bi ra'i me tog dang lan tshwa sna bdun ba sres pa dang shing tsher ma can gyi yam sreg shing yungs dkar la bsres pa drag shul spyod par bya'o// char mi 'bab
81b5: pa'i tshe pad ma dang tsan dan dang yungs dkar dang mar sres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te sbyin sreg cu rtsa brgyad byas nas/ khro bo'i gsang sngags pa de bdun zlas na/ ji srid 'dod pa de srid du char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// thal ba
81b6: de blangs la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te nam mkha' la tor na char ha cang ches bzhi par 'gyur ro/ / phyogs bzhi gtor na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// sprin la sngon du phyogs te gtor na rlung dang sprin dang ser ba rnams 'byung bar
81b7: mi 'gyur ro/ / gzhan gyi sde gnan pa ni til dang 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis so// pha rol gyi dpung zlog pa ni sa bon bdun gyi sbyin sreg gis so// phug sgrub pa ni shing arka'i sbyin sreg gis so// a rka'i lo ma dang mar sres pa'i sbyin
81b8: seka byas na/ phug gi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// nags su 'gro ba'i tshe ku mu da dang / rgya spos dang nyungs dkar dang mar bsres pas nags kyi phug gi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur zhing / sman gyi dngos po thams cad rang bzhin

82a1: cu gnas par 'gyur ro/ / shing ba la sha'i me spar te na le sham brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po dang nyi ma 'ongs nas mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// rna ma'i me tog dang
82a2: kang ni gA ra'i ma tog dang / ud pa la rnams mar dang thos pa las byan sreg rgya gang byas na/ zla ba dang nyi ma 'ongs napa sachog rgyan ning mas la 'od pa btang na nam sapa' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ma tha pas la sreg shing byas pa
82a3: shwa ti dang nye'u shing dang ar ka dang can na dang yungs dka dang nas dang mar sres pa las nyim bdun gyi dus btsams gsum du spyan theganyi shu rtsa gcig byas nas/ rgyal po btsun mo'-i'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// don dang
82a4: gnod sbyin dang srin po thams cad chad pas bcad na 'bras so ba dang yungs dkar dang lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg bgyis te/ thams cad la don yod pa'i zhags pa bcing bar bya zhing khro bo'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags lhan cig rjes su dran par bya'o//
82a5: byin sreg gi cho ga 'od nas don yod pa'i nags pa'i snying po'i cho ga'i rgyal po chen po ras kyi sku gzugs mthong ba tsam gyi mod la mnar med pa'i mthar thug pa dang // mtshams med pa lnga byed pa byang bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya ste/ ras
82a6: khru do gru bzhi lham pa kha tshar ma chad pa sgra med ga/ thag ran bzang gshin tu dkar ba shin tu sbyangs pa la ri mo mkhan mi smra ba'i dka' thub can/ bsnyen gnas la gnas pa/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos pa zas dkar gsum
82a7: zab dus gsum du khrus byas pa/ lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon gyi snod sar bar bzhag ste/ bir sar bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhengs pa 'am bzhugs pa'am dkyil mo dkrung du zhugs pa bri bar bya ste/
82a8: ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis rgyan pa/ a ne ya'i lpags pa bsdams pa phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag bcu drug pa zhal bzhi pa/ sbyin phye ba dbu rgyan la rgyal ba 'od dpag med

82b1: bdun ga/ zhal g.yas pa thor tshugs la rnams kyis kun pa/ phyag gnyis rdo rje'i thal mo sbyarang ba las rgyan du pad ma'i tshul du bya'o// phyag gnyis thung du kun tu gal gyi phyag rgyal bya'o// phyag gnyis ng+gA brjod kyi phyag
82b2: rgya byas la 'dzub mo g.yas pa brkyang ste/ pad ma'i tshul da byas la bar na bgrang 'phreng 'dzin par bya'o// phyag gnyis don yod pa'i nags pa'i phyag rgya bya'o// phyag gcig na rtse gsum pa/ gnyis pa na pad ma gsum pa dan yod
82b3: pa'i zhags pa'i glegs pa ma/ bzhi pa na don yod pa'i zhags gzhags pa tha mal pa 'jug lnga pa dbugs 'byin pa drug pa na ril pa skyi thugs/ bdun pa na rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i snod brgyad pan me tog rna tshogs kyi snod thogs pa
82b4: bya 'od 'domo gang gis brgyan pa sku me tog sna tshogs kyis bkrabs mdzes par bya'o/ / ri bo ta la'i khang pa rtsegs pa shin tu mdzes pa gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa khri 'phang stegs bu mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis
82b5: mdzes pas brgyan pa/ pad ma'i phreng bas mdzes par byas pa rdo rje'i phreng bas rgyan 'ame tog sna tshogs dang chu shing gi yal gas mdzes par byas la g.yas logs kyi steng na nyi ma/ g.yon logs na zla ba gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i dra
82b6: dag lag na me tog sna tshogs mang po thogs te/ bcom ldan 'dapa la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// ri pad ma 'dra ba zhig snying pos mdzes par byas shing / sdong po dang ldan pa mtshos mdzes pa rgyas// mtshonyas gang zhing chu srin ma ka ra dang nga ba dag na da nang /
82b7: sha te'u dang drang pas kun pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis legs par gyun pa'i ri de'i steng du pad ma'i gdan dang seng ge'i khri bya'o// g.yas phyogs kyi phyi rol khang pa'i gnas su dbang phyug bya'o// g.yon du dbang phyug chen po rgyan thams cad
82b8: kyis rgyan pa bya'o/ / gi gnas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go// g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma lus btud de 'dzem pag dang bcas pa bya'o// g.yon du dri med 'gro lag pa dbugs 'byin pa dang nor bzangs pus mo btsug/

83a1: phyag dam shing po'i dbus kyi gnas su la ba'i rgyal pa byas pa gzug na lag pa ban pa' laganas can ma migs papa/ gags pa dang grag ta da gas ma da dpa'o/ nga gnam da sa mo kyang byed pa
83a2: pawas cung zad bcud dpa/ mgo bo'i steng g.yas g.yon du dang srong bstod rabs byed pa bya'o// de nas 'og gi g.yas g.yon du rdo rje tsam chen go lag na rdo rje'i tsho gra mang po 'dug pa dang / gshin rje dang chu lha dang / rlung lha dang dbang po dang lha'i tshogs dag bya'o//
83a3: phyogs kyi ma dzad 'i ba ba da da tshangs rgyal ga phyogasas rgyal pa can pa pa ga gas pa kyi/ ga dam ga med pa pa lagapa gyu me ma maud kyang ldan mad da
83a4: mtshan mo lha dang sa'i lha mo dang lo tog gi lha mo bya'o/ / dbang phyug gi drang du khro gnyer can bya/ dbang phyug chen po'i drung du gos dkar mo'o// ri dang po/ mo bar du srin mo ral cig ma'o// ri ri khor yug du gru bzhi rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa bya zhing /
83a5: sngon shing dang lhag ma sna tshogs dang / me tog gri brgyan cing / mtshe'u mdzes pa me tog sa tshogs kyi brgyan dang sege dang stag gis gang ba dang kwa'i phru gu dang gral bum dag bya'o// g.yon du gsang pa balnga bya'o// ga du klu'i rgyal po chen
83a6: lnga bya'o/ / thams cad brag gi stan dang lag na rin po che'i me tog gi phor ba thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la bltabar bya'o// 'phagrab spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du rigs sngagra 'cha bus mo gtsugs te lag na me tog dang
83a7: pog por thogs pa bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya'o/ / steng gi bar rim du thub pa chen po rgyal ba 'od dpag med dang sha kya'i rgyal po dang 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po bya'o// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyi mdo la tshe rabs brgya stong du
83a8: bdar med pa bsags pa dang / mtshams med pa/ lnga'i las byas bde dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ rnam par 'jig par 'gyur zhing / sems can de dag thams cad kyang yongs su grol bar 'gyur na/ sems can dag pa rnams lta ci smos/

83b1: dpas mos pa rnams dang / dkon mchog gsum mchod padon du gnyer ba de dag ni/ tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu che ba dang phan yon mang po dag du shes par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pag gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phra
83b2: dag bcu rtsa bzhi'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa bskyed par 'gyur zhing de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs kyi snying po da
83b3: su mthong ba yin no/ / ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dgongs par 'gyur zhing sku yang ston par 'gyur ro// nyams thag pa tsam gyi mod la sku ston par 'gyur zhing mchog thams cad
83b4: sbyin par 'gyur ro/ / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzungs kyi snying po 'grub par 'gyur ro// nad kyis thobs pa dang nad tshabs chen pos gzir ba dang / nad sna tshogs dang sdug bsngal brgya stong gis dkrugs pa de dag thams cad kyis mthong ba tsam
83b5: gyi mod la nad thams cad dang sdug bsngal thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa dang nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// than dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa dag kyang mthong ba tsam gyi mod la yongs su
83b6: grol bar 'gyur ro/ / ras kyi sku gzugs 'di 'khor mang pos mchod pa dang / bkur sti chen po dngasi la stan sgrol ba mang po dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyis legs pa brgyan sa bya ste/ grong khyer chen po'am rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ btsug
83b7: lag khang ngam/ ljongs sam khyim ma mgrong du zhugs nas ras kyi sku gzugs bzhugs pa tsam gyi mo la/ ga kha ba dang brtsod pa dang / thab mo dang khrag khrag dang mu ge'i dgon pa dang mi ngas dang rang gi dpung dang gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs
83b8: pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / gnod sbyin dang srin po dang 'byung po dang sha za dang srul po dang lus srul po dang skem byed dang grib gnon zhi bar 'gyur zhing / bde ba dang lo legs pa dang dga' ba dang mi mang po bde ba mang bar 'gyur ro// dga' ba

84a1: dang yid bde ba mang bar 'gyur ro/ / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'di mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// skal
84a2: pa stong phrag bdun bcu'i tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ / pad ma'i 'od drim med cing rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma thob pa thob par
84a3: 'gyur ro/ / pad ma rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los/ bsgyur ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro// ri mo'i sku gzugs bsgrub pa'i cho gang cog ni mo'o// / de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying
84a4: po'i cho ga zhib mo chen po'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ chu klung gi 'gram mam/ pad ma'i mtshe'u 'am ud pa la'i tshe'u 'am me tog gi skyed mos tshal lam/ 'bras bu'i kun dga' rab 'am khang bzangs bzhi dag migazhi
84a5: yongs su sbyangs pa/ rtsa dang shing bal dang skra dang / phub ma dang / sol ba dang phyag dar gyi phung po dang gyo mo dang shing dang bong ba dang bseg ma dang thod pa'i rus pas gang ba rnams spangs pa'i sa gzhi'i phyogs na mtsha'u dang 'bab
84a6: chudang 'bab chu byang phyogs nas 'bab pa dang / nye ban chu yod cing shin tu mdzes pa lho phyogs dang byang phyogs dang nub phyogs dang shar phyogs gang na ljon shing gis mdzes par byas la gang nyams dga' ba kha dog dang gzi
84a7: byin du ldan pa'i gnas de lta bu rnyed nas/ chu dang yungs dkar la bzlas te kun tu gtor ro// sa gzhi de lta bu sbyang ba ni mchog yin no// khro bo'i rgyal po yungs dkar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ phyogs bzhir gtor na kun nas/
84a8: dpag tshad brgya tshun chad phyogs bcings pa dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang mtshams bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro// sdang ba thams cad dang bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad skad cig kyang mi gnas par phyogs bzhir byer te 'dong ste/

84b1: srog chags sdang ba dang sdang ba'i sems can dang sdang ba'i gcan zad khro bo gang yin pa de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing / lha thams cad srung bar 'gyur ro// gnas kyi phyogs der mkhas pas dkyil 'khor byas ste/
84b2: gru bzhi lha ma pa ngos re re shing khru sum bcu rtsa gnyis gzhal bar bya zhing cha dbyes pa gru bzhi pa cha mnyam zhing mdzes bsgo bzhi dang / rta babs bzhir ldan pa/ 'bras kyi phye ma'i mtshon sna bzhir sbyar la/ des dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ tshon
84b3: lnga'i thig skud kyis thig btab nas/ tsan dan dkar po'i bur bu btab ste/ zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad dam chos bco lda tshi phral dang rgyu skar bzang po bsdams te/ dkyil 'khor gyi mchog bri bar bya'o// dang po ni dkar pos zi go// gnyis pa ni mang bos so//
84b4: gsum pa ning pos so// bzhi pa ni nam mkha'i kha dog gis so// lnga pa ni mig sman gyi kha dog gis te dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po 'jigs pa med pa cha rnam par mdzes shing gsal bar ba ri sar pa dang tshon dang sdod sar pas
84b5: bri bar bya ste/ dkyil khor gyi snying por pad ma 'dab ma stong pa khor yug stegs bu dang bcas pa bri zhing pad 'i phreng ba mtshan gyis mdzes pa bris la de'i dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phub pa chen po shAkya'i rgyal po dang 'od dpag
84b6: med dang 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po bzhag go/ g.yas su mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug don yod pa'i shags pa'i cha byad 'chang ba gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya'o// g.yon du phyag na rdo rje rnga yab dang rdo rje thogs pa
84b7: bzhin khro gnyer can 'od 'bar bas skor ba'o/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du lha mo sgrol ma dang dri med 'od 'gro bya'o// 'bags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu dkar sham chen po dang gos dkar mo
84b8: dang dkar mo chen mo la ga na dbyug pa dang / ril pa spyi blugs thogs po'o// de'i 'og du srin mo ral ba gcig ma mche ba gtsigs pa thod pa'i phreng ba thogs pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa lag pa bzhi pa/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis

85a1: na rdo rje dang dgra sta dang / g.yas pa'i gung mo lha dang log 'dren la bdags par bya'o// g.yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bram ze'i cha lugs 'chang ba ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis bzhugs pa 'od dpag med/
85a2: kyi thor tshugs brgyan par bya'o// g.yas g.yon du dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po bya'o// de'i 'og du dpal lha mo dang lha mo dbyangs ldan ma dang mtshan mo'i lha mo dang sa'i lha mo dang lo tog gi lha mo dang 'bras bu'i lha mo bya'o// de'i 'og
85a3: du'akhor yug tsug shin rje dang chu lha dang rlung lha la sogs pa byo'o/ la pa'i thor tshugs kyis mun pa'i drang srong bzhag par bya'o// grwar rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa bzhag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i dbus dang
85a4: bar u0f89u0fa4mra kyu dang dgra sta dang rdo rje dkrug pa dang zhag pa dang grags zlog bya'o/ / rol tu tshangs pa dang / drag po dang lha mo um da tshang sa ba'i drung du la mo dbyangs ldan sa khros pa'i gnas pan no// gnyis kyi bar du byug pa dang ril pa
85a5: thugs bri bar bya'o/ / gcig tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnams par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi rnam grangs bzhag go// gcig du shi bA ba ha bzhag go// de nas shar phyogs kyi sgor khro bo rta mgrin 'jigs su rung ba'i mig can bzhag
85a6: go/ / lho phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po kA li ki li zhes bya ba/ rdo rje rnam par 'dren pa/ lag na rdo rje dang dgra sta dang zhagra pa thogs pa bya'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor pho nya mo pad ma'i rigs mdzes ma/ lag pa pad mi'i rtse mo nas 'dzin par bya'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor
