148a7: ni/ bskums na de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ rnam grol gsung ba'i phyag rgya 'di// yang dag 'grol bar rab tu bstan// phyag rgya 'dini bstan pas ni/ ngan par byas pa thams cad 'jig/ oM a mo g+ha badz+ra pad ma b+hu dze mi li mi li swA hA/ lag gnyis
148a8: thal mo khong stong las/ mdor na nor bu 'dra bar bcing / nor bu'i phyag rgya rdo rje 'dra// yid bzhin nor bur brjod pa yin/ las ni don yod thams cad byed/ don yod mchod pa'i chang 'bebs shing // don yod pha rol phyin drug rdzogs don yongs dpa

148b1: rgyas rnams dang ni/ byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba yin// don yod rnam thol dkyil 'khor gas mtshams med lnga po skyong sa mdzad// o a mo g+ha ma Ne ma Ni/ nag la ye/ rdo rje pad ma'i thal mo sbyar khang ma kha bye 'dra bar byas/ grang mo/
148b2: lcags kyu 'dra ba yi/ phyag rgya 'di ni mchog du bzang / phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam gyis/ 'bras bu chen po rmad du byung / 'jig rten 'das pa khyad par 'phags// dus gsum sangs rgyas mthong ba yin// oM a mo g+ha/ badz+ra ma hA pad me/ dza le ma hA dza
148b3: le su dza la ma hA dza le swA hA/ snying khar rdo rje pad ma nyid/ rdo rje bcing ba phun sum tshogs/ 'dzub mo lcags kyu 'dra ba ni// bcing bar bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di/ gzi brjid chen po dag dang ni/ stobs chen pha rol gnon pa dang / thams cad grub par byed pa'i
148b4: gnas/ thams cad srub par rab tu sbyin/ 'jig rten 'das pa grub pa che sangs rgyas nyid phyir bla na med// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa grub// gsang sngags grub pa bla na med/ oM a mo g+ha sid d+he/ sarba ta thA ga ta sid d+he/ a ba lo ka ya sid d+he/
148b5: ma hA bi bu la sid d+he/ ku ru ku ru swA hA// rdo rje thal mo mnyam bzhag ste/ gung mo bshibs te bslang ba dang // in lag mthe bos sor 'gyed// gung mo yid tsam dgug byab/ pad ma'i dbang phyug sems dpa' che/ 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma
148b6: ste/ rtag tu rnam grol dkyil 'khor ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis// phyag rgya byas pa 'di yin no// / phyag rgya 'di dag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya de dag mthong bas 'jig rten dbang phyug
148b7: mthong ba dang 'dra ba yin no/ / phyag rgya mchog 'di mthong ba ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'bor mthong ba dang 'dra ba yin te/ phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya 'di bcings ba tsam mthong bas mod la dam tshig thams cad shes par 'gyis
148b8: mthong ba dang gzung ba tsam gyis mod la 'bras bu chen po seM yod la sangs rgyas dang / byang chub blan med pa yin no// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

149a1: dang sa ma na pal phya la/ / ma a bal tum hA g+sa d+has rnas sangs na sa/ kun mat+pal a a sa ma rtapa/ ma thanan ba ban pa/ pa / 6 ca
149a2: rAt+na bani thar pa ma b+hU dza swA t+tha/ / phyag rgya chen po brgyan po 'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'dus pa byang chub snying pa'i lam gyi bras bu stun ga tag garten nga phyug zla ma 'i tan mgo pa'i tshus kyi thong /
149a3: yid no/ phyag rgya bdun ni phyag rgya chen po bye ba phrag bdun gyis yongs su skor ba yin te/ phyag rgya chen po bdun po dgang du bcings shing phyag rgya mchog gzung ba ni phyag rgya chen po bye ba phrag brgya bcings par 'gyur ro// bzung bar 'gyur ro//
149a4: de dag thams cad mchod pa dang / bsnyen papar byas par 'gyur ro// bstod par 'gyur ro// ming 'dzin pa byas par 'gyur/ phyag rgya bdun po de dag ni gsang sngags sgrub pa thams cad dang / kun tu las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// thams cad
149a5: byed pa'i phyag rgya 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam bla na med pa yin no/ / gang zhig phyag rgya de dag bcings pa mthong zhing khrus legs par byas te gtsang mas sgrub par byed pa 'di ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur// sngon gyi sgrib pas dmyal
149a6: ba mthong bar mi 'gyur/ phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyi mod la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun gyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po chen po kun du bzung bar gyur
149a7: ropha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / sa bcu la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la
149a8: skur ba 'debs pa dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba rnams kyis ji ste phyag rgya gzung ba tsam dang bstan pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa de dag thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yongs su gzung

149b1: bar 'gyur ro/ / lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / shaza rnams las legs par grang bar 'gyur ro// bang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang chulha dang gzhon nu rnams rtag du dun micad tra/
149b2: srung ba dang / spa ba'i phyir rgyun tu rjes su 'brang ba byed par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad dga' ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// mchod rten dugyur pa yin par 'dod pa dang / lus ring srel gyi snying po yin par 'gyur ro// rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i lus su
149b3: 'gyur ro/ / dug gis mi tshugs mes ma yin mtshon gyis ma yin/ chus ma yin/ dbyig drug gis 'jigs pas ma yin/ seng ges ma yin// gcan zan gtum pos ma yin/ drug mi zad pas ma yin/ rkun po dang / mi rgod kyis ma yin/ khyim
149b4: rdib pas ma yin/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gdon yang 'ong bar mi 'gyur// nad thams cad 'jug par mi 'gyur/ lus la dug sbyar ma dang / byang dang / spong stong gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu sdig pa can gyi rmi lam mthong bar mi
149b5: 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' lta ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ste/ rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// lha thams
149b6: cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'dis mthong bar dgyes par 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu yon tan dang bsod nams 'bar ro// dpal gyis lus shin tu 'bar ba'i lus su 'gyur ro// thams cad du 'di mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur te/
149b7: rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyis mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro// lha'i gnas sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar du yang dgyes par 'gyur te/ rtag tud dgyes par ston par bzhed par 'gyur ro//
149b8: rig sngags 'chang bas khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos te gang mar byas la dri sna tshogs kyis lus bsru ba dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug pa byas la/ tsan dan dkar po dang gu dkus gyis lag pa gnyis mus te/ ga bur dang / kla rtsis

150a1: bgos pa'i sa phyogs gtsang mar ngas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan snga'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan snga 'am// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gags kyi spyan sngar dkyil mo bkrung bcas te 'dug nas phyag rgya 'di
150a2: bcing bar bya'o/ / mchod rten ring srel can gyi drung du phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i tshogs yon chab la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o// byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems su bya'o// sems can thams cad la lhag par brtse ba dang rnying
150a3: rje'i sems bsgom par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la dran par bya'o// sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ phyag rgya chen po bdun po
150a4: 'di dag bcing ba byas na phyag rgya bye ba phrag bdun bcing bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas mthu brjod par bya'o// mthu ni 'jig rten las 'das pa yang dag par mthong ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rang bzhin gyi sku mngon du mthong ba yin no//
150a5: rgyal po 'am/ btsun mo'i nang du 'am/ skye bo mang po mang du tshogs pa dang / dge slong gi tshogs kyi dge 'dun gyi nang du 'am/ 'khor du bcad pa'i nang du'am/ rig byed bzhi tshogs pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / bud med dang /
150a6: skyes pa dang / khye'u dang bu mo dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang bcas pa de dag gi nang du de dag gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho 'phrul 'jig rten las 'das pa mod la mngon du mthong ba dang / 'das pa 'am ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung
150a7: ba'i 'chi ba dang / skye ba dang / skyes nas yang dag par dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i 'bras bu dang / dge ba dang mi dge bas shi ba dang / skyes nas phyug po 'am/ dbul po 'am/ rgyal po thob pa 'am/ lha'i longs spyod dang // lha'i gnas sum bcu rtsa
150a8: gnyis dang / rgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / rtag du dbang phyug chen por 'gyur ba dang / klu'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po gsang ba pa rnams kyis dmyal ba mi zad par skye ba dang / 'tshams med pa la thug gi bar du mthong

150b1: ba dang / bram ze'i rigs sam rgyal rigs sam gzhan yang rigs du ma sna tshogs par skye bar mthong ba dag 'jig rten mgon po'i mthus mngon du mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i las bsgrub par bya ba de dag thams cad bstan par bya ste/ rgyal ba dang
150b2: rnam par rgyal ba dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang mi ngas dang / yams kyi nad dang / pha rol gyi 'khor ram/ rang gi 'khor la gnod pa dang / dgra dang phyir rgol ba dang / 'gyed pa dang g.yul sprod pa dang / tshe ring ba dang / tshe thud pa dang / nad 'byung ba dang / nad med
150b3: pa dang char 'bab pa dang / shin du char 'bab pa dang / char me 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin par 'bab pa dang / dar ba dang / rgud pa dang / 'byor pa dang / mi 'byor pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / nor dang / 'bru rnyed pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'bri ba dang / le nyes pa mthong ba
150b4: dang 'khor ba na da ltar gyi las gang cung zad legs par byed pa dang / nyes pa byed pa dang / dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba'am/ 'bri ba 'am/ 'phel ba 'am/ skye ba legs par skye ba 'am/ ngan par skye ba dang / bu 'byung ba/ bu pho 'am bu mo 'am/ bu bzang po
150b5: 'am/ bu ngan pa 'am/ bsod nams can nam/ bsod nams med pa mngal na gnas pa de dag bden pa nyid du mthong ste/ las kyi cho ga legs par byas pas the tsom mi bya'o// tshe grangs dang / rgyu skar dang nyin mtshan brjod par bya mi dgos kyi
150b6: bzlas brjod dang / gtor ma dang / gtsang sbra dang / bkru bshal dang / shin tu khrus bya ba dang / gos bcad ma bcad pa dang / bden par smra ba dang / byams pa'i sems dang bla ma la legs par mnyan pa de gzung ba kho nar bya'o// zas dang skom/ gtsang ma
150b7: dang / chang dang / sha dang / be gtsong dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u dang / 'dres par byas pa'i 'dres pa'i zas yongs su spang ba dang / shin du spags pa dang / de dag ni khyad par 'dod pas yongs su spang bar byas na/ las 'di ni mod la thams cad mngon
150b8: du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / dka' thub spyod pa la brnyes sems mi bya/ ma gus pa mi bya'i lkog du yang mi bya'o// rjes su gartan pa de dag ni mchog yin na// bsgrub par bya ba mchog de dag ni/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon pos bka' stsal pa

151a1: yin no/ / ngal las me long chu zheng du sor bcu drug pa byas la zangs las pad mo'i gdan sdong bu dang bcas par bya'o// me long gi gong du dngul lam/ gser las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tshad sor bzhi
151a2: pagangan par mo phyag bzhi la mdung rtse gsum pa dang / zhags pa dang / pad ma dang / nor bu dang / rin po che thogs par bya ba ni 'jog sbyong legs par byas pa// 'jam po 'od byin pa tsam du sbyar bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas me long
151a3: gi gong gi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sA la ring bsrel bzhag par bya'o/ / ga bu ra dang / gla rtsis sku la mchod par bya'o// me long gi nye 'khor thog thag ru dngul gyi me tog dang / gser gyi me tog rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i phreng ba gdags
151a4: ba bya/ bang gang mi dang gdags par bye/ nas gi lpags 'cha bas ma yo la shi de ni du gsum du don yod pa'i nags pa'i snying po tu rgya brgyad bzlas brjod bye ste/ cim rgya chasa'i bad bya'o/ jo bo'i rgyal bab dang 'gyur bar bya'o// den pa yong bar bar 'gyur ro// cig yon 'dog ga tshogs bar
151a5: ra byur ro/ / ngag rten dang phyug gi sugan pade la b+harnas kyi chung dag go/ 'o tshogs byung / na 'di sngags chang 'i lus par ni dgang bar 'gyur ro// na yod pa dag shA dri ma med pa zhes bya ba don yod ba nags pa'i rnying po cho gzhi mo// zhwa bzo par 'gyur ro// lub shin dri ma med cing yongs su dag
151a6: par 'gyur ro/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang bas 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par 'phrul pa 'grub pa bstan par bya dgos pas de nas rig sngags 'char bsas dang ba'i lci ba kres pa'i dkyil 'khor
151a7: t+yar zla ba'i 'phang nga khra ngobo byas la shan tu mkhregs pa shin tu 'jam par bya'o/ / ga skad kyis rnam par bye ste/ tshon sna tshogs rnam par bye zhing sgo bzhi rnam par bye nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo rnam par bye ste/ pad ma 'dabs
151a8: brgyad chen gyis gsal bar bri zhing bad pa'i dkyil drags ra dang theb bya'o/ / stegs pacu bzhi la rin po che sna tshogs kyis rgyan pa dang / stegs bukra bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa/ gsum pa/ 'jigs par byed pa'i

151b1: gzugs bri bar bya'o/ / stegs bu'i dbus kyi gnas par bar du lha dbang phyug dang // dbang phyug chen po dang shin rje dang chu lha dang / gzhon nu dang / lus ngan po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang //
151b2: lha dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / ral pa gcig pa dang / sgrol ma dang / dkar mo dang / khro gnyer ma dang / rdo rje pho nya mo rnams tshon sna tshogs kyis bri zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs thogs pa bya'o// stegs
151b3: bu'i phyi rol du mdud rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba dang / rdo rje'i phreng ba dang / pad ma'i zang ba kun tu bya'o// phreng ba'i bar dbus dang / 'i bar du lha me brgyad dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / dpe med ma dang / ba sa na ti dang / dpal spa dbyangs dang / sa'i lha
151b4: mo dang / dung can ma dang / bus pa ngan ti rnams rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan // me tog sna tshogs dang rin po che'i snod thogs par bya'o// phyi rol thog thag du phreng ba'i ba bar du dri sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor ba sku zhing tsan dan dkar po dang /
151b5: gur kum gyis mchod pa sna tshogs bya'o// ga bur dang / gla rtsis mchod cing dkyil 'khor kun tu dar sna tshon sna lnga'i rgyal mtshan dang / mda' dang / rta babs kyis brgyan par bya'o// dngul gyi snod bzhi rung ber gis bkang ste bzhag par bya'o//
151b6: dngul gyi garjod bzhi gtor ma dkar gsum gyis dgang bar bya'o// dngul gyi snod bzhir mchod yon gyi chu bzhag par bya'o// snod brgyad dri sna tshogs kyi gtor mas dgang bar bya'o// 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag par bya'o// bzas
151b7: bza' ba dang / gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag par bya'o// dri sna tshogs dang / thug pas dngul gyi snong bkang ste/ bzhag par bya'o// / 6// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/
151b8: bam po bco lnga pa/ de nas gsang sngags la 'jug pa rnams kyi dgos pa thams cad so sor 'grub par 'gyur ba ni oM zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gsang sngags yi ge gcig

152a1: pa'o/ / 'jig rten mgon pa'i spyan sngar 'bum dran par byas nas dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// ldan gyi sdig pa bsags pa sems can dmyal ba mi zad pa gang ci yang rung bde dag thams cad ci ltar rlung gis phyag dang gtor ba
152a2: bzhin/ 'jig par 'gyur/ dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// don thams cad rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs thams cad dang / gang dkyil 'khor gyi lha gzhan dag kyang dgyes par 'gyur la 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs
152a3: dbang phyug rtag du mchog sbyin pa mdzad do/ / gsang sngags o zhes bya badran nas tshe 'phos pa ni 'jig rten gyi 'ams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags kyi yige gcig pa'o// oM b+hu li ge gnyis pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas
152a4: gnyis pa thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi spyan sngar 'dug par 'byung zhing mchog thams cad rjes su sbyin par mdzad sdig pa thams cad kyang rnam par dag par mdzad sngon gyin dkyang sos par 'gyur/ nor gyi
152a5: dbang phyug nor bu bzang po'i bu dbang du 'gyur zhing nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ / migang gis kyang phyir zhing bar chad byed nus par mi 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas ri gu 'dzin du skye bar 'gyur don yod pa'i zhags pa dngos grub kyang thob par
152a6: 'gyur ro/ / oM pad ma gsang sngags kyi yi ge gsum pa 'bum bathas brjod byas nas gsum pa la yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur/ pad ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags gang yin pa thams cad la
152a7: zhugs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhon nu'i cha byad can mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjes su sbyin par mdzad/ don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsugator gyi
152a8: dkyil 'khor ston par mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams ston par mdzad/ thams cad dngos grub rjes su sbyin par mdzad do// oM pad mchigasang sngags

152b1: yi ge bzhipa'i bum bzlas brjod byas nas bzhi pa la 'jug par 'gyur/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sku mdog gser gyi kha dog can mdun na bzhugs zhing dpung pa brkyang nas phyag spyi bor 'jug par
152b2: mdzad la rig sngags chang ba la legs so zhes bya ba rjes su sbyin par mdzad de/ rigs sngags 'char chung shog khyod kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su dag ste// rang gi ngo bo thams cad shin tu dri ma med par yongs su dag go//
152b3: mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas tshe 'phos nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'ong zhing tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ phyir zhing nam yang mngal na gnas pas gos par mi 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// oM pad
152b4: ma b+hu dze/ gsang sngags yi ge lnga pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas lnga pa la gnas par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i bla ma rab tu ston par mdzad// sgrib pa thams cad
152b5: yongs su zad par 'gyur rig sngags 'cha la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur te rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ / khyod la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po skyes te/ rig sngags 'chang khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po// bskyed
152b6: bas rig sngags 'chang khyod tshe brjos na de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshungs par bskyed par 'gyur zhing nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur/ / khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags
152b7: pa'i pad ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya chen po rim par phye ba grub cing rig sngags 'chang khyod sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad spangs kyis bya ba thams cad kyis shig/ yid la bya ba'i
152b8: sgrub pa thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin de dag thams cad shin tu grub par 'gyur ro/ / oM pad mA ba lo ki te gzungs sngags drug pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas drug pa 'thob ste/ 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

153a1: cad snang bar mdzad par 'gyur/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gzigs shing mngon sum du ston
153a2: pa mdzad/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan ga sngags 'chang de la yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/
153a3: rig sngags 'chang nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshur shog/ las byas pa ni shin tu yongs su zad cing khyod kyis sems can dmyal ba'i sgo rnams pa cad / khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi
153a4: zhing thams cad kyi sgo rnams ni bye/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bon dang / rigs kyi spyi ni khong du chud khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi snying po dag gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni grub/
153a5: khyod kyis thams cad du gnas kyi sgo rnams ni phye bas 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las bsgrub pa'i rnams ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin las thams cad byos shig/ oM pad ma dz+wa la hUM d+h+r-ig/ yi ge bdun pa
153a6: 'bum bzlas brjod byas ma thag du ting nge 'dzin pad ma dri ma med pa sgrib pa dang bral ba dag pa zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur la ting nge 'dzin gang thob pas lus shin tu 'bar bar 'gyur zhing 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs su 'gyur/ sa bdun
153a7: bal gnas par 'gyur/ / lus kyi snang ba gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi gnas rnams snang bar byed cing / gang dang gang du 'od zer rin po che 'bar bsna
153a8: dga'abab pa las me tog gi char sna tshogs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i pad ma

153b1: ma 'od zer 'bar ba gser gyi mdog can dpung pa brkyang ste/ phyag g.yas pas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog cing legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin la dbugs 'byin par mdzad do// rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// 'di ni sangs rgyas
153b2: bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snying po gsang ba bzlas brjod kyi cho ga mchod pa'i mchog yin no/ / 'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po gsang ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi snying po
153b3: yang dag pa'o/ / rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / pad ma gtsug tor gyi snying po cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par 'phrul pa grub kyis rig sngags 'chang nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song la sangs
153b4: rgyas kyi mdzad pa gyis shig/ oM a mo g+ha ma ni pad me gzungs sngags kyi snying po brgyad pa 'bum zlas brjod byas na lus shin tu yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur// bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis nor bu rin po chen po shel ltar phyi nang
153b5: shin tu yongs su dag ste/ de ltar rig sngags 'chang gi lus yongs su dag par 'gyur/ sa brgyad pa la gnas par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi lus yongs su dag pa rang
153b6: gi gzugs kyi ngo bo ston cing / rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na gnas la rig sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de// phyag g.yas pa mgo'i spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/ legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin par mdzad de// rig sngags
153b7: 'chang legs so legs so/ / rig sngags 'chang khyod lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa dga' ba la zhugs so// rig sngags 'chang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam par 'brel ba'i 'jig rten rnam par lta bar tshur shog/ dor khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
153b8: pa byed par 'gyur ro khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi snying po dkyil 'khor gsang ba sgrub kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa dam pa bya ba thams cad gyis shig/ oM pad ma lo tsa ne hu ru huM/ gzungs sngags kyi snying

154a1: po yi ge dgra po 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas dgu pa la gnas par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras kyi gtso bor 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye
154a2: ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa dgu dag rig sngags 'chad la mngon sum du ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs ston par mdzad/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bo thams cad kyis phyag 'jog par mdzad legs so zhes
154a3: bya ba yang sbyin par mdzad de/ / rig sngags 'chang chen po legs so legs so// khyod kyis ngal zhing spyod pa'i las legs par sgrub pa byas so// khyod kyis 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa sangs rgyas nyid du sgrub pa ste/
154a4: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa dang / mdo sde lung bcas pa sgrub pa 'jig rten gyi 'dren pas bstan pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad grub pa yin no// oM pad moSh+Ti sha bi ma le hUM phaT/ gsang sngags kyi
154a5: snying po yi ge bcu pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na phyir mi ldog pa nyid du gyur nas bcu la gnas par 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i skye dgu dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// zhes brjed la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
154a6: phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i pad ma gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyur te the tsom mi bya'o// gsang sngags bcu pa'i sgrub pa de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa 'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par 'phrul bzlas
154a7: brjod tsam gyis 'grub pa yin te/ bdag gis sngar bstan pa thams cad la lhag par zhen pa/ gtsang ma/ gtsang sbra spyod pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ byams pa'i sems dang snying rje skyes pa/ bden pa smra ba/ bla ma la gus pa/ dkon mchog
154a8: gsum la dad bache ba/ bla ma dang / slob dpon la rtag tu mchod pa byed pa'idi ni bzlas brjod kyi cho ga yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med par brtan to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dponi chen po lag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dgra

154b1: chen po phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rab tu 'dzus la lagan rdorje skor bzhin du mgo tud nas smras pa sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gni don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug tar kyid dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang/ /
154b2: ba chen po rgyal po 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ste/ gzungs sngags kyi snying pa ri po 'di dag ni bzlas brjod tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par gyur na/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang ches ngal zhing drub par smras brjod sgrub pa dang / chog tu
154b3: par bsgrub pa lta/ smos kyang ci dgos/ nyi zhag gcig brte/ gnas la gnas shing zas spangs pa dang / 'bras bu dang / grus bu dang / chu ba bzang ba zos nas rag sngags 'di bsgrubs na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i dngos grub di la buzhig 'byung bar
154b4: 'gyur/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje nyin zhag gcig bskud pa la gnas shing / nyin zhag gcig tsas bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis 'bras bu grub par 'gyur ba ni lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge
154b5: slong dam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge basbyin nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ gzhan yang dge sbyong mge bregs pa/ rigs kyi gtso bo// bram ze'am rgyal rigs sam/ skyes pa'am bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmang rigs gang la la
154b6: s kad cig thang cig yud ma 'am dus chags gcig gam dus tshigs gnyis sam dus tshigs gsum yongs su rdzogs par gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi snying po khro bo'i rigs kyi gsang sngags rim par
154b7: bye ba gzungs sngags chen po 'di la lan cig dran nam/ klog gam/ ming gzung ba yang dran nas/ lag na rdo rje dus tshigs gcig tu dran pa tsam gyis kyang de'i mtshams med pa byed pa/ mnar med par gzhol ba/ skal par gnas pa yang de'i
154b8: thatha cad rnam par dag par 'gyur la/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa bsags pa rnams zad par 'gyur// lus yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ rdeb 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du padam

155a1: byab/ / dag las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ nams kyang ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur// skal ba bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad bcur 'khor los gyur ba mchog du 'gyur// rgal ba byeb 'bus phrag brgyad bcur 'jig rten gyi
155a2: khams bde ba can du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ skal pa 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa gnyis su// 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba bde ba myong bar 'gyur// bskal pa 'bum phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis su 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig rten rnam par gzigs
155a3: par skye bar 'gyur/ ro rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ skal pa 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa gnyis su nor bu 'chang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur// skal pa khri phrag brgyad bcur 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas ri gu 'dzin du bde ba myong
155a4: bar 'gyur skal pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ / skal pa 'bum phrag brgyad bcur dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ skal ba 'bum phrag sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi nang du rgya byin nyid byed par 'gyur
155a5: skal pa 'bum phrag lnga bcu rtsa gnyis su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su yongs su 'jug par 'gyur/ bskal ba stong phrag nyi shur 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la spyod par 'gyur te/ nams kyang mi'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur shing gang dang
155a6: gang du skye bar 'gyur ba thams cad du/ rdzas te skye bar 'gyur thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ lag na rdo rje de ltar rig sngags lan cig dran pa tsam gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje gal te gang/
155a7: zhigazhag gcig ga ma lan gcig bsnur ba la gnas te bzlas brjod dang bcas pa byed na/ lagan rdo rje de ni tshe 'di nyid la mi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo nyid sgrib pa dang / bral nas don yod pa chen po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// ngan yod pa bkod
155a8: pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ / pad ma gsal ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// don yod pa dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo// don yod pa rnam par gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ pad ma gtsug tor

155b1: mthar phyin pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob po/ / don yod pa 'bar ba'i gtsug tor gyi snying po gsang ba sgrub pa 'thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge
155b2: ba'i rtsa bskyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ dzes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad ma dag las rdzas te skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa pad ma ga tsug
155b3: tor gyi cho ga mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / phyag rgya dang bcas pa cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du lobs par 'gyur zhing // don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po pad ma gtsug gtor gyi
155b4: dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang sngags grub pa'i cho ga ste/ grub pa'i cho ga gnyis pa'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smraso//
155b5: bcom ldan 'das don yod pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bya ba'i cho ga dang / grub pa'i cho ga dang / bcas pa bshad par gsol// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang kun gyi grub pa/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pas
155b6: dngos grub sgrub pa'i cho ga de kho na bsha du gsol/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ram gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje bya ba'i cho ga dang /
155b7: sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya yis nyon cig/ lag na rdo rje gsang sngags rtsab don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi snying po gsang ba 'di'i rig sngags 'chang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong/
155b8: dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma lan gcig tsam dran pa yid la byed pa yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid snying rje chen po dang / byams pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i bsams pas/ sems can la dmigs pa'i sems can gang yang rung ngan song

156a1: gsum du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam yi dgas kyi yul rnams kyi gnas de dag med de/ de ltar sems can thams cad sgrub pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lan gnyis
156a2: brjod pa tsam gyis nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis dug dang / 'brum bu dang 'bras dang / lhog pa dang rkang shu dang / mdze dang g.yon pa la sogs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// lan bzhi brjod pa tsam gyis
156a3: dbyig dug dang / byang thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// lan lnga brjod pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang / zab mo dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan drug brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa dang / gdon dang / rims thams cad 'jig
156a4: par 'gyur ro/ / lan bdun brjod pa tsam gyis dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa thams cad dang sems can thams cad kyi nad dang yams kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyi don du nyin
156a5: re zhing gzhan me smra bar lan bdun dran par bya'o/ / sems can gang la la sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba shi ba dang / dge slong gang la la bslab pa'i sdom pa dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom pa ral pa dang mkhan po dang slob dpon la gus par ma byas
156a6: pa shi ba de'i don du bya ma gtsang ma blangs la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ dur khrod dam/ ro sreg pa 'am/ mchang ba der bye ma gtor bar bya'o// gang dang gang na sems can gang dag gi rus pa yod par bye ma gtor ma thag tu de dang der bye ma bab pa'i
156a7: sems can dmyal ba 'am yi dgas sam/ sha zar skyes pa'am gnod sbyin nam srin po'i skye gnas su phyes na de'i mod 'tshengs nas thams cad mthongs su gzhol bar 'gyur shing rnams kyang sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar mi 'gyur ro// yang na grog la
156a8: bris nas mchod rten gyi nang du bcug pa'i gnas de nar gnyis pa'am/ rkang bzhi pa ga / bar 'ong ba de dag thams cad grib ma phog pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag ci thams cad mtho ris su gzhol bar 'gyur ro//

156b1: tha na re dgas dang / bya dang / tha na ldang sko skra dang / ne'u le dang / sdig pa dang / sbrul dang / khyi dang / rul sbal dang / lag 'gro dang / dkyil 'khor de la grib ma 'bab pa tsam gyis thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa rnams rnam padag par 'gyur zhing de dag thams
156b2: cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ / dung la lan bdun zlas brjod byas nas gnas mthon por bus na sems can gang dag dung de'i sgra thos pa skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang ri dgas dang / bya dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
156b3: gtogs pa de dag thams cad mtho ngas kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ / gang dag tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / sems can gang dag sbyin pa la dga' ba dang / gang dag bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas pa dang / gang dag skyabs su gzung ba dang /
156b4: gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas bsdams pa de dag kyang dung gi sgra thos nas sems can de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur la/ tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde
156b5: ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// tsan dan la lan bdun zlas brjod byas na dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'am/ mchod rten gyi 'khor sa 'am/ dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ skye bo mang po'i nang ngam/ rgyal po'i pho brang du bdugs na
156b6: gang dag der dri bsnams pa'i sems can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / chos gos la bdugs nas gang gi lus la gyon pa de'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// lus la bab
156b7: pa tsam gyis dri ma dang / ser sna dang / skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro// gos bcangs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyis gos de bdugs nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po btsun mo dang / 'khor dang
156b8: bcas pa dbang du 'gyur mchod gnas chen por 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar yang 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na dge slong thams cad kyi mchod gnas chen por 'os par 'gyur ro// skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na

157a1: nod chen po 'phel bar 'gyur zhing mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ / ri'i rtse mo nyi ma 'char ba'i khar bdugs nas gsang sngags rtsab lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na mod la nyi ma babs par 'gyur shing 'dod pa mgo ku rje su sbyin par byed do// bu gul
157a2: dang bsres nas lha chen po'i bdun du bdug par bya zhing gsang sngags rtsab lan bdun byab ba byas na mod nyid la lha chen po 'bab par 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du 'dug nas bsam pa thams cad yongs su spong bar byed do/ / bo la dang tsan dan
157a3: dang / gu gur 'asres nas sred med kyi bu'i mdun du bdug par bya zhing gsang sngags rtsabs lan nyi shu gcig lus kyi yan lag la byab pa byas na sred med kyi bu rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na 'dug cing 'dod pa mchog kun rjes su skyid par byed la
157a4: dngos po sna tshogs kyang sbyin par byed do/ / yungs dkar dang bsres nas tshangs pa la bdug cing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bcu bzhi byab par byas na tshangs pa rang gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug la mchog thabs sbyin par byed do// pad ma'i phye ma dang bsres
157a5: nas nag po chen po dang ma mo'i tshogs la bdugs na nag po chen po dang ma mo'i tshegs 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing mchog dang bya ba sgrub pa thams cad sbyin par byed do/ / na ga puSh+pa dang / sbrul gyi shun pa dang / sres
157a6: pa'i bdug pa klu'i mtsher 'dug cing gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun yungs dkar la bzlas brjod na klu'i mtshor gtor la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mdo lan cig brjod cing dran par byas na klu dang klu mo dang / klu'i bu pho dang klu'i bu mo thams
157a7: cad gnas kun nas byung nas rig sngags 'chang gi rkang pa gnyis la 'dud cing gang sgo ba de dag thams cad byed la 'dod pa thams cad sbyin cing dbang du 'gyur ro/ / lan gsum sbyar na klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho yang 'ong // klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang
157a8: dga' bo yang 'ong shing thams cad go ba bzhin byed pa dbang du bur nas 'jug go/ / gdod sbyid dang / srin po dgug par 'dod pas dung khrod kyi nang du mir sregs pa'i sol bas bdugs la/ gsang sngags rtsab gsang mthon pos lan bdu brjod

157b1: cing dran na gnod sbyin dang srin po dag rgyug cing 'od la/ rig sngags 'chang gi rkang pa gnyis la bcud nas/ rje btsun bka' stsol cig ces zer ba dang / de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis de sgob ji lta ba bzhin du byas na ba thams cad byed la mngag
157b2: pa'i las byed par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dug/ thod pa sbyar ba la lan bdun gas brjod byas nas thod pa bkang ba'i bdug pas bdug na 'byung po thams cad kun nas 'ong zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur la/ las byed par 'gyur ro//
157b3: gnod sbyin mo dbang bar 'dod pas btsag gis gnod sbyin mo bris la/ ba lang gi lci ba'i dkyil 'khor byas par byes pad ma'i ri mo bri zhing bye'i gtor la pad ma lta bur byas pa bzhag la bdug pa 'dis bdug cing / gsang sngags bcu rtsa brgyad bzlas
157b4: brjod bya/ / yungs ka pa pa bdun bzlas brjod byas nas gnod sbyin mo la brdeg pa byas na gnod sbyin mo rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du 'dug cing lha'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'grol slar yang 'ong ste/ don gsang ba thams cad slob tsam gyis byed par
157b5: 'gyur ro/ / yang nama'am chung ma'am/ sring mo yin no zhes smra bar bya ste/ gal te mar byas na bul sdug pa 'ongs spyod dang / gzhal med khang thams cad kyi nang du 'dug la rgyal po'i bu bzhin yongs su sbyong bar byed do// gal te sring mor byas na
157b6: rnam thos la 'gran par 'gyur ro/ / gal te chung mar byas na sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi dga' bo ltar dga' ba'i longs skyong dag la cer 'jug par byed do// lha mo dpal la bdugs la/ gsang sngags rtsa ba lan bdun bzlas brjod bya zhing lha mo dpal gyi mgo
157b7: la byugs na lha mo chen mo dpal rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na 'dug cing / nor gyi phung po 'bul bar byed do// nam 'tsho'i bar du khyim na 'dug cing nor chen po nyid 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rnam thos kyi bu la bdugs ni gser srang stong sbyin par
157b8: byed do/ / nor bu bzang po'i bu la bdugs na gser gyi dong rtse stong sbyin par byed do// tshal gseb du bdugs na tshal na gnas pa'i lha rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing rdzas dang / sman thams cad rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na 'dug go//

158a1: de mas la bdugs na r+tha dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang rdzas thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer bzhi'i sgo rnams su bdugs na grong khyer kun tu yams kyi nang dang gnod pa dang nad 'go ba dang / dang thams cad dang 'thab pa dang tha
158a2: mo dang bcod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// brog tu bdugs na kun mo dang / g.yon can dang / gnad byed dang / seng ge dang stag dang / sprul dang / dreng dang / dos kyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur shing ri dgas gtum
158a3: pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / rims thams cad la bdug sa na rims thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad 'gegs pa can dan gyi bdug pa bsgrub pa'i chog ste/ gsum pa'o// de nas thig le yang dag par
158a4: bshad par bya ste/ rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags bsgrub pa ni nyi mi'i gzi brjid dang mtshungs shing skar ma'i rnam pa ltar 'bar ba yin te/ gzi brjid kyi rgyal po de gnyis kyis 'bar bar 'gyur ba ni bsod nams kyi phung po rnam par 'phel lo// lha rnam
158a5: kyi nang na lha'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang bcas pas rtag tu mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur gyis rig sngags 'chang gis the tshom mi bya'o// dpal ba'i steng du thig le byed pa ni rtag tu mdzes pa yin te/ nyi ma ltar
158a6: 'od zer gyi dra ba stong gis gsal shing shel ltar dag pa mdog dkar sha pa dri zhim pa dang / glang po che'i bya ba dang / dpral ba dang / ba lang gi gnas ltar skyon med cing mnyam par 'thud la shin ku rul ba/ ded dpon gcig pu'i bu nor bur gyur cing gas
158a7: dag 'dus gas pas ses par sgru ga/ se gzhes pa ga tu ba rtson pa med do// mas kyi ba gal pa na ga ga tug par ma sa pa'i ba khas pa ma ba na pa ba
158a8: gangal ba'i myunar gyirnam pa zlab bus ni gnas pa bzhin dang ga bor gyi dbas na skarnams kyi rgyal po ba ni byen gabu yin pa/ ba dang pa ni 'dzin dad kyi rgyal po gdugs gcig pa kar bar ba yin na cin nag gas gas

158b1: bde ba gshegs pa shin tu rgyal ba yin la shAH'i rigs kyi rgyud ltar sems can thabs cad la pan par 'dod pa de bzhin du nong bu mchog rnam par dag pa ni sems can thams cad la phan par 'ad pa yin no/ / dang bcas pa'i 'jig rtenan ji ltar
158b2: na pang thugs pa mamo/ de / sa cag sems nathakhas la 'ang pa byung / sheg da man das thab cadag tu phyin par byed/ dang / gad/ palas pa du shA
158b3: brgyags da/ yo ba gyu ba sa su sa pa dang / na dam ma shA ga pa ma da// bya na pa 'ad nga byu ba thams cad/ dgung gyur nam san ma// dpa pa rtag gyu na/
158b4: na tham cad ma kha na pa kyang cag tu 'a las me // rgya sa me bye shing sus pa du dang / sa pa'i bya dang / bye ba'i drug dang / byang mi ba dang nga sngags dang / sna ba'i rna pas mi rmugs par gyur bangs/
158b5: mthus de ga thams cad kyis mi rmugs par 'gyur ro// mas dang / srog bsngal ba / dang / rdza dang grwa na chen po lacigs byas pag bung mo pa de dag thams ca dag tu par 'gyur/ sems can bcon ba 2
158b6: pas bcad pa'am/ bcing bar 'os pa la thig le lta bu byas pas de dag thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// smin mtshams dpal bar thig le lta bu byas na de'i mod la gnod sbyin stong dang / srin po bdag po'i gzugs can gdon stong rnams lus
158b7: la 'dug par mi 'thur shing glang po che dang ri dgas kyi bdag po'i gyu dang / tshem rkun dang god dkyilam dang / ri'i lam dang / ri rdul dang / dam grog dang / dro ba dang / grang ba dang / sbrul dang / thang 'jigs kyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'i bar 'gyur ro//
158b8: thig le lta bu'i mthus dgra'i sde stong snyed kyi nang na 'gyed pa las myur ba nyid du rgyal bar 'gyur/ g.yul dang / 'thab mo dang tha snyad mod nyid la zhi bar 'gyur/ de'i tshe nor bu gtsug gi spyi bor btags pa gang yin pa dang / thig le yang byas

159a1: nas 'khor lo la byugs la pha rol gyi dmag tshogs g.yul gyi nang du zhugs na bdag nyid gcig pus dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa las rgyal bar 'gyur/ 'dis thams cad du zhugs pa tsam gyis bam pa byas par 'gyur
159a2: zhing phyogs bcur 'bros la thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ / thig le byas nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po dang / btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas nye bar 'khod do// ji srid 'tsho'i mchod gnas su 'gyur ro// dpung pa
159a3: g.yas par nor bu btags la yan lag dang / nying lag dag du thig le byas na thams cad du rgyal ba 'thob cing rig pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur la/ don gang dang gang bsgrubs pa de dang de thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// ri lu dag ni khar bcug
159a4: nas/ lhan cig 'dug la smras ni na// thams cad dbang du 'ong bar 'gyur// rgyal po dang ni btsun mo'am// dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dang // rgyal rigs dang ni dmangs rigs nyid// skyes pa dang ni bud med dang // khye'u dang bud med rnams kyang rung // de dag thams/
159a5: cad dbang du 'gyur// kun du mngag pa'i las rnams byed// ri lu zos pa tsam gyis ni// nad rnams thams cad rnam par 'jig/ gang gi nyin bzhi pa yi rims// gang dag khong skom nad kyis nyams// gang zhig rtag pa'i rims kyis btag gang du 'ab
159a6: mo 'byung ba dag/ bzhin skye bo sdang sems can// bdag la grib gnon gzhan grib gnon// skem byed skem pa brjed byed dang / gang zhig gdon gzhan mi zad pa// sdig pa'i las ni kun tu spyod// sngon gyis las ni mi zad pa// de kun skad cig tsam
159a7: gyis 'jig ri lus khrus byas tsam gyis ni/ 'bras dang shu bar 'gyur rnams dang // ldog pa dang ni gang shA dang / mtshan par rdol dang me dpa la dang // kyi ngo mdzo dang rkang pa'i nad/ mi ba de rnams kun dang ni// gang gi nod rgyas sdang bas zin// thugs
159a8: btsam gyi mod la ni/ / thams cad dag med zhi bar 'gyur/ ri lus thams cad las byed pa// rtswa rdzas shi ba sos par byed// ri lu dag ni 'chad byed cing // big le dag ni byas pa yis// thams cad du ni mchod pa 'thog thams cad dra ni nor dag 'du/

159b1: dpa' 'dod pa ni papa 'thor cing / bru 'do 'bu'i brang po'i bal/ lharnam pa dag na dga' 'gyur shing / bla rnams kyang ni dag dang bcas/ gan tsun ldan ba za dang / mnam 'a rjong mi 'am mi lce bye tshan po thams pa dang / phung pornams
159b2: kyang dga' dang bcag / rtag tu phyag bya'i gnas 'gyur zhing // thams cad dbang du gyur nas 'khod// 'khod kun bran byed ci byi zed// gang shig ri lu de dag bsten// ri lu thig le rtag byed la// de bzhin gshegs kun dgongs pa mdzad// 'phags pa spyan
159b3: ras gzigs kyi dbang / de nyid rigapa rtag dra ni// mchog sbyin dus kun gzigs par mdzad// bsod nams phung po stong dag ni// nyi ma rer sogs par byed/ 'jig rten pa'i ba spyad cing // 'jig rten pa rol shin dra bde/ mje ba ni 'bo
159b4: nas su/ bde ba can du mod la 'gro// gang dang gang du skyes par ni// tshe rabs rtag tu tshe rabs dran// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin te/ nod sbyin byeb 'os go gag yel ba med par nyin mtshan du// dus kun tu ni srung ba dang // skyo ba dang sbed dang srung bar byed/ gang
159b5: zhig bu ni med pa dang bud med bu ni 'dod pa la/ / ril bu gcig cig spyang nas su// mnyam par bzhag pas gsang sngags ni// mkhas pas zlab par gyi dor// 'bum ni tshang bar bzlas nas su// zla ba nya ste bcwa lnga la// skyes pa bud med khrus bya zhing /
159b6: yan lag yan la gzig le bya/ dkon mchog gsum ni legs mchod cing // bram ze dag kyang mchod ston byed/ bsrung ba'i chog byas nas su// gtor ma dkar gsum mang po bsham// bdag nyid rgyan gyis brgyan nas su// gos gtsang rnams ni/
159b7: bgo bar bya/ byams pa'i sems la yang dag gnas// snying rje sems can sdug par byed// bsam pa dag cing nges pa dang // bla ma rtag tu gus par bya// me tog sna tshogs rab dgang zhing // spos dang byug pa sna tshogs dang // du rus tsan dan sa la gyi/
159b8: lha yi bdug pas bdug bya zhing / bu ram 'o ma bdun dang ni/ ri lu legs sbyar bza' bar bya// gsang ba 'di 'thungs mod la ni// btud dang kha zas bza' bar bya// mgon po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // mchog sbyin mdzad par mchod par bya//

160a1: byams mdzad de yi zhabs drung du// mtshan mo nyal dang nad par ni// mthong ba mchog 'di thob par 'gyur// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // mchog sbyin rang gzugs ston mdzad cing // mchog nyid dam pa sbyin par
160a2: mdzad bud med de ni bskyed cing / / gzugs bzang mchog tu bltan sdug/ stobs ldan gzugs ni phun sum tshogs// lha yi dpal gyi rjes su 'gro// chos ldan mkhas shing gsal ba dang // tshe ri dbang phyug tshad med 'gyur// dpa' bo dgra las
160a3: rgyal ba dang / sdang ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyur// yang na dran pa'i blo bskyed par// 'dod pas thos pa la brten nas 'dug cing / rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma zhag bdun du nyin re zhing sar dang 'os bskol ba dang ri lu bdun bcug ste/
160a4: zan ma zos pa'i sngon rol du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas 'jam rtsam pa 'thungs la phyis kha zas bza' bar bya// zhag bdun gyis thos pa'i rgya mtsho chen po bsags par 'gyur te/ bstan bcos thams cad dang chos lugs
160a5: dang / 'dral ba dang / snyanang dgas dang / brda sprod pa dang / mdo sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyang ba'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / chos mngon pa dang /
160a6: rtsis dang cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya thams cad dang / theg pa chen po thams cad kha ton du lobs par 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig du sbyar ba byas na stobs chen po'i brtson 'grus kyis pha rol gnon par 'gyur te/ glang po
160a7: che khri'i stobs su 'gyur ro/ / zla ba gcig tsam sbyar ba byas na lo lnga brgyar 'tsho zhing gnyer ma dang / sgra dkar spangs la sba lung lo 'khyil zhing 'khyil bar 'gyur ba dang / lus kyi mdog dkar sham lta bur 'gyur ro// lo gcig tu sbyar na lha'i
160a8: blan bcud kyis len mchog la 'jug cing nam mkha'i steng du lda na gan gi yu la rgyal/ brgya byin dang yang lhan cig 'gran par 'gyur/ lha rnams kyi lha mo'i tshogs dang / lha'i gzhal med khang na rtse zhing dga' bar byed la rin po che sna bdud

160b1: gyi gzhal med khang gi gnas na gnas par 'gyu gnyis lta bur 'ad gtong shing rgyal gnas pa bzang po rnams kyis 'gro bar byed/ gzi brjid shin tu gsal ba mi bzod cing rnam par dag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la the tsom ma bya'o// las thakra
160b2: cad bsgrub pa'i thig le dang / ri lu bsgrub pa'i cho ga ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas mi sdang bar bya ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba sman gyi mchog don yod pa'i mthus grub par bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi grub pa'i mchog de
160b3: lon nyid yid do/ / sman dang la d+ha dang / preng+ga k+Shir dang / pra ba Na k+Shi ra dang / shel sngo sangs dang / wa mI dang / mu gan ti dang / king kun skyon med pa dang / ud pal bzang po dang / bad sa khwa dang / bral dang / belu bad nga dang / gung bus dang / nag batra dang /
160b4: bcas pa dang spang spos dang shi ri Sha'i me tog dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / bcas pa bsres nas zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma la don yod pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba rigs kyi rgyal po'i sdigs kyis shin du brtson par lan brgyad brgya bzlas
160b5: brjod bya zhing khre bo'i gsang sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas lan nyi shA rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur la/ yi ge gcig ba lan 'bum bzlas brjod bya/ de'i tshe gzungs sngags bcu po so sor lan nyi shArtsa re re bzlas brjod bya ste/ gsang sngag
160b6: thams cad rdzogs par bzlas brjod byas nas sman don yod pa rgya che ba gsal ba zhes bya ba sman gyi mchog bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du bzhag la grib sa la brkam par bya'o/ / yang don yod pa'i zhags
160b7: ba'i gtsug tir gyis lan ba rkyang brgya bzlas brjid byas nas sdod kyi nang du bcug la nam dgos babyung ba da'i tshe thams cad du bsgrub pa'i dgos pa thams cad la gyur ba bya'o/ / sa nas rig sngags 'char gtsang mar myur bas las legs pang
160b8: khru byas la grub nus thugs tegs gcang ma bgo bar bya/ sman gyi mchog 'di zus sa gyis sus la rang gi las la thug par bya ste/ pan cig bsus bcas gyis mi snang bar 'gyur la gnas gsang par bya ba'i sgo bcad pa thas sa

161a1: padas pang ba byur/ gnas thams cad rdzamang 'ad pa bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur don thams ma byed par 'grug/ 'byung po dang / gdod sbyin dang / min po dang / sha zal sogs pa'i ga po rgyam por chung shi de dag babs cad da
161a2: du 'gyur te/ ci ba kyi zhes bya ba byed la dri med 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas nas las su bya ba'i dgos pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// klu gnas kyi sgo bcad pa thams cad na 'dug pa la khru 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad mdunacu
161a3: 'khod nas bya ba thams cad la ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed par 'gyur zhing las su bya ba dang / dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur/ ji srid 'tshe'i bar du nye bar 'khod cing nyin mtshan du gnas la de nas klu thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro//
161a4: sman la sid ha dzi swa dang / ba'i 'o ma dang sbyar bas mgo kun byugs na ji lta ba yid la byas pa dang rang gi blos 'dod pa'i ngo bo sna tshogs par byed/ gnas su gtogs pa thams cad ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin ston par byed// gnas su gtogs pa thams/
161a5: cad 'khor gyi nang na ji ltar rnam par sprul pa'i gzugs sna tshogs ston par byed/ ji srid 'tshe'i rab du 'phel ba rnams ston par byed cing bya ba thams cad byed do// spos kyi til mar dang sbrus nas byin pa dang / rkang pa la bskus na nam mkha' la
161a6: 'bags par 'gyur zhing / nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur la gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur// chu'i steng du 'gro zhing rnams kyang phyis sa la rkang pa 'jog par mi 'gyur/ lag pa g.yas pa la bskus na gang dang gang la lag pa reg pa de 'od
161a7: par 'gyur la sus kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur/ bud med gzhon nu'i 'o ma dang bsres nas mig la bskus nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na mthong bar mi 'gyur zhing / don 'dod pa gang na yin pa byed do// don gyi rdzas gang yin pa blangs na
161a8: sus kyang mi mthong ngo / / bud med gang dang phrad na sus kyang mi mthong la ji srid 'tshe'i bar du 'dug kyang sus kyang mi shes so// bar byugs nas gang dang gangan bro gar byed pa dang / bzhad gang byed pa nyid kyi nang du zhugs na bya ba thams cad

161b1: tham sa dam / ma pa lakhrugs nas sa ga/ danan rgyun pa ma thas pa rnams na/ gan pa ma ga dngas rgyag pan ga cu sa song bdun pab nga / zla
161b2: rgyas brkus bkang pa lagan thogs na bus pa las chu chung ba ni snang la mi grus na pa snang / / gas bskrus nas skye ba sang pa'i nang du grags dmem thong bar 'gyu / b+ba thos shing nga gisas ni mi 'dod do// gnas su /
161b3: pathams cad du zhugs na rang gi lus khrus ma byas kyi bar tu mi mthong ngo // su yang rung ba'i mig la bskus la lus la yang bskus na de dag thams cad mi mthong bar 'gyur zhi gang dgang du 'gro ba de dang der mi snang bar 'gyur la khrus byas
161b4: btsam gyis phyir snang bar 'gyur ro/ / lus kun bskus nas// mdzod chen po'i nang du zhugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur la gser dang / dngul dang / 'phra men dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / b+hu ru dang / dung dang / man shel dang / rdo rje dang / bai dUr+ya dang /
161b5: margad dang mthon pa dang / gos dang / spyad pa dang / rgyan dang / lhab lbub gang yang rung ba nyid 'dod na thams cad blangs nas song na sus kyang mi mthong la gar dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ji srid du khrus ma byas pa de srid du rang mi mthong la
161b6: khrus byas na thams cad du mthong ngo / / rig sngags 'chang bud med kyi nang du 'jug par 'dod pas/ gtsang mar khrus bya'o// de nas spos chus khrus bya'o// de'i 'og du ba gcin gyis khrus bya'o// yang gur kum gyis khrus bya'o de'i 'og du pa'i
161b7: nam lngas khrus bya'o/ de'i 'og du pa'i til mar dang lhan cig bsres pa des lus bsku bar bya'o// de'i 'og du bud med gzhon nu'i nu zho dang sbyar bas mig la bskus pa de nas ri lu gsum dpung ba g.yas pa la gdags par bya'o// nas
161b8: gos gtsang ma bgos nas gsang sngags brjod cing dran par byas la rgyal po'i pho brad du zhugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur te lus sus kyang mi mthong ngo / / nyi ma gcig gam/ nyi ma gnyis sam/ nyi ma bdun nam/ nyi ma bcu bzhi 'am/ nyi ma

162a1: nyi shu rtsa gcig du khrus byas la zad med de dag gi nad na che zhing dga' bar byed la/ yongs sa myong bar byed kyang sus kyang mi shes la 'jug cing phyir 'gro ba na sus kyang grags mi rnyed de/ ji srid du khrus ma byas pa'i bar du dang
162a2: gi lus mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / phug du 'jug na lus kun spos kyi til mar gyis byugs la phug du zhugs na phug gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur gyis/ gnas de'i nang du zhugs la ji lta ji ltar las su bya ba de lta de ltar gyis shig / chu'i
162a3: nang du zhugs na ji ltar khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa bzhin chus mi rlan la/ chus gos par yang mi 'gyur ro// me'i nang du zhugs na mes lus la mig reg cing / tsan dan ltar bsal bar 'gyur ro// klu'i gnas mchod zhugs na gnas na 'khod
162a4: pa rnams kyis de mi mthong gis ji ltar rang gis yid la las su bya bar 'dod pa'i las kyi rnam pa gzhan dag kyang kyis shig/ mi snang bar bya ba ri lu'i bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po//
162a5: bam po bcu drug pa// phyag rgya gsum ni rnam sprul pa// phyag rgya de dag yang dag bstan/ bzang po gtso bo chen po ste// mchog dang rab mchog nyid yin no// phyag rgya mnom bla na med// 'jig rten 'dren pas bsten pa yin// snying po'i
162a6: nyid byung ba ste/ phyag rgyad kyis chen legs par bsgrubs// sangs rgyas byang chub phyag tu 'di/ dus gsum gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs// kun gyis 'di ni byin gyis brlabs// myug tu dus gsum gshegs pa 'i// de bzhin
162a7: gshegs pas phyag rgyang ga/ de bzhin sangs rgyas chen po pa// ba pa snang mdzad kyis kyang bta// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dkyil gyi// gas cing kun tu bzhugs pa s+ho// de nas gas sngags gsang pa da
162a8: grub bla med bshad par bya/ oM a mo g+ha hrid ya/ pad ma uSh+NI Sha sA sa d+ha ya/ b+har sa ma b+ha ra/ ma hA bad me swA hA/ bskul ba dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so// oM pad ma us+thi la ma mo b+ha naN le hU~M/ dkyil

162b1: 'khod bsrung ba dang phyogs pacing ba dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / driH pa dang / chu dang / lungs dkara' bsres pa la lan bdun pazlas bstsud byas pas bya'o// oM pad pa shi khA g+hu/ smyeg zug ded pa yin te lan pa du bzlas brjod byas na/
162b2: so/ oM pad ma uSh+Ti Sha A mo g+ha dza la hAM/ khrus bya ba'i sngags te yungs dkar dang / chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so// oM bi ma le shud d+he hUM/ nye reg bya ba'i rigs so// oM sad chad ya pad me hU~M/ gos bgo ba'i sngags sa/
162b3: oM mi li li mi li shud d+he trA~M/ lus yongs su sbyang ba'i sngags te/ ba'i rnam lnga'i tshul lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so// oM pad ma uSh+NI sha a mo g+ha a b+hi Shi ny+tsa ad ma shud d+he hUM/ dbang bsrung ba'i sngags te dri chab la
162b4: lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so/ / oM pad ma ka ba tse dri d+ha ban d+ha hU~M dz+wa la swA hA/ go cha'i sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas so// oM badz+ra a d+hiSh+Thi na pad me d+h+waM/ byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so//
162b5: oM dz+wal pad me d+hang d+ha hU~M/ sa'i sngags so// oM pad ma a shra ya drA ha tsa li tsi le hUM/ gdan gyi sngags so// oM deb bya pad me maM/ me tog gi sngags so// oM pad ma a mo g+ha sam par ni sA hA/ bdug spros kyi
162b6: sngags so/ / oM pad ma gan d+ha i shwa ri hUM/ byug spos kyi sngags so// oM pad ma bar ka ri ni d+ha ra ne sa me swA hA/ 'bras yos dang me tog dgram pa'i sngags so// oM pad madz+ra le su gan d+ha ba ti hUM// mchod yon
162b7: dbul ba'i sngags so/ / oM shud la ba re ra sa ya shud d+he d+h+waM/ lha bshos kyi sngags so// oM su ru su ru kum b+ha ba ti swA hA/ gtor ma'i sngags so/ oM ma hA pad ma a shri ni sA d+ha ya hUM/ gtor ma zang gzhug pa'i sngags
162b8: so/ / oM pha la bi shud d+he pra ba ra hUM/ 'bras bu'i sngags so// oM pra ba ra buSh+pe dza ya swA hA/ phreng ba'i sngags so// oM dz+wa la dz+wa la ya ra sa ra sA gri ni hUM/ gtor ma bcos pa'i sngags so// oM pad ma d+hi ba ya dz+wa la hUM

163a1: mar me'i sngags so/ / oM sam pad ma b+ha ba ne shu sa ra hUM/ 'jug pa'i sngags so// oM pad ma ug+ni Sha a mo g+ha su ni hUM/ phyag byas pa'i sngags so// a tsakra man Da le sa maN ta pa ma hUM/ bskur
163a2: ba'i sngags so/ / oM sa men ta pra krir NA pad me sa ma b+ha ra hUM/ me tog dor ba'i sngags so// oM pad sus sa ye uSh+NI Sha ma hA oM.aM mo g+ha sa ma ya nr-i/ dam tshig gi sngags so// oM sa man ta sA d+hA ra~M Na pad me
163a3: phaT/ skyil mo dkrung gi sngags so// oM a ba ri mi ta dz+wa la ba me hUM/ bgrang phreng gi sngags so// oM sha ta sa ha sra dz+wa la ti pad me d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/ bzlas brjod kyi sngags so// oM sa man ta d+ha ri sha pad me hUM/
163a4: rmi lam gyi sngags so// oM sa man ta rak+Sha ra ni pad me hUM/ bsrung ba'i sngags so// oM sa man ta ma ru dri D+ha si ri hUM/ ra ba'i sngags so/ oM sa man ta dz+wa la ma la garbe/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ma hA pad ma dz+wa le hUM/ me'i
163a5: sngags so/ / oM d+ha ru d+hu ru pra sa ra/ rUs ri man tre swA hA/ bsreg lugs kyi sngags so// oM sa man ta a ba lo ki ta~M gu h+ye/ bA yu dza ba pad ma bi ge ni swA hA/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i sngags so// oM shub+hA sta d+ha ra
163a6: ni pad ma b+hu dza hU~M/ mtshon cha'i sngags so// oM sa man ta a kar sha ni pra sa ra gu h+ye hUM/ drang ba'i sngags so// na mo tri b+hu ba na/ I shwa ra yA/ lo ke shwa ra ya/ ma he shwa ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ guh+ya
163a7: a gang tsha b+ha ga b+ha na d+hi ri d+hi ri/ ma hA bi ri/ ma Ni ka na badz+ra bai dUr+ya/ ma raka ta bad ma rA ga/ in dra nI la/ ma hA mug ti kA bi b+hu Shi ta shwa rir/ ma hA pad me b+hu dza/ a mo g+ha pA sha d+ha ra/ sa man ta a ba lo ki ta/ par
163a8: dA par dA ya ka/ dz+wa la dza la/ sa man ta/ a ba lo ke ta a ga tsha a gang tsha b+hag bAn/ shrig g+h+ri sa ma ya/ ma nusma ra bi bi d+hi ge d+ha ra/ ya ma ba ru na/ ku be ra nam sI ta/ I shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra pad ma shwa ra/ e hi b+ha ga bAn/

163b1: shig g+ha a gang tshad/ sarba bid d+ha maN Da la/ sa s+yag ma nu s+pha ra/ dir sha na swa ra ba na/ ba ba de te dza d+ha ra/ sa man ta ra shI/ dz+wa la gar+b+ha sha ra ni/ ma hA kA ru ni ka swos mya mu kha/ ba ri pU ra na/ tsan dra maN Da la/ na ba tsan dra dza Da d+ha ra/ a mi tA b+ha ma kuta d+ha ra
163b2: ma thA pra hA be sha d+ha ra/ ti lo can a mo g+ha b+ha ra d+ha/ b+ha ru 'u ru/ ma hA kA ru ni ka/ pad ma pA sha a ba lo ki te/ shud d+ha sa twa/ bar d+ha ya na mo s+yA te swAhA// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so// rig sngags
163b3: 'da'i gu gul nag po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bdug par bya'o/ / dugs pa tsam gyi mod nyid la 'phags pa spyan gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis ston par mdzad cing mchog
163b4: thams cad sbyin par mdzad do/ / gal te mtshams med pa lnga byed pa mnar med par gzhol pa des kyang bdugs pa tsam gyis nges par ston par mdzad na/ dge slong tshangs par spyod pa bsam bdag pa dang pa can mos palta smos kyang ci dgos/ mod
163b5: nyid la rang gi gzugs rang gi ngo bo yongs su dag pa ston par mdzad cing / mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad la don yod pa chen po'i dngos grub sbyin par mdzad do// drag po la bdugs na gzugs mngon sum du mdun na 'dug cing / 'dod pa dang
163b6: dngos grub thams cad sbyin par byed do/ / sred med kyi bu la bdugs na gzugs brnyan 'gul zhing / tshig 'byin la yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed/ rtag tu rjes su 'breng bar 'gyur/ stobs dang / shugs dang / brtson
163b7: 'grus dang / 'dos nos khyed mi dngos grub sbyin par byed do// ma mo'i gnas su nag po chen po la gdugs na nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas 'dug la las dang bya ba thams cad grub par byed/ thams cad du dngos grub
163b8: chen po sgrub par byed do/ / tshogs kyi dbang phyug la bdugs na// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la bdugs na sdang ba dang / gdug pa dang / bar chad byed pa gzhan gang yin pa de dag thams cad

164a1: bcings par 'gyur zhing mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po'i sgor bdugs na rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa bkug nas dbang du gyur te/ nye bar gnas la 'dod pa dang bya ba thams cad byed do// nyi ma shar ba'i tshe nyi ma la mngon
164a2: daphyogs nas bdugs na nyi ma 'bab cing 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad sbyin par byed do/ / zla ba nyal ba dugs na zla ba 'bab cing dbang phyug 'byor pa chen po sbyin par byed do// rnam thos kyi bu la bdugs na nor 'bel ba chen po sbyin par byed do//
164a3: lha mo chen mo dpal la bdugs na dngal 'thob par 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad la bdugs na badrags pa tsam gyis 'bab cing phyogs bcur 'bros so// zin pa'am mazin pa la badrags na mod 'a 'ong // bu khyod kyi mi rol bdugs na rolangs ldang
164a4: bar 'gyur ro/ / thod pa la bdugs na 'bab cing gar byed gru len chug par byed cing sprod stong byed do// rdo rje la 'dugs na 'bar ro// mdung rtse gsum pa la bdugs na 'bab par byed do// 'khor lo la bdugs nanam mkha' la 'gro'o// theg pa la bdugs
164a5: na sprul bzhin 'khrel bar byed do/ / rdza ma dang / bum pa la bdugs na 'bab par byed cing rang nyid 'gyur bar byed la phan tshun 'gro bar byed do// lhung bzed la bdugs na rang nyid 'gro bar byed do// ral gri la bdugs na 'bab par byed cing 'bar bar byed
164a6: la rang nyid 'gro bar byed do/ / dung la bdugs nas bus na sgra gang du grag pa de dag 'thab pa dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa dang / nad thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa
164a7: thams cad dang / sdig pa dang / gdug pa thams cad dang / dgra thams cad las thar par 'gyur zhing sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// rims thams cad la bdugs na/ rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// rims nyin bzhi
164a8: pa la bdugs cing gsang sngags kyang rjes su dran na rims nyin bzhi pa ku co 'don cing 'bros par 'gyur ro/ / klu'i mtshor ba dugs na mod nyid la char gyi rgyun chen po 'bebs par byed do// char ches na gnas mthon por bdugs na char ches

164b1: pa gcod par byed do/ / sprin la mngon daphyogs nas bdugs na grang lhags dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad gcod par byed do// lo gcig gi bar du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// ri mthon po'i rtser bdugs na// phyogs bzhi
164b2: thams cad kyi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / phyir rgol ba dad pas kyi dgra thams cad dang / dpag tshad stong gi bar du rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / bcings par 'gyur la dpag tshad stong gi bar du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// bdag
164b3: nyid la bdugs na sems can thams cad la mchod pa'i gnas chen por 'gyur la sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ / bu mo la bdugs na bag mar blangs par 'gyur ro// tshe zod la bdugs na rin chen par lom par 'gyur ro// ba bal bdugs na/
164b4: 'bru 'bel ba mang por 'gyur ro// btud ba'i gnas su brdugs na btung ba 'phel ba mang por 'gyur ro// gos la bdugs na gos thob par 'gyur ro// me tog dang 'bras bu la bdugs nas gang la 'byin pa de dag bdag nyid mi nor gyi sgo nas dbang du
164b5: 'gyur ro/ / phreng ba la bdugs la gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na gang gi mgo la bcings pa de la 'bab par byed cing / ya mtshan byung ba dang 'byung ba smra'o// 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang la bdugs na rigs sngags chen po'i dngos grub thob/
164b6: par 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ston par mdzad la dgos pa thams cad sgrub par mdzad do// gnod sbyin mo yi gzugs bris pa la bdugs la gsang sngags lan bdun dran par byas na/ gnod sbyin mo 'ongs nas 'dod pa thams cad sbyin//
164b7: zhing las byed par 'gyur la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'dug go// sbyor ba mo la bdugs na sbyor ba mo thams cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du gyur nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar tu nye bar 'dug go// 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can ma la
164b8: bdugs na 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can ma 'ongs nas chung mar bya'o zhes sman ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yo byed dang / longs spyod du bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la rtse bas dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / rnam thos kyi bu

165a1: la 'gran par 'gyur ro/ / dril bu la bdugs nas sgra dkrol na 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur la/ bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur/ khyim gyi nang du dkrol na 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang /
165a2: brjed byed dang / grib gnon thams cad byung nas phyogs bcur bros par 'gyur ro// oM a mo g+ha bA sha bad ma uSh+NI sha/ ta ra ta ra/ a ba ta ra tu/ b+ha ban gad tsha tu/ swa b+hA ba nan/ hu ru ku ru/ ma hA bad ma b+hu dze swA hA// slar gshegs su gsol/
165a3: pa'i sngags te/ bdugs spos gu gul dang / chu dang yungs dkar dang bsres pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na thams cad du slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags byas par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i cho ga dang bsgrub pa'i
165a4: cho ga'o/ / de nas lha mo chen mo sgrol ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
165a5: gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lha'i mchod pa'i sprin chen pos mchod de/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mgo btud de thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad
165a6: ces smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das rig sngags chen po 'jig rten du cher bstan lags so// gas ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par bye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug gi rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen
165a7: po'i snying po rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi don dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag lags so bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang don yod pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi rgyal
165a8: po de'i snying po dang cho ga zhib mo don yod par sgrol ba dri ma med pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa zhesab kyis rigs sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po bshad par bgyi ste/ rig sngags 'chang gang gis dran pa tsam gyis bdag bkug cing g.yar

165b1: bras par 'gyur/ ga sngags 'chang gi rig sngags bsgrub cing yongs su spyod pa la rim gro ba kyi pa dang / rig sngags grub pa'i dngos srub mchog stsal bar bgyi pa dang / bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su bka bar brtse pa dbadag gis pa nga
165b2: ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po 'dus pa'i mngon sum du rig sngags kyi rgyal po bshad par bgyi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas lha mo sgrol ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha mo chen mo sgrol ma rang gi rig sngags kyi rgyal po
165b3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi phyag rgyas byin gyis rlabs kyis shod cig/ de nas lha mo chen mo sgrol ma bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar don yod par sgrol ba dri ma med pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi snying po smras pa/
165b4: na maHmA yang d+hi kAn+na/ Na thA ga ta nAM shAN+Da rA dza ya a d+hiSh+ThA na na mam+me twe nAM/ na mo nga na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+ya a ba lo ke te shA rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo d+hA ra ye/ ma hA de bi/ oM tA rA Ni tA ra Ni tA re/ pad ma bi b+huSha
165b5: ta tA re me Ni ka na ka ba tsid k+Shi ta ma la/ dza Ta ma kra Ta nan/ da ta bad me d+hur+ya d+hur+ra/ bad ma bA shad+b+ha dza/ a mo g+ha bA sha ha ste/ tA ra ya b+ha ga ba te/ ma hA sid t+ti pa ra di/ tu dra r+tharba/ ma hA tA ra Ni / bar d+he/ sa d+ha ya sa d+ha ya/ sid d+he/ a mo g+ha ba ra te swA hA/ oM a
165b6: mo g+ha pad me ni tA re swA hA/ snying po'i oM ma ni tA re hUM/ nye ba'i snying po'o// bcom ldan 'das 'de ni bdag gi gsang sngags nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po// don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi rig sngags kyi snying po'i zhags pa cho ga zhib mo sa
165b7: rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang sems can thams cad la mchog stsol pa rab tu stsal pA bgyi ba'i slad du rjes su stsal pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i yo byad dang chog
165b8: bshad par bgyi ste/ du ru ska dang gu gul dang / sprig ka gcig tu bgyis la gsang sngags kyi snying po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas bcom ldan 'das bdag la bdugs pa tsam gyi mod la bcom ldan 'das bdag dgug pa dang /

166a1: g.yang dngas par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di sgrub pa'i tshe rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du dngos grub rjes su sbal bar bgyi/ bgegs dang / log 'dren tham/
166a2: dbazlog par bgyi// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad bzlog par bgyi/ 'thab pa dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/ bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du rdzogs par bgyi bde
166a3: legs dang dge legs bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das mchis nyal ba na bdug spos kyi rgyal po 'dis bdag la bdugs shing / bdag gi snying po nor bu ni bo che chen po'i snying po gsum po de dag lan nyi shu rtsa
166a4: gcig brjod na bdugs pa tsam gyi mo dang / dran pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rang gi gzugs yongs su dag pa bstan cing / mngon sum du mchis par bgyi/ mchog thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ blang ba dang 'byung
166a5: ba'i bka' mchid bgyi'o/ / dran pa tsam gyi modo la don yod pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi zhags pa'i snying po 'di dran pa tsam gyis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rig sngags 'chad de'i mdun du mchis shing bas pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su
166a6: rdzogs par bgyi/ sdang ba dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ dngos grub chen po bsgrub pa rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ bkra shis kyi sgra thams cad 'byung bar bgyi reg sngags kyi dngos
166a7: grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ bsod nams dran pa'i dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi// dus ma yin par 'chi
166a8: ba thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par bgyi/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rig sngags 'chang gi bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi

166b1: smadathams cad bsal bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang 'gum pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa tha ma la bab pa de/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rtag tu mngon sum du bstan cing mdun na nye bar mchis par bgyi/ sangs rgyas
166b2: yid la bgyid pa shin du dran pas dus las 'da' bar bgyis pa dang / ji ltar sbrul lpags pa bas pa bzhin lus phes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi skal pa dang mnyam par pad ma dag las brdzus te skye la rgyan thams cad
166b3: gyis brgyan pa dang / tshe rabs su tsho rabs dran par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yongs su bzung zhing byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus rdo rjer 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du chud par 'gyur/ sa bcu la gnas
166b4: par yang 'gyur/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par yang 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par yang 'gyur// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskyed par yang 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du
166b5: ston par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bsags par 'gyur/ sdig pa dang // sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dam tshig rtogs pa dang / gsang ba'i
166b6: dkyil 'khor chen po 'dam tshig byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug pa'i bar du 'tshal bar 'gyur ba lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas lha mo chen mo sgron ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo chen
166b7: mo legs so legs so/ / rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di khyekhyod kyis bshad pa mchog tu legs so// cho ga zhib mo 'di yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rig sngags 'chad de yang yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir dang / dngos
166b8: grub rab tu sbyin pa'i phyir khyod kyis yongs su bskyed par bya'o/ / de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang // dbang phyug chen po dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / tshogs

167a1: kyi bdag po nag po chen po dang / rig sngags dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha dum dang / nor bu bzang po'i bu dang / lnga len dang / gar mkhan mchog dang / stobs can dang / stobs po che dang / ldong sngo dang / rung can dang / de bzhin du 'jigs byed
167a2: dang / dbyangs ldan ma dang / dpe med ma dang / lha mo chen mo dpal dang / ral pa gcig ma dang / me tog tshems te thams cad 'dus nas 'thun par stan las langs te bla gos zag pa gcig cagazar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsu/
167a3: te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang phyir ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe rig sngags 'chad de dang / rig sngags smra ba rigs kyi bu 'am/
167a4: rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan yang skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa gtsug tor 'di sgrub par bgyid dam/ klog par bgyid
167a5: dam/ 'don tam/ tha na ming tsam yang 'dzin par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de la bdag cag kun nas 'thun par rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi// gzi brjid gzugs par bgyi/ dngos grub chen po'i
167a6: bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ bsam pa thams cad kyi mchog yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ nyes par bgyis pa thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bgyi/ byang chub kyi mthar thug
167a7: gi bar d+ha rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du grogs po dag legs so legs so// khyed kyis bya ba de ltar yin te rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po 'di ngas gtams shing yongs su gtang ngo zhes bka' stsal
167a8: to/ don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma gtsug tor rdo rje chen po'i snying po gsang ba rdzogs s+ho// // rnam par thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang ba bstan pa bgrags pas grub pa cho ga zhib mo rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba mtha'

167b1: dag rdzogs pa yongs su rdzogs s+ho/ / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gdugs nas mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das kyi napa
167b2: du bstan nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'din bdag la pad ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor pad ma'i rigs kyi snying por gyur pa gsang ba de kho na nyid bstan pa mchis te/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor
167b3: migasang ba'i don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bob rgyal po rigs sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ngo bo tha dad pa dang / phyag rgya tha dad pa dang / sngags tha dad pa dkyil 'khor dang / gzugs bri ba yongs su bslab
167b4: par bgyi sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i slad du/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi de kho nar gyur pa ni 'di lags te/ rigs sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi gnas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor pad ma yangs pa'i dam tshig don yod pa'i
167b5: zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga rjes su stsal bar bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das de bdag la gnang bar mdzad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / pad ma'i rigs
167b6: da nor bu'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / spyi'i dam tshig 'grub par 'gyur/ spyi'i byin gyis brlabs dang / rigs sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor dang / gzugs bri ba dang / phyag rgya rimi par bye ba la rjes su 'jug par 'gyur/ chog zhib
167b7: mo bsgrub pa thams cad kyi dngos grub de kho na nyid du 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi byin gyis brlabs kyi de kho na nyid du 'brur legs so//
167b8: denas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa don yod

168a1: zhags pa'i dam tshig rnam par thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba cho ga zhib mo de'i dus la dbab par shes na shod
168a2: cig ngas byin gyis brlabs shing rjes su yi rang la phyag rgya chen pos btab nas byin gyis brlabs so/ / sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa gang gI klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
168a3: byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so/ / sems can thams cad kyi don du de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na med pa phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig chen por byin gyis brlabs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
168a4: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin 'dzum zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa bkod pa/ don yod pa mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas nas ting nge 'dzin
168a5: des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'od zer gyis snang bar byas lha'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ klu'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gnas thams/
168a6: cad snang bar byas// 'byung po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ sa'i 'og du gtogs pa 'og na gnas pa thams cad snang bar byas/
168a7: par snang gi gnas nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams snang bar byas shing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas g.yo ba chen por gyur pa dang / g.yo ba'i mthu des de dag thams cad bskul bar gyur to// bskul ba tsam
168a8: gyi mong nyid la/ de dag thams cad lhags te/ ri gu 'dzin na 'khor mang po 'dus par 'thun par lhags nas 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor mang po 'dus

168b1: bar mkhyen nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha byang du zhugs shing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad du rigs spyi'i dam tshig gi tshul du zhugs la/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis
168b2: brgyan/ rgyal ba 'od dpag med thor tshugs su thogs pa tshangs pa'i gzugs can phyag bcwa brgyad la rang gi ngo bo zhags pa thogs pa/ thal mo sbyar ba/ sku phyed na phyag g.yon pa brten pa// mdung rtse gsum pa bsnams pa/ ril ba spyi thum
168b3: dang / bgrad phreng bsnams pa/ pad ma bsnams pa/ pad ma'i phyag rgya bsnams pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / rgyal mtshan bsnams pa/ me tog gi phur ma dang / bI dzi bu ra bsnams pa/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/ rin po che'i char 'bobs
168b4: par mdzad pa/ thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/ spyi bor phyag rgya mdzad pa/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ pad ma yangs pa'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya la mdzad pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang / nor bu'i phyagaH
168b5: mdzad pa gzugs zhi ba spyan gsum pa/ mchod phyir thogs pa/ gdan pad ma/ sku 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba/ sgrol ma bdun rjes su 'brang ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcus bskor ba/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus
