168b6: dan pos bskor gdabang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / sred med kyi bu dang / dbang chen dang / rgya mtsho dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'khod nas mig
168b7: mi 'dzums shing bzhin 'dzum pas/ me tog sna tshogs pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la 'thor te/ 'di lta ste/ me tog shra la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa dang / a ti mug ta ka dang / sho kA bar ta sha dang / kha bye 'byil ba dang / gan d+ha bar shi
168b8: ka dang / mthon kha dang / mthon kha chen po dang / ka dam pa dang / mdog mdzes pa dang / su man n+ya ka dang / skya snar dang / cher gsal ba dang / dri med gzi brjid dang / dri dga' dang / rab sami dang / ba lA sha dang / za ba dang / mar Na da ka dang / gzi brjid

169a1: 6/ / bsil dang / dri med dang / gzi yangs ldan dang / shin du bstan dang / lha dga' dang / yid dga' dang / yu thi ka dang / pad ma dang / ku mung dang / pad ma dkar po dang / u ta pa la dang / u ta pa la dmar po dang / ta ra Na gur+ya dang / gsar dang / dngul da
169a2: rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa ni mngon sum du rnam par thang ci'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba don yod pa'i rgyal po 'di smras so/ / dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub
169a3: sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rigs kyi dam tshig la phyag 'tshal lo// rigs sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rigs dang / phyag rgya thams cad la
169a4: @phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar zung ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rtogs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
169a5: blo klos chen po dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi mchog rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
169a6: pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo//
169a7: drang srong chen po de dag dang / 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi mchog de dag la phyag 'tshal nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas byung ba// don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i
169a8: mngon sum du gsungs pa 'di 'khor mang po'i nang du bdag gis nga bzlas kyis/ bdag gi dgos pa thams cad grub par gyur cig/ 'jigs pa thams cad du bsrung bar gyur cig/ tad ya thA/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi re/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Na

169b1: ma ba gaH tsang/ pa maHk+Sha drA N+Da// sa ra sa ra/ cang / bar ba ra// ra bar/ ma pa dam s+ho// la kal/ ka la ko la/ ku lu ku la/ pa hA shud d+has ta/ a h+ye ta/ drang da bud / d+hA bad+hA ga/ ka takaN/ kiN ka/
169b2: k+ShataThaH/ par ma thad tas d+ha/ ka ra ka ra/ ki kiraM/ ku ru kra dra/ mahA s+sa ma prapa ta/ tsal tsal/ san tsal kha tsa la/ eTaT/ aTaT/ b+ha ra b+ha raSh+Te b+hai rai/ rA b+hu rba/ ma h+ye ma hA kA r+ra Ni kA/ ma hA ba shra bi ki ba ga d+ha/ ta / sa sa
169b3: tsang ca / ra taraShA tAShAt+ma/ tI tI hA hI/ dA d+hA drAd+ha/ oM ka ra pra ng+ga baSha d+ha gad+hA ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ngi d+hi ri/ d+ha rA d+ha ra/ ta ra tar/ sa ra sa pa ba ra ba pa tsa ra tsa dab+ta b+ha par sh+la sha ta/ sa hAsa? b+ha ti/ maN Di ta sha R+Sha ya/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta pa/ b+ha ga bArA/ sam
169b4: ad ti/ ya ma pa dra// ku be ra/ pra sma in dr-i/ bi'i/ de ba ga Na a b+hu ra tsi ta tsa daH/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ bu ru bu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ san da ku mA ra/ rung bA sa pa/ bin+ta d+ha nad / de ba ri Sha na yaka/ b+ha pra bi/ ba hU bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra ta ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+harma
169b5: draTha ra thar/ k+Sharab+har/ yar ya ral la ra/ ta ra tar/ ma ra ma ra/ khar bar/ Nar car khar bar/ kha ra ba da yakas man ta a ba lo ka te/ bi lo ka te/ lo ka shwa ra/ ma te shwa su rba mur+tha/ mu la su ya/ muny+dza mra hA// bcom ldan 'das 'phags
169b6: paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / yams kyi nad thams cad dang / gnod thams cad dang / nad thams cad las bsrung du gsol// krung ngu gsol// gnod pa dang / 'ching
169b7: ba dang / rdeg pa dang / sdigs pa thams cad dang rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / gnod byed dang / me dang / chu dang / drag dang / mtshon las yongs su thang bar mdzad pa/ kan ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku N+ya kra r+Na/ tsa ra tsa ra/ in dri ya/ ba la bo d+h+yang ga/ mA ra ka/ tsan tu rAr+yas
169b8: sam pra kA sha ka/ ta ma ta mad ma dam/ sha ma sha ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma hA ta mon d+ha kA ra/ b+hi dman/ Sha Ta bA ra ma ta/ bA ri bA ra ka/ mi li mi li/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ ShaTha Tha Tha/ Ti Ti Ti Ti/ Tu Tu T+yan+ya/ e na ya tsa ra mi kri Ta/ e h+ye hi shwa ra ma hA b+hU ta/ ga na b+hamany+dza ka/ ku r+ra

170a1: ba ba paka Ta ka Ta / paT mamra pa zud/ ga ya ni b+ha si mamaHkArA NI k+Sha/ sh+lad+da ba dz+nyA ba pa ta ya/ da na ma kun/ mA lA d+haH/ sarbar+d+ha shi si krikam paT marbu thAH/ kar ta la d+han sa maHba mo// a prag ma ma/
170a2: satwa/ san ta ti/ pa ba tsaka ma hAkA ru Nak+Sha/ sarba karma a bar Ni bi sho d+haka/ sarba b+hUd+hi bi mo tsa ka/ sarba A sha bar bur ka/ sarbas tras mA shA sa ke / na mo s+yA te swAhA/ oM pra d+ha ba shad+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha/ dzi ri ti ri/ d+ha dra d+ha ra/ sa mnaH
170a3: dz+wal a mo g+ha hU~M/ don yod pa'i snying po// a yi ge gcig po ni kun nas gsang pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dmatshig dang / pad ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i yin te/ grags pas grub pa'o//
170a4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis snying po yi ge gcig po kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba spyi'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor smras pa
170a5: tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing lha'i me tog gi char rab tu bab la/ kun nas rin po che'i char rab tul po// de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig stong
170a6: kun nas gshegs nas nam mkha'i dkyil la rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhugs so/ / don yod pa'i rim par phye ba'i sprin lha'i rin po che sna bdun phab la 'bab pas khebs pa dang / lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog rnams dang / lha'i rgyan dang /
170a7: gros mas pa ma bcom ldan 'das dang / phags pastan sa gcigs don yod pa'i rgyal po'i tshul du zhugs pa la mchod ba dang / bkur sti bya ba'i phyir btu pa ga/ sangs rgyas com ldan 'as de dgagis kyang legs so//
170a8: shes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par mdzad de/ sems dag pa chen po khyod kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba mchog bstan pa legs so legs so// di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang pa'i phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang ga

170b1: sngags kyi gnas rim par phye ba rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / yi ge gcig pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su nyi ma gcig shar ba yin no// gang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /
170b2: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra mo snyed kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba rdzogs par sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig gis thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa yin zhing / snying po
170b3: yi ge cig gis rjes su zhugs pa yin la phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rami par phye ba dang / dam tshig gcig gis rjes su zhugs pa yin no// don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang
170b4: ba bzang po 'di ni don yod pa'i gsang sngags kyi nags pa sadrangs shing sku gcig gi dam tshig la bkod pa yin no/ / de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes bya bar byin gyis brlabs so// snying po yi ge gcig pa'i gzungs sngags ni rtag tu grags pas
170b5: grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlabs pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAHthub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so// zhes bya
170b6: ba byin te/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa lags so legs so// de kho na nyid bsgrub pa grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs spyi 'dam tshig thams cad grub pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po sgrub pa bklags pas 'grub pa 'di ni mchog
170b7: tu bzang ba yin gyis yon tan gyi phung po shod cig/ snying po yi ge 'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa bsgrubs pa'i cho ga bsgrub pa bde ba bklags pas grub pa phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sku gzugs ri mo dang bcas pa bsgrub pa'i
170b8: cho ga bla na med pa yin no/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma yangs

171a1: pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / pad ma'i rigs kyi rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig gsang pa chen po dang / rigs skye'i bsgrub pa klags pas 'grub pa 'di'i yo byad dang / cho ga bshad par ba kyi yis bcom ldan
171a2: 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis dran pa tsam gyis bag mdun na nye bar mchis shing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi rig sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o//
171a3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so legs so// de ltar khyod kyis sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya zhing / rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi dngos grub dam pa mchog de khyod kyis rab tu sbyin par gyis shig/
171a4: don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snyid po gsang ba'i dam tshig dang / yi ge gcig po rigs spyi'i rjes su zhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs kyis yo byad dang bsgrubs pa'i cho ga shod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
171a5: chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs phyung ba dag thos nas snying shin du dga' ste/ yo byad dang / cho ga smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mngon sum nyid du sdig pa sreg cing ma lus par zad par bgyid pa
171a6: sems can dmyal ba rtsa ba na 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga smras pa/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas nas su// dbus su pad ma'i 'khor lo bya/ tshon rtsi sna tshogs rnam par dbye// pad ma ze ba'i dbus su ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang bzhugs
171a7: par bya/ bum pa bkang dang pad rnams kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan par bya/ me tog sna tshogs legs par dgram/ spos dri bzang pos bskos pa yi// mar me'i phreng ba kun du bung / mchod yon chu dag bzhag par bya// a ga ru dang du ru u0f7f/
171a8: bdug spos snod bzhed gnas bdug/ reg sngags 'chang ba khrus byas nas// gos gtsang bgos te smyud ba la// nye bar gnas nas tshes brgyad dam// bcu bzhi'amatshes ni bcwa lnga ste/ zla ba yar gyi ngol sgrub/ shang rul thaltas 'dug nas su/

171b1: don yod zhags pa dus gsum du nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya// snying po'am brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas// yi ge gcig po 'bum du ni// mtshan mo bar chad med par bzlas// s+ya re shar nas 'jig rten dbang // ze ba'i dbus na 'bar 'gyur zhing //
171b2: 'phrul 'phur 'phrul ba de yis de// dmyal ba chen pa bcu drugag/ sgra rnams dag na kyi bar 'gyur// dmyal ba gnas nas shugs can ces// gsol gsos pa tsas des ni// dmyal pa tshar kun rnam par 'ag/ dmyal ba
171b3: yang rnam par 'joms/ sems can dmyal ba de dag ni/ thar nas phyogs bcur rgyug pa yi// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kun las grol// mtho risi lam du zhugs par 'gyur// dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dud 'gro
171b4: rnams las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ / bdag nyid kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang / sdug bsngal mi bzad pa thams cad mthar gtugs par yongs su zad par 'gyur/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro//
171b5: gal te sdig pa thams cad zad par 'gyur na/ de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku mdog gser gyi mdog can du ston par mdzad la mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// don yod pa dri ma med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho
171b6: bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ / sgrib pa dang bral ba sems kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu po nas
171b7: mod nyid la mngon sum du ston par mdzad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad phyag g.yas pa mgo'i spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur// dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/
171b8: 'jig rten pa kun gyis gcig zu mchod pa chen po byas par 'gyur// gshin rje dang chu lha dang / lus ngan dang zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mngon sum du ston cing nye bar 'khor la

172a1: kun nas bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur dngos grub dang / dgos pa thams cad grub par 'gyur/ gal te sdig pa thams cad zad par ma gyur na/ de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku mdog gser gyi kha
172a2: dog can du mi mthong / des sgrib pa dang / sdig pa lhag ma lus par shes par bya ste/ de nyid du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga smyung ba byas pa dang / sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rtsa ba dang bcas pa thams cad phyung bar 'gyur ro// gal te bzlas brjod kyi cho ga
172a3: spung ba gsum pa byed na bzlas brjod kyi cho ga gsum rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi phyag g.yas pa brkyang nas rig sngags 'chang bteg ste mod la 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'od dpag mad kyi spyan sngar 'jog par mdzad
172a4: la mngon sum du bzhugs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyis dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing phyag spyi bor 'jog par mdzad de/ tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// gal te sems can gzhan rigs kyi bu'am// rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge sbyong
172a5: dang / bram ze'am/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam khye'u 'am/ bu mo'am than dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba gang zhig sdig pa dang / sgrib pa zad par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang khrus byas la gos gtsangs bgos/ smyung ba byas pa des dkyil 'khor la
172a6: mngon du phyogs par bzhag la/ rig sngags 'chang cho ga byed pas gsang sngags rjes su dran par byas nas rma bya'i sgros byab par bya'o// de tsam gyis yon tan gyis kyang bathob par 'gyu te/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ nad thams cad
172a7: dang gdugs pa thams cad dang / na pa thams cad dang mtshams med pa thams cad zad par 'gyur te/ the tshom med do// sgrib pa dang bral ba nyid thob par 'gyur zhing tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur lha thams cad kyis bzung zhing kun nas bsrung
172a8: bar 'gyur de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thob par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzegs dang sug gas shel 'gyur/ tshe ring ba dang / sib pa dang / nad dang bral bar 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur

172b1: tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa 'gyur te/ snying rjes dang byams pa chen po yid la bya ba rtse gcig tu bya zhing smyung ba dang / bzlas brjod bya'o// sdig pa dang sgrib pa zad par bya ba'i dkyil
172b2: 'khor chen po'i cho ga'o/ / // 'phags pa dod yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib pa'i rgyal lo// bam po bcu bdun pa/ dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ grub bzhi po ke la'i tshad du legs par phye ba grub zhi dang / sgo bzhi/
172b3: yod pa thes skas kyi rim pa can du tshon sna tshogs kyi skud pas thig gdab cing dkyil 'khor kyi snying po mdzes par bya/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po pad ma mchog kha phye ba 'dabam brgya baHrgyad pa/ snying po dang / ze bshin du mdzes pa/
172b4: snying po las padas byung ba kha phyed bye ba dang / lag pa gnyis byung bas pad ma'i 'dab ma 'dzin pa bris par dngul gyi snod kyi nang du sman bkang ste dar gyis kha g.yogs nas ma sab ma'i steng du gzhag par bya/ 'phags pa spyan rapa gzig
172b5: dbang phyug rtag tu tshangs pa'i cha byang du bzhugs pa/ dar gyi cod pan bcings shing brgyan pa pad ma'i steng du bzhugs par bya'o// dkyil 'khor phyi rol kun du phyag rgya'i rtags rnams gsal bar bri'o// sgo sgor don yod pa'i zhags pa pad
172b6: ma'i steng du bzhugs pa kha dog dang 'od zer 'bar ba bri'o/ / gla glar bum pa gang ba bri'o// dkyil 'khor kun du 'phan dang / bum pa gang ba dang / 'bras bu dang / me tog bsres pa mdzes pas brgyan par bya'o// gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs
172b7: gzhag par bya'o/ / mchod yon gyi chu dbul bar bya/ tsan dan dang / a ga ru'i bdug spos dang // spos sna tshogs dbul bar bya dkyil 'khor kun yang me'i phreng ba dang / me tog phreng ba dgod cing kun du 'bras yos dang yungs dkar dgram
172b8: par bya'o/ / rigs sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas legs par khrus bya zhing gos gtsang ma bgos pa 'jigs pa med pas zla ba yar gyi ngo nya la bsgrub par bya ste/ sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyur cing byams pa'i sems dang /

173a1: snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis bsgrub par bya'o// gang gis lag gis gzung ba tsam dang / rag pa tsam gyi mong la de dga' ba 'thob cing sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// sngon gyi sgrib pa rnams 'jig par 'gyur/ marnams/
173a2: med pa byed pa rnams las grol bar 'gyur/ mad la nad thams cad 'byang zhing ngan 'gro thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ bsod nams chen po'i stobs kyi dngos grub sman gyi de kho na nyid mthong ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lung bstan cing /
173a3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis thas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsngags pa/ 'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis sprul pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyis bsngags pa/ rig sngags 'chang gi dbang gi thams
173a4: cad kyis phyag byas pa/ lha thams cad kyis bsrung ba/ kwa'i dbang po thams cad rjes su 'brang ba/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / nyi ma dang /
173a5: zla bas mchod pa/ de bzhin du rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang / gza' kun dang / mjug rings dang / de bzhin du gzi khyim dang / thams cad du bkra shis kyis mchod pa/ cho ga zhib mo thams cad dang / de bzhin du dkyil 'khod dang / phyag rgya dang / bzlas brjod
173a6: thams cad dang gsang sngags thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa/ rigs spyi'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sman gyi mchog dbang bskur ba/ dus
173a7: gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu thams cad dang 'thun pa'i sman gyi rjes bkra shis pa bye ba khrag khrig gam/ lhag par gyur pa gzhan gang med do// sman de lta bu ni rtag tu mchog gtso bo 'byin pa/
173a8: 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra ba yin no// de'i phyir thams cad sman 'chang bar 'dod pas gnas gang yang rung bar sbyar bar bya ste/ tsang ma legs par khrus byas pa des sbyar bar bya'o// ji lta ji ltar bkra shis kyi bsam pa yid la byed pa de lta de

173b1: sbyar bas pa pa yid sa byed pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ sbyar ba ma gyi ma la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ 'dod pa thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs sa rdzogs par 'brug rig sngags 'ang gtsang mar gyur pa/ gis gcang
173b2: bgos pa smos nus legs par khrus byas la nyin re sran ri don yod pa'i rgyal pos bzlas brjod byas te bzos nathos pa tsam gyi mod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' thams cad dang / byang
173b3: chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dang phyug gis dgongs shing snang ba rnam par dag pa 'thob par 'brur/ nyin zhag gsum du sbyar na dag rnam par dag pa 'thob bo// nyin zhag lngar sbyar na/ dran pa rnam par dag pa thob bo//
173b4: nyin zhag bdun du sbyar na rig sngags chen po'i cho gzhib mo rnam par dag pa 'thob bo// nyin zhag bcu bzhir sbyar na don yod pa'i zhags pa de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig chen po 'thob bo// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyar na de bzhin
173b5: gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig gi dngos grub mo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub thob po// zla ba gcig gi thar du sbyar
173b6: na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dngos grub sgyu ma lta bus brgyan pa thob cing tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur ro/ / zla ba gsum du sbyar na lus yongs su dag pa dang / mdog yongs su dag pa 'thob bo// lo gcig tshar par
173b7: sbyar na don yod pa'i dngos grub rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ mig mthon mthing ma dog bung ba lta bu sgra ral bu 'khyil bar 'gyur tshe lo bdun pa lta bu'i gzugs dang 'thun par 'gyur la/ tshe bskal pI bum thub par 'gyur
173b8: ro/ ba dar nas bdag nyid la byugs na/ gang dri nams pa tsam gyis bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yi dgas dang / skem byed dag brjed byed dang / grib gnon thams cad dang / gdon thams cad

174a1: dpa gdug pa thams cad dang / dgra thams cad dpag tshad stong du 'bros so// gal te myur du mi 'bros na ni spyi bo dum bu 'bum du 'gas shing yan lag dang / nyid lag rnams zhig par 'gyur la/ pra dang chung mar bcas pa
174a2: 'jigs par 'gyug/ sngon gyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyu/ sems cand dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba marnams med pa lnga ga 'jig par 'byur/ rmil ma ngan pa dang / sas ngan pa dang / mi shis pa dang pa ma
174a3: shis pa'i dngos po thams cad 'jig par 'gyur smos bsnams pa tsam gyis rgyal pa dang / rgyal po'i blon pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed pa la dbang du gyur/
174a4: nas 'khod go byugs pa tsam gyis 'bras dang / phel mig dang / ldog pa dang / med pa la dang / rkang shu dang / na pa dang / mdze dang / kyi rdo dang / shra ba dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / rma dang / khong gi rma yongs su sos par 'gyur/ drug thams cad dang /
174a5: zos pa dang / drag myos dang / sbyar drug drag po dang / drag sbyar ma dang / sbyar drag bye ma dang / byad rnams la bskus pa tsam dang / chu dron po 'thungs pa tsam gyis drug med par 'gyur ro// dri tsam gyis klu'i rgyal po 'jog po'i dug kyang med par/
174a6: 'gyur ro// rims nyin bzhi pas thebs pa la dpral bar bskus nas ku co 'don cing 'bros so// rims thams cad dang / nyin gcig dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhri sa ba las gyur pa dang / pad kan
174a7: las gyur ba dang / 'dus pa las glar pa dang / lba pa dang / po pa'i nang dag mchin pan pa dang / ston pa dang / sman dang / gcin srib dang / rtsib legs na pa dang / mgul banab dang / khan pa dang / 'khyil zhing na ba dang / chang ba dang / 'doms na
174a8: dang / yan lag dang nying lag na ba chu dron po 'thungs pa tsam gyis yongs su sos par 'gyur ro// gzhogs byed na ba dang / mgon pa dang / mig na ba dang / rna ba na ba la bskus pa tsam gyis sos par 'gyur ro// thig le byas na chom rkun

174b1: dang / gnod byed dang / me dang / chu dang / byi pa za bas 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan khro bos 'jigs pa las thar bar 'gyur zhing 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// lag pa gdengs pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi
174b2: 'brug mi ma yin pa gang gis kyang mdangs 'phrog par mi nus shing bar chad bya bar mi nus so/ / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis dbang bu gyur nas 'khod do// rgyal po brgyan mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa'i mchod gnas
174b3: chen por 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang gang dang gang du sbyar ba rang gi blos bye ba phrag 'bum sbyar na las grub par byed de/ sman gyi mchog shin du 'bad pas bsgrub par bya'o// sman gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// // de nas de'i phyir gser gyi
174b4: ri lu'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i snying po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod pa rnam par gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma gtsug tor gyi rgyal po zhes bya bas byin gyis
174b5: brlabs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po chen snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od kyis bka' stsal pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa gang
174b6: kI klung gi bye ma snye bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs shing bsngags pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ dbang bskur ba/ rjes su thugs rang par mdzad pa/ lung bstan pa mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
174b7: gtsug tor gyi nor bu cod pan 'chang ba/ rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyi gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid kyi thig le yid bzhin gyi nor bu rgyal mtshan gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal po mchog tu 'grub pa/ rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang
174b8: cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig spyi/ sku'i snying po gang gis mthong ba tsam la sogs pa 'dis tshad bstan par lta su zhig gis nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs

175a1: pa gang ba'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs par mngon bum du mthong ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag nyid mngon sum du mchod par gzung ba dang / lung ston pa 'thob pa /
175a2: 'gyur/ de bzhin gnasas pa de dag gi mngon sum du dge ba'i rtsababasod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// nor bu gzar gyi kha don tu bstan pa'i ri lu'i da gang gis mthong zhing 'chang ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung po ched/
175a3: bskyed myed par 'gyur/ nor bu ri lu'i da mthong ba tsam gyis sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang / gdug pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / man med par gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i tshes spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa dang / sngon gyi tshe rabs
175a4: nas bsags pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jig cing spangs par 'gyur/ rims dang / nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur// gang gi lag na sman 'di yod par gyur pa'i sems can de ni lung bstan par 'gyur ro// ri lu gang
175a5: la yod pa ni/ phyir mi ldog par lung bstan cing / mgon pos bcu dag la gnas// rtag tu mchod rten 'gyur ba ste// sku gdung snying po'i bdag nyid can// rtag tu sangs rgyas bdag nyid 'gyur// dus gsum dgal zhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas de//
175a6: bzhin gshegs pa gang / sangs rgyas dpa' bo de kun gyi/ sras gcig tu ni brjod pa yin// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras// thugs las skyes dang zhal las skyes// chos kyi dbyings sprul chos las skyes// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin
175a7: mgon/ / rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur// phyag g.yas rtag tu spyi bor ni// 'jog mdzad 'di ni the tsom med// ri lu mthong ba tsam gyis ni// sdug bsngal kun las rab tu grol// sgrib pa thams cad rnams par 'dag/ de ni ngan 'gror 'gro mi/
175a8: 'gyur/ phyir zhing gnas mchog zhi ba 'thob// 'jig rten len po 'od dpag med// mgon po rtag tu mngon sum mthong // de ba can du 'jug par byed// gad na de yi mngon dga' ba// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs ga/ tag tu

175b1: mi 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing de bzhin mo g.yo ma 'gul te/ / sems dpa' ri rab tshe dang mnyam// gzung du med pas mtsho dang 'dra// de la bgegs dang log 'dren dag/ nams kyang 'jug par mi 'gyur la/ sems dpa' //
175b2: phyag bya'i gnas su 'gyur// gang la nor rgyal 'di yod la// rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag/ dpung dang bcas pa bkol dang bcas// rtag tu srung phyir gnas byed de// 'dir ni nyin mtshan de bzhin no// lha tshogs thams cad
175b3: bsrung bar ni/ / the tshom med par byed par 'gyur// gzi brjid dpal yang rab tu 'phel// de la legs par 'jug par 'gyur// 'jigs med rtag tu rmi lam ni// dngos po chen po sna tshogs mthong // gru 'dzin ri la gzhal
175b4: med khang/ / tshal dang bcas shing rin chen bcas// gnas dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha ma ni gsang ba pa// nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci// de bzhin lto 'phye 'khor dang bcas//
175b5: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams na// kun nas bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur// rin chen lha yi seng ge'i gdan// khang pa brtsegs pa rin chen dang // nor bu chen pos brgyan pa dang // 'jig rten dbang phyug thub pa'i gtso//
175b6: pad ma snying po la zhugs nas// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang // dkyil 'khor bcas pa'i chos ston to// gsum kun thob par gyur nas ni// thub pa rang gi ngo bo mthong // de ltar rmi lam bzang rmi ba// nyin cig bzhin du
175b7: mthong bar 'gyur/ / nor bu rgyal po'i mthu ni de 'dra bas// de bas mi yis 'bad pa chen pos zung // dge sbyong bram ze nyid dang rgyal rigs dang // dmangs rigs nyid dam yang na rgyal po 'am// btsun mo smras sam dpung gi ga
175b8: bo 'am/ skyes pa 'am bud med khye'u dang bu mo dag/ nor bu rgyal po rtag tu 'chang byed pa// de ni ston pa nyid dang 'dra bar 'gyur// chom rkun gyis ni mi slus shing // gnod byed kyis ni 'jigs mi 'gyur// 'jigs pa mi bzang brgyad

176a1: las thar/ de la dug dang sbyar ba'i dug/ sbyar dug drag pos mi tshugs shing // de la byad kyis tshugs mi 'gyur// gang la nor bu'i rgyal po yod// de la nad gyis mi tshugs shing na bas ma yin sdig pas mni// pad ma ru yis
176a2: mi chags ltar/ / rtag tu chags pa med par gnas// g.yul 'gyed pa yi nang na'am// 'thab pa'am 'gyed pa'am rtsod pa na// lan thebs rtag tu rgyal bar ni// thob par 'gyur te the tsom med// de nas rdzas ni bshad bya ste// sman
176a3: ni bkra shis dang ldan pa/ / grub pa'i mthu ste mchog tu gtsang 'jig rten mgon dang mnyam par gsungs// a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / pad ma dang / u ta pa la dang / shi ri sha'i me rtog dang / a pA ma rga dang / me ru dang / na la da dang / chu srin
176a4: gyi sen mo dang ka na ka'i 'bras bu dang / tsan dan gyi 'bras bu dang / pad ma'i 'bras bu dang / rdo drag dang / med dang / btsod dang / sU ka ri dang / ma kaT+Ti dang / dzA ya dang / bi dzA ya dang pa ri be la ba dang / ra sa dang / bI rA dang / d+hu maka dang rgya spos dang shabus
176a5: dang a bar ta ka dang / rus rta dang / bya gra na kha dang / bad tra dang / tra tsa dang / ka dam ba rA dang / bri yang gu dang / g+hi'u wang dang / spri ka dang / smig rkang dang / yungs dkar dang / nA ga bus pa dang / e la dang / ldong ros dang / gur gum dang / ga bur dang / gla rtsi dang /
176a6: spang spos dang / na le sha ma dkar po dang su ma dang / nye'u shing dang / shu ti dang / sbrang rtsi dang / tsam pa ka ste/ de bzhin rdzas ni de dag kun/ su ba ra Ni na dkar por sbyar// ri lu na ma cig tsam du ni// skyes bu mkhas pas bya ba yin// su ba ra Na sa ni
176a7: bkab nas su/ rdzas rnams bsres nas sbyar bar bya/ cha rnams 'phel bar bya ba ste// gArtsi yis ni dri bskyed do// phye ma zhib mor btags nas su// tsan don dkar po'i chu sbyar nas// grib ma la ni bskam par bya// tshes brgyad nas ni rnams
176a8: nas su chos ni bcwa lnga nya yi bar/ nyin gcig bzhin du don yod pa'i// rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas// khro bo'i rgyal pos nyin gcig bzhin// lan bdun par du dbang bskur ro// phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar yang bya// de nas chos ni bcwa

176b1: lnga ste/ nyal chu dang yungs dkar dag/ dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag par bya// de nas nor bu'i rgyal po dang // bzhag pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya// cha rnams ma nor legs par bya// d+har ni ki la'i tshad du bya// shin tu 'jas la dbyibs
176b2: lha legs/ tshod gyi sna tshogs 'byes par dang dkyil 'khor mchog ni thig gdapa pa/ ni/ dod cing gra bani dong kun nas shin tu na bye zhing // dkyil 'khor snying po che bye ba// cha dang shin tu ldan par bya/ pad ma chen po bzhi dag dang /
176b3: de ba'in phyag dang sbyar du bcas// don yod dngos grub bri bar bya// nor bu rgyal po 'chang ba yis// phyag rgyar bcas pa bri bar bya/ chu yi rgya mtsho'i nang du ri// las kyi rdo rje legs par bri// dkyil 'khor snying po dam pa la// kun nas kha khyer
176b4: rnam pa dang / / me tog sna tshogs pa dag bri// dkyil 'bor phyi rol kun du ni// nor bu pad ma legs par bri// sgo bzhi yi ni gnas rnams su// pad ma zhags pa mdung rtse gsum// rdo rje'i tshul mchog legs par bri// grwa bzhi yi
176b5: riganas rnams su/ / lag na nor bu yod pa bri// pad ma'i steng na rab tu gnas// dkyil 'khor bzang po pan phran dang // bum pa bkang ste me tog dang / bdug pa 'bras bu rnams kyis brgyan// gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ ci bdog
176b6: bungs cher gzhag par bya/ / kun du mar me phreng ba dang // mchod yon chu dang a ga ru// tsan dan bdug spos dbul bar bya// nor bu rgyal po 'jigs med pa// snod bzang legs par bkang nas su// rgya dar la yis kha g.yog ma te// dkyis
176b7: 'khor de nyid rig pas gzhag/ dkyil 'khor snying por 'jig rten dbang // bzhag ste de nas las rdo rje// snod kyi steng du bzhag pa ni// nor bu dkyil 'khor bya ba yin// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i rgyal po lanaH
176b8: shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya/ / khro bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun dbang bskur bar bya/ de nas gsang sngags yi ge gcig po 'bum tshang bar bzlas brjod bya ste/ 'bum bzlas brjod byas na nor bu'i rgyal po 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de nas/

177a1: rig sngags 'chang gi lag/ g.yas dang ldan pas bzung nas ni// chad pa dam du bsdams par bya// bsdams pa tsam gyi modo dag la// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la 'gro// nor bu dri ma med pa don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul/
177a2: pa bkod pa zhes bya ga rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba 'thob la 'khor rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba bye ba phrag 'bum yod par 'gyur/ khung gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad phye bar
177a3: 'gyur te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dag kha ton du lobs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang /
177a4: 'dud pa dag gis gsong por smra bar byed// thams cad du yang don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bye ba thob par 'gyur/ tshe bskal pa 'bum phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis su ring bar 'gyur/ don yod pa'i
177a5: pad pa'i 'khor lo mdun nas 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te 'bar bar ma gyur na sngar bstan pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par rnams thob par 'gyur la/ mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rgyal po'i ri lu ni 'jig rten
177a6: dad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las rnams sgrub pa yin no tshe rjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur la/ gang dang gang du skye ba'i tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ nor bu'i ri lu 'di mthong ba tsam gyis rus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs
177a7: pa mngon sum du mthong zhing lta bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du mthong zhing rtag tu lta bar 'gyur/ rang gi lus la yod pa de yang phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying /
177a8: po mchod rten dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ste/ 'di la som nyid dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// mthong ba dang reg pa tsam gyi mod la sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa grangs dang bgrang ba'i tshul gyi bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa/ mnar med pa'i gan/

177b1: su 'gro bar 'gyur ba/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dam pa'i chos spong ba de dag thams cad dus gsum gyi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
177b2: de dag gi mthu dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi nor bu'i rgyal po'i mthus thams cad zad par 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba dag las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/ bde 'gro'i lam la gzhol bar 'gyur/ tshe rjes
177b3: nas 'jigs rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de lta bas na legs par sgrub pa mthar thug par bya zhing bsgrub par bya/ mthu stobs kyis sbyar bar bya/ shin du gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba'i bsam pa 'bang pas sbyar bar bya/
177b4: rang gi sha dang khrag kyang yongs su btang nas btsal bar bya zhing / cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po yongs su btsal bar bya ba yin na phyi rol gyi dngos po nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / dngul dang / gos dang / rgyan rnams yongs su btang nas
177b5: yongs su btsal bar bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ srog btang bar bya'i de btang bar mi bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba sgrub pa 'di brtsal bar bya zhing bsgrub par bya'o// 'di'i dus phyi
177b6: ma'i tshe na sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ / sems can thams cad yang dag pa nyid kyi dad pas sangs rgyas nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing nams kyang ngan 'gro
177b7: log par 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ / nor bu'i ri lu sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// de nas de'i phyir don yod pa yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po don yod pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub kyi sman nor bu dang / gsang sngags rnams
177b8: bshad par bya ste/ sman nor bu dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya'i mthus des phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na rig sngags 'chad rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig spyi'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor

178a1: rnam pa sna tshogs sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa yang dag par ston par mdzad/ grags pas grub pa/ rigs kyi dam tshig spyi'i gsang ba thams cad du nye bar ston par mdzad do// rig sngags 'chad rnams kyi de las 'bras bu
178a2: med pa gzhan du 'byung ba med do/ / dal ba dang // dub pa dang / 'bad pa'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir rang gi sems kyi rgyud dang pa dang / gus pa dang / gsang chen dang / gsang bar bya ba gzhan la bstan par mi bya ste/
178a3: dngos grub med par mi 'gyur ro// de lta bas na gsang sngags sgrub pa ni shin du gsang bar bya zhing legs par bsnyud pa byas la 'bad par bya/ kha zas ngan pa spang bar bya/ gos ngan pa dang / sems ngan pa yang yongs su spad bar bya/ mi srun pa dang /
178a4: mi bden pa dang pra ma dang / sems can sun par byed pa dang / gsang sngags chu ba dang / cho ga zhib mo rku bar byed pa dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rku bar byed pa de dag gi rtogs pa ni gdan yang med de/ dus gsum gyi mgon pos smad cing byang chub
178a5: sems dpas yang slad la mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang smad pa yin no/ / sems can sdong dum bsregs pa 'di// gsang ba sun 'byin ma rungs pa// 'jig rten 'di nad pha rol tu/ rtag tu sman par bya ba yin
178a6: lha rnams kyis ni yongs su btang / / ma rungs pas ni bdud kyis zos// ma rungs pas ni bgegs kyis zos// bslab gzhi tshul khrims nyams pa dang // mgon po'i bstan pa sun 'byin pa/ don la dngos grub ji ltar 'byung// de la skyo
178a7: ba gang yang med/ / gnas med kun du smad pa yin// de bas de la dngos grub ni// chung ngu'ang med la nyes pa yis// gsang sngags dang ni sman mi 'grub// nyes pa de dag rang gis byas// gzhan yang ma rungs byed pa yin// de bas sems
178a8: can mkhas la skyed/ slob pa 'dod cing yon tan dgal/ snying rje'i bdag nyid byams la gnas/ sems can kun la brtse ba'i mchog/ de yi lag tu sbyin bya ste/ de yi dngos grub blan mad/ gsang ba 'di ni shin tu gsang ba yin te//

178b1: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi snying po gsang ba de yang rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya sgrub sla ste/ khaklags pas 'grub pa de bzhin du sman nor bu 'di la rtag tu 'jug cing dngos grub kyi de kho
178b2: na nyid rab tu ston par byed pa yin no/ / rig sngags 'chad ni bdag nyid kyis/ mchog tu gas rab bsgrub bya ba// rig sngags 'chang ni gtsang ma yis/ khrus byas gos gtsang gyon byed la// 'dir ni nyin zhag bsrung ba dang // dad dang
178b3: gus pas mchod pa bya/ / don yod 'khor lo sbub byed pas// dngos grub dkyil 'khor dam pa bsgrub// sran smi ka dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / a ga ru dang / pad ma ge sar dang / pad ma dang / pad ma'i ldum bu dang / pad ma'i
178b4: 'dab ma dang / de bzhin du g+he'u wang dang / ldong ros dang / tsam pa ka dang / su ma na ste/ de bzhin cha ni mnyam sbyar te/ phye ma dag tu byas nas ni// de nas don yod rgyal po yis/ tshes brgyad nas ni bcwa lnga'i bar// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas
178b5: brjod bya/ / khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad// bzlas brjod byas nas dbang bskur ro// de'i 'og tu cha lngar bya ste/ mig bsku ba dang / ri lu dang / phye ma dang / til mar chos pa dang kha gdod bkru zhing khrus bya'o// mig sman ni so'u byi re dang lhan
178b6: cig spras la don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya stong pa zlas brjod bya'o/ / ri lu ni sbrad rtsi dkar po dang lhan cig spu'o// phye ma ni 'jig rten dbang phyug la phul ba'i me tog dang lhan cig smra'o// til mar btsos pa ni pra ma ti la ste/ shing ba la
178b7: sha'i mar dang lhan cig smra'o/ / kha gdong bkru pa ni tsan dan dkar po'i chu dang lhan cig spu zhing sum na dang / gur kum dang / spos chus lhan cig spus la so sor brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas//
178b8: nas dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chad nyin zhag gcig bsnyad pa byas pas gcig tu sbas te/ dngul gyi snod kyi nang du bcug la/ so sor brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dkyil 'khor du gzhag

179a1: par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor mchog la phyag dang bskor ba byas la re nas so sor dam gyis kha bcad de/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying por gzhag la don yod pa'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
179a2: brjod byas dbang skur bar bya/ dbang skur bar byas nas kyang rigs sngags 'chang gis dbang bskur bdab/ de nas dkyil 'khor snying por ni// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchod bya ste// bdug spos lnga dag dbul bya ba// a ga rung tsan dan dang /
179a3: smig gu kul du ru ka/ mdzad yan sne ni lnga dbul zhing// gtor ma ldan dgang bya ste/ rdo ldan sna tshogs dag gis dgang // ro ldan 'bras bu ma tshogs pa'i// gtor maN lnga bral bar bya/ kun du phreng ba nyi shu dang // mang ma nyi shu lA dag
179a4: dang / spos kyi phye ma lnga dag dang / spos kyi cha lngar phye bas byug/ 'ban phran nyi shu rtsa lnga gdags/ tshon rtsi lnga yis mdzes par bya// gser dang dngul gyis g.yogs pa yi// bum pa gang ba nyi shu lnga/ rin po che ni lnga gzhug go// sgo bzhi grwa bzhir
179a5: bum pa brgyad/ brgya dang nyi shu rtsa lnga nyid// dkyil 'khor me tog 'bras yos dang / yungs dkar nyid kyis mngon par dgram// slob dpon bla ma mchod pa ni// gos dang snod dang yon gyis so// thub pa 'jig rten dbang phyug ltar/ ston pa'i 'du shes
179a6: bskyed nas su/ dkyil 'khor slob dpon mchod byas nas// de nas dkyil 'khor gshegs par gsol// de nas las rnams bya ba ni// ji ltar yid la sna tshogs bya/ don yod chen po'i gan med khang // rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu gsang//
179a7: nyid dngos grub bsgrub sla ga/ de bzhin nor bu sman sngags so// don 'di shin du bkra shis te// mkhas pa mi yis bya ba yin// phra ma'i tshig kyang mi sten te/ brdzun ni rnams kyang spra mi bya/ 'di ni bsgrub pa'i de nyid de/ de la 'grub pa the tsom med/
179a8: 'dir ni dkyil 'khor bshad par bya/ kun nas gru bzhi lham pa ste// grwa bzhi cha ni legs par dbye// ko la'i tshad de legs pa dang / sna tshogs tshon gyi thig skud gyis/ dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab po// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi snying por ni/

179b1: 'khor lo bzang po bri bar bya// dbus kyi lte bar pad mo yi// 'khor lo gas rab dri bar bya/ pad ma'i snying po gser dang ni// dngul lam tsan dan las byas pa// 'bar bar 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhugs 'khor lo kun du rtsibs dang
179b2: ni/ pu khAd dag gis chang bye'o/ dkyil 'khor snying po'i grwa rnams der// lha yi dbang po tshangs pa dang // khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen po bri// kun du kha khyer rnam pa dang // pad ma phreng ba rnams bya'o// dkyil 'khor phyi rol kun du me/ rtags
179b3: rang phyag rgya rnams bri ste/ / rdo rje dgra sta mdung rtse gsum/ ral gri zhags pa thob dang // gshin rje be con pad ma gdugs/ dbyug to mnga' bo che rnams so// grwa rnams kun du phreng ba dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dgra ma/ sgo sgo dang ni
179b4: dkyil 'khor gyi/ lha ste gshin rje chu lha dang / lus ngan dang ni gzhon nu bri// dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi rnams su ni// rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag go cha legs par bgos pa dang // khro bar lta ba 'jigs byed bri// 'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin te
179b5: dkyil 'khor gyi ni dgos pa rnams/ / legs pa yongs su rdzogs par ni// rig sngags ji bzhin bstan pa yin// de nas legs par khrus byas la// gos gtsang bgos pa 'jigs med pas// sman chog bzung ste las bya'o// rmongs pa'i
179b6: za ba sna tshogs dang / sgyum lta bu'i rnam sprul pa// gang gis ngan 'gro thar 'gyur pa/ sems can kun la bstan par bya// rtag tu dga' dang dang ba dang / gus pa de nyid thob par 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang gis bsgrub pa'i mtsho
179b7: dngos grub de nyid thob par 'gyur/ / rig sngags 'chang gis sngar khrus byas la rdzas kyi dri chab gtsang mngon yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ tsan dan gyi tshul brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas sgra yan
179b8: tshad tsam byugs la tshor zin par skus nas kha gdong bkru bar bya'o/ / mig sman la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas bskus na mig bzang par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad tshad par bzlas brjod byas nas bdag nyid dang phyogs

180a1: bcur gtor ro/ / de bzhin du til mar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas sgra yan chad bsgrub dang / tshod brin par bsku ba dang / lus rkang mthil yan chad bsku'o// yi ge gcig po yid la bya ba la sems byams pa nyis
180a2: la gnas nas rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i sgo'am/ skye bo'i na ngam/ 'dus pa chen po'i 'am// dge 'dun kyi nang ngam/ tshogs dang phrad pa 'am/ de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten mgon po'i
180a3: gzugs dang kha dog tu mthong zhing sa'i steng nas rkang 'khru gang tsam gyis spags te/ 'dug la ji lta ji ltar 'dul ba rnams kyi dang pa de lta de ltar gzugs rnams ston par byed de rgyal po'am/ 'khor los snang ba'am/ 'i se
180a4: ge 'am/ phag gam/ sred med kyi bur ston pa 'am/ tshangs pa 'am/ su bcu rtsa gsum gyi dbang po 'am/ dbang phyug chen po mig gsum pa 'am/ gzhon nu 'am/ chu lha 'am/ gshin rje'am rnam thos kyi bu 'am/ de bzhin du rgyal po chen po
180a5: bzhi'am/ nag po chen po'am/ dga' byed dbang phyug gam/ ser skya'am gsadab pa'am/ lag na rdo rje stobs po che'am/ nor bu bzang po'i bu'am/ gang ba bzang po'am/ stobs kyi lha 'am/ gar mkhan mchog gam/ rlung ngam// drang srong nyid
180a6: deji ltar gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs yid la byas pa thams cad ston par byed do/ / me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa nyid 'byung bar byed do// de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na de sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / gzugs snga tshogs
180a7: susra zhing gzhal med 'ang gi nas pa dag kyang ston par byed do/ / de ltar 'dod par 'gyur ba yid la byas pa de ltar gzugs rnams ston par byed de// 'khor chags pa'am dgon pa'am/ 'chags dag kyang sman nor bu dang / gas
180a8: sngags kyi mthus gzugs sna tshogs su ston par byed do/ / 'gron po'i 'brog gi nang du phyin pa nyam thag pa 'jigs pa mi zad pa/ chu med pa/ dgon par mgon med ba sdug bsngal drag po de lta bu'i nang du chud pa'i skye bo sdug par gyur pa/

180b1: skyabs med pa// mgon med par gyur pa/ skyob pa med pa/ dpung gnyen med par gyur pa na de la rig sngags 'chang gis phye ma 'dis phyogs bzhir mtshams gcad par bya/ phye mas dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du ri mo bris la ri lu lnga
180b2: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag go/ / yungs kar la ti la mar gyi rgyal pos bslus la don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te dbang bskur nas khro bo'i rgyas
180b3: bo bI zhes bya bas phyag rgya bcings las la bsnun cing phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya ba phyag rgya dang ldan par byas pa tsam gyis chu bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs 'bab cing rdzing 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshal dang / nye ba'i tshal dang / me tog
180b4: dang 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal med 'ar 'byung bar 'gyur/ / phye ma'i dkyil 'khor de las grong khyer dang / khang bzangs 'byung bar 'gyur// khyim gyi gnas lnga stod 'byung bar 'gyur zhing bde ba dang / lo legs
180b5: pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / skye bo dang / mi ma pos gad ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ nye tshed dang / ba lang dang ma ched gad glang po'i gnas dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag tshed pa dang / khyim dang / khang pa bzang po dag 'byung
180b6: bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du bas mos pa de srid du 'dug go// chu dang yungs dkar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas phyogs bzhir gtor na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// yangs dkar de g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du gtor na dpung gi tshogs
180b7: yanalag pa'i dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sa pha rol gyi dam gatshogs dang / dgra 'jigs shing 'joms par byed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// nga bar gyi phyogs bzhin kun du gtsor na 'obs bcad cing rab 'khyer gyis
180b8: bsor la grong khyer kun du skyes bu go cha bgos pa dag snang bas grong khyer gnan pa'am/ gtse bar sus kyang mi nus so// mtshan mo'i dri ti la mar de nyid yungs kar la bskus te/ rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas chad pas/

181a1: me'i nang du gtor/ char pa gang phyogs bzhi kun du gtor na kun nas mar me'i phreng ba 'byung bar 'gyur la// ji srid dgos pa de srid du 'bar ro// gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa 'am/ ri 'am/ phug gam/ 'chag sa'i gnas sam/ khyim
181a2: dragator na mar me'i phreng ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/ chu dang yungs kar gyis mi snang bar 'gyur/ grong khyer gyi sgor yungs kar gtor na gtor ba tsam gyi mod la dgra thams cad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi grong khyer me snang bar 'gyur ro// gang na phyi
181a3: rgol ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gnas pa'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ tshal gyi nang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas su gtor na 'brog dgon pa 'byung bar 'gyur la thams cad phan tshun ngo mi shes nas 'jigs shing skrag pa chen pos rab tu 'bros
181a4: bar byed do/ / dgra'i tshogs kyi nang du gtor na mtshon cha thams cad dang / 'gyed pa'i go cha thams cad mi snang zhing gcer bur 'gyur ro// zhal che 'gyed pa'i nang du gtor na 'gyed zla gtso bo de gcer bur 'gyur ro// dgra'i steng du gtor na me 'bar ba
181a5: 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag la sogs pa yid la ji ltar byas pa'i lam 'bum snyed de byed do// de nas las rgya chen po byed par 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pa sbom kyis lus bskus pa des/ yungs dkar
181a6: dang / til mar gyi rgyal pos bskus pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlam brjod byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gtor bar bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun dbang bskur nas phyag rgya bcas pa'i lag pas ri lu spyi bor bzhag la
181a7: gyi lasags par ga/ sam pa tha thos na pal drug par / na med pa'i rdul pa la nagaciganas bya ste/ sengasas kyad pa'i las ldan cig pa pa legs par dbyas pas 'alags pa stan pag zigs pang phyug gi gzugs gas
181a8: dag pa sa/ gags nagang pas nyid la gro'o// yang dag napa gan napa pog ga dag ya thog// khyim pa 'i bang dgata ma tshu pa drugs bya sa ma rnaM pa gyur pa/

181b1: kyi rgyal po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa bdag nyid kyi pus mo dang // byin pa la bskus na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rkang mtha'i la bskus nasa'i steng na nang pa sor bzhi tsam mi reg go// rdo'i steng du dang pa bzhag pa
181b2: dang / rkang rjes su byung ba'i steng du rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum bu bzhag pa'i rku ba la bskus na sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad du nam mkha' la 'dug go// yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas nas mes sbyin bsreg byas pa'i thal ba de blangs nas lan brgya rtsa/
181b3: brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ til mar gyis/ smras pa la khro ba'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur nas mig la bskus na mig gsum ston cing dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston par byed do// thal bas lus la thugs na tshangs pa'i gzum
181b4: su ston to/ / de pal sha dang / pa rna ka bsres pas lus byugs na sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang / shugs dang / gzugs su ston to// til mar chen pos khar bskus la thal bas dpral bar thig le byas na gzhon nu'i gzugs su ston to// yungs kar gyi
181b5: 'bru kha dog sna tshogs can la til mar chen po byugs pas bskus la don yod pa'i rgyal po sa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya phyag rgyas brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur cing khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur la/ de nas dngul gyi snod kyi nangad
181b6: ru bzhag/ de nas las thams cad byed de nam mkha' la gtor na nor bu dang rin po che'i char 'bab par ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i tshe nam mkha' la gtor na me tog gi char sna tshogs 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dus pa'i nang du nam mkha'
181b7: la gtor na 'bras bu dang nor gyi rgyun sna tshogs pa ston to/ / tshal gyi nang du gtor ni me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa ston to// ri phug tu gtor na rdzas dang sman sna tshogs ston to// mchod rten rnying pa 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i gnas su
181b8: gtor na yo byad thams cad kyis yongs su gang zhig rdzogs pa khang pa bzang po yangs pa gnas kyi mchog ston to/ / grong khyer stong par gtor na 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad phun gsum tshogs shing yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yul gyi rgyal po dang

182a1: rmas dang / bkrabs pa dang / mdunan 'don pa dang / blon po dang / skyes pa dang / bud me dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag son to// yang khro bo'i rgyal po'i hUM zhes bya bas gtor na dpung gi tshigs yan lag bzhi pa ston teto// dung khrod kyi na du
182a2: gtor na shi ba'i rus pa gang dang gang la bab pa de dang de gang du sems can dmyal ba'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam gzhin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ dri za'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen
182a3: pa 'am/ bya 'am/ nya ba 'am/ ru sbal gyi rigs su skyes pa 'am/ lha'i 'jig rten nam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa der rus pa 'am/ thong ba la tshig 'byung bar 'gyur la/ gang du skyes pa de'i gtam yang smra'o// gang
182a4: dang gang gi skye gnas su skyes pa de thams cad sprul thabs ji ltar bya ba de smra'o/ / yungs dkar des kyang rus gong 'brel ba 'am shi ba'i ro'am/ rus pa 'thor ba la bab na bab pa tsam gyi mod la sems can dmyal ba las yongs su
182a5: thar nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / zong bkram pa'i nang du gtor na thams cad mi mngon par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la gtor na skar ma rnams mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// skye bo mang po'i nang du gtor na thams cad gcad
182a6: bur 'gyur ro/ / 'dus pa'i nang du gtor na thams cad bro rdung bar byed do// dge 'dun gyi nang du gtor na dge slong thams cad bsam gtan 'thob par 'gyur ro// tshogs kyi gtso bo la gtor la rnal 'byor spyod par 'gyur ro// mkha' 'gro/
182a7: ma'i tshogs kyi nang du gtor na thams cad bong bu dang / wa dang / khyi'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro// sbyor ma'i sgor gtor na sbyor ma thams cad 'bar la ma ti'i gzugs can du snang ngo // shi ba'i steng du gtor na po rdung bar byed do// thong ba'i steng
182a8: dragator na bro rdung bar byed cing rgyug la phan tshun rgyug par byed do/ / lam gyi bzhi mdor gtor na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na nye bar 'khod la ji srid 'tsho'i dbang du 'gyur nas 'khod do//

182b1: nyin gcig bzhin bdag 'di la gton na mchod pa chen po'i gnas su 'gyur te// gzhan yang rang gi blo rnams kyis las 'bum gang byed / na yod pa dpo rnam par 'phrul ba'adakyil bsod snyam lta bu'i chog/ phags
182b2: da ma mo rgyal ro/ / / bam po brgyad pa/ den pa da byed dkrugs pa chen po dang / lagan rdo rje'i gzugs brtan 'i chog sha bar byaste/ gang gis spyanams rlung myong ba dang / ga na rje shA
182b3: sbyar du ston / / rdo rje'i sgra dang stobs po che// rta mgrin dang ni mgul sngon dang // de bzhin rta ni rgod ma'i kha/ bdud rtsi 'khyi'i ldan gzugs po che// log 'dren rnams ni rab 'joms dang // khro rgyal de bzhin 'jigs byed spyan// ke le'i
182b4: li'i rgyal po che/ / khro bo chel ba stobs po che// de bzhin rdo rjes 'og gzugs// rdo rje rtse mo de nyid dang / klu chen rab 'joms spyan yangs dang / sog ma med ni 'dul ba dang // de bzhin thigs khro khros chen dang / de bzhin mtsho ba gtsigs mad
182b5: dang / / rgyal po chen po rdo rje'i sgrog/ klu yi dbang po stobs kyis gnon// mgon po gos sngon gyon pa dang // dbyug sngon dgra las rgyal ba dang // 'jig rten dbang phyug pad ma'i lte/ phyag na pad ma pad ma phyug/ de bzhin 'jigs pa brgyad sel
182b6: dang / de bzhin mchod rten 'jig rten pa// sna tshogs gzugs ste bzang po dang / sred med bu dang tshangs pa dang / drag po de ni dbang phyug dang / nag po chen po gzhon nu dang / gshin rje dang ni chu la nyid// nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // rgyu skar sgra gcan mjug
182b7: rings dang / de bzhin gza' dang lha ma yin// nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci/ gnod sbyin srin po lto 'phye che// 'byung po dpal ldan rnam thos bu// de bzhin yul skyong mig mi bzadang // 'phags skyes de nyid mthong ba dang // mi'u thung dang ni dra
182b8: srong gzugs/ nor bu bzang sras gang ba dang // sna tshogs gzugs can ston pa dang // rgyal po dang ni deng dpon dang // tshong dpon de bzhin khyim bdag dang // bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang // dge sbyong stag dang seng ge dang // khyu mchog de bzhin

183a1: nags kyi lha/ / shing lha de bzhin nags kyi lha/ shing lha de bzhin lo tog lha// gang gA swa ti ya mun// zla bskal ldan du sbal // lag 'gro dang ni thod pa can// skal yang de bzhin 'bras bu dang / me tog rgyal rlabs chen po dang / sna tshogs
183a2: gzugs dang rnam sna tshogs/ / de ltar dgug pa bstan pa dang // de ltar slar gshegs gsol ba nyid// sbyin pasreg dra ba 'di nyid ni/ rdzu 'phrul chang dbyung gsang sngags grub// rdzas grub nor bu til mar grub// don yod zhags pa bsgrub
183a3: pa'i phyir/ de nyid dngos grub rab ston pa// mchod rten dgon pa gtsug lag khang// lha yi gnas dang de bzhin grong // grong khyer nyid dang 'bab chu'i deng // mtshe'u dang lte ga chu bo dang / rdzing dang de bzhin char 'bab dang / 'brug sgrogs dang na
183a4: klog 'gyu dang / gzhan yang me ni 'bar ba dang // drad pa'i phung po bde byed dang skyes bu go na gyon pa dang // de bzhin mtshon cha ma tshogs mthong / khru mthong grub pa mthong ba dang // de nyid rmang du byung ba ste// rdzas thang sbyar ba nyud gyur kyang
183a5: de nyid dngos grub bla na med/ sems can rnams la phan 'tshal nas// bcom ldani de nyid bdag gis bshad// rig sngags 'chang rnams bklags pas 'grub// dbul ba rnams ni nor 'thob cing / sdang ba rnams ni byams par gyid/ mu
183a6: stegs gzhan rnams dad par bgyid/ / mkhas pa rnams ni dga' bar bgyid// gdul ka rnams ni thar pa 'tshal// dge slong rnams ni bsam gtan thob// ting 'dzin bla na med pa 'thob// chos 'dod nams ni sangs rgyas mthong / sdig pa
183a7: byed rnams sdig pa 'jig/ mi rigs byas rnams thar pa thob// mtshams med lnga rnams pad dag na// dbugs ma phyin rnams dbugs 'byin mchog/ ma dul pa rnams de bzhin 'dul// mnal ba rnams sgrol ba'i gru// thar pa'i lam
183a8: du 'gro bar gnas/ ma grol ngan 'gro kun las 'gro// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// lung ma bstan pa lung ston byed// skyon dang dri ma sdig pa rnams/ thams cad mod la spong bar bgyid// de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni/ klags

183b1: bas grub pa bgyid pa lags/ / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// don gyi dngos grub blan med// gang dang gang du sbyor ba bgyid// dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ yid la bsams pa 'grub par 'gyur// 'dir ni yid kyis rnam
183b2: bsams pa/ ji ltar yid la 'dod pa dang // ji ltar ngo bo kun bsams pa// de ltar rnam 'phrul ston par bgyi// chos grangs rgya skar sbyar mi 'tshal// bsnyung ba bgyi ba mi 'tshal te// cho ga ji bzhin dus ci bzhin chog rig sngags rgyal re
183b3: bzlas/ rig sngags 'chang ba gtsad gyur cing / legs par khrus bgyis gos gtsang dag/ bgos pa bden par smra ba dang // bla ma la ni gus byed pa/ rtag tu byams pa'i sems la gnas// sems can kun la brtse ba'i mchog/ sdom lagarba
183b4: shing tshangs par spyod/ chos ma yin pa spong byed pa// gral te de nyid 'grub 'dod na// chang dang sha dang kun dong dang / 'dres dang za 'phro spags pa spangs// sems can ngan pa sun 'byin pa// rig sngags rku dang cho ga tu/ chos rku gsang sngags rku ba dang /
183b5: de bzhin yi ge rku ba dang / ser sna rtag tu spangs par gyis// de dag la ni dngos grub med// ma rungs pa'i dam tshig nyams/ yid btsug pa ni med par byed// sdig pa'i chos ni kun du spyod// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis sma // byang chub
183b6: sems dpa' rnams kyis smad/ / rtag tu chos kyi sdong dum 'gyur// shi nas sems can dmyal bar gzhol// rtag tu smad pa'i gnas su 'gyur// dbul po lus ni skam pa dang // mdze dang khyi rdos 'debs pa dang // sdug bsngal rkun mchos
183b7: sun 'byin/ chos rku ba yi lus can ni// 'jig rten 'dir ni bder mi 'gyur/ 'jig rten pha rol ga la ba de/ sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba yin// de lta bas na chen po 'dod pas ni rtag tu dam pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya zhing
183b8: rtag tu dkon mchog gsum dang / pha dang ma dang bla ma dang / ston pa ni skyob pa dang / skyabs pa dang / dpung gnyen mdzad pa/ ston pa/ mchog sbyin pa/ dngos grub dang / mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ rga shi las thar par byed pa/ dbang phyug sbyin pa

184a1: nor sbyin pa longs spyod sbyin pa/ dang po mchog bskyed pa de nyid 'jig rten gyi bla ma/ mgon po'i 'jig rten dbang phyug chen po dbang phyug mgon po/ mchog sbyin par mdzad pa/ gzugs sna tshogs ston par mdzad pa/ dngos grub sna tshog
184a2: sbyin par bgyid pa/ mgon po sdug bsngal sna tshogs las yongs su thar bar bgyid pa nad sa tshogs spyod par grub pa/ che sna tshogs rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ 'jig rten sdig pa sna tshogs sel bar bgyid pa/ bla ma lagus pa sna chags
184a3: bgyid pa lags te/ de lta bas na rtag tu 'bad pas dgos pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ rtag tu 'bad pas shin tu gus par bgyid pa lags so// de nas rdzas kyi sman sgrub pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bshad par bgyid ste
184a4: seng ge'i lce dang / snying dang / mig dang / de bzhin du nyi byas kyi phye dang / ldong ros dang / pra m+b+ha'i lo la dang / gu gul dang / pad ma dang / pad ma'i ze ba dang / uta pa la sngon po dang / nag bus pa dang / li shi dang n+ya spos dang / de bzhin du g+hi'u wang dang
184a5: gla rtsi dang / ga bur dang / gur gum dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / sprig ga dang / te dza ba ti ste de ltar cha mnyam par byas pa de dag thams cad bye ma zhib mor byas la dngul gyi snod bkang ste dar gyis g.yog/ don yod pa'i rgyal po spyan ras gzigs
184a6: dbang phyug gi mdun du dus gsum du khri bzlas brjod bya'o/ / dus gsum du khro bo'i rgyal pos lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas dbang bsrung shing phyag rgyas kyang nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur ro// ji chang nas cha lnga byas te/ phye ma
184a7: dang til mar dang / nor bu dang / mig bskus pa dang til mar tshos pa dang / cha lnga'o// bye ma'i pad ma mu ru ka'i bye ma dang sbyar la bzlas brjod bya'o// khro ba'i rgyal pos lnga stong ngo // ti la mar ni ma hA ru ti ras 'grub te brgya stong bzlas brjod bya'o//
184a8: khro bo'i rgyal pos bzhi stong ngo // nor bu ni sbrul gyi khrag gis sbrus te khri chig stong bzlas brjod bya'o// tho bo'i rgyal pos lnga stong lnga brgya'o// mig sman ni ma bya'i mig chu dang / 'ug pa'i mig dang / glad pa dang sbyar la khri cig stong bzlas brjod kyi

184b1: khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad do/ / pra b+ha tI la srang nyi shu/ gan d+ha ra ba te'i la srang brgyad/ yungs mar la srang bcu drug/ 'o ma la srang brgya/ ba ser mo grub pa'i 'o ma dang / ba'i lci ba dang / ba gcin srang bdun/ du ru ka'i srang gnyis te rdzas 'di
184b2: rnams chu dang bsres nas pad ma sdong bus dkrug cing zangs snod du bco'o/ / mnyam par gzhag pas gsang sngags bzlas/ cho ga dag gis bsrung bar bya/ cho ga bzhin du gtor ma sbyar// me tog bdug spos dag gis bdug/ til mar mchog
184b3: ni bsgrub par bya/ chung ngur me brang grub pa mchog/ spos kyi shing gis bud pa bzad// 'di ltar grub par shes pa dang / khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur ba// nyi shu gcig tu dbang bskur ro// tir mar de ni snod gtsang ma/ zangs snod yang na dngul snod bzang /
184b4: smig ma'i sdod du gzhag par bya// de nas rig sngags brgyad stong dang / khro bo'i rgyal po brgyad stong nyid// so sor dag tu bzlas brjod bya// dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa der gzhag par bya ba ni ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar bya ba de ltar byas
184b5: nas gzhag cang slob dpon gyi las kyang bya ste ji ltar dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang / 'jug pa dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dbang bskur ba dang / mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor bskor ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / spyi'u gtsug bcing ba dang / phyag
184b6: rgyabacing ba dang / srung ba'i cho ga dang / nye rag kya dang / gos bgo ba dang / mchod phyir thogs pa ste dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon kun gyis de dag thams cad bstan par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying por bzhag la rig sngags 'chang sbyang
184b7: pa'i cho ga byas pas 'phags pa don yod pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ / khro bo'i rgyal pos kyang stong rtsa brgyad du dbang bskur/ phyag rgyas kyang stong rtsa brgyad du dbang bskur la/ phyag rgya bcings nas rnam pa gsum 'dra bar dbang
184b8: bskur ro/ / de nas las thams cad byas te yungs kar dkar po grub pa las rig sngags 'chang gis brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas la pad ma'i mchog gtso bo gtsang ba/ gtsang mar byas pa/ legs par bkrus pa/ sbyangs pa/ phye ma zhib du

185a1: btags pa thal ba lta bu la brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas nas snod dgang/ / gu gul dang / tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / smrig ka la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas snod kyi nang du bkang la/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa'i steng du
185a2: so sor gzhag go/ / de nas khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur cing phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ba byas na/ gang gi tshe don du bya ba byung ba'i tshe bya ba thams cad byed do// gser ram/ yang na dngul lam/ zangs las pad ma'i tshad du byas pa 'dab ma nyi shu
185a3: rtsa gcig dang / snying po dang / ze ba can dang / de bzhin du sor de bzhin du sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshad lnga sdod bu sor bcu drug pa'i tshad rdo rje'i rnam pa can du bya/ skud pa dmar po'i zhags pa pad ma'i tshen dmar pos bzhen pa/ gzhon nus bkal pa grub pa/
185a4: de dag la brgya stong bzlas brjod pa/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur cing phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ba byas la mkhas pas gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag go/ gang gi tshe don du bya ba byung ba de'i tshe las thams cad grub pa ston to// shin tu gtsang zhing
185a5: gtsang bar bya ste/ su la yang mi sbyin no// sangs rgyas rnams la sku brnyas par gyur pa/ dam tshig nyams pa yang ba la bgegs 'jug par 'gyur zhing / 'phral tu mtshams med pa lnga byed pa rmongs pa'i dra ba de la dngos grub rnams kyang shes par mi
185a6: 'gyur ro/ / gnas gzhan ni bla ma la gus shing // sangs rgyas chos la sten byed pa/ 'phags pa'i tshogs la dad pa dang // byams sems snying rje bdag nyid can/ de yi lag tu rab tu sbyin/ bdag gi srog bzhin gtad par bya// de dag dngos grub mchog sbyin te/
185a7: blags dang mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin// rjes su 'thun pa'i las byed do// 'jig rten 'di ni rtag tu bde/ 'jig rten pha rol bde ba yin// 'gro ba la ma ni bde bar 'gro// gang na 'od dpag med pa bzhugs/ bde ba
185a8: can du rtag tu 'gre/ rdzus te skye ba'i pad ma las/ rgyan rtags kun gyis rnam par brgyan// tshe rabs dag ni dran 'gyur te// sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// de nas rig sngags 'chang rmongs pa chen po'i dam tshig ston par 'dod pa gtsang mas legs

185b1: ba zlas gags gcang ma pags nas tan nagagacig bsrung ba byas pas lagan rngarnga dang / 'phags pa stan ngas gcigs dbang phyuganal mngan du bzhag ste// matog dang bdug sus dbus dang 'phags pastan ngas gangs/
185b2: dbang phyug gi sku gzugs dang phyag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs la mchod pa yang bya/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la a ka ru'i bdug spos kyis bdug/ lag na rdo rje gru gul gyi bdug spos kyis bdug/ 'phags pa sman pas/
185b3: gzigs dbang phyug la lha ba shos dkar po dbul/ lag na rdo rje la ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha bgos phul la/ nyin par don yod pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod pa// mtshan mo khro ba'i rgyal po ngal ba med par bzlas brjod bya ste// mig nga
185b4: khroganyer med pa dang / dri ma dang ser sna me pas nam langs kyi bar du bzlas brjod byas pa dang / 'phags pa ldan ngas gzigs dbang phyug sa/ lag na rdo rje yang thab mo 'jugs par 'gyur / gnyis kyi miganas 'ja/
185b5: pa/ rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mig la bskus na nam mkha' la 'gro'o// khar bcug na rig sngags dang / cho ga zhibi mo dang / dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang / shugs
185b6: dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol gnon par 'gyur/ lag na rdo rje'i rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na nye bar 'dug cing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjes su sbyin par byed la/ rang gi gzugs kyis spyod par byed/ lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang /
185b7: shugs dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol gnon pa rjes su sbyin par byed// de ltar lag na rdo rjes 'gugs par 'gyur ro// nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su til mar chen po ngan par bdag nyid la bsku/ mig sman gyis mig phrug/ bye mas gtong zhing
185b8: bdag nyid theg le bya/ nor bu mgo la bzhag nas gu gul gyis bdug/ bdag nyid gos ngur smri bgos nas sangs rgyas yid la bya ba bsgom zhing / zhi ba dang dul ba'i yid kyis sde can gyi nang ngam dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug par bya'o// de nas

186a1: slo ga/ sde can gyi nang du zhugs sam/ dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs pa'i rig sngags 'chad de bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang / mdog dang / rtags dang / spyod lam du mthong ste/ mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod pa 'od mngom
186a2: gang ba/ snyan pad ma/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i mdun gyis bdang ba'i lha tshogs sna tshogs kyis gzugs mthong bar ston to// dge slong de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / mdog tu mthong
186a3: nas thams cad zhabs gnyis la 'dud pa byed do/ / rig sngags des brnyas par mi bya zhing / bdag la bstod par yang mi bya/ brnyas pa tsam gyis khyod kyi bsod nams yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur
186a4: par bya'o/ / 'phags pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rdzu 'phrul chen pos stobs/ bcu dang ldan par dbugs dbyung bar bya ste/ rgyu des na brnyas par mi bya'o// de nas grong khyer dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug
186a5: par bya/ / de nas 'dus pa'i nang du 'jug par bya/ de nas grong dang / tshang tshing dang / yul dang / ri brags kyi nang du 'jug par bya/ de nas btsun mo'i nang du 'jug par bya ste/ yul gyi skyes pa dang
186a6: bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de dag thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / mdog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs su mthong zhing mchod pa chen po dang / rim gro sna tshogs byed par 'gyur la
186a7: de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas yin no/ / zhes smra ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho ga 'thob bo// yungs kar dang / til mar gyis rang gi 'khor gyi spyi bor gtod cing byugs na/ thams cad lha
186a8: dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs su ston to// rkang pa til mar gyis bskus na si'i steng nas sor brgyad

186b1: tsam gyis dpags te/ nam mkha' la 'gro ste/ ji srid du ma bkrus pa de srid du sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du ston to// mgon po spyan ras gzigs mthong bar 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang de nang par sngar
186b2: langs nas gtsang ma khrus byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas khang steng du 'dug la yungs ka ra la ti la mar gyis byugs nas phyogs bzhir gtor na// rgyal po dang / blon po dang / rgyal rigs da
186b3: bram ze dang / btsun mo dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad sgyu ma chen pos rmongs par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang des nor bu bzhis dbu rgyan dang / phreng ba byas
186b4: la mgo la gdags so/ / til mar gyis yan lag tsam la bsku bar bya// dpral bar thig le bya/ mig sman gyis mig bsku/ phye mas bdag nyid la gdab/ ras bzang po yug gcig bgo/ byang
186b5: chub sems dpa'i cha byad du bgyi ba dang / nor bu dang gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / gser skud gyis bcings na de dag thams cad rgyan dang / spud pa dang / nor bu dang / dngul dang / rdo rje dang / bai dUr+ya
186b6: sna tshogs kyis lus brgyan par snang ngo / / lag na pad ma thogs na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs su snang ngo // yid la ji ltar bsams pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
186b7: tshul dang / 'jigs pa brgyad dang / tshangs pa'i tshul dang / yid bzhin nor bu dang / rgod ma'i kha dang / mgul sngon dang / ta mgrin du ston to// ji ltar gzugs
186b8: yid la byas pa de ltar ston te/ ji srid du thig le yod cing dbu rgyan thogs pa de srid du tshul sna tshogs ston par byed do// til mar dang / yungs kar dang / bsres nas/ king ku

187a1: d un du na rgyu na ku du su
187a2: smra te/ xxxxxxxxxx/
187a3: xxxxxxxxxx
187a4: xxxxxxxxxx/ xxxxxxxxxx
187a5: k+Sha/ ga
187a6: gyu shin pa dag rgyas / shings ma / ma dang / ma pa spya la tshus la slas na das pa'i gzugs pa s+ho/ 'i spya
187a7: gas ga sa/ rgyas zla ga / / /
187a8: dang / sring po che'i zag dang sbyin cig byang nam lus la bzlas na nag po'i gzugs med sul du da gi gzugs su stan la/ ga dang ga dgal thig sa byas nam ma tshigs kyis gzug

187b1: ston to/ / sbrul gyi khrag dang / lpags pa dang / til mar gyi rgyal po dang lhan cig sbrus la skal tshigs su bsdu zhing / dpung pa g.yon par yang bskus na klu'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su sta daH/
187b2: di lnga ji skar khrag dang sbyang shing ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams la de lta de ltar gzugs sbyin to// de nas gzhal med khang lta bar 'dod na yungs kar la te la mar gyis bslus nas dge 'dun gyi nang
187b3: steng 'og tu gtor/ / phye mas nor bu rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo kun du bskus na dge 'dun rgan rims su bkod pa'i dbus su gnas med khang chen po rgyan gyis brgyan pa ston/ dge slong rnams kyis steng du gtor
187b4: na dge slong thams cad gzugs sna tshogs yin la/ ji ltar byas pa bzhin rgyal po'i gzugs su snang ba dang / gzhan dag blon po dang / gzhan dag bkrabs pa dang / gzhan dag mdun na 'don pa dang
187b5: gzhan dag yongs su spyod pa'i gzugs su ston la/ yungs kar ma bskus pas gtor na slar yang dge slong rnams su snang ngo // shing arka'i 'o ma yungs kar la bskus nas dge 'dun gyi dbus su dge
187b6: slong rnams kyis mal stan gyi steng du gtor na/ ji ltar dge slong thams cad 'khod pa ltar snang ngo // ral pa'i thong tshugs kyis brgyan pa la gtor na rgan po 'khor thogs pa sgur po lhag dgye sna
187b7: dkar can nyam chung bar snang ngo / / mal stan gyi steng du yungs kar gtor ba gal te mtshan thog thag bzhag na gzugs gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// lug gi steng na snod yod pa la gtong na de thur ma'i gzas
187b8: dang / sbrul nag po snang ngo // snod kyi steng du gtor na kham por du snang bar 'gyur ro// btung ba'i snod sbrang rtsis byugs pa'i steng du gtor na phyag dar gyi phung por snang ngo // grong khyer gyi sgo dang grong khyer

188a1: kun du gtor na zong khyer kun nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / grong khyer kun yungs kar dang pad ma'i phye ma gtor na skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo ma snang ba thams/
188a2: cad snang bar 'gyur ro// seng ge'i khrag dang sbyar nas dud 'gro' ste gnas kyi steng du gtar na lam gyi bzhi ma thams cad du seng ge gzugs su stan to// sde drag cang gtum la yan lag mchog/
188a3: gi gzugs ldan pa'i steng du gtor na thams cad la'i gzugs su snang la phyogs bcur rgyug go/ g.yul 'gyed par gtor na thams cad gnyid log par byas par 'gyur la mtshon cha thams cad dang /
188a4: cho ga thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro// mi'i nang du gter na mi snang ba rnams sdang bar 'gyur ro// til mar dang sbyar nas me'i nang du gtor na rtag tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// chu'i nang du gtor
188a5: na chu mi mngon par 'gyur ro/ / bum pa chus bkang ba la gtor na srog chags chu'i nang du gnas pa thams cad chu'i nang nas 'byung zhing thang la gnas so// tshal gyi nang du yungs kar gyis gtor na
188a6: me tog dang 'bras bu mi sdang bar gyur pa thams cad snang zhing shing skam po dang / tshal gyi mthar me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad ston to// nam mkha' la gtor na phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi
188a7: nang ngam/ 'dus pa'i nang ngam/ skye bo mang po'i nang du me tog gi char rnam pa sna tshogs dga' bab ste/ lha'i dri legs par smin pa yid dga' ba sim par byed pa 'bab bo// las dang
188a8: ldan pa'am/ bzo'i gnas kyi las te/ las kyi sdod thams cad la til mar gyi rgyal pos byugs la bye mas bsdu/ pad ma chen po'i phye mas 'khor gyi gnas bsku/ yungs kar gyis

188b1: phyogs bzhir gtor la/ de nas las kyi bzo bzang po ji lta ba bzhin ston par 'dod na las kyi snod de dang de dag nyid g.yol/ las kyi bzo'i tshul bzang pos mthar phyin pa rnam pa ram dag ston par byed la nyo tshang
188b2: byed pa 'byung ste/ gal te phyir bzlog pa ma byas na rin dza/ ji lta ba de ltar nya tshad byed do// chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na mi snang bar 'gyur la dpag tshad brgya tsam gyi bar du khrid na de dang de nyid
188b3: du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo la bye mas byug cing yungs kar chags par byas la/ pad ma chen po'i phye mas gtor nas 'jim pa bzhag la snod kyi ngo bo ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bya ste/
188b4: snod kyi ngo bo dngul las byas pa 'am/ gser las byas pa 'am/ zangs las byas pa 'am/ lcags las byas pa 'am/ lcags lnga las byas pa rin po che bzang po sna tshogs kyis spras pa ji lta ba de
188b5: lta bu'i snod bkra ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur la/ nyo tshong byed pa yang 'byung ste/ rin chen pos tshong byed do// yungs kar gyi phye ma dang / pad ma'i phye ma lhan cig sbyar nas tshong 'dus kyi dbus su
188b6: gtor na kun du zod bkram pa'i snod mi snang bar byas pa thams cad snang bar byed do/ / thag pa'i steng du gtor na sprul chen po ston to// khyim dang / ra ba'i ngos dang / sgo dang / shing sbyar ba dang / ka ba'i steng du gtor na khang pa
188b7: dang / ra ba dang / 'khor gyi byams rnams sbrul du ston to// ji srid du chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du sprul pa rnams 'dug go// bzlog pa byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i gnas sam/
188b8: khang bzangs kyi ngos la gtor na sbrul chen por snang ngo // lha'i steng du gtor la mig sman gyis bsku/ ri lus thig le byas na lha'i gzugs brnyan de ku tse 'don cing 'gro ste/ gar 'dod pa der 'gro'o// bzlog pa byas na phyir 'dug /

189a1: sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi zhabs la byugs la phye mas gtor na sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs g.yo bar mdzad/ bzhud par mdzad do// 'jug par mdzad do// 'chags par mdzad do// tsan dan la bzlas brjod byas
189a2: nas bdugs na phyir bzhugs so/ / bum basbrang rtsis bskus pa rnams la gtor na g.yo bar byed do// ji tsam du phyir bzlog pa ma byas pa de tsam du g.yo'o// chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog na phyir 'dug go/ de nas rdo rje bskyod
189a3: bar 'dod na spos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la me tog bkram ste/ gu gul gyis bdug pas bdug/ de yang yungs kar dang / phye ma dang bcas pas gtor la don yod pa'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ rdo rje dkyil
189a4: 'khor las langs nas nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed/ 'phar bar byed/ 'dug par byed/ 'bar bar byed cing / phan tshun 'gro bar byed/ mtho bar 'gro bar byed/ dma' bar 'gro bar byed/ rnam par 'gro bar byed// 'bar ba chen
189a5: pos 'bar bar byed de ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du nam mkha' la 'gro'o/ / chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na de nyid du na snang de de nas 'khor lo bskyod par 'dod na dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la spos sna
189a6: tshogs kyis bris nas me tog dgram pa yang bya/ gu gul gyi bdug pas kyang bdugs nas 'khor lo la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku/ lte ba'i dbus su thig le byas nas dkyil
189a7: 'khor gyis dbus su bzhag par bya/ de la yang yungs kar dang / bad ma chen po'i phye mas gdab par bya/ 'khor lo kun nas gu gul gyis bdug pas bdug cing se gol gyi sgra yang byas na 'khor lo de dkyil 'khor las langs
189a8: nas nam mkha' la 'phar zhing sdang ba thams cad la 'bab pa byed de/ gal te g.yul 'gyed par 'bar na/ de'i tshe dgra thams cad kyi mgo gcod par byed/ sdang ba thams cad dang phyir rgol ba thams cad la bab na 'jig

189b1: par byed/ bgegs thams cad la 'bab pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / gdon rnams la 'bab pa dang / klu sdang ba thams cad la bab na 'jig par byed de/ ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas
189b2: ba de srid du 'phar ro/ / chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na slar kyil 'khor la 'dug go// mdung rtse gsum pa bskyod par 'dod na dkyil 'khor byas la thod pa bzhag par bya/ me tog dgram pa yang bya/ gu gul gyi
189b3: badrug pas kyang bdugs la/ mdung rtse gsum bal til mar gyi rgyal pos bsku/ phye mas gdab cing thig le bya/ rtse'i rgyun gsum la pad ma chen po'i phye mas gtor nas thod pa'i steng du bzhag par bya/ yungs dkar gyis gtor
189b4: zhing hU~M zhes se gol byas na mdung rtse gsum pa 'bar bar byed ldang bar byed/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed/ kun du 'bar bar byed/ 'gro bar byed/ phyogs bcur 'bar bar byed do// ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du 'bar bar byed do//
189b5: chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na slar dkyil 'khor la 'dug go/ dung la til mar gyis byugs la phye mas gtor la thig le bya/ yungs kar gyis kyang phyi nang gtor la bus la ji srid du sgra thos pa de srid kyi skyes pa dang / bud
189b6: med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad bro rdung bar byed/ rgyug par byed mchong bar byed cing phyogs bcur rab tu rgyug par byed do// g.yul dor bus na 'gyed bI mi thams cad dang / mtshon cha thams cad dang / go cha thams cad btang nas bro chung bar/
189b7: byed de/ gcer bur 'byung bar byed/ phyogos bcur rgyug par byed do// gal te rung lan bdun bus na phyir rgol ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs des nyon mongs pa skyed par 'gyur te/ ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du mchong zhing phyogs
189b8: bcur rgyug go/ / spos chus bzlog cing khrus byas na phyir bde bar gnas par 'gyur la/ rtag tu rgyal ba dang / dpal gyi mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// de nas sgyu ma de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i gsang sngags dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub

190a1: dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ sgyu 'phrul gyi dra ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor gang du dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs shing / kun nas brgyan par yungs kar dang til mar gyi rgyal po dang / bye mar bgres pas byugs
190a2: pa dang / thig les kyang dbang bskur cing pad ma chen po'i phye mas byugs la lag pa'i phyag rgya dang / hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod pa tsam dang / yungs kar gtor ba'i mo dal/ gtor ma'i snod dang snod rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum pa
