190a3: bkang ba thams cad dang / mtshon cha thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor gyi steng nas nam mkha' la sor bzhi tsam gyis dngags te 'dug la ji srid du dkyil 'khor gyi las su bya ba thams cad rdzogs rdzogs kyi bar du nam mkha'
190a4: la 'dug go/ / las su bya ba thams cad zin nas dkyil 'khor gyi yod byad dri chab kyi tshogs dbang bskur na gtor ma dang / snod rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum pa thams cad rang nyid 'bar bar byed la/ slar yang ra shi gnas su
190a5: 'dug go/ / go cha de lta bu ni dkyil 'khor thams cad la bya ste/ thams cad du ya mtshan ston par snang la/ byas pa tsam gyis las thams cad sgrub par 'gyur te/ the tsom mi bya'o zhes bshad do// de'i phyir pad ma'i dngos grub
190a6: bshad par bya ste/ gser ram dngul lam zangs las shin du legs shing mdzes pa snying po dang / ze ba dang bcas shing sdong bu tshad dang ldan par byas la/ 'dab ma byed kha phye ba 'khor bar 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi
190a7: yod da khru gang tsam gyi tshad sdong bu dang / snying po dang / ze ba'i tshad sor bzhi tsam du byas pa la tisas gyi rgyal pos bsku/ pad ma'i phye ma dang / mig sman dang / mig bsku ba dang / thig ler byas pa dang bcas pas kun legs par
190a8: bskus la/ pad ma'i sdong bu'i bar du nor bu rin po che bzhag nas lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya// khro bo'i rgyal pos lan bdun gyi bar du dbang bskur nas rig sngags 'chad gtsang ma legs par khrus byas par/

190b1: gos gtsang ma bgos pas til mar gyis bdag nyid la bsku bar bya/ mig bsku ba dang / thig le dang / bdug pas bdag nyid kyi lus la bdug par bya'o// lag pa g.yas pa la nor bu gdags/ lag pa g.yon pa pad ma gzung la bcom ldan 'dra
190b2: kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ 'khor gyi nang du bcom ldan 'das la pad ma'i mchod pa 'bum bya ste/ pad ma 'bum 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas chu dang yungs kar gyis btab na yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// pad ma sprul pa gang
190b3: yini de dag thams cad chu'i nang du ba na padam 'gal me bka ba ltar 'khor bar 'gyur la/ pad ma 'bus rnams card du 'bab par 'gyur ro/ da ma'i tshu nang drang zhag par bya ba ni mtshaman dang/ lte ka' nga/ chu bo 'ang/ chen
190b4: 'am/ 'obs sam/ rdzing ngam/ mtsho'i nang gar yang rung ba'i gnas su gzhag na gnas de dade de thams cad du pad ma'i mtsho chen po 'byung ste/ ji srid du pad ma ma byung ba de srid du dus rtag tu pad ma'i mtshor 'dug ste/ ston ga dang / dgun
190b5: nam/ dpyid ngam/ sos ka tsha ba'i dus su rtag tu pad ma'i mtshor 'dug go/ tshal gyi 'gram du zhugs nas yungs kar la til mar gyis bskus pa phye ma dang sbyar nas me tog gang yang rung ba zhig lag gis bzung ste/ bskor la yungs
190b6: gar gyis gtor na/ tshal gyi mtha'i shing thams cad la me tog rgyas par snang ngo // dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ tshogs pa'i nang ngam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ram/ skye bo'i nang du me tog ji snyed pa lag gis bskor la/ yungs kar gyis
190b7: gtor na me tog mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / chu dang yungs kar gyis thams cad du zlog par byed pa yin no// 'bras bu ji snyed pa lag gis bzung nas yungs kar gyis gtor na 'bras bu'i tshar 'bab par 'gyur ro// gos lag pas
190b8: bzung nas yungs kar gyis gtor te bskor na gos dang bla re sna tshogs ston par byed do/ / rgyan lag pas bzung nas yungs kar gyis gtor na/ lha'i rgyan bzang po sna tshogs pa lag tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing skye bo 'dus pa thams cad kyi

191a1: 2/ d+han du byed la thams cad la rgyan btags par 'gyur ro// yungs dkar dang chus bzlog par bya'o// yungs kar la til mar gyis bskus phye mas bsgo/ b+hi'u wang dang / gur kum dang / shing kun dang / sU hA'i 'o mas kyang bsgos
191a2: yade dag gcig tu byas nas gribs la bsam mo/ / de bras cug / gzug phyogs shing gtan 'das me bang bang cwa shi lus pas bang tshogs byu nga lnga ste/ mr-i rdza sa nga me ba du ngas ngas 'od zer yang
191a3: bakha dog rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ngo / / ti la mar dang lhan cig btags pa'i snying por bya/ sko bur ti la mar gyi rgyal pos bkar ste mar me 'bum ston par byed do// me thab khung bu'i nang du bcug na ji srid du ma phyung ba de srid du me 'bar
191a4: bar ston to/ / mar me'i sdong bu'i nang du bcu ga la ma phyung na rtag tu 'bar ro// ma gal me 'bar ba'i nang du bcug na 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'bum snyed du snang ngo // gtor mami'i rdza ma dang / bum pa'i nang du gtor na gtor ma'i rdza ma dang bum pa thams
191a5: cad 'bar bar snang ngo / / lag cha dang / mtshon cha thams cad la byugs na gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyi lus la byugs na ri lu gtsang ma spyi bor gzhag na lus thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar snang ba nas lus ril
191a6: bsregs pa ltar snang ngo / / 'o ma dang yungs kar gyis gtor na lus slar snang bar 'gyur ro// lag pa dang rkang pa la bskus la/ ri lu gtsang ma 'bar ba lag pa g.yas pas bzung ba 'am// rkang pa'i mthe bos bzung na lag pa dang //
191a7: rkang pa gcig pu 'bar ba dang / 'brel bar snang ngo // 'dus pa'i nang ngam/ skye bo 'dus pa mang po 'am/ rgyal po'i 'khor ram/ sde can gyin dang sa/ rig byed bzhi'i nad thams cad du yan la gnyams par snang ngo // dri chab dang / yungs kang /
191a8: gyis gtor na lus slar rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mtshan mo'i ri lu bsregs pa lam gyi bzhi mdor bzhag nas yungs kar gyis phyogs bzhir gtor na mar me 'bum phrag bye ba snang ngo // kun nas phyogs bzhir chu dang yungs

191b1: kar gyis bzlog par bya ba yin no/ / tshal chen po'i mtha' dang / nad du gtor la shing gcig la ri lu gtsang ma bzhag na shing dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / 'dab ma dang / lo pa thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar snang ngo // ri'i rtse mod/
191b2: mar me bus nas ri kun du gtor na ri kun nas gcig tu 'bang shing mched par snang la sems can thams cad kun nas ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rkun ma dang / g.yon can dang / gnod byed dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
191b3: dang / spang ba dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra thams cad dang / sngar sems can nas ri dgas gtum po dang / bya la sogs pa'i bar ri la gnas pa rnams de'i mtshan mo// nyid phyogs bcu kun du bros shing ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra
191b4: 'byin to/ / spos char gyis bzlog par 'gyur ro// gzugs brnyan gyi steng du gtor la/ gtsang ma'i ri lu 'bar bar bzhag na gzugs brnyan thams cad gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur te/ spos chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog par 'gyur ro//
191b5: mar me'i ri lu shar phyogs kyi sgor spang ste gnas gtsang mar bzhag dkyil 'khor gcig byas nas gtor ma'i cho ga bum pa bkang ba bzhag/ grong khyer kun du yungs kar gyis gtor zhing don yod pa'i rgyal po yang dran
191b6: par byas na grong khyer kun nas mar me'i phreng ba 'bar ba gcig tu snang ngo / / grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir dkyil 'khor gyis cho ga byas la shar phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs na gang grong khyer na gnas pa skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang /
191b7: bu mo de dag thams cad dga' ba chen po rgya che bas tshim par 'gyur ro// grong khyer de nas gang sdang ba'i sems can phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra dang / chom rkun dang / g.yon can dang / gnod byed dang / glegs tshol bar gyur pa/
191b8: gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / mi ma yin pa gang yang rung ba grong khyer de na gnas pa de dag lang long du gyur cing gdugs la ngu zhing ha ha zhes sgra 'byin cing grong khyer gyi sgor byung nas phyogs

192a1: bcur rab tu 'thos so/ / zong khyer de yang kun nas gnod pa med cing 'khrug pa med par 'gyur/ 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ mtshadan
192a2: 'das nas spos chu dang / yungs dkar gyi grong khyer sgor gtor zhing dbang bskur na bzlog par 'gyur ro// // 'phags pa doran yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// bam po bcu dgung / ldong ros dang / zing shing gyi
192a3: phye ma dang / yungs kar dang / la hA trail dang / a ka'i 'om dang / la gu'i 'o ma dang / gcig tu sbyar ro// 'i mig bris pa dang bcas pa dang / na gabras pa dang / pad ma'i chub rnams kyang lhan cig tu phye ma zhi ba sor bya'o// byes snga ma lags
192a4: par sbyar la chus ri lung byas pa dang / phye las gzhan yang bcang do// bye mas 'di dang pad ma chen po'i phye ma bcad pa lhan cig tu bsres pa'i phye mas lus bskus la phyogs bzhir yungs kar gtor te ri lu bar bcug la zhes byab
192a5: bsdams te brjod na de'i lus las chu 'dzag cing de kho na bzhin du rna ba gnyis kyang rdzas kyi chu 'byung bar snang lus las spos kyi rigs yid 'ong ba rab tu sregs par byed pa 'byung ba ni nang thams cad grub par snang ste/ rgyal ba'i phyag
192a6: bzhir do/ / yungs kar gyi phye ma blangs ten mamakha' la gtor la ri lu lag pas bskor dmar chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// ri lunam sa pa' la 'phangs nas mi 'bab po// g.yul chen po 'byed pa'i nang dbye sa yungs dkar dang
192a7: bsres te ram mkha' la gter la ri lung yang khar bcug ste/ / steng du ltas la hUMzhes pa'i sgras bos la/ gnas lugs chen po 'bab ste/ yid mi 'chad pa dang sdug bsngal ba skyed par 'gyur// chu'i nang du zhugs te phye ma gtor la
192a8: yungs kar dang / ri lu chu'i nang du gdab par bya/ phyogs bzhir yungs kar gtor te/ trai las lus bskul na krung chen po'i gzugs su skad do// ri lu dang yungs kar me'i mdog lta bu chu dang bsres pa'i yungs kar dam mkha' la

192b1: gtor na 'brug sba chen po 'byung zhing glog chen po gsal bsnang bar 'gyur ro/ / chu'i nang nas byung nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// khron pa'i nang du btab na chu lung nas phyogs kun du chu 'bab par 'gyur ro// rdza ma'am// bum pa'am
192b2: rje'u'am/ ril ba b+h+ri garA'am/ ril khA la phye mas byugs te/ de'i steng du yungs kar gyis gtor na chus bkang skye khrus byas na de chu 'bab par snang zhing de'i snod ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gzhar yang dgos pa mang po byed de
192b3: mchog tu grub pa yin no/ / de nas ri chen po'i cheng du 'bru mar gyi rgyal pos byas te 'bru mar gzhan dang / de bzhin du til las 'bru mar gyi rgyal po de bzhin du sbyar ro// lag pa ga pa gzhags de ga mad+mo kyang shes pa bya'o/ gnag thams
192b4: dro shes pa bya ba ni nang sar bzhin du jam par 'gyur shing skang cig de nyid la mtho ba dang / dma' ba ji ltar yid la 'dod pa bzhin du ri yang 'gyur ro// snying po thur ma 'dra ba dang / zlum po'am/ yang na lcug ma lta bur byas pas ka ba yang 'dud pa
192b5: dang ri yang dma' ba'am/ yang na mthong por 'gyur bar byed do// yungs kar dang pad ma chen po'i phye ma lhan cig bsres pa 'bru mar gyi rgyal pos bsgos pa phyogs bzhir kun tu gtor na ri thams cad mi sdang zhing 'brog
192b6: dgon par snang bar 'gyur ro/ / yang na mi bgrod par mi nus pa'i ri'i rtse mon seng ge dang / stag gis gang ba lcug ma dang tsher ma can gyi shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba'am/ rngub pa'am/ dum bu'am/ khong stong du snang bar 'gyur
192b7: ro/ / Ni ste rig sngags 'chad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang ri bo ta la'i gnal med khang mthong bar 'dod na de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhag bdun gyi bar du nas kyi'o thug gi zas zos te gtsang ma shin du sa
192b8: byas dgos sa ma bags pas ri'irigs pa du zhugs la/ sa phyogs gtsang ma'i gnas der shing dri zhim po'i me sbar bal yungs kar phye ma dang bsres pa 'bru mar gyi rgyal po dang sbyar la 'bras sob dang bsres pa stong rtsa lu /

193a1: 1// zhag bdun du dus gsum du sbyin pasreg bya'o// lha bshos dang gtor ma dkar po 'bul lo// de na pa rig sngags 'chang gis chos brgyad la nyin zhag cig bsnyung ba bya shi 'grus pa Na ma thos sna gas kyis lub/
193a2: bskus gos bzang po gtsang ma bgos te/ 'brumar gyi rgyal pos rang gi lus bskus phye mas lus byugs mig sman gyis mig brkus/ thig le byas la nor bus mgo bcing zhing mgul ba dang / lag pa dang / dpung pa dag rka
193a3: par yang bcings la yungs kar dang mtshal bsres pas ri'i phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya/ pad mchen po'i phye ma de yang phyogs bzhir gtor rang gi lag pa g.yon pas zhags pa dang / pad ma bzung zhing g.yas pas rnam tha
193a4: lta ba snang ba dang / don yod pa chen pos dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya bzung ste don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo lan cig bzlas brjod byas na ji ltar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo sde bshad pa las bstan pa de ltar ri po ta la'i gzhal med
193a5: khang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang de yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs su snang bar gyur to// ji ltar ri bo ta la'i gzhal med khang bzhin du ri de la yang gzhal med khang snang ste/ ri de la rin po/
193a6: che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs snang ngo // me tog sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang snang ngo // sA la dang / tA la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / a sho ka dang / a d+hi mug ti ka dang / ba ri sha ka dang / ka dam pa dang / nI la dang khA Ta la dang / ba lA sha
193a7: dang / mu ngam 'ab ra dang / dong ka'i me tog sa tshogs dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / taran dang / na ba ma li ka dang / krung byag/ ma tshogs snang bar 'gyur po/ Tha'i tshigs rna tshogs kyis legs par zan pa dang / ri dgas kyi tshogs pa tshas kyis
193a8: gang bsnang bar 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe phyir bsru ba byed par 'dod pa de'i tshe gnas gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs pa sna tshogs la rang gi blo gros la ji ltar snang ba bzhin bya'o// dgos pa thams cad larab tu sbyar ba ni/

193b1: blags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// // don yod pa'i chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga gsang ba'o// // don yod pa'i sgyu ma rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba sgrub pa'i cho ga ni/ de nas de'i
193b2: 'og tu phyag rgya bri ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ rtags mtshon phyag rgya'i de nyid ni// pad ma rgyas dang sna tshogs mtshon// pad ma kha ni phyed bye ba// phyag dag na ni rab tu 'dzin// phyag gnyis dran kyang nas kyang // bsku
193b3: pa'am 'dzin stangs de nyid kyis/ kun nas phreng bar 'bar ba'i rtagra// mtshon cha phyag rgya bsdams pa ni// 'di lta ste// ral gri dang / mdung thung dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje
193b4: phre zlum dpa las kyi rdo rje dang / zur gsum ma zhes bya ba dang / 'khor lo dang / drung dang / thob dang / zhags pa dang / dgra d+ha dang / dbyug zo dang / me tog gi thum po dang / bum pa gang ba dang / rin po che'i snod dang / pad ma'i phreng ba dang / rdo rje'i phreng zlum dang /
193b5: pa la'i phreng ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / pad ma dang / uta pa la dang / zla ba dang / ri ba dang / me long dang / gru dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / be tson dang / gshin rje'i be con dang / chu srin gyi kha dang sngags de'i phreng ba dag mas/
193b6: rtse gsum pa'i phreng zlum dang / bsdigs pa dang / bsgyings pa dang / dbugs 'byin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / mchog sbyin pa dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / glegs bam bsnams pa dang / ma khar sa li dang / lhung bzed dang / gdugs dang / dbu rgyan dang /
193b7: nor bu rgyus pa dang / gser srud dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / gan bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / na cha dang / me'i thab khung ngo do// kun na 'bar bred phyag rgyad// batshog rmad du byung bas smras// mtshon cha sna tshogs bsdams pa yi/ pad ma 'dzin la rab tu gas/
193b8: ras la bris pa 'am dkyil 'khor ram/ rtsig pa 'am gang yang rung ba la/ tshon rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// gang du bris pa mthong ba de// ngan 'gro sems can dmyal bar ni/ phyir yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang gis rtag mchog sbyin

194a1: sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ / gang zhig nyes byas mi zad pa// mtshams med lnga po byed pa nyid/ mnar med pa'i gnas dang ni// dmyal ba gzhan du gzhol ba dag/ phyag rgya de dag mthong tsam gyis// 'gro ba thams cad zad par/
194a2: 'gyur skye dang 'chilas rnam par grol// 'khor ba'i chu mtshorgol par 'gyur/ de dag skye ba byi mar ni/ phyir yang mngal gyis mi thos te/ yang dang yang du pad ma las/ rdzus te skye ba dag tu 'gyur / rtag tu bde bcan du 'gro// gang na 'dren pa tshe
194a3: dpag med/ bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar rtag tu bder/ skye 'gyur the tsom mi za zhing // don rnams bde bar 'grub 'gyur zhing / rig sngags sna tshogs bde bar 'grub/ bde bar dkyil 'khor 'grub 'gyur zhing / rtag tu mi ldogs gnas 'gyur//
194a4: phyag rgya 'di dag mthong tsam gyis/ sangs rgyas byang chub dang mnyam 'gyur// dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ bla med dge rtsa bskyed par 'gyur// 'dzag rten 'di dang pha rol du/ sod nams phung po chen po 'thob/ de nas dkyil 'khor rab
194a5: bgad pade nyid 'grub pa'i phyag rgya rnams/ 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du// dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin// sdig pa thams cad modo la sel// ga shig mtshams med byed pa dag/ mi bzad mnar med gnas pa yi/ sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/
194a6: dmyal ba'i sgornams pacad nas ni/ mtho ras tha kyi mi med// blo phye byar ba rnams la ni/ sangs rgyas dadeng rnams snang bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa// mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba ma
194a7: kyis sems can gyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di mthong na sha 'bos pa'i mod la bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// kyil khor zhugs pa tsam gyis gang na bub pa dzin pa 'di pag med pazugs pa'i po brang du phyu
194a8: la gapapa mar ro kyil 'khor grub nigam pa la/ / na dpa tshan mdzes par bya// grub na ga la na cam la// sgo bani sem smras pa'i yis rgyan shin sa legs par bzlas dang san/ jas zhing mkhyen la mnyam pa'i// sa yi cha

194b1: sa ga ma gas pacan sa / / la gag pa/ b+h+ya Sh+Ta mabar bya// phyags pas can mnyam pas// dbus das dkyil bang myal yan// rtsuban pa la ldan sa ban du/
194b2: rnam pa dang mdung rtsa gsum pa'i phreng ba rnam par bye'o// gru bzhi pa'i dbus su phyag na don yod pa'i nags pa'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba bla na med pa dang / phyag rgyan gyis brgyan pa tshan gyi snga tshogs kyis bri'o// bus kyi
194b3: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi gnas su phyag rgyatho pa yang shin tu 'byas par bya'o/ / dkyil 'khor kun nus gas dang bdan dang / rgyal mtshan gyis brgyan la kun du yungs kar ga/ tso ga phyag rgya'i dkyil 'bar kyi byar
194b4: gnas su phyogs bzhi kun du bya ba ni ba lang gi lcibs dang bsres pa shin du leg par byugs pa dang ldan pa la tshon rtsi'i bye mas kha khyer gyi rnam pa dang / kun nas pad ma'i phreng ba rgya chen po dang / mtshon cha bris la 'di'i sgo yang rnam par phyes
194b5: par bya'o/ / ji ltar phyag rgya dang 'thun pa'i ro snga tshogs kyis gtor ma bzhag par bya ste/ phyag rgya re re la yang mchod yon phul la/ dbyib mo dang / phu ba dang / bum pa dang / kha bor dang / rje'u gtor mas bkang la gzhag go// kun du bum
194b6: papagang ba dang / bdug spos kyi ni snod dag dang / me tog 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / gtor ma dkar po dag gis bkang // me tog rnam par bkram byas la// kun du phreng bas bzhag par bya// phreng ba bzang po bzhag nA kyang / de bzhin
194b7: ban rgya drug gos dngul/ a kI rba nga / can da dang / dra drun dang/ sa la ka dang / snreg nga ku gus dang / ma kyi bog dang / myong shing dang / gtsu nga / gzung gyi bdug pa'i dgags bdugs la// gtor ma dang / matog dpa
194b8: bshos la lo/ / phyag rgyu dkyil 'bor du 'jug pa sa don yod pa'i rgyal po dra par byas te bsko la phyag rgya'i kyil 'khor la phyag rgyathams cad la me rtog pa'am ning matog gtor ro// gang phyag rgya di yon nyidags

195a1: ba 'di dang phyag rgya'i dkyil lakhor 'di bsgrub pa la sngar gang dgos pa la sngar dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang bcas pa la mchog tu mdzes par byas la/ phyisi las thams cad bya'o// rig sngagra 'chang ba gtsang ma yis gtsang pa/
195a2: na gas pagos pa ji lta dkyil 'bor tshig pazhin/ kyil 'khor du gzhag par bye// ji lta dkyila' ba la dgos pa// de shin du ni las bya'o// phyag N+DI dkyil 'khor sna med pa/ kyil khong 'di ni zhugs ma gyis/
195a3: grub pa snang mdzad kyis gsungs pa'i// spyi sa rigs ni thams cad // phyag rgya dkrigs dang gtams rnams kyis// dam tshig kun du shes par 'gyur// spyi rigs kun gyi tshig le// dam tshig rjes zhugs de bzhin ka dkyil la
195a4: kun tu zhugs pa dang / rgyal bas lung ni bstan par 'gyur// san gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa'i// phyag ni skyib 'dog par mdzad// chos kyi ron bdud rtsi 'i// gze brjid mod la 'jug par 'gyur// nam snang mdzad gsungs
195a5: dkyil 'khor sa/ dan yod dngas grub sgom par mdzad// phyag rgya'i kyil 'khor kyang bzhugs pa// kun du mi rigs rnams kyi// don yod dngas grub mchog gyur ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba gang gA'i klung gi byam
195a6: khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur ro/ / bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ yon tan gyi phan yon 'di dag de ni tshe 'di yin par
195a7: khong du chud par bya'o/ / bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran zhing 'od zer bye ba 'bar ba'i lus dang ldan zhing tshe bskal lab rgya stong dpag tu med par 'gyur
195a8: ro/ / yon tan thams cad dri ma med par snang ba don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ gang ting nge 'dzin thob pas sgyu mchen po lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul

195b1: ston par byed do/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lha'i spyi'i rigs de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
195b2: kyar gyichen po dang / mi dang / y-in pa thams da ga sa gyur pa rtags rdzas su drang bar gyur ga// sa sa rgyab dang / byang chubs las byung bams kyis kyil 'acor byong ba gcigs das pazung ga sa
195b3: pa dag sra ba mdzad par 'gyur ro/ / sems can thams cad kyi bzhin phra shing marjod pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro// la bapo btsun po dang / 'bo dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchod pa'i 'ib chen por 'gyur ro// sems can
195b4: thams cad gcig tu bla mar byed par 'gyur ro/ / nad thams cad med par 'gyur ro// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// mtshan mabri ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// de nas sbyin bsreg gi cho ga'i dkyil
195b5: 'khor bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnam dag gi/ de nyid bsgrub sa gyu kyi/ spyi yi rigs rnams thams cad kyi// cho gzhib mo bla med yin// gang gis sbyin bsreg byas tsam gyis// phyogs kun rnam par gzis
195b6: ba yi/ de bzhin gshegs gnas byon 'gyur zhing / byang chub sems dpa' dgongs par 'gyur// rig sngags dngos grub rjes stsol cing // rtag tu srung ba mdzad par 'gyur// mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs//
195b7: the tsom med par myur du pyon// mgon po 'khor bcas gnas nyid na/ rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur// 'dod pa thams cad cag tu sdom// rtag tu mchog ni sdom pa nyid// nyin dang mtshan du rtog par ni// rnam par
195b8: gzigs 'gyur the tsam med/ dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ba ste/ dkyil 'khor gru bani shin du mdzes par bya ba ni rgya chen po ko la'i tshad tsam la/ legs par blugs pa shin tu 'jam pa/ shin tu gsal bgru bzhi sgo bzhi dang

196a1: themaskas bzhi dang ldan pa/ rnam par dpyas pa mchog tu mdzes pa dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por yang bya'o// me yi gnas kyi dkyil 'khor ni// gru bzhi nyid kyi rnam pa la// kun nas them skas bzhi dag dang / steng
196a2: dugrA ni bzhi pa bya rtag tu pad ma'i snying po dang / / snying po rgyas pa'i steng du yang / kun nas b.rab ma mdzes par bya// grA g+ha ra pad ma'i phreng ba bya// de bzhin du grwa gnyis kar rdo rje pad ma dang bcas pa'o// gsum pa mdung rtse gsum
196a3: par pad ma dang bcas pa'o/ / bzhi par 'khor lo pad ma dang bcas pa'o// lnga par bum pa gang babazhag go// sna tshogs tshon gyis rnam mdzes pa'i// kun nas 'dab ma'i myu gu bya// rin chen snod ni bkar ba dang // me tog phreng dang dang bdang
196a4: bye ba pa dmar bcas pa dang / / de bzhin me tog rigs dag nyid// de bzhin sna tshogs rgyan brgyan pa'o// nub kyi gnas dang grwa dag tu// pad ma'i 'dab ma u ta pal bcas// bum pa du rabs bkang ba bri// rtsa ba'i bum pa dbus ma la/
196a5: 'dir ni kha khyer thig kyang gdag// de nas dkyil 'khor mdzes bya ba// thig gis kun nas cha mnyam zhing / sgo bzhi mdzes par bya ba ni// tshon sna lnga'i skud pas gdab// me 'bar mdog can bri ba ni// kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba can//
196a6: grwa dang grwa ni me lha bri/ lus ni me mdog 'bar ba dang // lag na me 'bar 'dzin pa dang // mtshan ma sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang // cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga bzhin// ba dan mda' dang sna lnga yi// skud pas
196a7: bum pa gang kris dang / / de bzhin bdug spos snod dag gis// kun nas dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya// sna tshogs gzugs can rgya che yi// sna tshogs ro yi gtor ma bzhag/ rje'u dang kham por rnam gsum gyi// dkar pos
196a8: bkang ba bzhag par bya/ / rdze'u dang dbyib mo bum pa ni// gtor mas bka pa kun du gzhag/ 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag/ kun nas me tog dgram bya zhing // phreng ba sna tshogs gzhag par bya// 'bras yo sa yungs

196b1: ka gtor nas ni/ / kun du mar ma 'bar ba dang // sna tshogs dri dang bzhin du// dri yi bye ma lha bshos dang // dkyil 'khor kun la gzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad la// thugs gzang dur rab rtag tu gzhag
196b2: shing ni a rka shi mi dang / / yungs kar 'bras ni so ba dang // zhun mar dang ni mar dkar dang // kun du tsan dan dkar po dag/ sbyin bsreg cho gar 'dir gzhag ste// dus gsum rtag tu rigs 'dzin gyis// sbyin bsreg brgya rtsa
196b3: brgyad nga bya/ rig pa 'dzin pa gtsang ma yi// gtsang ma yi ni gos bgos la// dkar gsum gyi ni zas bza' zhing // gzhan ni bza' dang spyad mi bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni nub sgo nas// dkyil 'khor shes pa 'jug bya zhing // dang b+hi'i
196b4: stan la dkyil dkrung du/ / shar phyogs kha bltas 'dug par bya// byams pa'i sems la mnyam bzhag ste// don yod rgyal po dran bya zhing // snga dro'i dus su sbyin bsreg bya// gung la slob ma gzhug bya zhing // spyi yi rigs
196b5: kyi bsreg lugs ni/ / phye ma breng dus su bya ba'o// gang zhig dkyil 'khor du zhugs la// sbyin bsreg dkyil 'khor de nyid dang // grub pa kun du cho ga yi// bdag nyid dbang bskur me kun gyi// sbyin bsreg byed pa'i mchog tu gsungs// kun
196b6: du gnas ni thams cad na/ / rgyas pa gnas 'jog rab gcig dang // gang ge de bzhin phur bu dang / mnan 'don pa me lha ni// sbyin bsreg byed pa 'jig rten par/ mtshungs shes ston pas lung bstan to// 'jig rten 'das pa'i las sgrub pa//
196b7: dag 'dzin dbang po chen po dang // phyag na rdo rje tshangs pa dang // khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen po dang // mnyam pabs kyang lhag pa nyid// maM yis sbyin bsreg byed pa la// de bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis rnyob// gal
196b8: zhag bdun dus gsum du/ / del sogs pa'i las rnams ni// mel sbyin bsreg byed pa la// mod la mngon shes lnga thob ces// de sad 'jog rten 'dren pa gsung // las ni byas nas de nas ni// sbyin pasreg la ni

197a1: brtsam par bya/ / bsreg lugs sbyin pa sreg byas tsam gyis/ las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// lha rnams rtag tu 'ong 'gyur zhing // de bzhin gshegs kun dgyes par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'
197a2: byo nas ni/ / yong la mthong ba'i sbyin par mdzad// sdig pa thams cad sreg par 'gyur// shin du mi zad sngon gyis las// bsreg lugs tsam gyis mo la bsregs// 'bar ba'i me yis phye le ba bzhin// de la sogs pa'i sdig
197a3: page theg gyur 'di the tsom med/ / sngang ba'i phyir ni nos nyid dang / dag shing yi ni ba ba dang // lus cadag ni thams cad la// rtag tu dga' bar byed ci gnas/ ga tu me yi lta nyid de/ rgyun tu mthong bar 'dod pa yis/
197a4: mel sbyin bsreg byas tsam gyis/ me lha nyid ni bzhugs gyur te// rtag tu las nis thams cad mdzad// rgyun du phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur lhani rtag tu 'ong bar 'gyur shing // thams cad du ni mthong ba skyed// rgyu skar zla banyis dang // gshin rje dang
197a5: nichu lha dang rgyal po cheg po bzhi po dag/ dpung bcas gzhon par bcas pa yang / nyin dang mtshan du rtag par ni// rjes 'breng bsrung 'gyur the tsom med// ci ste rig sngags 'chang don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po sgrub par 'dod na rig sngag
197a6: 'chang gtsang ma des shin du khrus byas la gos gtsam bgo bar bya/ / nyin zhag gcig bskyed pa bya zhing // shing a rka'i yam bsreg shing gi me sbar la pad ma dang / zhun mar dang / 'bras so ba'i sbyin bsreg brgyad brgya byas nas
197a7: bsreg zugs lan cig byas pas mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yang grub par 'gyur te/ / 'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dngos grub 'dod na rig sngags
197a8: 'chang des byang chub kyi shing gi me spar la rigs spyir pad ma dang / uta pa la sngon po dang / yungs kang dag yod zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin pasreg brgyad brgya byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob ste/

197b1: thams ca cagacan bzhib mo dang // sbyin pa sreg chen pa'i chogar 'gyur ro// nas pa rol gyi dam ga chags gnas par 'dag rig sngags bachad ga cad mdas gan du blas byas la gas gtsang ma pags te med lde gas
197b2: spang la zho dang / zhun mar dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul gyi bsreg blugs kyis spyan pasreg brgyad stong byas na dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dgra gzhom par 'dod
197b3: pa dang dpung gzhig par 'dod na de nas rig sngags 'charang gri shing kar ba ka'i me spar la/ sbrul gyi lpags pa brjes pa dang / ske tso'i sa bon dang / lan tshwa 'bras sa lu dang bsres pa yungs mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin bsreg byas na dpag tshad stong tshun chad
197b4: gyi ngol gyi dmag tsho ga dang / dgra gnam lcags chen po dang / rlung grang mo 'bab pas phongs pa dang / yid mi bde ba bskyed par 'gyur// gra thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// klus char 'bebs par 'dod na reg sngags 'chang des nyin zhag gcig
197b5: bsnyung ba byas la/ shin du khrus byas pa gtsang mas dri sna tshogs dang / me tog phreng ba dang / yungs kar dang / sha ta bus pa zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin bsreg mtshan gcig la dus gsum du byas na klu'i rgyal pos char gyi rgyun chen po 'bebs ste/
197b6: 'dzam pa'i gling mtha' dag tu zhag bdun gyi bar du char 'bab par 'gyur ro// char de nyid ha cang ches na thal ba nam mkha' la gtod na ma ma ches pa 'chang bar 'gyur ro// yang me lha 'ong bar 'dod cing rang gi gzugs su mthong ba 'dod na rig sngag 'chang
197b7: gtsang ma nges gos gtsang ma bgos la nyin zhag gcig gan par gyur bas shing sna ma'i me spar la 'bras so ba dang / zhun mar dang / bung ma sha khar dang bcas pa dang / tsha ba gsum dang / sna ma'i me tog bsreg pa brgyad stong sbyin pasreg bya'o/ brgyad stong tsha
197b8: padang me lha me'i nang na lus phyed phyung ste 'dug na rig sngags 'chang la cib gyi bka' stsol cig ces zer zhing ji ltar rig sngag 'chang gi cho ga'i don du 'gyur ba de bzhin du spro/ tham cad sbyin pa the bya ba mchog thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba bdud rtsi 'bar ba sbebya

198a1: ba'i me'i kha/ kha'i mchog sbyin par byed do// gang bdud brtsi 'bar ba'i me'i kha thob pas gang du dbugs phyung ba dang / rngubs pa der me 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang du phu zhes byas pa der me 'byung 'gyur ro// mun gnag
198a2: du dbugs phyung na me 'bar te/ snang bar 'gyur ro// tsan dan dkar po'i sbyin bsreg stong rtsa rgyad byas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi gzugs ston par mdzad do// sa bon bdun gyi sbyin bsreg gis nad thams cad
198a3: zhi bar byed do/ / bras so ba'i sbyin bsreg gis ni rgyal po dbang du byed do// phub ma da lan tshwa'i sbyin bsreg gis ni zhes 'gras par byed do// bras yos dang yungs kar gyi sbyin bsreg gri ni sems can thams cad dbang dbyed do// yungs kar
198a4: dang gu gul dang zhun mar gyi sbyin bsreg gri ni gnod sbyin 'gugs so/ / ka rabi ri'i me tog dang / gu gul zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin bsreg gri ni srin mo 'gugs so// de bzhin du 'dir las tham cad byed do// sbyin bsreg gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// ri mo'i
198a5: dkyil 'khor gyi bsgrub pa'i tshig bshad par bya ste/ kun du thun mong bsgrub 'i mchog/ dge ba'i las kun byed pa ste// sangs rgyas thams cad mthong 'gyur zhing // bla med bsod nams chen po sogs// don yod rgyal po de nyid ni// rnam pa sna tsho ga gzugs dag
198a6: 'jig rten 'dren pa snang bar bya/ 'thun dang dngos grub sna tshogs pa'i// 'jig rten 'dren pa'i gzugs bya ba// grub pa sna tshogs byed pa'i gan// so so'i gzugs su bya ba ni// ras sam yang na dar dag la// 'jigs pa med pas gzugs bya'o// don yod pa yi
198a7: rgyal po ni/ khru gang tsam gyi tshad dam yang na tshad shin du rnam pa 'byed pa pad ma'i mdog lta bu phyag brgyad pa/ dbu gsum pa/ de bzhin du spyan gsum gzhi ba'i zhal du bri bar bya ste/ de bzhin du zhags pa 'dzin pa dang / pad ma 'dzin pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang /
198a8: ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / be con dang dbugs 'byin pa dang / bgrang phreng dang / me tog zlum po 'dzin par bya'o// g.yon tu ni dkar mo'o// g.yas su 'phags ma sgrom ma thal mo sbyar la dbu yid tsam 'dud pa rgyan thams

198b1: cad kyis brgyan papo/ / bapags pa stan ras gzigs nga phyug gi rab pa'i thang chugs can/ dbargyan po dpag med kyis pas// g.yas phyogs kyi da zlabal pas ban+d+ha nAg/ ridags kyi lcags pa bu /
198b2: pamachod phyir thogs pa// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa// 'od 'domag dang ldan pa'o// nang rim du pad mi 'phreng ba'o// rim pa gnyis par rdo rje phreng ba lcags kyu dang bcas par bya'o// rim pa gsum par ne bu rin po che'i
198b3: phreng ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs mdzes pa'o// rim pa bzhi par mdud rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba'o// rim pa lnga par kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba'o// steng dang g.yas phyogs kyi gnas su dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen pa dang me/
198b4: tog sna tshogs thogs par bya'o// yon du gzhon nu dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / dbang phyug dang / lha'i bu rnams bya ba ni me tog sna tshogs thog par bya'o// lha mo sgron ma'i rgyab du khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags pa bya ba ni
198b5: khros pa/ gtum pa'i gzug 'chang ba/ phyag bzhi pa 'bar ba'i nang du bajugs pa/ sku rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ral pa 'chang gi'o dadapag med kyi dbu rgyan can// spyan gsum ga/ g.yas pa zlabs spyan cing ral gri 'dzin pa dang / zhagra pa 'dzin pa dang / mdung
198b6: rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa dang / dgra sta 'dzin par bya'o// dkar mo'i rgyab tu rig sngags kyi rgyal po dbu gsum pa bya ba ni zhi ba'i zhal ras can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dbu rgyan rgyal po 'od dpag med can thogs pa/ pad ma 'dzin pa/ nor bu rin po che
198b7: 'dzin par bya'o/ / 'og tu po nya mo dang / dbyangs can dang / drung can ma dang / dpal mo dang / gnas ma dang / dpe med ma dang / ral pa gcig ma dang / pho nya mo zhib dang / lo thog gi g+ha dang / sa'i lha dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o// steng
198b8: dang / g.yas g.yon du sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs skyil mo dkrung bcas pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad tsam bya'o// nyi ma dang / zla ba'i lha rgyu skar dang bcas pa bya'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi phyi rol rim pa kun du phyag rgya dang / phyag mtshan sna
198b9: tsherje rdzogs par bri'o/ / zla rgyan bya zhing kun nas 'bar ba dang bcas par bye'o/ rig sngags dngos grub bla med pa'i// ri mo'i cho ga'i gnas 'di na// sdig pa thams cad mod la sel// mtshams med lnga 'amyod ba byed// phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor dang

199a1: bcas pa grub pa 'di ni spyi'i rigs thams cad du 'jug pa ston pa yin no/ / phyi'i rigs thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi ri mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang
199a2: b+hin gyis brlabs pa'o/ / don yod pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi ri mo 'di ni thub pa rnam par sdang mdzad kyis brlabs pa ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i de kho na nyid snying por gyur pa de khon nyid gsang rab 'dri mthong ba tsam gyis rnam par thar pa 'thob
199a3: cing lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ / mthong ba tsam gyis cho ga zhib mo bla na med pa thams cad 'grub bo// rnam par snang mdzadang khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan par snang ba bye ba ga dgA'i klung gi bye ma brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu mngon sum/
199a4: du mthong bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags chog bla med pa// spyi rigs yang dag 'byung ba ni// thub pa rnam snang mdzad kyis bstan// de bzhin gshegs rigs grub pa dang // gang yang pad ma'i rigs de bzhin// nor rigs de nyid 'byung ba dang // rdo rje'i
199a5: rigs gang bla med pa/ / spyi rigs 'di nyid mthong ba ni// ri mo mthong ba'i khyad par yin// phyir yang ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing // dmyal ba ngan 'gro'i sgo bcad de// mtho rigs kyi ni sgo yang phye// bla na med pa ston pa yi// phyag rgya'i ri mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di//
199a6: bsod nams bla na med pa yin ci ste don yod pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des tsan dan dkar po las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa sor brgyad kyi tshad tsam la/
199a7: gnad kyi gnas kyi cha'i sor tshad shin du rnam par mdzes pa/ dbu dang / mgur dang / ked pa dang / pus mo dang / yan lag dang / zhabs kyi tshigs dang / phyag sor gyi tshigs dang / sen mo thams cad mnyam zhing mdzes pa dang / ral pa dang / sen mo tshang ci
199a8: mdzes shing cod pan gyi rgyal ba'i g.yas phyogs na zlag ma zhi ba'i gzugs can spyan gsum pa/ phyag bani shin du mdzes pa dang / dbu sra shin du mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ zhags pa 'dzin pa gcon//

199b1: pa'od dpag med can phyug na pa dam bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa mdung ca gsum pa dang / dbugs 'byin cing rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad pa// pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o// sgrol ma dang / dkar mo yang 'od 'dom gang dang bcas
199b2: par dgod do/ / mgon po shin du mdzes pa/ nor bu dang / mu tig gi rgyan gyis mtshams su gser gyi rgyan gyis g.yogs pa'i cod pan nam/ yang na spyi gtsug tu ring bsrel gzhag par byas la/ tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing
199b3: gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga bur gyis mchod la dkyil 'khor gyi snying po 'di'i dbus su pad ma ge sar dang bcas pa'i 'dab ma sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa bris la de'i dbus su 'jigs pa med pas 'jig rten dbang phyug dar gyi cod pan gyis
199b4: bcings pa bzhag la/ a ga ru dang / tsan dan gyi bdug pa dbul zhing me tog dgram par bya/ me tog gi phreng bas mchod par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa shin du khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas bskud ba byas la mgon po
199b5: 'jig rten dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs par skyil mo dgu bcas te 'dug la mchod yon dang / lhab shos yul la byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom so// sems can thams cad la brtse bar
199b6: gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang bsgom zhing shin du yongs su spyad pa legs par spyod cing gzhan 'jigs pa med pas bdag bsrung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba bsrung ba dang bcas pa yang byas la bzlas brjod de nyid
199b7: snying rtsa brgyad dang / phyag rgya yang stong rtsa brgyad brtsams na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'bar zhing g.yo ba dang / bdag kyang 'bar ba dang / snying dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigam dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin
199b8: bar mdzad pa'i phyag spyi bor bzhag ste/ legs so legs so// rig sngags 'char khyod kyis mchod padam pa dang / gsang sngags kyi cho ga chen po byas so// bsgrub pa dam pa byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi rigs 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs

200a1: pa'i rigs thams cad kyi chog zhis mogasang ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi chog dang / thams cad du spyi'i dngos grub rig sngags 'char khyod la 'grub gyis khyod kyis don yod pa'i nags pa'i skyeng po rjes su zung shig dang /
200a2: rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa de lta 'dod pa dang / mchog thams cad ji ltar yid la bsams pade thams cad rjes su sbyin no// 'di ni khyod kyi skye ba'i 'khor ba za ma yin te sde ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang mngal du gnas pa
200a3: yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ / reg sngags 'chang khyod shi 'phos nas bde ba can 'jig rten gyi khams su pad ma las skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ mngon sum du chos nyan
200a4: par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar tshe'i tshad bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med grangs med bgrang du med par 'gyur ro// zhes tshig tu gsung ngo // de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po me tog gam/ cod
200a5: phan la mngon par gtor na/ des na 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug rang gi skur bzhugs te/ rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro zhing don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo//
200a6: yangs pa chen pos rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// sku gzugs bsgrub pa de kho na nyid ces pa 'di gal te rig sngags 'chang skal pa chung ba mnar med par gzhol ba/ mtsham
200a7: med pa lnga byed pas de lan cig nges par bsgrubs pa tsam gyis mdun du rang gi gzugs kyis nges par mchis par bgyi'o/ / gal te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la sdang bas khrag dbyung
200a8: bar sems bskyed pa des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i byin gyis brlabs de rig sngags 'chang bsgrub na rmi lam du bdag gi gzugs mthong

200b1: bskul bar bgyi zhing yid la bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ / mchog thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi zhing sdig pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par bgyi'o// dri ma med par rnam par thar pa'i 'od zer gyi
200b2: dkyil 'khor la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ / sang nas 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'as chen po gcig pur 'gyur ro// skye bo thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba chen por 'gyur ro// sgrib pa dang bral zhing rnam
200b3: par dag pa/ sgo kun du dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i lus yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag gis de mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral zhing nyon mongs
200b4: pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ / gdol bas kyang dad pas dang / gus pas sgrub pa rnam pa gsum dang / tshig gzhan gyis kyang nges par yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ rang gi gzugs kyis mthong ba stsal tha/
200b5: bgyi na/ mir gyur pa dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba sdom brtson can gyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ dran pa tsam gyis bdag rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par bgyi zhing yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ste/
200b6: 'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de lta mod kyi bcom ldan 'das sems can tshe gcig brub de la rig sngags bsgrub pa'i dngos grub rjes su stsal bar bdag gis rngo ma thog lags so// gang yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'o
200b7: dus na dge slong dag dang / rig sngags 'chang ba'i sems can ser sna can/ sems gya gyu ba gnyis su mi byed pango gnyis can/ sar sna can/ byas pa mi gzo ba/ pha rol gyi rdzas la brkam chags can/ gsang sngags rku ba/ yi ge rku
200b8: ba/ gdug pa// phrag dog che ba/ khengs pa/ gzhan gyis rdzas 'phrog pa/ mkhan po dang slob dpon phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor ston pa'i bla ma la ma gus pa/ rig sngags kyi tshi ga zhib mo 'di ston pa la ma gus pa nyid rkam chags

201a1: can/ byas pa mi gzo ba nyid dag 'byung ste/ sems can de dag la bskyang bar bstan pa 'am/ dngas grub bstan par rngo mi thogs lags so// bdag nyid la yang brnyas par bgyid pa'i sems can de lta bu mang du 'byung ste/
201a2: bdag la yang sun par bgyid pa/ bdag la yang ma gus par bgyid pa/ kun nas mnar sems can dang sdang bas khrag byin par bgyid pa dag 'byung ngo // bdag la yang 'khrug par bgyid pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gas
201a3: ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / spyi'i rigs kyi dam tshigs sun par bgyid pa'i sems can de ni smad par 'os pa zhes brjod par bgyi'o// rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo dang / dam tshig kun nas 'joms par bgyid pa'i gdol ba zhes rig
201a4: par bgyi'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / gsang ba dang // / dkyil 'khor kun nas
201a5: 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / gsang ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o// de dag gis bdag la smad pas sems
201a6: can de dag gi sdig pas gdol ba zhes bgyi ste/ dge slong dag dang / rig sngags 'chang de dag ni smad par 'os par rig par bgyi'o// tshig bka ba tshe/ ba lta bu/ rig sngags nyams pas log 'dren gyis zin pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad
201a7: kyis smad pa zhes bgyi'o/ / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa chung gzan pa/ rig sngags nyams pa/ dmyal bar gzhol ba de dag ni bdag gis ma nongs te/ bdag gis yongs su spangs pa ma lags so// de lta mod kyi
201a8: dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su spangs pa/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su spangs pa/ rdo rje'i dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya thams cad spangs pa/ thub pa

201b1: rnam par snang mdzad kyi mtshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig yongs su spangs pas bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / sdang ba thams cad kyis zin cing nad kyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ba de dag ni bdag gis
201b2: mnongs te/ bdag gis yongs su ma spangs so// de lta mod kyi rig sngags bsregs pa/ dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig bsregs pa/ phyag rgya byed pa dang bcas par bsregs pa/ gsang ba sregs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam
201b3: tshig dang rigs sun par byed pa/ sdig pa'i dge slong mang po de dag ni des na bskal pa mang ba rdul phra mo bsags pa'i bskal par sdug bsngal nyams su myong ste/ 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol gyi bde ba can med do// de lta bas na
201b4: sems can rig sngags kyi ched du rig sngags kyi rjes su sems dpas byams pa'i sems su bya'o/ / gang gi drung du phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / rig sngags gsang ba rnyed par 'gyur ba de la des gus pa chen po dang /
201b5: bla mar bgyi pa chen po bskyed par bgyi/ pa dang ma dang 'dra ba'i sems bskyed par bgyi/ pa dang ma'i gus par bgyi/ ston pa'i gus pa bgyi/ rang gi sha dang / khrag dang / rkang yang btang bar gyi/ gos dang / rgyan dang / btung ba dang /
201b6: snyan pa dang / bgo bas rim gro dang / mchod pa bgyi ste/ de la ni bdag gis mchod par bgyi// rjed pa dang b+h+ra mar brtsi'o// rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi// dran pa tsam gyis kyang bdag gi gzugs mthong ba rjes su phul bar bgyi/
201b7: rgyun du rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ bdag rgyun du rjes su 'brang ba ni ji ltar chags kyi nang du til mar gyi thigs pa stsal ba ltar dngos grub kun du mchi bar bgyi/ rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs bzhin du thams cad du mchi bar bgyi'o// bdag
201b8: gis zhags pa dang / lcags kyus dmyal ba thams cad drang bar bgyi/ bde bar gshegs pa'i lam la so sor gzhag par bgyi/ stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid chen po 'jug par gyi/ thams cad du bsgrub pa dang / dngos

202a1: grub mchog stsal bar bgyi'o/ / de nas tsan dan gyi gzugs 'di mthong bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi gzugs mthong ste/ de mtshungs par 'tshal bar rabagyi ste bdag ni rang gi gzugs kyis rgyun
202a2: 'o nar gnas par bgyi'o/ / gang na chog 'di gnas pa de mchod rten dang bcas par mtshungs par rig par bgyi'o// sa phyogs de ni ston pa bla ma bzhugs pa'i gnas su rig par bgyi'o// gang na dus gsum du gshegs pa'i
202a3: spyi'i dam tshig gnas pa 'di sangs rgyas kyi gnas so zhes rig par bgyi'o/ / de gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba zhes rig par bgyi'o// lha thams cad kyi gnas dang dam tshig go zhes rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs
202a4: po'i rigs thams cad kyi gnas byang chub kyi snying po dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang dag par ston pa'i gnas so// zhes rig par bgyi'o// sa phyogs 'di rin po
202a5: tshe sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang gi gnas bkod pas brgyan par rig par bgyi ste/ de la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de nas de'i 'og tu gnas thams cad du gtogs pa'i dngos grub chen po sgyu ma chen po'i rnam par
202a6: 'phrul pa'i gnas byed par 'dod pa dang / dgos pa thams cad byed par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des dri sna tshogs las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs sor bcu drug pa shin tu mdzes pa/ sku shin tu tshang dang
202a7: ldan pa/ phyag drug pa/ de bzhin du zhal gsum pa bya ste/ dang po ni zhi ba'i zhal ras can tshangs pa'i cha byang 'chang ba/ spyan gsum pa ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ 'od dpag med pa'i dab rgyan 'chang ba/ zlags can no// zhal
202a8: g.yas pa ni khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs can/ gzugs bsgyur ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral ba'i thor tshugs kyi steng gi ral po la 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ zla ga ma g.yas phyogs na gnas pa'o// g.yon pa ni zhal khro ga nyer

202b1: can/ khros pa'i lta stangs su lta ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral ba'i thor tshugs 'chang ba/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ g.yas phyogs zla gam can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis legs par brgyan gzhags
202b2: pa thogs pa/ pad ma thogs pa/ mdong rtse gsum pa thogs pa/ dgra sta thogs pa dbugs 'byin pa/ rin po che'i dbyug pa thogs pa/ pa da mi'i gdan la btsugs pa'o// g.yas na lha mo sbrel mthal mo sbyar cing 'dud pa'o// g.yon na dar
202b3: mo thal mo sbyar te yid tsam du 'dud pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bya'o// zhabs kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ lag na me tog thogs pa/ 'phag
202b4: ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la la ltas nas pus mo btsugs te 'dug par bya'o/ / mtshon rtsis tshad dang tshad ma 'dres par spyan dang / smin ma dang / chu dang / sen mo'i gnad kyis gnas su sbyang bar bya'o// //
202b5: 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// bam po nyi shu pa// de nas rdzas bshad par bya ste/ 'jigs pa med pas spos kyi rigs tsan dan dang / ta ga ra dang / pu shel ci dang / lo shi dang / nag bus pa dang / sprika
202b6: dang / rgya skyegs dang // kha ba ra Ni kha dang / spang spos dang / nal da dang / gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / sgron shing dang / gnad bri yang ku dang / kun du ru dang / sha kha ra dang / pad ma ge sar dang / du rus ka dang / til mar dang /
202b7: sgra tshil dang / lhan cig sbyar ba'i phye ma zhib mo shin tu 'jam par/ shin tu mnyen pa/ mchog 'dig tsang ma gtsang sbra spyod pas thub pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge shing shin tu dul ba/ rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par shin
202b8: tu mdzes par bya'o/ / gsang sngags brgyad bstong bzlas brjod byas pas/ lan gcig bsgrubs pa ni mchog yin te/ 'di yongs su rdzogs nas kho bo'i rgyal pos thams cad la mngon du gtor te/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis

203a1: las brtsam 'o/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur par gos gtsang ma bgos te/ shin du khrus byas la dris byugs pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi shin du mdzes pa gsal ba/ ko la'i tshad tsam gyi dkyil 'khor bzang /
203a2: po legs par byugs pa shin du gsal ba bya'o// dri sna tshogs kyis byugs pa shin du 'jam pa la tsan dan dkar po dang / gur gum gyis dbus su las kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba bri bar bya'o// 'dir ni pad ma yang bya ste/
203a3: 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa ge sar dang snying por bcas pa shin du mdzes pa/ shin tu bzang ba/ tsan dan dang gur bum gyis bri bar bya ste/ der tshon rtsi gzhan ni spyad par mi bya'o// bum pa spos chus bkang ba dang / de bzhin du dri chu
203a4: dang / gtor ma dang / gtor ma thams cad dri sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa dang / ci yod pa'i gtor ma bzhag ste/ de nas 'dir dkyil 'khor bya ba ni gnas sam dgon pa'am// khyima'am gang du gnas par gyur pa der khrugang tshad
203a5: des khru ro'am khru gsum 'am lhag par yang bya'o/ / de bzhin du bdug spos dang / tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / ru rus ka dang / kun du ru'o// ba dan kha dog sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan par bya'o// me tog phreng ba
203a6: dgram zhing / dri dang byug pa de nyid dang / kun du mang me'i phreng ba'o// de nas dri las byas pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad ma'i ge sar gyi steng du bzhag pa la/ rig sngags 'chad mngon
203a7: ru phyogs par dkyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas gzhan mi smra bar bzlas brjod brgyad stong brtsam par bya'o/ / brgyad stong rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung zhing cher
203a8: gol bar 'gyur rang gi lag pa g.yas pa 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ / gzugs brtan las rig sngags 'chang legs so// khyod kyis 'dod pa'i las thams cad grub bo// dan yod pa chen po'i 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul

203b1: ba'i dngos grub dang / thams cad du dgos pa grub pa de kho na nyid grub bo// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di mchog tu grub bo// khyod kyis sgrub pa'i cho ga rgya cher mchog tu grub bo/
203b2: zhes sgra 'byung ngo // de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dgos pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ji ltar dgos par bya ste slob ma gzhug pa dang / dam tshig ni 'dir dgos pa zhes bya'o// de nas
203b3: rig sngags 'chang gis gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe dri las byas pa'i mgon po la sngar mchod pa bya ste/ de nas dgos pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
203b4: mdun du bzhag la/ bzlas brjod brgyad brgya byas na dgos pa sna tshogs rmi lam du ston cing ji ltar bsams pa thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// de'i mdun du tsan dan dkar po las dkyil 'khor
203b5: byas la/ tsan dan dkar po'i sbyin bsreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// de nas thal ba la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ rang gi lus mtha' dag khyab par bsku zhing / thal ba de nyid dang / yungs kar gyi
203b6: byug pa phyogs bzhir gtor na 'jog rten dbang phyug gi gzugs ji lta ba de ltar 'jig rten thams cad kyis mngon sum du mthong ste/ ji srid du phyir bsdu ba ma byas pa de srid du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi
203b7: gzugs su snang bar 'gyur ro/ / dri chu dang yungs kar gyis mngon du gtor na gtor na phyir bsdu ba byas par 'gyur ro// thal ba des rab tu bdugs te drang khrod kyi nang du zhugs na 'byung po'i dpung dang 'khor dang

204a1: bcas pa mdun na nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad mdun ni nye bar gnas shing dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ bdag dang nor gyis bgyi ba ci mchis shes bya ba
204a2: byed do/ / rang la byugs te/ tshogs kyi nang dang / dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na ston pa mthong ba ji lta ba de ltar rig sngags 'chang snang zhing mthong ste/ mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro// phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur don dang mchod pa
204a3: chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ / thal bas lus bskus te kwa'i yo shugs na klu'i rgyal po stong phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas te bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par
204a4: 'gyur ro/ / rang la byugs te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po btsun mo dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur te/ ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed cing mdun na nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten
204a5: bla ma ji lta ba de bzhin du mchod pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ / don chen po dang mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ ston pa 'dren pa ji lta ba bzhin no// gang dang gang la thal
204a6: bas reg pa tsam gyis de dang de'i nad thams cad bral bar 'gyur sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / shi 'phos nas
204a7: bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ / byas pa mi gzo ba/ gsang sngags kyi gdol ba ma gus pa/ bla mar mi byed pa/ rlom sems can/ nga rgyal dang ldan pa/ bdud kyis phyogs pa skyes bu gti mug can/
204a8: bsogs pa la zhen pa/ khengs pa/ nga rgyal can/ de dag gis gang du yang dngos grub yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / de dag yun ring por thar pa mi rnyed pas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems/

204b1: dpa' dang / gang yang rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis smad pa/ skye ba brgyad par rang gi rgyud la dngos grub bsregs pa 'jig rten 'ang dang pha rol tu chud gson pa dag ni ma gtogs te de lta mod kyi 'dir bdag
204b2: gis cung zad kyang ma nongs te/ sdug bsngal mang po dang chen po'i sems can grol ba rngo mi thog lags so// sangs rgyas thugs rje chen pos bka' stsal pa'i yid la bgyi ba bskal pa bgrangs par yid la bgyid phra/
204b3: dgrol bar rngom thog lags so// de lta mod kyi sdug bsngal mang po brgyud par nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// dngos grub ni byams pas 'thob ste/ byams pa dang gsang sngags kyi go cha bgos pa/ byams pa'i
204b4: ral gri thogs pa/ sems can thams cad la phan zhing mnyes gshin pa la de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag 'jig rten 'dren pas rjes su gnang ngo // mgon po 'di mthong ba tsam gyis spos kyi gzugs kyi
204b5: 'jig rten mgon po mthong ba dang / 'jig rten 'dren pa rang gi gzugs su mngon sum du mthong ba mtshungs pa nyid du khong du chud par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas bye ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang / mnyam pa mngon sum du
204b6: mthong baban dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po mthong ba mtshungs pa khonar khong du chung bar bgyid ste/ 'di ltar shes par bya'o// de nas phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas rig sngags 'ching gi 'khor los sbyar ba chen po sgrub par rna
204b7: pa'adag slong ma/ gas kyi pa'am rigs kyi bu mo'am/ rnam pa ni gas 'chang ngas/ gzhan gang yang rung ba'i rig sngags 'chang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'dod pa dang / dus gzum
204b8: gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'ad pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas mthong bar 'dod pa dang / rig sngags lang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad mthong bar 'ad pa dang / 'bagasas

205a1: rdo rje 'dzin mthong bar 'dod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i dam tshig mthong bar 'dod na chog 'di bsgrub par bya ste/ snying po dang bcas/ bya ba dang bcas pa des myu ba dang / shin du myurab
205a2: dang / mgyogs par 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du tsho 'phrul chad du 'byung ba gsang bston par stong mthong ste/ 'di la sa ma ni dge 'a du bskyed par mi bya'o// bac+doMm dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de nas rig
205a3: sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser gyi mdog can sor bzhi'i tshad tsam/ tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ rol pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa bya ste/ shin tu tshad dang ldan pa/ cha byang mdzes
205a4: pa/ cha shin tu rnam par mdzes pa phyag gnyis pa/ spyan gsum pa/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan can/ g.yas na zla ba tshes pa/ phyag g.yon na pad ma dang / ril pa spyi blugs bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas mi 'jigs
205a5: sbyin pa/ sku'i nang ga bur dang / gla rtsi dang ring srel gyis bkang ba g.yas na lha mo sgrol ma dngul las byas pa thal mo sbyar te/ yid tsam 'dud pa/ gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan po dang / g.yon na dngul las dkar mo thal mo sbyar te/
205a6: yid tsam 'dud pa pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o// steng gi g.yas phyogs na 'od dpag med dkyil mo dkrung bcas te bzhugs pa dang / g.yon na shAkya'i rgyal po dkyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa dgod par bya'o// 'od 'dom
205a7: gang dang bcas pas legs par brgyan par byaning / / gnad dang gnad shin tu rnam par dbyas pa/ sgra dang / bral ba dang / srin ma dang / shang sa dang / stan dang / zhas dang / mgul ba dang / dpung ba dang / nu ma dang / rked pa dang / brla dang /
205a8: dbus mo dang / byin pa dang / zhabs dang / phyag gi sor mo mnyam zhing thams cad du mdzes pa/ sku chu zheng gab cing mthon dman ran pa/ mchod phyir dkar po thogs pa 'chang ba bya'o// las shin du yongs su rdzogs shing / shin tu

205b1: mthar byin pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs zin par rig nas/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rgyu skar bzang po'i zla ba nya'am/ tshes brgyad dam/ bcwa lnga 'am/ bcu gsum 'am/ bcu bzhi
205b2: 'am/ zla skar bkra shas pa rgyal gyi nyi ma dang 'thun pa rnyed nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor shin du mdzes par bya ba ni gru bzhi la cha legs par phye ba/ ko la'i tshad tsam la themasas bzhis brgyan pa/ khru
205b3: gsum par rnam par dbye bar bya ste/ chung ba dang lhag par ni mi bya'o// legs par byugs pa shin du 'jam pa/ snyib mnyen pa dbyibs legs pa la tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par dbye zhing dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab pa ni
205b4: shin tu rnam par mdzes pa/ sgo bzhi pa la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying por pad ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor bri'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su cha rnam pa brgyad du phye la
205b5: lho'i grwa'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs tshon sna tshogs kyis bri'o/ / de nas byang gi grwar bri ba ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra bar bri'o// de nas nub kyi grwar bri ba ni nor
205b6: bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra bar bri'o/ / de nas shar gyi grwar glang po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rtag tu shin tu mdzes pa dang / shin du gsal bar bri'o//
205b7: shar phyogs kyi sgor ri bo tal me tog dang shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa ri'i lha dang bcas pa bri'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor ri rab klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bos kun nas dkris pa dang / sum bcu rtsa
205b8: gsum pa'i ris kyi lha bri'o/ / byang phyogs kyi sgor ni spos kyi dang sdang dri zi'i tshogs kyis gang bshing ljon pa sna tshags kyis shin du mdzes pabri'o// baphyogs kyi sgong nga tis b+hanas kyi gnas me tog na tshegs dang / 'bri zhi dang shing sngon pa rna tshogs mchog gis nas

206a1: tu gang ba bri'o/ / legs par zin nas kun du ni mdung rtse gsum pa'i bar phreng ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje'i rigs nyid gzhag go// nor bu'i rigs su de bzhin gshegs pa
206a2: gzhag cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / thams cad du rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhag na spyi'i rigs 'grub po// lha mo sgrol ma ni ri bo ta la la bzhag go// ri rab la ni gos dkar mo'o// dpe med ma ni ti se'i rtse mor ro// sgrol ma bdun ni
206a3: spos kyi ngad ldan la bzhag go/ shar phyogs kyi sgor pho nya mo zhi ba pho nya mo bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor ni srin mo ral pa gcig ma srin mo bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje lu gu
206a4: rgud lu gu rgyu de bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o/ / byang phyogs kyi sgor khro gnyer can mo khro gnyer can bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o// de nas 'jigs pa med pas mgon po 'jig rten gyi bla ma'i gzugs gser gyi mdog can ring
206a5: bsrel dang ldan pa don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po pad ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor du bzhag par bya'o/ / grwar rgyal po chen po bzhi stobs po che go cha bgos pa drag shul gyi gzugs can/ mtshon cha 'bar
206a6: kha thogs pa bzhag par bya'o/ / gang zhig thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sprul pa/ spyi'i rigs yang dag par 'byung ba don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam 'phrul pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa dang bcas pa/ don yod zhags pa rnam
206a7: bar 'phrul pa bsgrub pa'i ched du chog sna tshogs dran par bya'o/ / sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ rnamatha dkyil 'khor de nyid ni// legs par sgrub pa mthong tsam dang // blags pas dngos grub bla med 'gyur// de bas rtag tu yas/
206a8: pa yis// bsgrub par byed pa mi mkhas so// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa shin tu khrus byas pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pas dar dang pa dan sna tshogs bzang pos dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya'o// re bri ba'i mchog rgya

206b1: chen pos snod sna tshogs legs par bkang ba dang / gser dang dngul gyi snod du mchod yon dbul zhing ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag par bya'o// gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i kha zas kyi gtor ma gzhag par bya'o// de bzhin tu
206b2: 'bras bu sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o/ / gzugs sna tshogs pa'i kha zas kyi gtor ma yang bsgrub po// me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang ba dang / bum pa dang / rje'u dang por zlu ma dang kham phor dang / dbyi ba
206b3: mo dag kyang dgang ngo / / kun du dri chus bsgos pa yi// rgya chen gtor ma kun du'o// sna tshogs pa yi pog phor nas// sna tshogs bdug pos dbul ba ni/ a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / sprig ka dang / du ru sa ka dang kun du ru dang / gu gul dang /
206b4: sgron shing dang / shri be Sha ka dang / sar dang / sar dza ra sa dang / de bzhin du ga bur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur gum dang / sha kha ra kha'i bdug spos 'di dag ni rab tu phul/ thams cad du sgrub pa bla na med pa yin no// sna tshogs pa yi dri dag dang // phye
206b5: ma byugs pa sna tshogs nyid/ / shes rab can gyis kun du ni// dkyil 'khor dag la gzhag par bya// lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog dang / byi ru dang ni mu tig dang // in tra nI la dag dang ni/
206b6: pad ma rA ga dag kyang ngo // gser dang dngul gyi bum pa rin po che sna bdun can yang gru bzhir gzhag par bya'o// 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang bsres pas dkyil 'khor kun du gtor ro// kun nas me tog phreng ba ni/ rmad byung dkyil
206b7: 'khor la gzhag cing klan nas mar me'i phreng ba yang / dkyil 'khor rmad du byung la gzhag/ rig sngags 'chang nyid gzhag cing gnas par gyur pas yang bzlas brjod rgya cher byas la cho gas bsrung ba dang / phyogs bcings pa dang / kun
206b8: nas dkyil 'khor bcing ba byas la dkyil 'khor gyi las bya'o/ / de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ bla ma mkhan po'am/ slob dpon nam/ pha 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po la dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gsang ba bstan

207a1: te mgon po 'jig rten gyi bla ma mthong zhing dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba mthong nas phyag bya zhing mchod pa dang / me tog dang bdug spos dbul ba byas la bskor ba bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis thams cad la byams pa'i sems
207a2: mnyam par bzhag ste/ skyil mo bkrung bcas nas 'dug la mi smra ba ra ya mtshan du snang bar mthong gi bar du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byas la dkyil 'khor kun tu khro bo'i rgyal pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur zhing yungs kar dang /
207a3: chu dang me tog gis dkyil 'khor kun tu lan brgya rtsa brgyad gtor ba'i mod la rtag tu phyag rgya lan brgyad bcings la dkyil 'khor kun tu me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri phul nas mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa mthong na
207a4: don yod pa nyid mchod par bya'o/ / de nas mgon po phyag na rdo rje dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po bla na med pa mchod pa byed do// de nas lha mo sgrol ma dang / kun tu lha mo thams cad la'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la'o// de nas ri'i rgyal po
207a5: rnams la gnas pa'i ri'i lha thams cad la'o/ / thams cad dang sgo srungs la rtag tu mchod pa bya'o// de nas phyogs bzhi kun tu rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu mchod nas skyil mo bkrung bcas te 'dug la 'jigs pa med pas lag pa'i phyag
207a6: rgya bcing bar bya'o/ / byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa rtag tu dran par bya zhing sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom mo// gsang sngags brjod ma thag tu dkyil 'khor dang sa gzhi
207a7: g.yo zhing gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i mod la snying dga' ba dang / sems bde ba 'thob bo// 'od zer bye ba kha dog sna tshogs rnam par bkra ba 'byung zhing dkyil 'khor gyi snying po na don yod pa'i zhags pa 'gul bar 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor gyi
207a8: snying po 'bar bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i lha dang / lha mo thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur/ lha g.yo bar 'gyur zhing dkyil 'khor kun nas legs so zhe/

207b1: grag par 'gyur ro// de nas ji ltar gser bkod pa de ltar dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po dang / mgon po de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / 'phags pa sta na ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / sgrol ma dang /
207b2: dkar mo gser gyi mdog gis bkod pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang nas bzhengs par 'gyur/ skra gser mdog can gzugs bzang pos bdag nyid kyi rang gi bo ston pa snang bar 'gyur/ phyogs bcu kun du rtab du gzigs par 'gyur ro//
207b3: thams cad du rtag tu sems brtan por bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang byams pa dang bcas pa'i sems brtan por gyur pas me tog dang rol mo'i sgra dbul zhing don yod pa'i rgyal po yang dran par bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas
207b4: phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad cing rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag dang / dkyil 'khor
207b5: dang phyag rgya rim par phye ba grub ste/ skyes bu dam pa khyod bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyis khams su lung bstan gyis rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis yongs su dag nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
207b6: rgyas kyi bar du skyes bu dam pa khyod rang gi ngo bo phyir mi ldog pa dang / don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur bar byos shig/ dkyil 'khor 'di la brten pa'i skye bo dge ba dang lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa sems can
207b7: thams cad bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das par lung bstan gyi bar tu phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ / ji ste sems can ngan pa rig sngags kyi gdol pa smad pa dag der zhugs na gzugs brnyan las khrag 'dzag cing sgra mi zad pa 'byung ste/ mgon
207b8: po 'di mi mthong sa 'di yo bar mi 'gyur dkyil 'khor 'di 'bar bar mi 'gyur te/ de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang la rmi lam du ston te de nyid kyang gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// ji ltar mngon sum pa de bzhin du rmi lam ston cing 'di la bsams pa thams

208a1: cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / de lta bas na rig sngags 'chang gis legs par rtag cing so sor brtags te/ sems can dkyil 'khor du zhugs par bya'o// sgrub pa po bden par smra ba dang / dbang po yang dag par bsdams
208a2: pa/ sems can thams cad la byams pa/ sems can thams cad la brtse ba can/ gzhan la yang dag par smra ga tshig brtags pa dang pa can/ gus pa dang ldan pa nyid/ mar 'dzin pa/ phar 'dzin pa/ dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu gus pa/ rtag tu
208a3: bla ma la gus pa nyid kyi sems can 'di dag gzhug par bya'o/ / rab tu bag yod pa dang / rtag tu gtsang zhing gtsang sbra dang ldan pa dang // kha zas ngan pa dang / lhag ma dang / 'bags pa dang / 'dres pa dang / gcig tu sres pa dang / chung zad bkrus pa dang /
208a4: chang dang / sha dang / kun dong dang / sgog skya dang / ki'u dang bsres pa'i kha zas dag spang bar bya zhing / rang gi kha 'phro yang spang bar bya'o// lhag ma ni rtag tu spang bar bya ste/ 'di dag sgrub pa'i cho ga la dran par bya'o// lag pa 'bags pas gdod la
208a5: reg par mi bya/ lhung bzed dor bar mi bya'o// rtag tu 'am phyed phyed du gcod pa dang / mchog tu 'phags pa 'di dag nam yang bza' bar me bya'o// gtsang mas zas gtsang ma bza' zhing lag pa'i sor mo bsdams pas kha gdong la sogs pa la
208a6: mi reg par 'di dag za ba nyid ni mchog tu mdzes shing blo dang ldan pa yin no/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis las shin du yongs su rdzogs par byas shing dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba legs par rdzogs na de la khrag 'dzag par mi 'gyur ro// de nas
208a7: ' phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang bas rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa nas bzung nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du 'jug par mdzad cing shin du ni dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i nor bu nyid kyi mgul ba nas dkrol te rig
208a8: sngags 'chang gi mgul du 'dogs par mdzad do/ / spyi bor phyag 'jog par mdzad cing 'di la sras kyi thu bo nas gsungango // mgul bar nor bu bcings pa tsam gyi mod la de nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

208b1: kyi spyi'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig dang dkyil 'khor mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du rigs thams cad du don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rgyal po'i
208b2: cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor chen po rtag tu mngon du 'gyur zhing rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo nyid smin mtshams na 'dug par 'gyur ro// rgya chen po dri med par snang ba don yod pa'i ye shes rnam par 'khrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thos
208b3: gang ting nge 'dzin rjes su thob pas 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshe 'phrul ston par 'gyur ro/ / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang cho ga zhib mo dang / bsgrub pa dang / dam tshig dang gas ba thams cad
208b4: byi mthu chen po ston par 'gyur ro/ / don yod pa chen po'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rnam pa 'phrul pa thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i dam tshig gi byin gyis brlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig mtha'
208b5: yas pa thob ste/ gang dam tshig thob pas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang mtshungs par shes par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa ston par 'gyur ro//
208b6: de nas rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i bya ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug ring bsreb dang bcas pa de yang sa phyogs dben pa'i gnas gtsang mar gos gtsang ma'i gdan bsham
208b7: la de'i steng du bzhag par bya'o/ / a ga ru'i bdug spos 'bral zhing nyin gcig bzhin du nang bar sngar gzhan mo smra bar bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal pos mchod pa dbul bar bya'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gcis
208b8: dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan 'bar bar 'gyur te/ nyin gcig bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzugs brnyan smra bar 'gyur/ tshig 'byin par 'gyur ro// da ltar gyi bzhin du de thams cad smra bar 'gyur te// dge ba dang /

209a1: mi dge ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// tshe ring ba 'am/ tshe yongs su zad pa de thams cad ston cing smra bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po brnga 'am/ dgra 'thub pa 'am/ pha rol gyi dmag
209a2: tshogs 'thab pa 'am/ lo nyes pa dang / mi ngas dang / dgon pa dang / nad dang / na ba dang / gnon dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / grang ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba dang / ser ba dang / chom po'i 'jigs pa dang / rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang / can gzan
209a3: gtum po'i 'jigs pa dang / sprul gdug pa'i 'jigs pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / 'bras bu 'phel ba dang / 'bru 'phel ba de thams cad smra bar 'gyur zhing de'i thabs thams cad kyang rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// rig sngags
209a4: 'chang la nyin gcig bzhin du khyad par du gyur pa rnam pa mang po rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ / kha cig la bstan par mi bgyi ste/ sdang sems can rig sngags kyi gdol pa/ rkun ma byas pa/ mi gzo ba/ brlang ba/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'khub/
209a5: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'phrog pa bslab ma'i 'dod pa dang yang dag par ldan pa de dag gi lag tu bstan par mi bgyi/ rna bar bsgrags par mi bgyi/ skra'i rtse mo tsam du snang ba yang bstan par mi bgyi'o// cho ga zhib mo 'di ni yi ge'i 'bru gcig tsam yang bstan par mi
209a6: gyi'o/ / rjes su 'jug par mi bgyi'o// nas rig sngags 'char dngos thub mchog thob par 'gyur te/ mchog tu yid brtan pa/ rnam par thar pa mchog gi dkyil 'khor gsang ba thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi drung nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i rig sngags kyi dkyil
209a7: 'khor chen po lag tu 'thob par 'gyur ba de la ston pa dang / bla ma'i 'du shes bskyed par bgyid/ bdag dang 'dra bar mchod pa sna tshogs kyis gus par bgyid na bdag la gus pa dang bla mar gyis pa lags/ mchod pa dang rjed pa bgyid pa
209a8: lags so/ / de lta bas na dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas byams pa bsgoms pa dang / snying rje bskyed pas dngos grub chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// ji ste bgyi ba 'di las 'da' bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de la bdag gis rtag par rgyun

209b1: mi'i chad par dran pa dang / bdag brjod pa tsam gyis rang gi shin du yongs su dag pa'i rang gi ngo bos bdag mdun na mchis par bgyi zhing / yid le re ba thams cad dang mchog yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// ji ste bdag ji ltar dam bcas pa las
209b2: gzhan du byed na bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bslus pa lag so/ / rig sngags kyi gdol pa rkun mar gyur pa la ni mi bgyid de/ dam bcas gzhan du smra bar mi bgyid de/ rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu gtsang bar bgyi
209b3: rtag tu 'dzum pa dang / rtag tu byams pa dang / snying rje bsgom pa yid la bgyid na// de la bdag gis rtag tu yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur bar bgyi de dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad dang ldan par bgyi/ don yod pa yangs
209b4: pa chen po'i dngos grub rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba la/ rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs ltar thams cad kun du mchi bar bgyi'o// ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba
209b5: thams cad yongs su zad par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag dga' bas kun du mchi bar bgyi'o/ / sems can gang la byams pa dang / snying rje mchis pa'i sems can pha rol de rnams kyi bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o//
209b6: de bas na rig sngags 'chang gis shin du sdom pas bsdam zhing rig sngags brjod par bgyi'o// yongs su gtor ba'i lag par bgyi zhing spar chums par mi bgyi ste/ lag pa brkyang par bgyi'o// gtong ba mang bas de bzhin gshegs pa
209b7: dam tshig la gnas par gyi'o/ / sngar legs par spyad par bgyi stedon yod pa'i rgyal po'i spyod pabagyi zhing rtag tu yid la bgyi'o// de nas bdag dang chos kyi mchog la dga' ba zhes bgyi'o// rang gi gzugs brnyan bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o//
209b8: de nas khro bo'i rgyal po bshad par bya ste/ don yod rgyal po rmad byung che/ kun du dngos grub thogs med cing / dkyil 'khor kun la dbang bskur ba/ sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms/ bdud dang bgegs ni rnam par 'jig/ gnod sbyin

210a1: sri po gas ba pa/ / byung po thams cad rab tu 'bros// gdon gyi gtso bslong byed cing // sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms// sdang ba'i klurnams dam 'dzag cing // 'jigs pongs rnams la mi 'jigs stsol// rig 'dzin rnams
210a2: la grub stsol pa/ / don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub mchog/ dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas ston// spyi yi rigs ni rab ston pa// don yod spyi yi gsang ba ni// rtag tu gzhan min snying po nyid// khro bo'i rgyal po bla med pa// de ni/
210a3: bdag gis rab tu bshad// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i rgyal pos khro bo'i gzugs su gnas te sdang ba thams cad 'jigs par
210a4: byed par gyur cing lag na zhags pa thogs te khro bo 'di smras so/ / na maHsarba ta thA ga ta Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra badz+ra d+ha rI b+hA/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ ma hA pad ma ha ste/ ka la ka la/ ku lu ku lu/
210a5: ma hA swa ma pra bste/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra Ni shA tsa ra/ shwa ra e hwe hi/ bud d+ha bud d+ha/ d+hA bad+hU ba/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ba ba ra ma shud d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ma hA pa shu pa ti/ b+he Sha d+ha ra/ bA hA hI hI hAhA/ oM ka ra pra hA b+he Sha d+ha ra/ sar
210a6: sar kha ra bar/ ba ra rash+mi sha ta sa hasa?/ pra ti man tita/ sha rI rA dza ya/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ su ru su ra/ mu ru mur+ra/ sand ku mar/ rung dzibiSh+Ta b+ha sa gad+han da/ ri Shi na ya ka/ b+ha pra bi biH/ b+he ga d+ha ra/ d+hi ra d+ha ra/ sa man ta a ba lo kaH/
210a7: bi lo ka ti/ lA ka ta/ lA kAM shwa ra/ mA hwe shwa ra/ mu ya mu ya/ mu na tsa mun tsa/ b+han d+ha b+hanaH/ tra Tan ta ra dza na/ radza ta skar/ ag ni udaM ka/ pi Sha shasA pa ri m+bo tsaka/ kan kaH/ tsa la tsa la/ b+ho d+had ga/ tsatu rAr+ya bdas prakA sha/ tam
210a8: tam/ sa ma sa ma/ sa ma sa mas ma/ ma hA ta mAn d+ha kar pra sha man/ mi li mi laM/ A n+da yi/ tsam pa ri kar/ e h+ye hi/ ma ta ma ha Ta/ bi bud d+ha bi/ Sha ya/ ni bA sin ma hA ShA R+Ya Shi ka/ shwe tA yang tsA ba d+hita/ rang nam kuta mA lA d+har/

210b1: sarbad nyagar sa kr-ita/ kar bu mas mad+ha grags bya// da pA miSh+Ta/ par thar // sa nusas// pa bAT+Ta ka/ sa r+tha ma ra d+hi d+haH sam rtaka/ sa rba sa d+hA A shA par pU ka/ arbaNan tha man// sarba ta thAg ta mak+Shakar/
210b2: rtaka bA ra/ a mo ga radza hUM phaT/ na mo stud te swA hA/ khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags pa'o// oM bi kri ta dang Sh+Te a mo gA sa mA yA a biShi da n+ya man/ sarba bad d+ha a mo g+ha a b+he She ke/ hUM mi li mi li swA hA// de khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying
210b3: po'o/ / de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa chen po'i snying po gsungs ma thag du de nas ri chen po ta la rnam par drug tu rab tu g.yo bar brtsams te/ klu'i tshogs ni 'khrugs so// lha'i tshigs thams cad na dga'
210b4: bar 'gyur to/ / sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren ni 'bar bar gyur to// bdud la sogs pa sdang ba ni yang dag par rab tu zhi bar gyur to// ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad ni rab tu zhi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi lha
210b5: thams cad ni mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba thams cad dang / gdon thams cad ni mi snang bar gyur to// nad thams cad las ni rnam par grol lo// nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad las ni yongs su grol lo//
210b6: me tog gi char chen po rab tu bab te de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par gyur to// sems can thams cad ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur to// de nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
210b7: pa dang / dkyil 'khor la rten pa'i lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la tshig gcig tu legs so// zhes bya ba byin te legs so lags so// snying rje chen po can mchog
210b8: tu don yod pa'i rig sngags 'di slas zin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad dang / rigs spyi'i dam tshig dang / snying po dang / khro bo'i de kho na nyid gsang ba dang dkyil 'khor dang / bsgrub pa'i cho ga don yod pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil

211a1: 'khor du sros shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sdang
211a2: bshad do/ / dkyil khor gruba'i ba shin du mangs bko la'i tshing tsam shin du rnam par mdzes pa'i ba ni dang / sgo ba'i dang thamags bzhi dang / rta babs dang / mda'i 'a khyer dang / kun nas rdo rje'i rnam pa dag kya bya ste/ tshon gyi snga marba/
211a3: rnam par mdzes pa'i thig kyad kyis dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya'o// ri mo ma khan gtsang mas snod sar pa dang pir gtsang mas dkyil 'khor dam pa legs par bri'o// dkyil 'khor snying po rnam dbye ba// dbus su legs pa rnam/
