211a4: byel/ kun nas pad ma'i phreng ba'i dang // rdo rje mdud cig sum pa dgod// dbus su 'khor lo rta brib// shin du bsdu sdug 'khor lo dgod// dbus der rgyal ba gzhag par bya/ shAkya rgyal po de bzhin gshegs// g.yas su khro ba'i rgyal/
211a5: bo bi/ 'jig rten dbang phyug 'dren pa po// g.yon du rdo rje 'dzin gzhag pa// rnga yab rdo rje lag thogs gzhag/ de'i 'og tu 'od zer dang ldan par bya ba ni lcags kyu dang / dgra sta dang / go cha dang / dbyug pa dang / zhags pa dang / dgra sta lugu rgyud
211a6: can dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / glegs bam mo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu dkar sham chen mo dang / gos dkar mo dang / dkar mo chen mo ral pa can dang / dbyug pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs phyag na thogs pa
211a7: bya'o/ / de'i 'og tu srin mo ral pa gcig ma zhes bya ba ni mche ba 'jigs su rung zhing mi sdug pa sbrul se ral khar thogs pa/ phyag bzhi g.yas pa na rdo rje dang dgra sta/ g.yon pa'i sor mo gcig lha ma yin dang log 'dren la sngags shing khrag
211a8: 'dzag pa'i mgo'i tsa to nas 'dzin pa dang / khrag gi snod yongs su 'dzin pa/ glang po che'i lpags pa rlon pa'i stod g.yogs 'phyang ba dang / smad g.yogs can bya'o// mtha'i grwar pad ma dang rdo rje gzhag pa ni 'bar ba'i phreng ba can

211b1: shin du bzang po bzhag par bya'o/ / shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje 'jigs byed mig/ de'i sku 'bar ba'i phreng ba can bzhag par bya'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor ki li ki li zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i log 'dren de nyid rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa phyag mthong
211b2: par bya'o/ / nub phyogs kyi sgor pad ma chen po'i rigs mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i pho nya mo bya ba ni phyag na pad ma thogs par bya'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po'i rtse mo zhes bya ba'i tshogs rdo rje dang zhags pa phyag na rdo rje thogs pa'o// de nas 'jug pa'i skar
211b3: tsan dan gyi chu gur gum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga bur gyis bsgos pa'i chus bum pa bkang la ras dkar pos dkris shing rgyan gyis brgyan pa rin po che sna bdun can rtag tu gzhag par bya'o// ji snyed pa'i gtor ma sna tshogs yongs su bshams pas
211b4: kyang mchod par bya/ rnam par sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor legs par brgyan par bya'o// bdug spos kyis bkang ba dang / mar me'i phreng ba dang / me tog dang / dri dang / byug pas mchod par bya'o// ji srid 'jug gi bar du slob ma rnams tshogs bsrung la
211b5: de nas don yod pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byazhing don yod pa'i khro bas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ / dbang bskur ba tsam gyis kyang dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi mgon po'i byin gyi brlabs
211b6: kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig dang / dngos grub thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// gang bsams pa dang gang bcol ba de thams cad 'byor bar
211b7: 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du dang tshig thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro// dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / tsheg nib mo thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang / gdug pa dang / las kyi sgrub pa thams cad las rnam
211b8: par grol bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lha dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / gsang ba pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gi gnas phug dri ma med pa dang / nam mkha'i rjes su chub

212a1: dang / chun rgyu ba dang / nags dang / bskyed mes tshal spyod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los rmya ba'i drug chal thams cad du dbang du 'gyur ro// gsang sngags thams cad kyang 'di'i mang gzhugs par 'gyur ro// gang zhig de la me phan/
212a2: par 'dod pa'i lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa gang rig sngags 'chang la mi phan par sems pa de thams cad kyi de dag gi gnas dang lus
212a3: nyid rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir sdig pa rnams 'bab par 'gyur ro/ / de nas dngul la khro bo'i rgyal po song bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam byas te/ shin du mdzes pa/ shin du tshad dang ldan pa/ zhal gsum pa/ ral pa'i thod tshugs kyis brgyan cing rgyan thams
212a4: cad kyis brgyan pa/ rgyal ba 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbu rgyan can/ zla ba dbu la thogs pa/ zhal dang po khro bo'i gzugs g.yon pa dang g.yas bzhi pa'i gzugs zhal cung zad 'dzum pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ pad ma 'dzin pa zhags pa 'dzin
212a5: pa/ / ral gri dang mdud rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o// g.yas su lha mo sgrol ma me tog 'bul ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// g.yon du lha mo rig sngags kyis rgyal mo nor bu rin po che chen po 'bul ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// 'jig
212a6: tan dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang bus mo btsugs pa/ lag na po gaphor dang bzang phreng thogs te bcom ldan 'das la blta'o// gzugs brnyan de nyid kyi mdun du tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing gung gur gyes mtshad sa
212a7: bya'o/ / dkyi 'khor de'i steng du bro ba'i rgyal po bzhag ste/ de'i spyan sngar bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o// de nas gzugs brnyan de 'gul zhing g.yo bar 'gyur// 'chag par 'gyur/ 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshig 'byin par 'gyur/ legs so zhes
212a8: bya ba skyed par 'gyur/ phyag g.yas pa spyi bor brdeg par 'gyur/ yid la bsams pa dang mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'char de yang bdag nyid 'bar bar 'gyur/ nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur

212b1: zhing don yod pa yangs par snang ba/ dngos thub drim med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los ba smyur bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sbyang ba brgya stong phrag drug bcu rtsa brgyad po rnams kyi gtso bo dang
212b2: rgyal por 'gyur ro/ / tshe lha'i bskal pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro// bskal pa'i mjug rdzogs te de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang bya'o// ji ltar bde ba cad pa'i
212b3: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gzhal med khang gis rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur zhing tshe'i tshad bskal pa dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ / don yod pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang // cho gzhib mo thams cad kyi chos stod par
212b4: 'gyur ro/ / de'i 'og tu 'jig rten pa'i sgrub pa ni de nyid kyi spyan sngar bzlas brjod brgyad stong bya'o// bzlas brjod rdzogs pa'i mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khro ba'i rgyal po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na bzhugs pa/
212b5: 'gyur te/ 'jig rten pa'i tshe gzhib mo dang // gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / mig 'phrul dang / bzhad gang dang / phung bas gdab dang / bsreg pa dang 'phang ba dang / gsang ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / u0f7f
212b6: bsnyen pa dang / bdag bsrung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / mi snang ba'i cho ga smra ba dang / nor bsgyur ba smra ba dang / sa gzhi smra ba dang / rgyu ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / chu rgal ba dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon cha las na la ba dang
212b7: tshangs byed dang / rmugs byed dang / rengs byed dang / bcing ba dang / rgya mtsho chen po bskyod pa dang / raM langs bslang ba dang / shrI ba gso ba dang / zla ba dang nyi ma dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / bden pa bstan pa dang / nad la sogs pa thams
212b8: cad rab tu zhi ba dang / dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dgug pa dang / srin po dgug pa dang / 'byung po dgug pa dang / klu der lha dgug pa dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dgug pa dang / btang ba dang /

213a1: dgos pa la sogs pa thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyi mod la dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// blags pa tsam gyis las dang / dngos grub dang / bsgrub pa tham
213a2: cad ston par 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / sdang ba'i sems can thams cad phyir zlog par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyis mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur to// skal
213a3: pa ngan pa dang / nor chung za ba dang / mi 'khrugs 'grub pa dang / sdig pa'i rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / sgrib pa dang / sdig pa gzhig par bya ba la mchog tu grub pa yin no// khro bo'i rgyal po'i zhabs nas gzung ste/ bzlas brjod stong
213a4: rtsa brgyad byas na sngon bsags pa'i bsod nams dang / skal pa mngon du 'gyur te// tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du dpal chen po dang / che ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// zhal du bltas te bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na dbang phyug chen
213a5: bo'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ / rked pa'i gnas nas gzung ste/ bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas na sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par 'gyur rgyal po btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ bdag nyid dang
213a6: nor gyis ji srid 'tsho bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ / cod pan la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i dbul bcings na nges par dbang bsrung ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed pa/
213a7: mi bya'o// 'phags pa dor yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// bam po nyi shu gcig pa// / de nas phyag na rdo rje don yod pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshe 'phrul gyi lo kyi zil lo ying nam mkha' las babs nas/
213a8: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i mdun du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po dang / bkur sti mngon du bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgyad stong du bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag

213b1: 'aral te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te song nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa'
213b2: sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lha rdzas kyis mchod pa chen pos mchod pa byas so/ / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / thug pa dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab wub dang / sil
213b3: snyan dang / / pheg rdob pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod nas lan bdun bskor ba bya ba byas so// ri bo ta la'i gzhal med la na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
213b4: lto 'phye chen po de dag gis kyang mchod pa byas so// dkyil 'khor gyi lha de dag la yang mchod pa byas so// 'khor chen po de dag la yang mchod pa byas so// lhan cig lhags pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad la yang mchod pa dang / mngon du
213b5: bstod pa dang / phyag byas nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar 'dug par gyur to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje 'gying bag can/ brjid bag gi 'gros kyis langs nas/
213b6: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su song ste phyin nas rdo rje gsor zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba
213b7: bad nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug gi don yongad pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par bang ba'i kyi
213b8: 'khor gyi tshe gzhib mo 'di shin du zab pa/ shin du rtogs par dka' ba/ rgya mtsho chen po lta bur shin du zab pa/ ri rab chen po lta bur shin tu mi g.yo zhing mi skul ba// mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba/ shin du bzung bar dka' ba'i phyag rgya mang po dang /

214a1: gsang sngags mang po dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa mang po dang / ri mo'i sku gzugs brib mang po dang / bsgrub pa gsang ba rnam pa mang po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mang po dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzim
214a2: dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa'i klags pas 'grub par 'gyur ba mang po la bcom ldan 'das bdag mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur na ji ltar sgrub par rngo thog ji ltar nges par gzung bar rje thag lags/ gsang ba tha dad pa dang /
214a3: phyag rgya tha dad pa dang / dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa tha dad pa dang / ras kyi ri mo'i sku gzugs tha dad pa dang // gtor ma tha dad pa dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dang /
214a4: spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol pa dang / dgug pa dang / dam tshig dang / khrus dang / bsnyud pa dang / phyag rgya bcing ba dang / rab tu 'jug pa dang / bzlas brjod dang / sbyin sreg dang / slang gshegs su gsol pa/ nges par bzung ba 'am/
214a5: dran par bgyi bar rngo thog/ bcom ldan 'das rmongs pa chen po sems kyi spyod pa rmugs par gyur pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams sam/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams sam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge
214a6: skyosbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sa ma dmang rigs kyi rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyi don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di nges par bzung bar ji ltar rngo thog/ rig sngags 'am ded rnams kyis ji ltar bsgrub pa
214a7: rdothog/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying la mchog tu ya mtshan skyes pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis thetsom bcad pa'i slad du bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das the tsom bcad pa'i slad du zhus pa lung bstan du gsol//
214a8: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje dngos grub kyi spyod pa gsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs gas sngags bsgra

214b1: posgrub pa la gang gsadangs grub las dbugs phyung ba de'i cha blo chen po 'chen por 'bogs par 'gyur/ / ngos grub chen po 'grub par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i chen po rab tu skye bar 'gyur// dge ba'i rtsab chen
214b2: bo'i chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ pha rol du phyin pa drug gi dngos grub chen po'i chen po 'thob par 'gyur/ lag na rdo rje gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dngos grub gang gis bsgrub pa'i cho ga'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i dngos grub
214b3: dam pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gang la yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gyi byang chub kyi sa bon gyi 'bras bu thob pa yod pa de la lag na rdo rje dngos grub dam pa mchog tu 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu/
214b4: 'am// rigs kyi bu mo dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge/ sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan gang yang rung ba bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u
214b5: dang bu mo gang gi lag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ring bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gcig thob par gyur la des ring bsrel de za ma tog gi nang du bcug ste nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang khrus la sogs pa byed cing
214b6: du ba dang da / khras dang / zugs pa dang // phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mchod pa byed pa na lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang de dngos grub dam pa dang / mchog dang / bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang dang
214b7: gang du dgos par sbyar ba de dang der dngos grub chen po mchog tu 'gyur ro/ / ring bsral yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gcig la mchod pa byas pa de rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am dge slong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sa mdze'u
214b8: rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/ khye'u 'am/ bud med de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag ga dag klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa la skad cig gcig gis mchod pa byas par

215a1: thang na pa dang / gas pa dang / sod pa dang / phyag zus par bgyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi nganas pasod nanas kyi nga po dang ldan pa byung ba/ bzhin ga shegs pa de gagang / pa'i chub brgyad par 'byu
215a2: de dag gi drung du bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi drung du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan gang su yang rung
215a3: ba/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u'am/ bu mo de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//
215a4: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par 'gyur ro// shes rab dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i rtsa ba dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang chen po'i dngos grub dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i cho ga zhib
215a5: mo'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub dpag tu med pa thob par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib
215a6: mo'i rgyal po'i rig sngags rim par phye ba'i dngos grub dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / lag na rdo rje de ltar ring bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gcig la mchod pa byed pa de yon tan chen po'i chen por brjod pa'i rnam par 'phrul bI
215a7: byin gyi brlabs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin 'thob par yang dag par 'gyur ro/ / de ltar dngos grub chen po'i chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje khyod song la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
215a8: gzigs dbang phyug la yongs su dris shig dang / dris pa de'i lan ldon par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dga' ba dang / mthu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba bskyed nas

215b1: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgos phyag 'tshal te/ song nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
215b2: po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ lan gsum bshor ba byas nas bzhin 'dzum pa dang / gdong khro gnyer med pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mig mi 'dzums
215b3: par lta zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du 'dug nas rdo rje gsor zhing gdong du bltas te rtog cing 'dug go de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
215b4: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ / lag na rdo rje khyod mi g.yo bar mdun du 'dug ste rdo rje gsor zhing ngal ci zhig blta/ ci zhig yongs su dri bar 'dod/ ci zhig gsol ba 'debs par 'dod// lag na rdo rje deng
215b5: la smros shig/ lag na rdo rje khyod la skabs phyes yongs su dris shig dang / dris pa de thams cad lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
215b6: chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i tshi ga zhib mo'i shin du rtogs par dka' ba/ shin du zab pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag
215b7: bgyis pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang sngags mang po dang / phyag rgya mang po dang / dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa mang po dang / ras kyi sku gzugs brib mang po yongs su bsgrags pa 'di bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nges par gzung bar nus/
215b8: dngos grub ji ltar shes par bgyi/ rgya mtsho chen po lngar zabs che ba/ ri rab dang mtshungs par mi g.yo ba/ nam mkha' ltar mtha' thug pa ma mchis pa/ shin du rtogs par dka' ba/ 'di ltar shes par bgyi/ gnas ni gang / 'gro ba

216a1: ni gang 'byung ba ni gang / sgrub pa'i gnas ni gang / dngos grub dam pa'i gnas ni gang / snga ma ni gang / phyi ma ni gang / dbus ni gang / tha ma ni gang lags/ mang du yongs su zhu'o// dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / gsad
216a2: sngags dang / grub pa'i tshig dang / dam tshig so so dang pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga zhib mo// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis
216a3: phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po rim par phye ste rjes su gzung ba de nges par bzung bar ji ltar nus/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi the tsom chen po dang / mchog tu ngo mtshar tu gyur pa de thugs rje chen pos bdag la bka' stsal
216a4: du gsol/ / ji ltar grub na phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / ras kyi ri mo'i tshig mtha' dag nges par bzung bar 'gyur ba// the tsom gcad pa'i slad du'o// sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal du gsol/
216a5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje yun ring po gcig nas spobs pa gang zhing skyes te/ de la yongs
216a6: su 'dri/ lag na rdo rje nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o// gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni kha dog gcig pa/ rtags gcig pa/ chos gcig la zhugs pa/ dbyings dang / khams dang /
216a7: snying po gcig pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba gcig pa'o// de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje gang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni sangs
216a8: a zhidi sna tshogs pa nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sku tshe'i 'du byed sna tshogs pa nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang / lung bstan pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs

216b1: rgyas kyi 'du gatshogs pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshigs tshogs pa nyid dang gnan yangs sa rgyas kyikra sa dad pa nyid du dag par shes so// sa yod kyi laku rdo rje shin dru grags bstan ma gnasas nga d+ha/
216b2: gi snying po don yod pa'i zhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di yang gcig nyid las de thams cad du rjes su 'gro'o// sgyum lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs
216b3: kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis dngos grub kyi gnas dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i gnas/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la ji ltar ji ltar dul bar byed pa de lta de ltar dngos grub rjes su 'thob cing de
216b4: lta de ltar bsam pa dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chen pos bskyed par 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par
216b5: 'gyur ro/ / de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa sdu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag par 'thob par 'gyur ro// de lta de
216b6: ltar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin dang /
216b7: rnam par 'thor pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / stobs bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang chos la rnam par blta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri
216b8: pa med pa'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma rab tu grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin po che'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du blta ba'i 'od zer

217a1: gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi gtsug la rnam par blta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // yul la rnam par 'phrul pa kun du bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgron ma ra
217a2: ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shin du sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
217a3: 'gro ba yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma kun du lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yid gnyis yang dag par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du phyag rgya'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i ting
217a4: nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid la kun du lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du lta ba'i 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / pad ma bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yo
217a5: pa kun du lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya chen po dbugs 'byin pa don yod pa'i rin pa che'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung rgyan gyi ting
217a6: 'dzin dang / dbu rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad ma'i lcags kyu'i
217a7: ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang kunas 'dren pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i 'od zer gyi ljags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du lta ba'i gzi brjid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pa ni ma med
217a8: pa thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun du lta ba rab tu gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi gtso bo lnga bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin re re

217b1: yang 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa de thams cad rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / lag rdo rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par 'phrul pa 'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyis kyang de ni yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying ba
217b2: klog pa dang / 'chang ba dang / brjod pa dang / sgrub pa dang / phyag rgya 'ching bas yon tan de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'chang ba dang / brjod pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / nyin lan gsum mtshan
217b3: lan gsum dran par byed pa na lag na rdo rje sems can de dngos grub don yod pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba don yod pa 'thob pa dang / gzungs don yod pa 'thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin don
217b4: yod pa 'thob pa dang bsod nams sogs pa don yod pa 'thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlab
217b5: kyi rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa don yod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar don yod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba don yod pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas su 'gro ba don yod pa dang /
217b6: blo rgyas pa don yod pa dang / shes rab za mornam par 'phrul pa den yod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs pa don yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bla ma dang / gus par bya ba don yod
217b7: pa de'i phyir lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes ming du gdags pa byas na lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang rnams la ji ltar rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur/ sems 'khrug par 'gyur/ dran pa dang / blo glos rmongs par 'gyur te/ de'i gnas ni mi snang
217b8: nasu zhig smra bar nus/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni don yod pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de dag don yod pa zhags pa'i ming du dmigs so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes ni don yod

218a1: pa ste/ ye shes don yod pa gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i ming du dmigs so// sgyu ma g+ha bu'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phrag gi rnam par 'phrul ba ni
218a2: don yod pa ste/ sgyu ma lta bu gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'o// ye shes gang yin pa de zhags pa'o// de snying po'o// snying po gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
218a3: gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po zhes don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ming du dmigs so/ / gang yid la sems dpa' dang / gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad 'dren par 'gyur/ 'gugs par 'gyur/ len par 'gyur te/ shin du ring
218a4: po nas ye shes kyi zhags par 'gyur ro/ / lag na rdo rje de bas na de don yod pa'i snying po'i ming du dmigs so// lag na rdo rje gang gis ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob pa de la ji ltar rmongs pa skyes par 'gyur/ blo dman par 'gyur te gnas 'di ni mi
218a5: snang ngo po/ / lag na rdo rje gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo du ma 'thob ste/ gang gis gzungs 'thob pa des don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i 'di'i gsang sngags mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngam
218a6: rim par phye ba dang / dkyil 'khor kha ton nyid du gnas te thams cad so so yang dag par shes so// 'di lta ste don yod pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i pad ma'i lhab
218a7: klu zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang don yod par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi zam tog ces bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa lhun po'i snying po yangs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i
218a8: drim pad pa'i ba pa zhes bya ba'i gzung ba dang / don yod pa'i 'od zer rab tus nga ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa rnam par 'phrul ba'i 'od zeng nas bya

218b1: ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pang rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa yangs pasnang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i
218b2: dngos grub ces bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa dri ma med pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa blo rgyas pa'is zla ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i 'bar pa'i phyag turgya zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa nyi ma'i snying
218b3: po zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba don yod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob ste gang gis gzungs de rnams thos pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
218b4: snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo rgya chen po/
218b5: kha ton du gnas shing thams cad so sor yang dag par shes te/ gang gis mthu 'di rab tu thob pa la rmongs pa skye bar mi 'gyur/ dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur/ dran pa zhan par mi 'gyur/ dran pa rmugs par mi 'gyur/ dran pa 'khums par mi
218b6: 'gyur/ dran pa mi btan par mi 'gyur/ dran pa gzhan du rgyu bar mi 'gyur/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog gi rjes su 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ dran pa sdig pa can du mi 'gyur/ dran pa 'jig
218b7: rten pa'i mi dge ba byed par mi 'gyur te/ rtag tu blo yangs shing rab tu gsal bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i dran pa dang / blo rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ro// rtag tu dran pa zab cing rgya mtsho chen po bsags pa lta bur 'gyur ro//
218b8: lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i gzungs cho ga zhib mo de ltar go skabs yangs pa la gang gis gzungs 'di thob pa de lag na rdo rje ji ltar dran pa rmongs par 'gyur/ gzhan yang tshad med pa grangs med dpag tu med pa'i lus yongs

219a1: su dag pa dang / yid yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mdangs yongs su dag pa dang / mig yongs su dag pa dang / rna ba yongs su dag pa dang / sna yongs su dag pa dang / lce yongs su dag pa dang / dbang po
219a2: yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po blags pa tsam dang / mnyan pa tsam dang / mthong ba tsam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa tsam gyis de rnams yon tan gyi phan yon chen po'i chen po 'di thob ste/ gas
219a3: gis mthu 'di rab tu thob pa de la lag na rdo rje ji ltar rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur/ de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje yud tsam zhig sdod cig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor mang po'i dbus su ji ltar mngon sum du 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bar
219a4: par bstan par bya'o/ / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying byang chu me ma da sems dpang thams cad kyis phyag byas pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi rdzu 'phrul dam pa'i yul gyi mthu chen po'i po ga/
219a5: de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung nas don yod pa'i yon tan bkod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dag dang /
219a6: gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag mngon sum du thos nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ snying dga' bas dga' ba chen po nyid thob par gyur nas smras pa/ bdag lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs
219a7: bas yongs su dka' ba yid la bgyid pas nges par gnas par bgyi'o/ / yid la bgyid pa mchog tu dga' ba ngo mtshar du gyur pa dang / som nyid gyur pa dang bral ba dang / 'gyod pa ma mchis pas gnas par bgyi'o// rnam par thar gyi
219a8: dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mthu'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'o// de nas gnod sbyin

219b1: kyisde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugal dri ma med par kun du snang ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po chos kyis dga' bar 'phrul nas rkang pa gnyis la mamo/ bos phyag byas nas/
219b2: lan gsum bskor ba byas nas song ste/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod cing 'gying pag dang / brjid pag gis 'gros kyis song nas rang gi stan la 'dug ste/ bzhin 'dzum pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas
219b3: nas snying yongs su dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la rtog cing 'dug go/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ngo mtshar mchog tu rmad du byung ba snying rje dam pa rgya chen po'i lhag pa'i
219b4: bsam pa'i dmigs pas sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir 'od zer dri ma med par snang ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phul te nam mkha' la 'phags so/ / byang chub sems dpa'
219b5: sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis nor bu rin pa che de nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di cher g.yos par gyur to/ / 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po nya
219b6: sabargya rje po stong pas lhag pa'i 'od zer byung bar gyur to/ / snang ba gang gis/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi lus la reg pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad dang / dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
219b7: 'jig rten du ngan song gi 'gro ba las yongs su grol bar gyur to/ / gang yang gling bzhi pa'i yi dgas dang / dmyal ba de dag la yang snang ba des snang bar gyur pas nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba rnams kyi gtub pa med par gyur te/ sems can de dag kyang
219b8: yongs su thar nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par skyes te/ lus yongs su dag par gyur to// gang yang mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen po bcu drug po de dag kyang 'od zer gyi snang ba des reg pas dmyal ba de dag

220a1: thams cad du pad ma'i mtsho byung bar gyur cing / sems can de dag kyang yongs su thar nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par pad ma las brdzus te skyes so// grang ba
220a2: dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang dri zhing bde ba dang / reg na bde bar gyur to// tsha ba'i dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang bsil bar gyur cing / reg na bde ba dang / rab tu dga' bar gyur to// gang yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba ri dgas dang / ba dang
220a3: than sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dag kyang 'od zer des reg pas drang 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba de dag thams cad dga' ldan du lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so// sems can gang dag bcings par gyur pa de dag kyang 'od zer des reg pas sems
220a4: can bcings pa las yongs su grol bar gyur te/ su mi 'dod pa dang / lcag sgrog dang / lcags kyu lu gu rgyud kyi bcings pa de dag kyang dum bur gyur to// gang snod ma yin pa de yang 'od zer des phog pas mthong ba yongs su dag pa 'thob
220a5: pe/ gang sha bkra dang mdze'i nad kyis lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / rna ba dang / sna ma tshang ba yang 'od zer des phog pas lus yongs su rdzogs pa dang / lus yongs su dag par gyur to// gang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dang / bzhog rjo
220a6: yongs su sems par gyur pa yang 'od zer des reg pas me tog dang / 'dab ma dang / 'bras bu byung bar gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa gang du 'od zer bab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa de dag na yangs la
220a7: rgyas kyi zhing so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag thag brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa so so'i rin po che sna bdun
220a8: gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang dang / seng ge'i khri dang bcas pa'i gzhal med khang byung bar gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil gang du 'od zer gyis snang bas reg pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil der yang phyogs bcur ku tu rin po che

220b1: rang bzhin gyi sprin brtsegs pas khebs par gyur te/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab po// lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang / cod pan dang / dpung rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / do shal dang / se modo dang / rna rgyan dang / gasde/
220b2: gyi skud pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo// tshen kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i lha rdzas kyi gos rmad du byung ba sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab po/ lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshegs kyi char rab tu 'bab pa// lha rdzas kyi thug pa sna tshegs kyi char
220b3: rab tu 'bab po/ / lha rdzas kyi bdug pa sna tshogs dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi char rab tu 'bab po/ tshon kha dog sna tshogs pa'i lha rdzas kyi gos dang ba dan sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo// sgra rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs pad ma dang / ka muta dang par
220b4: ma dkar po dang / ud pa la sngon po dang / ba ri sha ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / a d+hi mug ta ka dang / a sho ga dang skya snar dang / ka dam pa dang man dA ra ba dang man dA ra ba chen po'i me tog gi char rab tu 'bab te/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin
220b5: gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las byed do/ / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yang rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa yang dag par gnas par gyur te/ gru bzhi pa ka ba bzhi dang / sgo bzhi dang ldan pa shin du 'bar ga lnga
220b6: rdzas kyi me tog sna tshegs lan kan gyis yongs su bskor cing mu tig gi dra ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa gser gyi dril bu sna tshogs 'phyang ba gos sna tshogs kyi phredang bas mdzes par byas pa/ chu shing gi rgyal mchen sna tshogs bsgreng ba/
220b7: nor bu rin po che sna tshogs bkram pa/ grwar lha rdzas kyi rnga yab sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ goskabs rgya che ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'byung zhing snang / nam mkha'i dkyil na yang g+ha rdzas rnams kyi matog dang /
220b8: bdug spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / tshes gos dang / bdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed cing 'khod

221a1: da nga du mdatha' cha grus byarnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi brlabs zang du byung ba can por ga bstan kyang las na rang byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par grum ba can pa'i chen por bstan to/ ngas byang chub ma
221a2: dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshe 'phrul 'di bstan nas rnam par 'phrul ba'i bkod pa chen pos rang gi spyan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs
221a3: song ste byin nas bcom ldan 'das la la ni brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon du bltas nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba
221a4: logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/
221a5: phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba/ gsang sngags kyi snying po gsang ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po bdag gi snying po gsang ba/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lcags kyu dang / don yod pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu dang / rig sngags
221a6: kyi rgyal po don yod par 'dren pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po gsum mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du yongs su bsgrags par bgyi'o// gang gis dran pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i
221a7: snying po'i cho ga zhib mo phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga rim par phye ba mtha' dag rdzogs par mngon du gnas par 'gyur te/ thams cad so so nyid du gnas so// gsang sngags 'dis gzir bas thams cad mdun
221a8: du gnas so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang

221b1: phyug gi snying po rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lcags kyu smras pa legs so legs so/ / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi don dang / sems can thams cad kyi don chen po'i phyir sems can thams cad dag pa chen po khyod kyis de'i dus la
221b2: bab par shes na da spros shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar rig nas bzhin 'dzum zhing mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das ga
221b3: lab de logs su mngon du phyogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i lcags kyu don yod pa'i zhags pa 'di smras so// dus gsum du gshegs shing so so na
221b4: bcags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin rig sngags kyi dbang po chen po 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dkyil 'khor gyi rig sngags kyi lha
221b5: thams cad dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
221b6: 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen
221b7: po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ / phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba cho ga zhib mo dang bcas pa thams
221b8: cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sku sems can

222a1: thams cad pa thams pa kyad ngas dang sa pa'ang yul ba kyang gsugs pargyal ba 'a phrag 'chalal/ / shegs dang 'ag sred dang sdang ba dang / 'drad 'phags pa thams cad tsu pa mdza pa'i sems dpa na/
222a2: ga nyid byas rgyal byag 'tshal ga// nam hA/ oM mags gses pas pa cad/ tsur/ sa na/ mdzunag yang gzung bar rlung yang thug rna
222a3: pa tu da / ma pa / dz+ral/ d+ha / shai/ d+ha ma d+d+haH/ ma zlas hA/ 92 a o16/ rba pa ta ra mAN+Dalag gas gsatwA u0f7f/ sa pa/
222a4: zug/ rang / pa ng+ka rA ti// the lo can/ pa shu pa ti/ rje d+har/ a shwar/ ma d+he shwa / khar maka du tsika/ ma rbash+tsa t+te shwa yam pa / namarbaiH/ kum+bAr/ trail kya ba dang / dmake shA ma ka/ tsugag / rbAb d+ha/ sa so/ 5
222a5: taN la/ bA dzaH/ ngang nam kuta/ mA la d+had/ d+ha rud+har/ mahA a u0f89u0fa4 sha ak+ShAr+tha hUH/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sa ma b+ha ra sa ma b+ha ra~M/ sa man rdzas mnan lam d+hA ra ya/ pU/ Shed ya a ku shi/ a ba log ya/ min sAd+ha d+hi ma sa d+he ra/ ma p
222a6: a mdaH/ maN+Dal/ badz+ral la/ sam ma/ bezhin pas+yAd+ha ma m+bA d+ha ma/ he ra har/ sarba thA ba gis phigam la/ mAdas dang/ d+ha r+ya/ ma hA mang / dzAH/ rba rmA u0f7f/ bo d+ha ma u0f7fsa/ na d+h+ya / ma hA bas k
222a7: lag da bA gtang/ nA pa ci rje AT+Ta na pa u0f89u0fa4 ti/ a ma~M hAH/ dzinam kyu rgyang/ d+ha nga/ bdas thAgam thag d+har/ rba ba h+ye na rnams le// baThar Ad+ha sa swa r+b+ha ka/ bi rba rbab tu/ sa sman tra/ sa s+yasa? / kha /
222a8: ru nika sA tra ba das la/ sarben pa muH/ zas d+haka/ sa ma hA ba/ radas tAn mos te a mo ga a k+sha sha/ pad ma b+hu dza sA hA// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di snyas

222b1: ga la can thag dang / nags ca pa dang / ga sa dzubanas pa'i gnas kyigan ma pa das pa d+ma brdzun sa// rdzas ma tag ga chen po lag// da ya pa'i dgas par snyi byang chub sems pa/
222b2: thams cad kyis blag byas pa/ rnam par thar ba 'dul 'khor phyag d+hA dadu/ gsang sngags dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'bong das par bye ba'i chog napa mo 'di sangs sar 'i 'a bya ba mtha' dag rdzogs par rnam mkha' la gnas so// gang
222b3: gas sngags kyi mig 'bru yang gise ral bai dU r+yas yi ger bris po ston kyi rim pan snang sti/ yi ge'i phreng ba mnyam ni dgas la zur phyin par bris pa/ thig gi phreng ba gshegs pas brgyan pa snang ngo // gang lag pa'i phyag rgya yang bda'i/
222b4: dang nas byung ba/ phyag rgya bcing bas tshogs 'od zer 'bar ba nam mkha' la gnas so// gang mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma la rab tu gnas pa nam mkha' la gnas par gyur te// gad ras kyi ri mo'i sku gzugs/
222b5: gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ rnam par bkra ba/ cho ga dang / yo byad dang bcas pa rim par phye ba bris pa yang nam mkha' la gnas so// gang dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba de dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs gru bzhi pa/ grwa
222b6: bzhi na mnyam pa rnam par bye ba/ dkyil 'khor shin du spras shing brgyan pa/ gzugs rnam pa snga tshogs kyis mdzes pa'i gzhal med khang yang nam mkha' la gnas so// dkyil 'khor chen po na gnas pa'i rig sngags kyi lnga po nya dang /
222b7: khro bo dang bcas pa gzhal mod khang na rjes su rgyu ba dag kyang nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// phyogs so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang phyogs bcu
222b8: na gyi dam ma'i'i dkyil na de bzhi gshegs pa'i sku bzhugs par gyu / / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skud de dag thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'thags pa spyan ras gzigs dpang byug la legams rdos

223a1: ga/ bya ba byin te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so legs so// ragasngags kyi mchog dam pa// don yod pa'i lugs kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal ba mtha' dag rdzogs par smras pa/ ga shos don yod pa'i nags pa'i glang po rnam par /
223a2: za 'i dkyil 'khor gyi chog zhib mo gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags rim par phye ba de dag thams cad don med pa'i lcags tha'i gsang sngags kyi nags pas kun nas sa so// 'khor 'di'i nang nanam mkha'i kyil na
223a3: tuganas pa phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bstan nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gnan
223a4: su yang rung ba bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo rig sngags 'dzin pa thams cad kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'di dran par byed na lan cig dran pa tsam gyis kyang mong
223a5: kha don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye
223a6: ba dang / cho ga zhib mo de thams cad so sor de la kha don nyid du gnas te/ de dag thams cad rim gyis dran pa dang / blo rgya mtsho bsags pa dang / shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba so so
223a7: la blo 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / nam yang blo dman par mi 'gyur zhing nam yang brjed nges par mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
223a8: gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ mchog chen po sbyin pa/ lag na pad ma/ mchog tu snying rje can khyod kyis cho ga rgya chen po smras pa legs so legs so// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam

223b1: par 'phrul pa'i tshe thul gyi yon tan mtha' yas pa 'di mthong nas dbugs cher 'byin par gyur cing mchog tu dga' ba chen po thob bo/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan
223b2: 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor 'di'i nang du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i bya ba'i yo byad dang cho ga bshad do/ / bcom ldan 'das de nas rig sngags 'chang gang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
223b3: snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bsgrub par 'tshal ba dang / gang yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong za'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge
223b4: bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan su yang rung ba bud med dang / skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di klog par 'tshal ba dang / bstan
223b5: par 'tshal ba dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi bar 'tshal ba dang / mtha' dag rdzogs par bsgrub par 'tshal ba des sngon rol tu phyogs bcur thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su kha bltas te mchis la gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i
223b6: lcags kyu'i snying po 'di lan gsum dran par bgyi zhing / yang thal mo sbyar te/ phyag bgyi'o// de nas dran pa tsam gyi mod la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkug par 'gyur te/ ri po ta la'i
223b7: gzhal med khang dang bcas pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto'i phye chen po dang bcas pa bkur bar 'gyur/
223b8: 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang bcas pa gsang sngags

224a1: rim par bye ba'i cho gzhib mo dang / bsgrub pa'i cho ga'i rnam pa rgyachen po mtha' dag rdzogs pa 'di yang bkug par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i rig sngags kyi lha 'khor dang bcas pa bkug par 'gyur te/ thams cad yid btu
224a2: dga' bar gyur pas dngos grub dam pa rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par bgyi ste/ ji ltar shin tu rgya cher yid la bgyis pa de ltar bsgrub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi khacwa
224a3: dran pa mnyan zhing rgyache ba dang / blo dang mdangs dri ma ma chim pa 'jug par bgyid de/ thugs pa tsam gyi mod la lce pad ma'i 'dab ma lta bur 'jam par 'gyur zhing / kha nas uta pa la'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byangs snyan cing mnyen pa dang rdza
224a4: pa dang / zab pa dang tshig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// mi 'am ci'i dbyangs dang / sta snyan pa dang / dbyangs mnyen pa dang / dga' bar byed pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur zhing / la bi ka'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro// jis dus gsum dul na gsum du dran par
224a5: bgyid na gsang sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / chog thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs spyi'i dngos grub de rdzogs par 'gyur ni spyod par 'gyur ro// gegs dang
224a6: log 'dren dang / bdud la sogs pa sdang ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi bsgrib pa dang / dmyal bar mchi ba'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying go pa
224a7: sngags kyin 'ad pa'i lcags kyi 'di la na gas margyan par bgyis patsam gyi gang cin kyi kyi maungal bdag pa dang / rang gi gnas kyi yang pa dang / slob ma dang / bsnyen pa pa dang/ 'kho dang btsas pa mig nga ba yang gcing bar 'gyur/
224a8: sem sum dag pa yang shin du ngas su dag par 'gyur ro// dris dang bcas pa yang shin du drim mchim par 'azur ro// lnga dang bcas pa yang rdza dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gti ga dang bcas pa yang gti cag dang bral bas gyur /

224b1: 'dod chags dang bcas pa yang 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sgrib pa dang bcas pa yang sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// bgegs dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang log 'dren gyis yongs su zin pa yang bgegs dang log 'dren dang /
224b2: bdud la sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sems kyi sdig pa yang bral bar 'gyur ro// thun mong ma yin pa yang thun mong du gyur cing bsrungs par 'gyur ro// mi smra ba'i brtul thugs ma mchis pa yang mi smra ba'i btul zhugs chen po dang ldan par
224b3: 'gyur ro/ / bsrung ba ma bgyis pa yang bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi gnas dang yul dang dkyil 'khor thams cad du tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyod pa chen por 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i gnas chen po la gnas par 'gyur ro/
224b4: dge ba mi spyod pa yang dge ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// chos mi spyod pa yang chos spyod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bsod nams mi bgyid pa yang bsod nams kyi phung po chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro// dul ba'i spyod pa ma mchis
224b5: pa yang dul ba'i spyod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags ma mthong ba dang / dam tshig ma mchis pa yang dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags mthong ba dang / dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyur
224b6: ro/ / rig sngags kyi gnas dang 'khor thams cad du sangs rgyas dang / chos mthong bar mi 'tshal ba yang byang chub dang / chos dang / dam tshig dang ldan par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ma bsams pa yang byang chub sems
224b7: dpa' thams cad kyis bsams par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyis bon gyi yul du mgyur pa yang byang chub kyis bon dang ldan par 'gyur ro// pha rol du phyin pa drug gi spyod pa dang mi 'bral zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bal
224b8: mkhas par 'gyur ro/ / tshul khrims dang mi 'bral zhing ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// na pa dang yang dag yongs su gtong ba dang mi 'bral zhing sbyin pa dang / yongs su gtong ba dang sbyin pa'i tshogs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro//

225a1: bzod pa dang mi 'bra ba zhing bzod pa'i rjes su smod par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus dang mi 'bral zhing brtson 'grus kyi stobs chen po 'go cha brtan pa bgos par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan dang mi 'bra la zhing bsam gtan chen po
225a2: 'jom pa shi napa nam bu'o/ / zhes pa pa ma sa pa nab pa shes pa mas la mkhas pa rgya chen por bgyur ro// rag sngags dang / gsar sngags mi nyams pa dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya yongs su tshang ba dang / chog la mkhas par
225a3: 'gyur ro/ / dge pa'i bshes gzhan chen po'i lam la rab tu gnas par 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad du snyid du sdug pa dang / bla mar bgyis par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / mngon du phyag bgyi
225a4: bar gyu ro/ / theg btsun par yar 'gyung ngo // bsam pa yongs su dag par yang 'gyur ro// de ltar don yod pa chen po'i chog rgya chen po 'di dag ni thams cad du dngos grub don yod pa/ mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba/ dge ba don yod pa 'do don
225a5: yo pa'i lpags kyus 'dren par babyed do/ / dngas chub thams cad 'grags par bgyid do// bsgrub pa thams cad dren par banyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos deg pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcwa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rtsom ma 'dras pa
225a6: brgyad dang / / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / don dam pa dang / stong pa nyid 'dren par bgyi de don dam pa'i lcags kyu 'dis 'dren par bgyid/ yangs par bgyid/ dngos
225a7: grub mchog 'dren par bgyid do/ / de ltar mthu che ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / yon tan chen por brjod pas bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po stsol bar bgyid do// de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan zhing kun tu stsogs par bgyi dpas rig sngags
225a8: kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lcags kyu/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po ni mchog tu grub pa bla na med pa lags so// de nas rig sngags 'chang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam dge slong ma' ma/ dge bsnyen

225b1: na/ dge bsnyen ma'an/ dge slong dam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan su yang rung ba bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am bu mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis
225b2: dgug par 'tshal ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'tshal na des cho ga 'di bgyi'o// gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis bgos gtsang ma bgos pa pa'i rnam lnga'i chus bsangs pa'i mchod
225b3: phyi ra thogs btags pas ras dmar po'i skud pa'i mchod phyir thogs kha dog bzang po gnas bdun du yongs su bzung ste/ mtshogs ma dang / spyi gtsug bcing ba dang / gnas gsum po dpung pa gnyis su bcing ba dang / lag ngar gnyis su
225b4: bci pa dang / de nas na pa bci la dang / sa phyogs gnam 'dug gnas sam/ gnas gzhan gang yang rung ba dben zhing 'khrug pa ma mchis pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi stegs gru bzhi pa shin tu rnam par mdzes pa/ khru bzhi'i tshad tsam la 'phang sor brgyad kyi
225b5: tshad tsam kun nas zlum po legs par blugs pa shin tu 'jam pa bgyi'o/ / de nas tshon sna tshogs kyi skud pas rnam par mdzes par thig gdab cing tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis bri bar bgyi'o snying po'i dkyil 'khor ni thu gar tsam gyi tshad la gru bzhi pa
225b6: rnam par bye ba/ shin tu mdzes pa/ gru bzhi kun nas khakhyer gyi rnam pa can bgyi'o// dbus su pad ma bgyi'o// 'arab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ 'dab ma thams cad la lpags klu bri zhing dbus kyi snying po ge sar dang bcas pa rin po che sna tshegs
225b7: kyis brgyan pa bgyi'o/ / 'od kyi phreng ba zlum po tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par mdzes par bgyi'o// snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir lugs kyu dang zhags pa kun nas zlum po yang bgyi'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu mtshan ma'i phyag tu sna tshogs
225b8: kyang bri bar bgyi'o/ / dkyil 'khor gyi gri bzhir rnam par phye bar rgyal po chen po bzhi 'bar ba'i nang na go cha bgos pa/ drag shul gyi gzugs can 'jigs par bgyid pa zi'o// sgo bzhi rnam par phye bar yang dkyil 'khor gyi lha bre bar bgyi ste/

226a1: shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje 'chang shi ba'i gzugs can bzhin 'dzum pa/ rdo rje gying bag can du 'dzin pa ri rab kyi steng na 'bar ba'i nang na mchis pazi'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor khro ba'i rgyal po drag shul gyi gzugs can 'jigs par bgyi
226a2: ba/ / pad ma dang shags pa thogs pa me tog bya ba'i steng na 'bar ba'i nang na mchis pa'o// nub phyogs kyi sgong dbang po rdo rje thogs pa mig gsum pa ri'i steng na 'bar ba'i nang mchis babri'o// byang phyogs kyi sgorang don yod pa'i gags pa gdong rje
226a3: gnyer can/ pad ma dang zhags pa thogs pa/ pad ma'i 'dab ma'i steng na 'bar ba'i nang na ljags kyu dang lhan cig mchis pa bri'o// dkyil 'khor khor lor yug tu gos dang / ba dan dang / mda' dang / rgyal mtshan kun gyis brgyan par bgyi'o//
226a4: tshon sna lnga'i skud pas kho ra khor yug tu dkri bar bgyi'o// gtor ma thams cad dkar po bzhag go/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyir rol kun du dngul dang gser gyi snod rnam pa sna tshogs pa bzhag go// snying po'i dkyil 'khor kho ra khor yug tu dngul gyi
226a5: snod bkang ba bzhi dang / 'o mas bkang ba bzhi dang mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil ba'i snod bzhi dang / dri'i snod bzhi dang / dris bkang ba'i snod bzhi dang / dngul gyi bog phor a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / du rus ka'i bdug pos bsres pa bzhi
226a6: bzhag go/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor khor khor yug tu sa las byas pa'i snod bkang ba dang / gtor ma'i snod bum pa yongs su bkang ba drug bcu rtsa bzhi dang / bdug pa sna tshogs bsregs pa'i pog por brgyad 'jigs pa med par bzhag par
226a7: bsti'o/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes bcu bzhi nas zla ba nya tshes bcwa lnga'i bar gyi nyin zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis pas 'bras yo sa dang / yungs dkar la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying pos lan brgyad rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pas
226a8: dkyil 'khor du gtor bar bgyi'o/ / yungs dkar dang / dri che ba la khro bo'i rgyal pos lan cu rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor kun du gtor zhing dkyil 'khor dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du mar me drug bcu rtsa

226b1: bzhi spang bar bgyi'o/ / me tog ji snyed pa mang po dgram zhing kho ra khor yug tu phreng ba bzhag par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i lcags kyus yungs dkar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor kun dang phyogs
226b2: bzhi dang / / steng dang 'og tu gtor na dkyil 'khor bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcing ba dang / spyi gtsug bcing ba dang / bdag bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// gegs dang / log 'dren dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
226b3: bdud la sogs pa thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang dag mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i bzhi 'dzin pa de
226b4: thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro/ / dkyil 'khor kun nas bsrung ba'i slad dug shing rje dang / chu lha dang / gzhon nu dang / ku be ra dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang / 'khor dang bcas pa/ lcags kyu dang zhags pas bkug par 'gyur to// dkyil
226b5: 'khor kun nas srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sla ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// 'og gi sa'i lha mo sa'i 'og na gnas pa rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor srung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / sba ba'i slad du mchis par 'gyur ro// steng nas nam mkha' la tshangs
226b6: pa dang khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / mtshan mo'i lha dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba rgyu skar dang bcas par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis phyag bgyi ba'i las bgyi ste/ rig
226b7: sngags 'chang gis rdza ku sha'i steng du shar phyogs kyi sgor dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par dkyil mo krung bcas te mchis la gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i nags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa bgyis la/ dkyil
226b8: 'khor gyi snying por 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhag par bgyi zhing me tog re re la bzlas brjod bgyis bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du dor bar bgyi'o/ / de nas khro bo'i rgyal po sa yungs dkar

227a1: gyi 'bru re re la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pas gtor bar bgyi'o/ / de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyus bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis pas dbul bar
227a2: bgyi'o/ / ri lu re re la bzlas brjed bgyis pa'i bdug spos dbul bar bgyi'o// yungs kar re ra la bzlas brjod bgyis la/ snying pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dor bar gyi'o// stod rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / thun tha ma'i nam langs kar
227a3: nom pa yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar bgyid pa dang / rab tu dga' bar bgyid par sa g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / sgra mnyen pa dang / snyan cing brdebs pa dang / yid du 'ong ba zab mo zab mo dang / ka la bing ka dang / mi 'am ci'i sgra dbyangs lta bu 'byung//
227a4: bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi sems brtan por bgyi zhing chog tu dga' ba yid la bgyid pas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi snying po nas 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs mang po 'byung zhing phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams
227a5: kun du mchi zhing snang bar 'gyur te/ nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor na sprin brtsegs pa'i phung po bzhin du 'od zer gyi gdugs su gyur nas gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas sngon ma byung ba'i dri zhim por rmangad du byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing lha'i
227a6: tsan dan dang / gong shi sha'i tsan dan dang / tsan dan sAl gyi snying po dang / ga pur dang / a rtsi'i dri 'byung ste/ dpag tshad brgya khor khor yug tu dri gnas par 'gyur ro// lha rdzas kyi bdug spos kyi dri zhim po sngon ma byung ba bai dUr+ya sngon po'i sprin
227a7: brtsegs pas bu'i bdug spos kyi smin rnams pa'i dkyil na gnas par yang 'tha te/ / phyogs bAn kun bdug thos kyicims par 'gyur ro// de nas bying po'i dkyil 'khod kyis dbus nas 'phags pasgyur pa gcigs dpang rjen
227a8: bdag nyid kyi rang gi gzugs kyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ tshangs pa bzang por rna lugs cam ngas pa'i thor tshugs kyis bcan ga/ don mod pa'i rtags pa'i gzugs lag pa bzhi pa/ pad ma dang zhags pa thogs pa/ rgyal brjod pa

227b1: med pa'i dbu rgyan can dbu rgyan zla ba tshes pas brgyan pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa thogs shing dbugs 'byin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa/ rang gi 'od dang gzi brjid kyis shin du 'dra
227b2: ba bzhin 'dzum zhing nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dang ldan pa khru brgyad tsam gyis lus bzang pos dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i pad ma'i stan las langs te/ nam mkha' la mchis nas zhi ba'i gzugs can bya bas
227b3: pa'i sems dang snying rje chen po yid la bgyis pas dkyil 'khor kun tu lta zhing phyogs bcur rtog par bgyid do/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ste/ rig sngags 'chang chen po legs so legs so// lag pa
227b4: g.yas pa brkyang ba'i lag mthil shin du bzang po 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag stong gis legs par brgyan pa'i lag pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lag pa spyi bor bzhag
227b5: ma thag tu de nas rig sngags 'chang de nam mkha' la mchis te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa dang lcags kyu rgya chen po 'od zer snang ba bkod pa rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba sgyu ma lta bu'i shugs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob
227b6: ste/ / ting nge 'dzin gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma snyed 'thob po// kun du don yod par lta ba nor bu'i snying po rgya chen por grags pa don yod pa'i lcags kyu'o gzungs/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i
227b7: gzungs 'thob par 'gyur te/ gang gis gzungs thob pa'i mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim pa phye ba'i cho ga bzhin byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar
227b8: ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton nyid du gnas so/ / gzhan yang pad ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / glang po che'i rigs dang /

228a1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dmatshig dang / gsang ba chen po snying po dang / phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i gsang sngags rim par che ba gsang ba dang / cho ga nib mo rnam pa thams cad 'aton nyid du gnas so// rig
228a2: sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong phrag gang gA klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa gnyis pa rnams kyi gtso bo dang / mchog dang rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// de nas 'phags pa
228a3: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rig sngags 'chang de la smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa dang / bsam pa smos shig dang / mchog de thams cad rjes su sbyin par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid/
228a4: la bsams pa dang / mchog mngon par 'dod pa de thams cad smra zhing mchog yid la re ba thams cad byin par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa sna tshogs de ltar byung ba rnams
228a5: smra zhing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba smra'o// lo legs pa dang / lo nyes pa dang / bde ba dang / nad dang 'jigs pa dang / lhag par 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / rang gi dmag tshogs dang / phyir rgol ba dang /
228a6: dgra bo dang / yams kyi nang dang / mings dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'tshe ba dang / gza' 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'tshang 'brub dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / char ches pa dang / char dkon pa dang /
228a7: dus ma yin pa'i char dang / tshe ring ba dang / tshe thung ba dang / tshe yongs su zad pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / 'byor pa dang / rgud pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / 'grub pa dang / mi 'grub pa dang /
228a8: bgegs dang / bgegs med pa dang / bdud kyi bar chad dang / 'bru 'phel ba dang / nor 'phel ba dang / nad mang ba dang / nang dang bral bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

228b1: po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang la smra bar 'gyur ro/ / sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten dang / gnad sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / grul bu dang / mi
228b2: 'am tsa dang / / lce'i phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa ri dgas dang bya'i skye ba dang / 'chi ba de thams cad phyin ci ma log par smra zhing de dag gi thabs thams cad kyang ston par 'gyur ro// lhar skye ba dang / klur skye ba dang /
228b3: sang brgyas kyi ning du gro zhing skye ba dang // rgyal po nyid dang / bud med dang / skyes pa nyid dang / bu rnyed pa de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// bram ze'i rigs su skye ba dang / rgyal rigs su skye ba dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bur skye ba de
228b4: thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang rigs mthon po dang / dma' ba dang / smad pa'i rigs su skye ba sna tshogs de dag thams cad ston cing smra la thabs kyang ston par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar bsams pa'i
228b5: don de thams cad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du smra zhing thams cad gtam zer ro/ / gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i mchog sna tshogs dang / bsgrub pa dang / grub pa de thams cad de stsol bar bgyid de/ 'di lta ste nor
228b6: bskur ba smra ba dang / zhing smra ba dang / mig sman gyi dngos grub dang / mi snang ba dang / mig 'phrul dang / gter smra ba dang / phug tu 'jug pa dang nags su 'jug pa dang spro ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dbab pa dang / ro langs blang ba dang / nang
228b7: zhi bar bya ba dang / gos 'thob pa dang / grong 'thob pa dang / yul gyi bdag po nyid dang / chu klung chen po rgal ba dang / dug bza' ba dang / gsang sngags sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i dngos grub dang / 'jigs pa chen po brgyad zhi bar bya ba dang /
228b8: dgag pa dang // dran pa de thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// gzhan yang ji ltar yid la bgyid pa de thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// de dag thams cad kyi dgos pa thams cad don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu snying pos 'dren cing //

229a1: dani yod pa'i nags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// bsams pa dang / don du gnyer ba dang / yid lar ba'i dgas pa de dag thams cad shin tu ring po nas kyang don yod pa'i nags pas bcings nas thams cad drangs te/
229a2: lag tu thob par 'gyur ro// bsgrub pa mchog gi dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te mi snang bar gyur/ rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams gang du sangs rgyas kyi zhing kang dang
229a3: gang du mchi mtshal ba de dang de thams cad du mchi bar gyur te/ thams cad du gtso bo 'gyur thams cad du mchod par 'gyur ro// ji ltar rmi lam mthong bar 'tshal nas gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas/ nyal kar 'phags
229a4: pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bdug spos su phul te nyal na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyal po'i cha byad du mthong ba rtsol cing / gang bsams pa dang / gang du gnyer ba dang / gang dris pa de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro//
229a5: ji ltar bsams pa'i mchog stsol cing sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur ro// stobs dang brtson 'grus dang / mdangs 'jug par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dgug par 'tshal zhing mthong bar 'tshal na/ de'i tshe shing arka'i 'o
229a6: ma dang / gu gul dang / rgya stegs ri lur bgyis pa la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis la/ tshangs pa la bdug spos su phul nas tshangs pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing mchog 'tshal ba thams cad rdzas su phul te// tshangs ni/
229a7: 'jig rten la thug pa'i bar gyi tshangs pa'i gnas dang / gnal med khang mthong bar 'gyur zhing tshangs pa'i gzugs kyi cha byang 'chang ba'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// lha'i gnas thams cad du mes po yin no// zhes tshig mngon par brjod par
229a8: 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten thams cad dang 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi bud med dang / skyes pa dang khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / rgyal gis dang / rje'i rigs dang / dmang rigs de thams cad thams cad du chings pa'o zhes sems

229b1: par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po btsun mo dang 'khor du bcas pas mchod pa'i sprin chen po bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas sred med kyi bu dgug par 'tshal ba des lha'i gnas su sred med kyi bu'i gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du nye bar sbyin pasreg gi
229b2: chog bgyi ste/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ snam dang shing arka'i yam sreg shing gi me sbar ba la gu gul dang yungs kar dang / sbrang rtsi dang zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin bsreg brgya/
229b3: stong bgyi'o// brgya stong rdzogs pa dang / sred med kyi bu rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so zhes smra'o// bsgrub pa dam pa 'di don yod pa'i lcags kyus 'gugs shing
229b4: rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i chos lugs chen pos bkug na rig sngags 'chang ci zhig bya/ dgos pa ni ci zhig yod/ mchog ni ci zhig/ ci gnyer ba de smos shig dang / thams cad rjes su sbyin par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis
229b5: don gang yin la bsams te smras pa de thams cad stsol bar 'gyur/ gzugs sna tshogs pa'i mchog kyang rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gzugs sna tshogs pa mchog gtso bo dang dgos pa'i las bsgrub pa'i mchog rje
229b6: su stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas lha chen po dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa des lha'i gnas su mchis pa la lha chen po'i mdun du gu gul dang / pad ma'i bye ma dang
229b7: zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin bsreg stong rtsa brgyad pabye'o/ / stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / lha chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas nag po chen po dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang shin tu khrus bgyis
229b8: ba gos gtsang ma bgos pas dur khrod du mchis la/ bzla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi la nyin zhag cig smyung ba bgyis bas pad ma sar pa'i phye ma dang / gu gul dang / ra'i khrag dang / yungs dkar dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba brgyad stong

230a1: ngan yang pa'i lcags gyur bzlas brjod kyis dung phrad kyi shing gim la bzlas brjod pa gyu'o/ / khrag gi gtor ma dang 'bras thug pa ca'i chan gyi lba bshos dang // me tog dmar po dbul bar bgyi'o// las 'di yongs su
230a2: rdzogs par bgyis na nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa mdun na mchis shing rig sngags 'chang la leg so zhes bya ba gsol te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// bsgrub pa'i cho ga bzang po 'dis bdag
230a3: yongs su mgus rig sngags 'chang spros shig dang / mchog rjes su sbyin par bgyi'o// mchog 'dod pa thams cad rjes su long shig dang / ji ltar yid la byed pa re ba de thams cad rjes su sbyin par bgyi'o// khyod bsrung ba dang / yongs su
230a4: bskyang ba'i don du bdag rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dbul bar bgyis// ji ltar bsams pa de mngon sum du smas na ga don du nyer ba de thams cad 'thob ci thams cad du rjes su
230a5: 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ / thams cad du thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam la sogs pas las thams cad bgyid cing nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// rtag tu lta zhing spyir thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos
230a6: bsna tshogs dang / / las su bgyi ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ las thams cad bsgo ba bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur te/ nam yang nyams par mi bgyid do// thams cad
230a7: rjes su 'brang zhing zhing las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ / ji ste 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma dgug par 'tshal na de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin lus kyis bshos pa tsham pags papa ni du rnaMs sus b+ha gas gsan dag ni smon mam
230a8: pa der mchis la zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag gcig smang ba bgyis pas shin tu dri zhim pa'i dri'i shing gi me spar bal bu shel ci dang / ta kar dang / spang spos dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang / sbyar ba'i

230b1: sbyin bsreg lan stong rtsa brgyad bgyi'o/ / gli rtsi dang / ga bur dang / tsan dan gyi chus bsgos pa'i 'bras yos dang / me tog gis bkang ba'i mchod yon gyi sdod bum pa sar pa brgyad stsal lo// dkar gsum gyi gtor mas bkang bag bur
230b2: gyis bsgos pa'i gtor ma'i bum pa gsum stsal lo/ / me tog shin du dri zhim po stsal bar bgyi zhing gla rtsi dang / tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / kun du ru'i bdug spos stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas las yongs su rdzogs pa dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs/
230b3: can ma bzang ma de lta'i gnal med yang dun che zhing mdun na mchis tad mthong nas ma'am/ sring ma'am/ chu ma'am/ las bya pa'am/ las ma dag gzug ma 'am/ pho nyam rnams ji ltar bung ji ltar tshig tu brjod pa de la smras na/
230b4: da// ji ltar mar gyur na de'i tshe bu bzhin du snying nas yongs su skyong bar bgyid do// nor dang 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gos dang rgyan dang / lha ba lbub dang / mal chas yongs su sbyong bar bgyid do// ji sa srid mor gyurang na de'i tshe longs spyod
230b5: thams cad kyis yongs su skyong bar bgyid do/ / ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i bud med dpag tshad brgya'i pha rol nas kyang bkug ste/ yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir yongs su spyod par bgyid cing / phyir yang de nyid du gtong bar
230b6: bgyid do/ / ji ste chung mar gyur na de dang / lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dam pa yongs su longs spyod pa'i gzhal med khang mthong ste/ lha rdzas kyi bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / longs spyod spel bar bgyid do// ro bro ba'i mchog ro brgya dang
230b7: ldan pa ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i longs spyod stsol bar bgyid do/ / mchog tu dga' ba'i rtsed mos 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i longs spyod la yongs su spyod par bgyid do// lha rdzas kyi dri dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang /
230b8: lha rdzas kyi gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang du 'gyur ro// nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / khang pa yongs su gang zhing mchis par 'gyur ro// nor bu dang / gser dang / rdo rje dang / bai dUr+ya dang / gser dang /

231a1: shang ka shI la dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le s+tham dang dngul sgog dpag tu med pa thob pa'i gter stsol bar bgyid do// rta dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang phyugs dang / bran po dang / bran mo rab tu mang por 'phel zhing mchis par
231a2: 'gyur ro/ / mal cha'i longs spyod sna tshogs stsol bar bgyid do// lha rdzas kyi chung ma'i longs spyod bud med gzugs sna tshogs pa'i 'khor brgya dang ldan pa nyin gcig bzhin gnas par 'gyur ro// yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs
231a3: pas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro/ / tshe lha'i lo stong thub par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis bag yod par bgyi ste/ dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu gus pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
231a4: rje 'dzin la mchog tu gus par bgyi'o// rtag tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' bar bgyi zhing sems can thams cad la mchog tu snying brtse bar bgyi'o// gzhan du mi smra bar bgyi'o// gal te las byed par gyur na de'i tshe rgyal po la bgyi ba
231a5: bzhin du las thams cad bgyid de/ shin tu yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du las la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro// ji ste mdag gzhug par mgyur na gnas gang du mngags pa de'i gnas thams cad du maci ste/ dpag tshad stong gi pa/
231a6: rol tu mchis zhing / skad cig gis slar yang mchi'o// thams cad du gter chen po 'byin par bgyid 'dren par bgyid do// dpag tshad stong gi pha rol nas bud med 'gugs par bgyid cing / nor dang / 'bru dang / glang po che dang / ma
231a7: rang ta dag 'thugs par bgyid de/ sgrad mang gtong bar bgyid do// bag yod pas paskyo bar bgyi ste// bdag nyid shin pa ring po'i tshul dang / gnas su 'phen par bgyid/ gnad sbyin dang / phrin po dang / byung ba dang / lha ma yin
231a8: gnas su 'deg par bgyid de/ der srog gi bar chad du 'gyur bar mi bgyid do// ji ste po nya mor myur na phyogs bcu thams cad du mchi ste/ lha'i 'jig rten du mchi'o// klu'i 'jig rten du mchi'o// lha ma yin gyi gnas su ma to/

231b1: nam mkha' lding gi gnas su mchi'o// mi 'am ci'i gnas su mchi'o// lho phye chen po'i gnas su mchi'o// gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas su mchi'o// 'byung po'i gnas su mchi zhing thams cad du pho nya'i bya ba bgyis nas slar
231b2: mchi'o/ / skad cig gis dpag tshad stong du mchi zhing slar mchi'o// skad cig gis dpag tshad stong du thams cad du byin nas pho nya'i bya ba bgyid do// ji ltar srid sa'i 'og gi bar du 'jug cing phyir yang mchi'o// bya ba shin du yongs su rdzogs
231b3: par bgyis nas bag yod pas yid las thams cad bgyi ste/ nyin gcig bzhin du mchod yon dang / rkang pa bkru ba stsal bar bgyi'o// thams cad kyi gnas thams cad du phyin cing bya ba 'grub pa/ bla na ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas
231b4: gnod sbyin mo dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des gzhan gyi ma reg pa'i shing leb sar pa la gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bgyi zhing gnas dben zhing 'khrug pa ma mchis pa gtsang ma'i
231b5: gnas su bzhag par bgyi'o/ / rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin du khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang ma bgos pas 'o ma dang / 'bras thug po che'i chan gyi gtor ma stsal bar bgyi'o// shing ka ra ba ri'i me sbar ba la yungs dkar dang / gu gul dang / ra'i
