231b6: khrag dang / zhun mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin bsreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / me tog dmar po stsal na gnod sbyin mo de yang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun mchis te/ rig sngags 'chang slongs shig ces smra bar
231b7: 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang gis khyod nga'i ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed pa yin no// nga'i las thams cad byed pa yin no// nga la dbyig mang po byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// de'i tshe gnod sbyin mo de ltar lags so zhes smras nas
231b8: mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe yungs dkar dang / gu gul la yongs su bzla nas mer gtor na de mchi zhing ci bgyi zhes bya ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur// dbyig stong stsol bar 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho

232a1: bar du mtshas par 'gyur/ rtag tu ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo dkrug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des spra tshil las lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bgyi'o// de nas
232a2: rig sngags 'chang gis gnas 'khrug pa ma mchis pa dang / dben pa dang / sa phyogs gtsang ma'i gnas su gzhag par bgyi'o rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin du khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas zhig gsum zan bcad par
232a3: bgyis la/ de'i mdun du dkyil mo krung bcas te mchis la gu gul gyi bdug spos stsal cing dkar gsum gyi gtor ma stsal bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i lcags kyu bzlas brjod yungs kar la bzlas pas bu mo de la lan stong rtsa brgyad rdeg par
232a4: bgyi'o/ / las yongs su rdzogs pa dang / de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo de rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis te gang dang gang du dgos pa de dang der dgos pa'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de'i las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/
232a5: thams cad du mchi bar 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// ji ste srin po dang / srin mo 'gugs par 'tshal na gu gul dang ba lang gi sha skam po dang lhan cig bsres pa la don yod pa'i lugs kyus lan stong rtsa
232a6: brkyang bzlas brjod bgyis pas dur khrod du mtshan thog thag bdugs na srin po'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur te/ srin po dang srin mo rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid par 'gyur/ ci bsgo ba de
232a7: gling bar 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing do pyod patshe'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// cugs gcig bzhin du dngul tshwa mang khri stsol bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis cha gsum du dbye bar bgyi/
232a8: gcig ri dkon mchog la mchod par bgyi'o// cha gnyis pa ni nyin gcig bzhin du sbyin par gtang ngo // zin mo rnams la zan dang tshong sdor rngon pa'i gtor ma gul bar bgyi'o// de nas srin po 'khor dang bcas pa de rnams tshim

232b1: par 'gyur ro/ / de nas srin po 'khor dang bcas pa shin tu mgyogs par 'gyur te/ shugs chen po dgos pa thams cad grub cing nam yang gzhan du bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// gtor ma gtsang ma stsal bar bgyi'o// ji ste sha za dang / sha
232b2: ba mo grug pa rang tshal na pa lang gis mkhris pa dang / de'i so dang / gu gul dang / shing arka'i 'o ma sbyar te// lam gyi bzhi mdor bdug par bgyi zhing // lhag ma dang 'bags pa'i gtor ma stsal na/ sha za mo de mchi zhing rig sngags
232b3: 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ / ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid pa'i bran du 'gyur/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// dpag tshad stong gi pha rol du mchi zhing skad cig gis slar yang mchi'o// dgos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyid do// dus
232b4: gsum du gtor ma lhag ma'i gtor ma sgo drung du stsal bar bgyi'o/ / nyin gcig bzhin du gser gyi dong tse brgya rdzas su 'jog par 'gyur ro// des thams cad zad par bgyis na phyir zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ji ste rgyal po'i btsun mo
232b5: dkrug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin du khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma gos pa des yungs kar dkar po dang skye che'i sa bon dang / 'ge'u wang dang / pad ma'i 'dab ma dang / rgya mtshwa ba sres pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad
232b6: yongs su bzlas na phye ma'i rjes su bgyis la yungs kar dang / skye che'i sa bon dang m+bAr rtsi'i sa bon lan gcig mnyes la yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ rgyal po'i sgo'am/ lam gyi bani mdo'am/ lam po che 'am
232b7: grong khyer gyi sgor gtor na gang der gom pa bor ba tsam gyis dbang du gyur nas gnas te ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid do/ / rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bkug cing dbang du 'gyur ro// thams cad ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid cing /
232b8: bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// gang bslangs pa de ster te dngul dang / gser dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lbub dang / srung ba dang / gnon pa dang / mal cha dang / 'brul sogs pa stsol bar bgyid do// gang smras pa de bgyid cing

233a1: gang bsgo ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/ / de'i yul gcig tu yang 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyis mchod pa chen po bgyid par 'gyur zhing thams cad du dbang bskur ro// de nas bram ze dbang du bgyid par 'tshal na/ rig
233a2: sngags 'chang nges nas dang / til dang 'bras sa lu dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / thun mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyis na/ rig byed bzhi dang ldan pa'i bram ze thams cad kyis spyi bor bkur ba gcig pur 'gyur ro//
233a3: thams cad du mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur zhing bram ze thams cad la dbang bgyid pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs dbang du bgyid par 'tshal na til dang / 'bras thug po che dang sran mud ga dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / zhun snga
233a4: bsres pa'i sbyin bsreg bgyi ste/ sbyin bsreg stong rtsa rgyad kyi bar du bgyis na thams cad la dbang bsgyur zhing mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro// thams cad dbang du 'gyur bar bgyid do// ji srid 'tshe'i bar du bgyid de tsa
233a5: bgyid pa bgyid cing bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/ / de nas dmangs rigs dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na lan tshwa dang / 'bras sa lu'i phub ma dang / su mu kha'i sa bon dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar sbyar ba'i sbyin bsreg brgya stong
233a6: bgyis na dmang rigs thams cad bran du gyur nas gnas te/ ji srid 'tshe'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// dgra dang phyir rgol ba dang zas kyi dgra thams cad bzlog par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des shring dngar gyi shing gi me sbar
233a7: ba la/ sa bon bdun dang / zho dang / smad rtsi dang / zhun mar dang / sbyar ba'i sbyin pa sreg brgyad stong bgyi'o// brgyad stong rdzogs pa dang / dgra dang phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad
233a8: bzlog par 'tshal na shing tsher ma can gyi me spang ba la 'bras yos dang / yungs dkar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin bsreg brgyad stong bgyi'o// brgyad stong rdzogs na pha rol gyi dmag tshegs thams cad bzlog

233b1: 'gyur ro/ / g.yal bgyed pa bzlog par 'tshal na skye che'i sa bon dang / gu gul dang / b+hang ga'i sa bon dang / zhog chu dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin bsreg bgyis na g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du son pa'i sems can thams cad slar zlog pa
233b2: 'gyur zhing / thams cad du rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro// de nas gdon thams cad las thar par bgyi bar 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang de na bdug pa 'di sbyar bar bgyi ste/ k+She ma ka dang shing dang ra dang // tsa rong dang ne gu gul dang / mu rasa?
233b3: ra ya k+Sha su ra dang / thu ta ke shi mnyam par gzhal/ phub ma dang ni ba la ka/ khyim bya'i sgo nga'i shun lpags dang / sbrul lpags dang ni yung rnam gnyis/ b+ha ga'i sa bon pa lang mkhris/ nya dang legs par sbyar bgyis te/ ra'i gcin gyis bsgres
233b4: pa la lcags kyu'i gsang sngags bzlas pa yis/ / bdug pa dam pa'i gtso bo 'di// thams cad du ni rigs pa ste// stong phrag brgya bcu rtsa bzhi gdon// gang dag sa steng gnas pa rnams// bdug pa'i dri 'dis 'jig 'gyur zhing // mi zad gdon
233b5: rnams 'bros par 'gyur/ / phyogs bcu dag ni g.yo 'gyur shing // sum bcu'i lha dang ri rab g.yo// gnod sbyin srin po'i gnas dag dang // snang ba'i srog chags chen po 'tshig/ gzhan yang sna tshogs drug bcas pa'i sro ga cas
233b6: thams cad 'jig 'gyur ba/ / dri tsam gyis ni dogs pa med// bdug pa 'dis ni bdug byas na// der ni rims ngan mi gnas te// nyin cig pa'i rims dang ni// nyin gnyis pa dang bzhi pa'i rims// gang yang mi bzang khyab 'jug
233b7: rims/ de dag thams cad 'jig 'gyur zhing // skad cig gis ni gtan nas 'joms// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// bam po nyi shu gsum pa/ de nas mig bsku ba'i sman brjod par bya'o// gdon
233b8: thams cad 'joms pa gang gis mig bskus pa tsam gyis gdon ma rungs pa 'bros par 'gyur ro/ / ro stod kyi nad thams cad 'joms par 'gyur te/ mig bskus pa tsam gyis de thams cad med par 'gyur te dogs pa mi bya'o//

234a1: mig gi nang ni ling tog dang / skya bor gyur pa dang / rab rib dang / chu bur can dang / chu zag pa dang / tshag po dang / ha sa rA dza dang / byis pa'i mchi ma dang / mig tu sme ba byung ba dang / khrag dang / rlung dang / bdakan dang / mkhris pa dang / rdul
234a2: 'byung ba dang / 'brum bu dang / g.ya' ba dang mig skams pa dang / mdongs pa dang / glad pan ba dang / glang ba'i gzhog phyed na ba dang / khan dang na pa dang lag 'a de dag 'joms par 'gyur ro// mig sman gyis mig bskus pa tsam gyis rims
234a3: thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / nad thams cad sel ba dang / mod la nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// de ltar na mig sman mchog tu grub pa/ bgegs thams cad sel
234a4: ba dang / / ma rungs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa sems can thams cad la dbang byed pa/ thams cad du rgyal bar byed pa/ mig sman rtag tu mchog tu dkon pa/ gsang ba la thug pa thar par byed pa/ btson ra nas gang thar bar byed
234a5: pa/ / rgyal po dag gang la khros pa las dgod cing smra bar 'gyur te/ nam 'tsho'i bar du rtag tu bu bzhin yongs su bskyong zhing gnas pa/ dus thams cad mod la med par byed pa ni/ mig sman mchog yin no// bsam pa ngan cing sdang ba'i
234a6: sems can dang / dgra dang phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang 'gyed pa dag mig sman gyis bskus pas mthong na dbang du 'gyur te gnas so// ma he gtum po dang / glang po che dang / rlung dang / ser ba dang / steng 'amathon po nas g.yang du lhung ba dang / me'i phung
234a7: po dang / / khyib rdib pa dang / g.yang sar ltung ba rnams mig sman gyis mig bskus pas mthong na zhi bar 'gyur zhing / gzhan yang bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs byed de 'dal dogs par mi bya'o// yung ba dang / skyer ba dang / na le sham dang
234a8: be pi li dang / shi rig ber dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / ud pa la sngon po dang / ldong ros dang / gur gum la sogs pa'i mig sman dang / rgyam tshwa dang spang spos dang / rgya mtsho'i sbu ba dang / dung phye dang / 'di rnams lhan cig tu phye ma zhib

234b1: mor byas pa la gsang sngags lan bdan bzlas te ga bung dang / gla rtsir bsnams pa'i mig bsku ba'i sman lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ mig sku na dri ma thams cad sel cing sdig
234b2: pa dang / / gzhan sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// mun pa thams cad kyi nang du nyi ma bzhin du skye bo thams cad kyi nang du mdzes par 'gyur ro// de nas ri lu bshad par bya ste/ sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa
234b3: nad thams cad sel bar 'grub pa/ bgegs thams cad med par byed pa/ gdon thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong pa/ mod la dug thams cad med par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad
234b4: sel ba/ bcings pa thams cad gcod par byed pa/ g.yul thams cad las rgyal ba sbyin zhing dge ba/ dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/ rtag tu dug thams cad 'joms pa/ rgyal po'i sgor mdzes par 'gyur ba/ nor dang
234b5: 'bru 'phel bar 'gyur ba/ rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / chu dang / me dang / dug dang / glang po che med par byed pa/ sbrul ma rungs pa dang / byi ba'i dug gis 'jigs pa dang / khyim 'jigs pa dang / ri snyil ba dang / seng ge dang stag dang / dom
234b6: la sogs pa rab tu rgyu ba dang / gnod pa dang bcings pa'i tshe 'gro bar dka' ba 'byung ba dang / nad dang rims 'joms pa/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba med par byed pa tshe dang nad med par byed pa 'phel ba/ skyes pa dang / budamar
234b7: dang / / gnon nu ma rnams mchog tu bde bar 'gyur ba ste gang gis ri lu bcangs na thams cad du rgyal ba 'thob cing gdon 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ rnam par log 'dren gyis ma yin no// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po
234b8: dang / / sha za dang / brjed byed ma rungs pa rnams ri lu mthong ba tsam gyis phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur ro// 'dis byis pa gsong bar mi byed do// sman 'di la reg pa tsam gyis khyim der dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / nab

235a1: thams cad dang / nad las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur ro// 'bras dang pol mig dang / lhog pa dang / 'brum phran mched pa dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / medze dang / 'brum bu ma ched pa dang / sha bkral bskus pa tsam gyis byang bar
235a2: 'gyur ro/ / lus thams cad du zhugs pa'i nad la chu dron po dang 'thungs pa tsam la sogs pas yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs skrag pa thams cad las rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa chen po las thams cad rjes su
235a3: 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ / gnas thams cad du song ba la sbyar ba byas nas thams cad 'kho bar 'gyur ro// de nas rdzas su bya ba ni bu shel ci dang / tsan dan dang / rgya spos dang / ru rta dang / rdo dreg dang / pad tra dang / tsha ma ka dang / sha mi dang / padam
235a4: batra dang / / ud pal dang / nal dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / tsha ba gsum dang / sug spel dang / btsod dang / su ga ri dang / ra dzan rnam gnyis dang / spri ka dang / sri rtsa pog dang gur gum la sogs pa dang rab tu ldan pa dang / de dag kun bsras
235a5: zhib mor btags la khar dang / chu dang sbyar bas ril lu byas la gsang sngags brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te/ grib ma la skams pa de ni sman grub pa yin te/ thams cad rgyal bar byed cing dge ba yin no// rnga dang / rnga bo che dang / dungal
235a6: ri lu mchog bskus te/ gnas 'thon por song ste/ dung gi sgra dang / rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga ji srid du thos pa de srid tsam du 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro// dug dang bcas pa ni thams cad dug med par 'gyur te dogs par mi bya'o// nad
235a7: thams cad dang / mi ngas thams cad dang / yams kyi nad dang / lo nyes thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// bde zhing legs pa nyid du 'gyur ro// gang dag mtshams med pa byed pa'i sems can sdig pa can dmyal ba la gzhol ba dag gis
235a8: sgra thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad byang ste/ bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// gos la bdugs na bdag nyid mchod pa chen po 'thob cing thams cad la dbang byed par gnas pa dang / don

235b1: grub pa bla na med pa yin no/ / nor dang 'bru rab tu 'phel zhing dgos pa sgrub pa bla na med pa yin no// thams cad mchod pa dang / rtag tu tshig bzung ba 'os par 'gyur ro// rgyal po gang la khros pa las rgod cing smra bar 'gyur ro// bud/
235b2: med rnams kyi gnad chen po 'gyur zhing rtag tu nad med par 'gyur ro// rtag tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu dpal dang gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu glang po che bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa dang / shi nas
235b3: mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la mchis pa ni don yod yangs pa'i
235b4: lcags kyu zhes bya ba don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzungs chen po'i cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / dkyil 'khor chen po lta ba dang / sgrub pa dang / blags pas 'grub pa don yod pa chen po rnam par
235b5: 'phrul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi dam tshig grub pa lags so// gang gis pad ma rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mtha' dag dang // phyag rgya dang / rim par phye ba dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga dang / bde bar bsgrub pa
235b6: mtha' dag ni rigs kyi spyi thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i rjes su 'jug pa bsgrub pa 'gyur ba lags so/ / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / pad ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen//
235b7: po'od dpag med pa'i snying po mchog dang po rdo rje rin po che rje mo mchog dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dmatshig las thams cad du rjes su zhugs shing dam tshig shes par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad du byin gyis rlabs par 'gyur ba de
235b8: rig sngags 'chang ba de thams cad mchog tu grub par bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sems can thams cad la rjes su brtse ba'i slad du bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i dbus su bsgrags par bgyi'o// rigs pa'i

236a1: 'jig rten gyi bud med dang / skyes pa dang khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir bshad par bgyi'o// thub pa yang dag par rjes su stsal bar gyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de zhin
236a2: gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dag cing shin du yongs su dag pa yin te/ leg so
236a3: legs so/ / rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad dang / sems can thams cad dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la bstan par bya ba shod
236a4: cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rigs thams cad kyi spyi grub pa dam tshig gi rjes su 'jug par byin gyis brlabs so// ngas kyang de dag byin gyis brlabs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags
236a5: ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar don yod pa'i rgyal po'i pad ma'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po shad pa/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i yang dag pa mchog pa grub pa/ bsgrub pa dam pa ni sa dad pa'i lci bas dkyil
236a6: 'khor gru bzhi bya ba ni shin du mdzes pa shin du 'jam por bya'o/ / tshon sna lngas rnam par dbye ba ni grwa dang bcas par rnam par dbye bar bya'o// tshon sna tshogs kyis bri ba dang / dkyil 'khor gru bzhir thig bdab pa ni mnyam par thig gis dbye bar
236a7: bya ste/ / sgo bzhir cha dbye bar bya'o// chu zheng du khru bzhi tshad tsam du dbye bar bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po ni tshad khru par byas la/ tshen sna lnga'i sgal bu dang / tshon sa las dbye bar bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la pad ma
236a8: dkar po kha bye ba zlum por bya'o/ / pad ma kha bye ba'i dbus su zhags pa dang / lcags kyu dang / pad ma gnas par bya ba ni klu mgo gdengs ka 'dra ba lcags kyu dang bcas pa dang / lag pa dang bcas pas pad ma'i lcags kyus 'dzin pa dang / 'bar

236b1: ba'i dang na 'dug par bya'o/ / tshor sna tshogs kyis bri'o// pad ma kha bye ba'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni lcags kyu dang bcas pa'i skal bur bya'o// nang dang phyi'i bar du ni ring po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya'o// lcags kyi'i byi ros kyi sgal bu ni zla ba
236b2: yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gis bya'o/ / zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i phyi rol gyi skal bu ri mdung rtse gsum pa bri bar bya'o// mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni phyag rgya phyag na thogs pa bri bar bya ste/ mtshon cha sna tshog
236b3: dang me tog rnams so/ / kun la 'bar ba'i phreng ba dang / 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bri bar bya'o// phyag gi phyag rgya'i phyi rol gyi skal bu ni stegs bu dang 'dra bar bya'o// stegs bu'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni 'khor bar lcags kyu bri bar bya'o// snying po'i
236b4: dkyil 'khor gyi grwa ra ni rgyal po bzhi go bgos pa lcags kyu dang / mdung rtse gcig pa thogs pa 'bar ba'i nang na 'dug pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dkyil mo dkrung phye du bcas te/ pad mo'i gdan la 'dug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi
236b5: rol thog thag tu 'jigs pa med pas phyag mtshan rnams thams cad pad ma la 'dug pa bri bar bya'o/ / sgo ba'i gnas su pad ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bri ba ni shar gyi sgor lag na rdo rje/ lhor ral pa gcig ma/ nub tu rdo rje ljags sgrog
236b6: byang du po nya mo dang / rig sngags kyi lha mo rnams bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi sgal bu mi me tog gi stegs bu 'dra bar bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor ni kun du ba'i lci bas bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor de la nas phyes pad
236b7: ma bri bar bya'o/ / dkyil 'khor kun du bum pa gang ba dang / dar btags pa'i mda' dang / dri'i snod bkang bas brgyan cing byug pa'i chu dgang ba dang / bdug pa'i snod kyis brgyan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang / dri chab dang /
236b8: mchod yon gyi cha ba dang / 'bras dang / yon cha ba dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / gser gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog gis 'jigs pa med par brgyan par bya'o// mu tig dang / byi ru dang / rin po che bai dUr+ya dang sngon po dang mar gang dang / pad ma rAg

237a1: rnams yang ban du ba/ / dbyal pa' ban dra dang bas la dang / rlud bya dang / kus dang / rus kyis brgyan par bya'o/ dkyil 'a bar bye du dnga'i byed dpal 'khor gyi sgrub pa shis pa rnams dang / na
237a2: gnas su ni chab kyi bum pa dar gyis brgyan te bzhag par bya'o/ / dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol thog thag tu ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag pa dang / bum bu dang / byam bum dang / bum pa dang / rte gu dang / kham por dang / bum pa gang ba rnams byas te/
237a3: gzhag go bog phor dang / gtor ma bzang po sna tshogs dang // me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya// phreng ba bzang pos brgyan par bya// tshon sna lnga pa'i ba dan gdags tshon sna lnga pa'i srad bu seng ldeng gi phur bul btags pa gzugs par bya/ kun tu mar pe
237a4: phrang ba dang / / mar me'i sdong bu bzhi yang de bzhin no// mkhas pas dkyil 'khod kyi nang du bdug pa dbul ba ni a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / hu rus ka dang / spri ka rnams kyis bdug pa ga bur dang // gla rtsis bsgos pa bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi bdug
237a5: ba ni gu gul dang / sil la ki dang / kun tu ri'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas gos sar pa bgos te/ gtsang mar byas nas maN+Dal gyi las su bya ba'i cho ga dang / lcags kyu'i rig sngags bzlas brjod bya ba dang / slob ma
237a6: gzhag cing dkyil 'khor gyi dmatshig dang / phyag rgya dang / ba'i rnam lnga la reg par bya ste/ mkhas pas phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags brjod cing don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags chen po ni thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// mtshams bcing ba
237a7: dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / spyi gtsug bcing ba dang / 'jug pa dang / dam tshig dang / khrus bya ba dang / gos bgo ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bskor ba dang / de dag thams cad la skyer bar bya'o// sbyin bsreg dang / bzlas brjod kyi cogazhi ba dang /
237a8: rgyas pa dang / mngon spyod dang / dgug pa dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang / de bzhin du yang dag par sprul pa dang / las thams cad la rig sngags 'chang bas thams cad du sbyar na myur zhing rdzogs par 'chang shing des na

237b1: chu bza ga / / babyang ze dang / 'azhig pa ga bad / drang bus pan dang / d+ha dang/ sra sa dang / du sa dang / dang na ma byu gas/ skye mo nga sanamal
237b2: pad pa dang / mchod yon gyi dkyil 'khor la dbul ba dang / dadag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang bar dus thams cad du nges par bya'o// don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags dran par bya ste grub pa mchog dang / las thams cad bsgru pa dang / gang dang gang du
237b3: gos pa la dran par bya'o/ / gsang sngags de nyid kyis slar gshegs su gsol lo// gsang sngags gzhan dang bsre bar mi bya ste/ phyag rgya dang gsang sngags 'di ni dpa' bo gcig tu blags pas grub pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang
237b4: chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kya byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ yang dag par 'grub cing mchog sbyin par byed pa yin no// don yod pa'i lcags klu'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i
237b5: dkyil 'khor 'di mthong ba ni sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'dag cing sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa rnams sngar bsags pa rnams rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i grub pa bde ba dang / 'jig rten pa
237b6: rol tu 'bras bu chen po bde ba dang / shi ba'i dus byas nas bde ba can du song ste pad ma'i nang nas rgyal ba'i spyan sngar rdzus te skye ba dang / kha ton byed na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang / gang zhig 'chang ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas
237b7: kyi zhing stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed thams cad kyi sgo phye ste 'dug cing gang du 'dod pa der 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal ba thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing spyi bor phyag bzhag ste/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing dus kun tu bla na med pa'i
237b8: byang chub tu phung ston par 'gyur ro/ / di na skye 'i tham yin te/ chos kyi lakho la bskor pa'i bar dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du yin gyi gzhan du skye bar po 'gyur ro// jig tan 'din dga' bar 'gyur zhing zla ba dang / ma can dang /

238a1: gyi mchod pa dang / sems can kun gyis mchod par 'os pa ni ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro// nor dang 'bru 'phel ba dang / gos dang / rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / rgyal po dang / btsun mor bcas pa thams cad bya ba ci yod ces bran
238a2: bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/ / lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa ni phyir mi ldog pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'di ngan 'gror yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing rtag tu bde zhing dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad dga' ba dang / byams par 'gyur ro// lha
238a3: thams cad kyis lus can shin du bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po la bel bar 'gyur shing nyi ma bzhin du gzi brjid 'bar bar 'gyur ro// sdug cing
238a4: bzang po mchog tu blta bar 'os par 'gyur ro/ / dpal gyis dus rtag tu 'bar zhing shin du rgyas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa snyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
238a5: rnams kyi drung nas dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ / bsod nams chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lcags bu'i dkyil 'khor du gang zhi gzhugs pa tsam dang dkyil 'khor de lta bu la me tog gcig dbul ba dang / ril bu gcig
238a6: tsam gyi bdug pa dbul ba'i sems can de dag ni gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa 'bus phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi me tog sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang gang
238a7: kA krung gi ce dgu bcu rtsa dgu/ 'bus phrag bye ba khrag khrig stang kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la snga tshogs me mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// dug pa mang po nas par bya ba'i sbyin las can dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / gong shing shi'i
238a8: 'dren pa'i 'byung ba ra 'byeng / ba dag shegs pa thams cad pa dzad pa'i byi rim par bye ba cu 'bregs par 'gyur ro// la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis legs sa nas bya bar myid bar nga dang /

238b1: ris bu gas ga so// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa 'di ni mchog tu grub pa bla na med pa yin no// de dag gis me tog dang / bdug pas dkyil 'khor mchod pa ni bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba chen po yongs su rdzogs pa dang pa
238b2: rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / bsgrub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa sgra dngas gzigs dbang phyug rtag tus cig sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ra// rtag tu mthong bar bzhed par 'gyur ro/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar
238b3: 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu don yod pa'i lcags kyu grub pa grub par 'gyur ro// tshig zung bar bya bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzhin 'dzum par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug
238b4: chen po dang / lha'i bu rnams bsrung ba dang / spang ba dang skyob pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang ba chen por 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgyas btab cing byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de'i sa phyogs kyang mchod rten snyam du sems
238b5: shing mchod rten ring bsrel can du 'gyur ro/ / sems can gang dag de la blta ba'i phyir song ba'i sems can de dag sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / dug thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang / rims dang / mya ngan thams
238b6: cad las bral bar 'gyur ro/ / nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// rtag tu 'jig rten thams cad kyis bla mar 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad las phyir rgol ba thamra
238b7: cad dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa las thar bar 'gyur ro// dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// 'di nas shi na bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// tha na ri dgas dang / bya dag
238b8: gnas te phyogs su nye bar song ba de dag sgrib pa thams cad dang / de'i sngon gyi tshe la yongs su bsags pa de dag lhag ma ma lus pa ni yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad bde 'gro la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// ngan song dang ngan

239a1: 'gro'i 'jigs pa med par mtha' byang chub la thug gi bar du'o/ / de nas don yod pa'i lcags kyu ras la sku gzugs bri ba'i cho ga brjod par bya ste/ gnas thams cad du bla na med pa grub pa ni sdig pa thams cad mod la sreg par
239a2: byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad 'phrog pa de bzhin du nad thams cad sel ba/ sgrib pa thams cad sbyong ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir gang dkyil 'khor
239a3: chen por kun du lung bstan pa/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa mchog tu dkon pa/ yid la re ba thams cad 'phral du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba// bkra shis thams cad sgrub pa/ bsod nams thams cad sogs pa/ myur du nor dang / 'bru
239a4: sbyin par mdzad pa/ bsgrub pa yang dag par grub par bya ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'grub pa/ bzlas brjod 'grub pa yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'grub pa/ pha rol du phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs pa/ de kho na
239a5: nyid rnam par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i bsod nams chen po skye bar 'gyur ro/ / nam byang chub yang dag par 'thob kyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i lcags kyu cho 'phrul chen po'i ras kyi sku gzugs
239a6: cher po mthong ba la sogs pa ni byis ngan 'gro'i gnas su mi 'gro zhing sdig pa'i las kyis mi gos pa dang sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa dang sdig pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / ngan song las thar bar
239a7: 'bru ba dang dmyal ba mazang pa rnam pa las thar par 'gyur ro/ / rabs kun drub ba dang / dkar gyi 'di la ma gakyang na pa'i bang bldan gyis grub pathob par 'gyur ro// bkren pa yang yangs skyed dang / byug pa mtshungs pa yang
239a8: pa ma chog mod la thob par 'gyur ro/ / lha'i dpal thob par 'gyur ro// 'khor bzang po bdog par 'gyur ro// rgyal po rnams kyis bla mar bya zhing rtag tu dus thams cad du mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rags da /

239b1: rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa rnams rtag tu dbang du bya ste/ bdug cing thams cad bsnyen bkur byed cing bdug pa ni ras sku gzugs la mchod pa bla na med pa yin no// ras gruba'i khyon kun khru gang ngam/ khru do ba la
239b2: legs par btags pa/ ras 'jam po thag ran bzang po gnyen po shin tu dag par bkrus pa gtsang mar byas pa'am/ yang na dang yug gam/ yang na mon dar ram/ shun phrags la zla ba yar gyi chos bcwa lnga tshang ba'i bar du ras kyi sku gzugs blan
239b3: med pa bri bar bya'o/ / snod gtsang ma sar pa'i nang du tshon lhag ma ma yin pa blugs te/ ras kyi sku gzugs gsal bar bri bar ni tshon sna tshogs kyis rnam par dbye bar bya'o// dbus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mgon po bri ba ni
239b4: dkyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal gsum pa/ mchog tu bzang ba// zhal dang po ni mdzes shing sdug pa/ dbu lcang lo dang thor tshugs kyis brgyan bcod pan la 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/ dbu skra'i 'khyil bar bya'o//
239b5: matog gi phreng ba bcing bar bya'o// phreng ba'i gong du 'od dpag med bya'o// cod pan la zla ba byed pa dang / 'od 'dom gang bya'o// kun du lcags kyu bya'o// kun du 'bar ba'i phreng ba bya'o// phyag bzhi la phyag g.yon na pad ma'i lcags kyu// g.yas
239b6: namadung rtse gsum pa'i lcags kyu/ g.yon gcig na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu g.yas gcig na rdo rje lcags kyu dbugs 'byin par bya'o// gdan seng ge'i pad mo bya'o// g.yon du lha mo sgrol ma'o// g.yas su dkar mo ste// me tog sna tshogs
239b7: thogs pa/ / bcom ldan 'das kyizhal du lta brgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad ma la bzhugs par/ 'bar ba'i rang na bzhugs par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyab tu rin po che'i shing lhag phran dang / yal ga dang / chas pa
239b8: rin po re sna tshogs kyis spras par bya'o/ / ne tso dang / re bye kas dang / shang shar te'u dang / rma bya dang / bya ka la bai da ka rin po che'i gseb na rgyu bar bya'o// shing gi gong spyi bol khang bu rtsegs ma dang bcas pa'i gzhal med khang gi nang du de bzhin gshegs

240a1: pa gsub rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzhugs par bya'o/ / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.yon du srin mo ral pa gcig ma bya'o// g.yas su lag na rdo rje khros pa'i gad mo 'byin pa'i gzugs mche ba gtsigs pa/ swa gyen du brjes
240a2: pa/ lcar lo dang cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje thogs shing rdo rje gsor po/ nam mkha' la lta ba bya'o// spad du gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o// gong du dbang po dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug
240a3: chen po lha'i bu bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o/ / g.yas phyogs su tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams btud de bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa'o// g.yon du dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal
240a4: po rgya mtsho rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa'o/ / g.yas kyi gnas gcig tu rig sngags 'chang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du pus mo btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal ru lta zheng me tog sna
240a5: tshogs kyi sdong bu dang / pog por dang / bgrang phreng lag na thogs pa bya'o// phyogs bzhi ngos kun du ris bskor ba la ri dgas kyi tshogs sna tshogs kyis gdang/ shing sna tshogs me tog dang / lcag ma can bya'o// 'bras bu sna tshogs can gyi
240a6: shing dang b+ha ga ma bya'o/ / gnas so sor drang srong rnams dang / grul bum gyi shing bya'o// tshul de ltar don yod pa'i lcags kyu ra sa la bris te gnas gtsad ma dben par bzhag la rig sngags 'chang bas 'bad pa chen pos mchod par bya'o//
240a7: ma ga ru dang / du rus ka dang / can dan gyis bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// ci nus par don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bya'o// nyi ma re re ras la sku gzugs bris pa mthong ba tsam gyi mo dal mtshams med pa lnga la sogs
240a8: 'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / mnar med par gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams yongs su dag cing zad par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / nad thams cad

240b1: yongs sa zad pa dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur ro// ser sna dang / phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gzugs grub pa chen po sor sor thob par 'gyur ro// mthong ba tsam gyi mo la
240b2: dang ga tu'abras bu chen po rnyed pa rgya chen por 'gyur ro/ / lan 'ga' yang log par ltung bar 'grobar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thabs cad mthong bathob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs
240b3: 'gyur ro/ / thams cad kyis rgyun du bsrungs zhing rjes su bzung bar 'gyur ro// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba cam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du mthong ba dang /
240b4: 'dra bar rig par bya'o// gang shig ras kyi sku gzugs 'di la legs par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis bya ba byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bskur byed pa de ni phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi ni dgang gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcurgya dgu dang panyam hA
240b5: de bzhin gshegs pa 'bus phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing la mchod par 'gyur ro/ / de nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni rab tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po chen pa yangs su/
240b6: bzung bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsab rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro// dge ba bsam pa yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas byang
240b7: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa stan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rig sngags 'chang thams cad grub par bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sems
240b8: can gyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar bgyi ba'i phyir don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po rim par phye ba rnams bstan pa lags so// bcom

241a1: ldan 'das yang bdag la mchis pa ni don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor tu rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi khro bo chen po'i las grub tu 'gyur ba dang bsam pa dang / yid la re ba thams cad yongs su
241a2: rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma rungs pa brtson pa med pa// brtse ba'i bsam pa med pa ni gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin
241a3: pa thams cad thag 'jug pa/ ma rungs pa'i bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad rab tu dul bar mdzad pa/ bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / phung bar byed pa/ sems can ma rungs pa thams cad skrag par
241a4: byed pa/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad 'ching ba dang / gcod pa dang / 'bigs pa dang / rdung ba dang / gtor ba dang / lus rnam par zhig par byed pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'dir bdag gis pad mo rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i
241a5: zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du don yod pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu'i brjod par bgyi ste/ dkyil 'khor dang cho ga zhib mo thams cad du/ srung bar byed pa
241a6: 'chos par byed pa/ dam tshig 'dzin pa gnas thams cad la rjes su sbyong ba ste/ de ni sgrub par byed pa/ bsgrub pa 'grub par byed pa'i mchog de bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba chen po'i slad du bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen po
241a7: byin gyis brlabs cing rjes su gnang ba mdzod cig dang / rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad mchog tu 'grub pa'i snying po dag sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das rjes su stsal pa/
241a8: bgyi'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag rgya

241b1: na pos pa gnas ba te/ ngas kyang ban gyis bdabs spyod cing ba na gshegs pa dag bcas pa yang dag par drugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang byug tus pa ba cing byin kyis pa bas kyis smras shagasung ngas gzigs dang /
241b2: b+hag rig sngags 'chang thams cad gas ba pa lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'chang ba dang / rdo rje'i snying po thams cad dam tshig la gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang sgra ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang /
241b3: bru chen po thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba smras shig/ spyan ris gzigs dbang phyug reg sngags 'char thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i gaskabs dang / mtshag grub par byas shog/ de nas byang chub sems da
241b4: sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bsgo zhing dbugs phyung ba thos nas snying dga'/ sprin ma bskums dpral ba phyed khros par byas// gdong khro gnyer du byas// mche ba ni
241b5: gtsigs/ spyan ras gzigs kyi lus 'khor mang po'i nang du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas don yod pa'i zhags pa khro bo'i rgyal po 'di smras pa/ dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub
241b6: sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
241b7: yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// shA ra dwa ti'i bu blo gros can la phyag 'tshal lo// drang srong chen po'i tshigs la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba byams pa la sogs pa byang
241b8: chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / khams gsum pa'i bdag po nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// khro bo'i rgyal po rig sngags kyi rgyal

242a1: po chen po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad ya thA/ oM bi ki ta/
242a2: bta na/ ma hA kro d+ha rA dzA b+ha ya ka ra/ ma hA dang Sh+Ta/ aT+Ta Ta hA sa/ dz+wa la dz+wa la ma hA dz+wa la/ mA la ma hA ro'u dra/ rU pa b+ha yang kar na/ ha na ha na/ sarba duSh+Ta/ yak+Sha rak+Sha sAn/ da ha da ha/ sarba duSh+Ta/ nA gA nAn/ pa tsa pa tsa/ sarba duSh+Ta/ b+hig+h+na bi nA ya kAn/
242a3: pA ta ya/ pA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Ta satwA na/ b+ho b+ho ma hA kro d+ha rA dza ma ni/ kan ka/ badz+ra be dUr+ya/ a la kri ti/ sha rI ran/ badz+ra ba ra shu bA sha ta stA ya/ ma hA pad ma ma ang ku sha/ b+hu dzA ya/ ma hA pad ma A sa nA ya/ ma hA pad ma bi ka tsagan+d+ha ya/ a mo//
242a4: g+ha a pra ti ha ta/ bal ba rI kra mA ya/ sa ha sra/ bi d+yA ya/ sarba b+huta/ b+ha ya ka rA ya sarbe ba b+ha ba na kam pa ud p+ta ShA ya/ ma hA bi kri ta/ ba da nA ya/ nA ra sid ta mu ShA ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ badz+ra dz+wa la/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA tsaN Ta/ be ka dngar/ tsa ra tsa ra/
242a5: tsar/ tsa tsa ra/ ni sha tsa tsa ra/ mi shwa ra/ b+hI ku TI mu kha/ hUM hUM phaT/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ sarba bA ba ki la bi Sha ha ra/ ma hA ma ni/ te dza d+ha ra/ pad ma hasta/ oM pad ma ang ku sha/ b+hu dze/ ta rA ya mAn tra ma ya/ big+h+nAM/ shA sA a/ duSh+TA nan shwa
242a6: sarba pA pa pa ra tra hU~M phaT swA hA/ pa sha tastA ya swA hA/ pad ma d+hA dA ya swA hA/ sa ma shA sa kA ya swA hA/ a mo g+ha ba ra da rA ya sA hA// kro d+had+ha dza d+ha yang ka R+Sha ya swA hA/ prahA be Sha d+ha d+ha ya swA hA// trai lo kya pU dzi tA ya swA tA// ya ma/ ba ru ni/ ku ba ra/
242a7: na maHkr-i ta ya sA hA/ badz+ra d+har pU dzi tA ya swA hA/ mahAk+Sha yAmA tri ga Na/ pa/ di ta/ budzi tA ya swA hA/ de ba gan/ ban di tA ya sAt+ma/ nA ga Ad+hA ya swA hA/ oM b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hI d+ha ri/ b+hu du b+hu r+ya/ sarba mata DA la a d+hiSh+Thi te sa ma ya swA hA/
242a8: sarba mur+tha a d+hiSh+Thi ta mu drA ya sA hA/ oM a mo g+ha pa ring / ma hA dang Da/ A gra sha badz+re hU~M/ ma hA pad ma/ a shwa sa d+ha ra/ na mo stu te/ a mo g+ha a~M ku sha hU~M phaT swA hA// khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / lha'i gnas dang /

242b1: sa pa dang / yang babs pa ma gnas dang sa pa dang / gnasam ba rnams kun du 'phul ba/ nga gsus carkang can par 'dzag tan bya'ams rnam pacugatug sa sa/ ma bus pa klu dang / skam pan dang gan tu /
242b2: phrin po dang / 'byung po dang / shan thams cad dang / bdud la sogs pa dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa dang / gnod sbyin madrangs pa rnams pa srub tu 'phel lo// ma rungs pa thams cad kyi khyim kun du tshigate 'bar ga/ kun du 'bar/
242b3: 'bar/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur cing bsregs pa dang / ngu zhing 'gro ldog ste/ tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa chen po myong ngo // lha thams cad shin du 'khrugs shing skrag go// bdud kyi rigs rnams breng nas khas btags so// 'jig rten gsum gyi
242b4: bdag po thams cad kun du 'khrugs so/ / rgya mtshor gnas pa'i klu dang / rgya mtsho'i klu chen po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dag kyang kun du 'khrugs shing shin tu skrag ste snying 'dar ro// gzhan yang sa'i steng na klu stong phrag brgya gnas pa dang
242b5: rgya mtsho chu'i nang gi klu gang dag dang / ri la gnas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kun du 'khrugs skrag gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur cing gdungs so// rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams gnas na 'dug na yang skrag go/ nag po chen po dang tshogs
242b6: chen po ri gtso bo dang ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba de dag thams cad skrag cing snying 'dar ro/ / gnas la rten pa'i bdud kyi gnas rnams 'dar ro// 'bar kun du 'bar te gnas dang bcas par bsreg go de nas 'khor de'i nang gi lha dang /
242b7: klu rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi steng rol nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog sna tshogs 'thor ro// lha rdzas kyi rgyan spyad pa sna tshogs dang / chos gos kyi char pa 'bebs so// mchod pa'i las byed cing tsan dan gyi chu char
242b8: pas sa la chag chag 'debs so/ / lha rdzas kyi gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / rin po che sna bdun rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje lus 'ab shing rdo rje

243a1: gsor te/ shin tu 'gying pag tu seng ge'i 'gros kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la bde logs su song ste nye bar phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
243a2: bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ / zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gi rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i phreng ba bcom ldan 'das phyag na pad ma la phul te zla ba yid du 'ong
243a3: ba'i dri ma med pa'i me tog gi phreng ba rin po che sna tshags kyis smras pa 'di dbul longs spyod pa'i phyir dang / bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad thugs rje chen po bzhes su gsol gang gis bdag yun ring bar phan pa dang / bdi bar 'gyur
243a4: lags so/ / khro bo chen po'i yang chen po bshad cing gang dran pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ gang dag bdud ma rungs pa dang / gang dag klu ma rungs pa dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po
243a5: dang / 'byung po dang / sha za ma rungs pa dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa rnams khyim dang bcas te/ lus kun du tshig cing rab tu 'bar nas kha sbub tu 'gyel cing sreg go// shi la thug pa dang srog skams par 'gyur ba'i don yod pa'i lcags kyu khro
243a6: bo'i rgyal po ni dus thams cad du mgo'i spyi bor blang bar bgyi'o/ / bcang ngo // bsgom mo// mchod do// rgyas par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gang gi lan khro bo'i rgyal po 'chang bar 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge slong
243a7: dang / dge slong pa dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs kyi lag na thogs pa 'am/ lus la thogs pa 'am/ lta ba 'am/ dridra ba 'am/ than tho
243a8: bo'i rgyal po nyan pa tsam de yang bcom ldan 'das bdag gis khur du bkur bar bgyi'o/ / spyi bos spang bar bgyi'o// bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// bsam pa dang yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par

243b1: bgyi'o/ / grub pa chen po'i chen po rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa thams cad so so bsal bar bgyi'o// rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / smra bar bgyi'o//
243b2: rtag tu dus thams cad du mthong ba rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel cing phun sum tshogs par yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// lus la stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang gzi brjid bskyed
243b3: cing bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi grogs bgyi'o// dgra thams cad sa sar bsal bar bgyi'o// nor dang 'bru dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / sprad pa dang / rgyan rjes su sbal bar bgyi'o// khu gcig pa 'dra bar rjes su bskyang
243b4: bar bgyi'o/ / dad pa dang / gus pas dus kun du mchog tu mos par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces
243b5: khyod kyis khas blangs pa chog tu bzang po byas pa 'di legs so legs so zhes smras te/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gi phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa blangs te/ lag na rdo rje la rjes su
243b6: brtse ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir dang / dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyis yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
243b7: dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad dkyil 'khor gang yin pa 'dir 'dug cing dam tshig la gnas pa rnams yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir ji kha bzhin du 'dug te/ de bzhin gshegs
243b8: pa'i dbu'i gong du gtor ro/ / de nas phreng ba de nam mkha' de la gtor ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbu'i steng du zla ba yid du 'ong ba/ dri ma med pa'i me tog de khang bu brtsegs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs

244a1: kyis smras pa 'od 'char bka ba bzhi dang / sgo bzhi legs par rnam par 'byes pa gru bzhi snyam pa chu zheng shin du rgya che ba/ zhin dang yangs pa me tog kad dag gis mdzes pa/ gzhal med khang sna tshogs sa yongs su gyur te gardza
244a2: so/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' dbu'i steng tha kar yang de bzhin du zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog rin po che sna tshogs spras pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i gzhas med khang du shin du gnas so// de lag na rdo rje dbu'i steng gi tha kar
244a3: yang zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog khang bu brtsegs par shin du gnas so/ / de 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng thog thag tu yang zla ba yid du 'ong ba'i dri ma med pa'i me tog khang bu brtsegs par nor bu rin po che chen
244a4: po lha'i bu dang / tshangs pa dang // khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams lag na rnga yab thogs nas g.yob cing 'dug go/ de dag kyang 'khor 'dus pa chen po mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas so// dkyil 'khor gyi ri
244a5: pa'i rgyal po'i lha de dag thams cad kyang nam mkha' la zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog khang bu brtsegs pa'i phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis sbas pa khang bu brtsegs pa'i nang na 'khod pa ni nyam dang zla ba sra ba bzhin dang / nas
244a6: mkha' la zla ba nya ba ni r+g+ha skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba sra ba bzhin du spa bar gnas so// me tog de dag gis nang na lha rdzas kyis zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog sna tshogs dang / lha rdzas kyi pad ma dang / ku
244a7: muta dang / prand ri ka dang / man dA ra ba dang / ma hA man dA ra ba dang / me tog ro tsa dang / ma hA ro tsa dang / me tog sa la dang / tAl ga dang / ma tog tam la dang / tsam pa ka dang / me tog a d+hi mug ta dang / me tog a sho ka dang / matog pa ta la dang /
244a8: me tog ni la dang ma hA nI la dang / me tog gan d+ha ra b+ha rA ka dang / me tog sum na dang / ta ra na dang / ku ya ka'i me tog char gyi rgyun phab po// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor chen po la mchod pa'i phyir dang // lha rdzas kyi chos gos spud

244b1: ba dang rgyan sna tshogs kyi char ji srid du char 'bab cing phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod do/ / de ltar na cho 'phrul che ba'i che ba dag snang ngo // rol mo'i sgra yan lag lnga pa dag kyang ma brdungs par nam mkha' la sgra 'byung ngo //
244b2: 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal pobam po nyi shu bzhi pa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
244b3: dbang phyug la legs so/ / zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po mchog tu dkon pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po 'di smras te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu grub par bya ba'i phyir ma rungs pa thams cad 'joms pa/ sdig pa thams cad sreg
244b4: pa bshad pa legs so legs so/ / 'di ni phyi ma'i dus na rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis lan gcig dran pa tsam gyis dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur/ yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'gyur 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
244b5: dbang phyug mthong ba'i sbyin par 'gyur/ gnas thams cad gtogs pa'i grub pa chen po rab tu ston par 'gyur rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis yangs shing rgya che ba'i chen po thams cad byed par 'gyur/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na 'di ni
244b6: 'jig rten las 'das pa gcig po mchog 'grub par 'gyur te/ las grub pa yang dag par 'grub pa'i phyir ro// de nas khros pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnod sbyin chen po stong phrag
244b7: brgya'i bdag po stobs che ba/ brtan zhing pha rol gnon pa chen po gang gis lag mthil gcig gis ri'i rgyal po lhun po 'gul bar byed pa/ lha'i gnas gzhal med khang dang bcas te/ rgya mtsho chen po na gnas te/ 'khor bye ba phal po che
244b8: dang ldan pa/ / drag po gzi brjid drag po stobs che ba// pha rol gyi dpung 'joms par byed pa de stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song ste/ nye bar phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom

245a1: ldan 'das kyi nams la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btud te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
245a2: gis khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i gzungs rig sngags kyi rgyal po shin du mi zad pa'i gsang sngags bshad pas ni bcom ldan 'das gzhal med khang dang bcas pa bsregs so/ / gnod sbyin du ma stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'khor dang
245a3: bcas pa 'bar ba gcig tu gyur te/ bsregs so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zhigs te chog cing zhu bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bdag la skyob pa su lags/ dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba
245a4: su lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni srog rnam par zhig ge/ dus kyi zhags pas bcings so// bcom ldan 'das bdag la phan pa gdags su gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag la bskyab tu gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
245a5: pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas khros pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po khyod ma 'jigs par khro bo'i rgyal po lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor
245a6: kyi rjes su song shig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la skyabs su nye bar song shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di
245a7: ni byed kyi skabs dang / dbang gnyen dang skyob pa dang / rten du 'gyur te/ gang gis 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa'i gnod sbyin stong phrag brgya'i srog dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba yin no// kye gnod sbyin chen po mAr ba myur bar song ste skyabs/
245a8: su 'gro bar byos shig/ de nas khros po'i gad rgyangs gtsud phud 'bar ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs phyung ba rtogs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang

245b1: klagagal ba da lags sa sa pa/ byung na ba sams dpa' sems dang 'a can pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang byugal pashing btul nas lag bab rgya napas la btud nas 'disad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdun
245b2: bskyab tu gsol/ thugs rje chen po bdag bskyab tu gsol// bdag la srog stsal pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsregs shing gcig tA' ba rabar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin du ma stong phrag bye ba 'khor/
245b3: dang bcas pa srog dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro// shes pa ni stor/ stobs dang brtson 'grus spro bar byed pa ni nyams na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi lus su zhig gso bar bgyid/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
245b4: gis khros pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kye gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyon cig de ji srid ston gyi bar du yud tsam zhig sdod cig gnod sbyin gyi bdag po byed kyis
245b5: 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can mang po la rnam par gtse bar byas khyod kyis bud med dang skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mang po ni zos na khyod kyis 'phags pa'i spyan mang po ni nyams par byas// khyod kyis rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang
245b6: tshe ga zhib mo mang po'i bar chad ni byam/ grub pa rnams ni med par byas ma grub pa rnams kyang med par byas/ skal pa can mang po ni med par byas skal pa med pa ni yod par byas/ mi 'tsho ba dang // srog dang longs spyod kyi bde ba ni med tha
245b7: byas/ 'tshe ba dang srog rnam par 'jig pa ni 'phel bar byas/ khyod kyis legs par bshad pa ni yongs su bor/ khyod kyis nyes par bshad pa dang / ser sna ni mang du byas/ rig sngags 'chad thams cad dang / sems can thams cad
245b8: la khyod nag po dang / rnam par 'jigs par rab tu gnas/ khyod kyis ngan thams cad ni spel/ khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ni nub par byas// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na khyod shin du mi bzad pa sdig pa can yin/ gshin

246a1: ga/ rje'i gnas dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i nang na byed gcig pu ngan sems can par chad byed par skyes pa yin te/ rgyu des na gnas skabs 'di 'dra ba thob pa yin pas kyi gnod sbyin gyi bdag po
246a2: dam cig dang / bslab pa dang / sdom pa las blang ba dang / dge ba'i chos byas shig/ 'on tang khe brgyad kyi skyabs dang / dpung gnyen du 'gyur bar bya'o// rgyud mug bsngal bas thams thag pa dang / bcings pa mi bzad pa dang ma 'bar ba ma
246a3: bzang ba'i 'jigs pa las des yongs su thar bar bya'o/ / mtho rigs kyi lam du 'jug par bya'o// de nas khros pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'khor gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang
246a4: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la btud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces gsol to//
246a5: bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod kyi bka' lung bzhin bgyis te dam tshig la gnas par bgyi'o// chos kyi rjes su sems pa dang // dkon mchog
246a6: gsum la skyabs su mchis pa la gnas par bgyi'o/ / khro bo'i rgyal po 'di dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po lcags kyu'i gzungs dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gang yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen
246a7: dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams yongs su bsgyud bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzungs rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'dra 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi chog kun spyod pa de la ni bdag gnod sbyin btu stong du ma
246a8: rnams kyis 'og dang / bla dang phyogs bzhi kun du bsod nams su dmigs te/ bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / sgrub par bgyi'o// yongs su bskyed par bgyi'o// lus la stobs dang / spro ba dang gzi byin mang du bskyed par bgyi'o// de de'i yul

246b1: phyogs su 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa dang / 'tshang 'bru ba dang / ma legs pa dang / lo nyas dang / mi ngas dang / rims dang / gnod pa dang / khrug pa dang / nyams thag par byed pa'i gdon dang bcas pa dang / nad dang / gcod dang /
246b2: nyon mongs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// rab tu bsal bar bgyi'o// rkun po dang / zol po dang / mi rgod dang / gcan zan khro ba'i 'jigs pa bsal bar bgyi'o// dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las so
246b3: sor bzlog par bgyi'o/ / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa byung ba thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi'o// char ches pa dang char mi 'bab dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang / sad dang / zan pa dang byi ba'i 'jigs pa rnams
246b4: so sor bsal bar bgyi'o/ / dben pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / le logs pa dang / 'byor pa sbyar bar bgyi'o// sems can mi dge ba spyod pa las bzlog par bgyi'o// dge ba la sbyor bar bgyi'o// sems can dge ba spyod pa
246b5: rnams kyi grogs bdag 'khor dang bcas pas bgyi'o/ / yang dag par dad pas rjes su bsgrub par bgyi'o// bud med dang skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sems can thams cad bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs
246b6: su myang bar bgyi'o/ / chos la zhugs pa'i yid dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pas gnas par bgyi'o// thams cad du bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// ji ltar rang gi srog 'di yongs su bskyed pa bzhin du gzungs dang / rig sngags
246b7: grub pa 'di/ nga yongs su bskyad par bgyi'o// spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o// khur du bkur bar bgyi'o// bsgrub par 'grub pa chen po stsal bar bgyi'o// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / sems can ma rungs pa dang / gnod sbyin
246b8: dpas sa sor bzlog par bgyi'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa sbyin ras gzugs dbang phyug gis bris pa'i gdabyangs su gtsug bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di/ ces pa

247a1: stsal to/ / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po legs so legs so// khyod kyis de bzhin du bya bar rig sngags so// sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba chen pos gzung bar bya'o// rig sngags 'chang ba la bdag nyid kyis bsrung ba
247a2: dang bcang bar bya'o/ / de nas gnod sbyin gyi bdag po de skyabs gsum la gnas shing dkyil 'khor chen po dam tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i tshig 'dzin pa la gnas par gyur to// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig dang ldan
247a3: par gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yon tan gyi phung po mchog tu bzang ba la gnod
247a4: sbyin gyi bdag po khas len du bcug cing bzhag pa legs so legs so/ / khro bo'i rgyal po'i cho ga nye bar spyad pa de smros shig/ rig sngags 'chang de rnams ji ltar mchog 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig dran pa tsam gyis ji lta ji
247a5: ltor myur ba myur bar las sgrub pa 'grub par 'gyur dang / ji ltar dran pa tsam gyis ji ltar bsams pa dang / yid la reb 'byor par 'gyur ba dang / don yod pa'i lcags kyu khro bo'i rgyal po 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis
247a6: brlabs kyis byin gyis rlobs shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' lung stsal pa rtogs nas nye bar bshad pa'i cho ga smras pa bcom ldan
247a7: 'das rig sngags 'chang ba rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang yin pa'am gzhan dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang skyes pa dang /
247a8: khye'u dang / bu mo rnams khro bo'i rgyal po 'di bsgrub par 'dod na/ de la zla ba yar gyi ngo tshas bcwa lnga la 'bras chan dang / 'o ma za zhing nang par sngar langs la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo

247b1: krung bcas te 'dug nas mi smra bar 'gan de drang ba'i dus la bab kyi bar du 'bras chan khyor ba bkang ste/ gtor ma brgya rtsa brgyad dbul ba byas na/ des khro bo'i rgyal po bsgrub pa'i cho ga de dag 'grub par 'gyur zhing mchog tu grub par
247b2: 'gyur ro/ / da ltar bsgrubs nas de nas bzlas brjod gcig dang / dran pa gcig gis thams cad du 'grub par byas na thams cad tu bya ba thams cad mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba las byed par 'dod
247b3: cing / / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po sgrub par 'dod na khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig dran par bya'o// dran pa tsam gyi mod la bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad skrag par 'gyur/ zhing dpag tshad tshun chad du rig sngags 'chang ba'i drung
247b4: du 'ong bar mi nus te/ rgyang ring po na 'dug go/ 'di lan cig dran pa tsam gyis bzlas brjod dang / cho ga dang / bsgrub pa bde bar 'grub cing dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad grub pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras
247b5: gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/ / dpag tshad tshun chad du 'bar ba'i lcags kyu chen po 'phang du re chen po tsam 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dpag tshad gsum gyi tshad tsam dang / 'og tu g.yang sar gyur te/ su yang
247b6: 'od mi nus so/ / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang bcas pas gnas der 'ong bar mi nus na/ mi ma yin pa phal pa dang / bgegs
247b7: dang log 'dren rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te gnas med do/ / rig sngags 'chang ba 'jigs pa med par yang dgos pa thams cad grub pa sgrub par byed de/ bgegs med par thams cad du bsgrub pa 'grub pa 'thob par
247b8: 'gyur ro/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang las thams cad bya bar 'dod cing gdon bsal bar 'dod na/ gu gul dang / yungs dkar la lan gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ gdon la bdug pa sbyin par bya'o// yungs dkar gyis brdeg pa bya'o//

248a1: lan cig dran par bye// lag pa g.yas pa'i 'dzub mos khros pas bsdigs par bya'o// bdug pa dang / brdeg pa dang dran pa dang lhan cig tu byas na mod la gdon thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// ji ste nag po chen po rang nyid dam/
248a2: ma yin gyi dbang po'am/ sgra gcan nam/ 'jigs byed kyang 'jig par byed na/ gdon gzhon 'ong bar ltag la 'gyur te mod la gcig tu 'jig par 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang / gdon gyis yongs su zin pa thams cad la dur khrod kyi thal
248a3: lalan cig bzlas brjod byas te/ spyi bor gtor zhing lan gcig dran par byas na mod la 'byung po dang gdon 'bros par 'gyur ro// na lar dang / an da ni dra ka ba tsa dang / gu gul dang / nas dang / ba la ka dang / matul dang / pad ma dang / kuSh+pa rnam gnyis dang /
248a4: ri dzi na dang / yungs dkar dang / shing kun dang / nar pad ma dang / bi shar dang / tsan tri ka rnams ra'i gcin gyis sbrus te ri lA nas kyi mdzel ma tsam byas te/ grib ma la bskams la// lcags kyu lan bdun bzlas pa byas nas las thams cad la 'dug
248a5: pa mchog gi ri lu gcig bdug pa byas na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri dang nags tshal dang / gcong rong dang bcas pa rnams 'gul lo// rgya mtsho chen po ni 'khrugs so// ri rab chen po ni g.yos so// sum bcu rtsag suM
248a6: gyi gnas gzhal mdakhang dang bcas pa ni tshar g.yos te 'gul lo/ / lha thams cad skrag go// lha ma yin thams cad du shing phyogs phyogs su 'bros so// sa ni g.yos so// klu gang dag rgya mtshon gnas pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
248a7: 'thung po dang / yi dgas dang / brjed byed dang / gsang ba dang / tshangs pa'i srin po dang / khagegs dang / gdon mi bzad pa gzhan ma rungs pa de dag thams cad ni tsher ba tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyur te// dogs par mi bya'o// lus rnam
248a8: par zhig par 'gyur/ bcom ste rus pa lhags par 'gyur/ 'chi bdag gi zhags pa'i khar 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas rnam par zhig par 'gyur ba de la dogs par mi bya'o// drag dang bcas pa ni mod la drug med par 'gyur// b+ha rngon

248b1: bo dang nor rgyas kyis gal te zin pa 'am sbrul gyis zin pa la bdug pa dang / thugs btsam gyis thams cad du drug med par 'gyur ro// gang dag 'jig rtenan dug ste tshogs mi bzad pa yod pa la bdug pa'i dri tsam dang bskus pa dang / ri lu
248b2: tsam gyis mod la dug thams cad med par 'gyur te/ the tsom mi bya'o// 'bras dang / bo la mig dang / lu ta dang / shu ba dang shab ba dang / rkang shu dang mdze dang / 'brum bu dang lhog pa rnam pa mang po dang / nad mang mched pa dang lba ba'i phre ba dang // khong 'bras
248b3: dang / rkub na ba dang / sman dang / 'khru ba dang / rtsib logs na pa dang / snying ga na ba dang / gre ba 'gags pa dang / rna ba na pa dang so na pa dang / mig na ba dang / mgo bon pa dang / gzhogs byed na ba la ri lus bskus pa tsam dang / chu dron 'thungs pa tsam dang / dug
248b4: pa tsam dang / mnams pa tsam gyis thams cad de ma thag tu rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ thams cad la ri lu dam pa lan cig bzlas brjod byas te byin na thams cad du dgos pa thams cad byed pa bla na med pa yin no// shin tu char che ba dang char mi 'bab
248b5: pa dang dus ma yin pa'i char dang rlung dang / ser ba dang 'thung po dang / ma mo'i gnas dang / mtsho klung de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// char dus su 'beb so// lo tog dang 'bras bu dang / me tog yod par 'gyur ro// phyis ser ba mi 'bab po// pa dang
248b6: rmang dang than pa ma'i byung ngo / / phun sum tshogs pa tha man grub par byed cing bkra shis pa thams cad grub par byed do// rims drag po ma rungs pa kun du 'jug pa'i rims mi bzad pa dang / 'das pa mi bzad pa drag po'i rims dang rims drag
248b7: bo'i 'jigs pa chen po dang me 'bar ba shin du che ba dang / zhag bzhi pa 'dams mi bzad pa dang / grang pa'i rims sdug bsngal che ba dang mes gang dag 'chi ba'i zhags pa 'bar ba/ 'khrug pa drag po me zad pa dang / zlos pa'i rims gso dka'
248b8: ba dang / nyin cig pa'i rims dang / nyin gnyis pa'i rims dang / nyin gsum pa'i rims dang de bzhin du rung las gyu pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las mur pa dang / mchil ma las gyur pa'i rims dang / rims rnying pa dang / zugs

249a1: dang / gzhang 'brum dang / gcin snyib mi bzad pa dang / rims thams cad la bdug pa tsam gyis the tshom med par rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / gang dag mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang
249a2: mi ma yin pa'i gdon dang gang dag gzhan mi'i gdon tham cad 'dug pa bdugs pa des mod la thams cad rnam par bral bar 'gyur ro/ / lcags kyu'i gsang sngags dam pa lan cig dran par byas na/ rkem byed dang skams pa dang / brjed byed dang gdo/
249a3: ra za yag shwA dang / bdag nyid ngan par byung ba dang / grib gnon dang 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa gang du skye bo zhe sdang ba rnams 'byung ba dang gang du gnod pa dang 'khrug pa dang nyon mongs pa mang po rnams la yid du 'ong ba bdug pa tsam gyis thams cad las de thar
249a4: bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po khros pas dang gang zhig rkun po dang mi rgod kyi nang du song ngam/ gcong rong bgrod dka' ba'i nang du song ngam/ dog pa mi bzad pa'i nang du chud pa lcags kyu'i lan cig dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdugs na thams cad
249a5: du rtag tu bde bar 'gro ba dang gang dag dang gang du 'gro ba na bde bar 'gyur ro/ / de'i lus la mes mi tshugs chu chen pos khyer bar mi 'gyu ro// lcags kyu'i rig sngags dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdugs na thams cad du pha rol tu phyin pa dang bde/
249a6: zhing legs pa shin tu rgyas par 'gyur ro// de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs dug gis ma yin/ gsang sngags mchog tu drag pos ma yin/ de la drag pos ma yin nad kyis ma yin/ nyon mongs pa drag pos ma yin no// gsang sngags dran pa tsam dang //
249a7: bdug pas bdag bdug pa ni thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar gyur te/ 'di la dogs pa mi bya'o dgra dang phyir rgol ba'i mi sems can ma rungs pa mi bzad pa rnams dang / thab mo 'gyed cing g.yul 'gyed pa na bdag nyid bdug pas
249a8: bdug cing rig sngags lan cig dran par byas nas thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam la dogs par mi bya'o// gang zhig rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang zhig bgegs kyis zin te nyams pa dang / blo zhan cing le lo can la bdug

249b1: pa'adi sbyar bar bya zhing gsang sngags lan cig bzla brjod byas na des mchog tu dkon pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / gal pa med pa bdag nyid bdug pa dang ri lu mchog gis bkru ba dang / mig bslu pa dang / mchog thig le byas na thams cad du skal
249b2: pa can dang dga' ba dang / dbang phyug mtshungs pa med par 'gyur ro// nor dang 'bru 'phel zhing rgyal po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du stobs thogs par med par 'gyuraro thams cad du mchog grub pa dang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par dus thams
249b3: cad du gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bzhi bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang sba bar bya ba'i phyir nyin mtshan du rjes su 'brang zhing gnas par 'gyur ro// bsrung ba'i phyir rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung 'khor dang bcas pa rig sngags kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gror
249b4: bde bar thams cad kyis tshim par thob par 'gyur ro/ / gnas gcig nas ri lu bdun blangs pa las khro bo'i lcags kyu'i lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba'am gzhan gang yang rung ba nas dge sbyong dang bram ze
249b5: badren pa sdug phongs pa'i bud med dam skyes pa'am khye'u 'am bu mo'i don du ri lu gcig gis khrus bya gcig gis bdag pa dug/ gcig gis gos bdug/ gcig ni pa'i rnam lnga dang sbyar te btung bar bya// gcig ni mgo'i spyi bor bzhag/ gcig
249b6: na ded pung pa g.yas par btags/ ri lu gcig ni rked par btags na thams cad du 'byor pa thob par 'gyur zhing thams cad du mchog bla na med pa 'grub par 'gyur/ bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ rgud pa thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyuraro//
249b7: rma dang nyam chung ba dang de bzhin du chag grugs dang / bgegs kyis zin pa dang / gdon ra za yag shwAs zin pa de dag thams cad rab tu sbyar ba tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ dogs par mi bya'o// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par zhig par
249b8: 'gyur te sngon bsags pa'i sgrib pa thams cad mod la rnam par zhig par 'gyur te gsang sngags bstan pa dang / gsang sngags dran cing dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdugs par byas pas dogs par mi bya'o// mnar med pa dang mi bad

250a1: pa'i sdig pa dang dug dang sems can ma rungs pa dang / las ngan pa dang phud pa rnams thams cad mod la med par 'gyur ro// me la phye ma leb bzhin rtag tu myur du sreg par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags lan cig dran par bya zhing bdug pa 'dri
250a2: bdug na rus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad zhig par 'gyur ro/ / thams cad sbyar ba la dogs par mi bya'o// 'khor los sgyur ba thams cad kyi khro bo'i lcags kyu spyi gtsug 'bar ba zhes pa'i bdug pa'i rgyal pos khyim dang sgo chen por nam nangs ka dang /
250a3: mun sros khar bdug cing gsang sngags lan cig dran par byas na/ khyim gyi nad der gang dag mi snang bar 'dug par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / 'byung po dang sha za dang brjed byed dang / grib gnon ma rungs pa dang mi ma yin pa thams cad snang
250a4: bzhin du phyir 'byung zhing dus te kyi hud zer ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro/ / khyim gang yin pa 'gul ba dang / khyim dang rta babs rnams 'bar bar 'gyur zhing dmyal ba'i srung mar mi bzad pa thams cad phyogs bslad par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang srin po
250a5: dang 'byung po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang dri za dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / klu mthu bo che dang thams cad bdug pa'i dri bla na med pas skrag par 'gyur ro// bsam pa ngan pa gang dag gnas pa'i khyim thams cad 'bar ba dang lus bsregs
250a6: ba dang phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 'khrul pa dang bdug pa'i rgyal po'i mthus 'jigs pa mi bzad pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / g.yul 'gyed pa dang thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang 'thab cing 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing rtag tu
250a7: rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ / bde zhing legs par rgyal ba 'grub pa dang thams cad du dpal thob par 'gyur ro// lha dang lha ma yin dang dri za dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang klu rnams kyis bsrung ba'i phyir nyin mtshan du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyu ro// de bzhin du
250a8: rjes su myong ba dang / dus thams cad bla na med pa'i gzi byin skyed par byed do// khro bo lcags kyu bla na med pa grub pa'i thig le brjod par bya'o// thig le skar ma lta bu ni/ lha'i nyi ma bzhin du dpa'// nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mtshungs bsod nams gzi brjid

250b1: dag gis 'bar/ mun khrod sgron chen 'od bzhin du mun pa'i nang na snang bar 'gyur// tshogs kyi dkyil na mdzes pini/ skar ma'i tshogs ldan zla ba bzhin// bsod nams bya ba stong phrag dag dpag med gzhal du med pa yis// lus 'di dag ni brgyan par
250b2: 'gyur/ / khar la rin chen mchod sdong ltar/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan// ri lu sten pa byas na ni lus ni bsod nams tshogs kyis bskyed// gang zhig lus ni 'bar ba dang / shin du bzang ba kho nar 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po dus rtag tu//
250b3: phyag ni spyi bor 'jog par mdzad// rtag tu mchog ni sbyin pa dang / kun du bla med grub par 'gyur// cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa dang // sang sngags 'grub cing phyag rgya da/ dkyil 'khor 'grub cing dkyil 'khor gyi/ rim par phye ba 'grub 'gyur te/ kun
250b4: du 'grub pa bla na med/ 'gye'u wa da dang gur gum dang / ru rta cha snyams te sbyar la khro bo'i lcags kyu'i gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ tshangs par spyod pa mnyam par bzhag pa khrus legs par byas pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos
250b5: shing gtsang mas zla ba yar gyi ngo tshas bcu gsum skar ma rgyal la bab pa'i tshe chu gtsang ma dang zhib tu btags la rgya shug gi 'bru tsam byas te grib ma la bskams la/ gang gi tshe dgos pa rtsom pa de'i tshe/ khro bo'i lcags kyu lan nyi shu rtsa
250b6: g nyis bzlas brjod byas te smin mtshams su thig le bya'o smin mtshams su thig le bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis brlabs pa mtshan nyid bzhin du thig le byas te byin gyis brlabs pa byas pa'i mod
250b7: la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid rnam par mdzes pa'i thig le dang mnyam par mtshungs par brgyan par 'gyur ro/ / thams cad du mchod par bya ba dang / rtag tu bla ma la gus pas dam tshig ma nyams pa dang rgyal
250b8: po dang mtshungs pa'i blon po dang / btsun mo'i nang du song na thams cad dga' bar 'gyur zhing thams cad du mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// sems can kun gus pa dang dga' ba ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa la bya ba bzhin byed do// nor dang 'bru dang lha'i

251a1: dpal thob par 'gyur ro/ / lha thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// dbang po dang tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po dang / 'jig rten skyong ba grags chen dang klu rnams kyis rtag tu mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro//
251a2: gnod sbyin dang dri za dang gsang ba ba dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis rtag tu mchod pa chen por 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang / tshe 'phel bar 'gyur ro// nad med pa dang rims
251a3: nad med pa dang sdig pa thams cad spangs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang sdig pa dang dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / dmag gi g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du rtag tu thams cad du rgyal bar sbyin
251a4: par 'gyur ro/ / dgra dang phyir rgol ba rnams las gnas thams cad du rtag tu kun du rgyal ba chen po sbyin par 'gyur ro// thig le de lta bu byas te khro ba'i lcags kyu lan cig dran par byas la yungs dkar la lan gcig bzlas brjod byas te phug/
251a5: gi sgor gtor na phug thams cad sgo gdangs par 'gyur ro/ ji ltar dga' bar 'jug par 'gyur ro// lan gsum zhugs kyi bar du sgo gtan 'jug pa'i gnas su khro bo'i lcags kyu 'ba' zhig bzlas brjod byas na de'i tshe lha'i bu mo rgyan
251a6: thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzang zhing mdzes pa lta bar 'os pa mchog tu mdog sdug cing 'phrig pa dang ldan pa/ dpal gyis shin du dpa' zhing 'bar ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa lus ngo tsha tsa ltar byed pa 'gros 'gying bag tu 'ong bar 'gyur te spyi bo
251a7: yid tsam btud nas gsor gyi snod rin po ches bkang ba thogs te rig sngags 'tshang la 'bul bar byed do/ / rig sngags 'chang bas cang mi smra bar bya'o// rin po che'i snod kyang spang bar mi bya'o// gsang sngags 'ba' zhig dran par bya zhing sngo
251a8: dkar gyis gzhon nu ma de rtug pa 'byin cing bzhin bsgyur ba khro bo'i gzugs marku 'phyang ba mche ba btsigs pa/ sgra ral pa ser la gyen du brdzes la ral bcod pan gyis brgyan par ston na rig sngags 'chang bas skrag par mi bya'i khri ba'i

251b1: lcags kyu 'ba' zhig dran par bya'o/ / yang yungs dkar gyis mgo'i spyi bor brdog cing khros pa'i gzugs kyis dran par byas na/ de'i tshe sa la 'gyel te 'gre ldog cing kye rig sngags 'chang thugs rje can khyod rig sngags 'chad khyab 'jug
251b2: gi gzugs can gum mo gum to/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang pas rjes su brtags te kha chu dbu bar 'byung na rig sngags 'chang bas de blangs la rkang pa byin pa bskums na rlung gi phung po bdun pa'i rlung la zhon te nam mkha' la 'gro bar
251b3: 'gyur ro rig sngags 'chang pa'i 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chad pa'i 'khor brgya phrag bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgus bskor bar 'gyur ro/ / skad cig tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mthar song zhing slad
251b4: yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te reg na ni skyes nas lo bcu lon pa dang / 'dra zhing sgra yid tsam 'khyil pa rna cha gdu bu dri ma med cing sman tog 'phyang ba dang 'khrig ma gdub lus brgyan pa lus pad ma 'dra zhing dkar sham du 'gyur ro// tshe bskal
251b5: pa stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis thub par 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi 'khor gyis bskor bar 'gyur ro// gnas thams cad du dpon por 'gyur ro// gal te thig la byas te mi snang
251b6: bar 'gyur na gnod sbyin dang srin po dang 'byung po thams cad kyi khyim sgo phye ste 'dug par 'gyur ro/ / gnod sbyin dang srin po dang 'byung po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes dbang du 'gyur bka' bzhin du 'dug ga/ mang sa/
251b7: pa'i dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// khyim thams cad dri re rer yang dpon po dang / bka' bzhin byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// gal te 'tshogs mar thig le byas na brgya byin dang lha rnams kyi dbang po sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi ris
251b8: bdag po'i lha dang sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur te rig sngags 'chang ba la bya ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ / shin du mthong ba'i lha'i rigs kyi lhan cig tu rtse

252a1: dag kun spyod par 'byung ga na pa gang lags par thub par 'gyur ro/ / ba'i gnas su thapa la byas te klu mtshor zhugs pa cam byas med 'akru rgyal po dpung dang gsog tu bcas drung ma dang bu mo gnon ma ba mas
252a2: cad mdun na 'dug cing 'di skad smra te rig sngags 'chang ba bka' stsol cig dang las bgyi ba dang dgos pa thams cad bgyi zhing nam 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par bgyi'o/ / yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel bar bsgrub par bgyi'o klu'i lha'i longs
252a3: spyod mchog tu longs spyod pas brtse bar bgyi'o/ / lha'i lo stong gi bar du rjes su gnas par bgyi'o// nor thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// rin po tshe rnam pa sna tshogs gser dang dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang shang kra shi la dang byi ru dang sa le sbram
252a4: dang gser dang mu tig dang in dra nI la dang ma mar ka ta dang / pad ma rA ga dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shin tu bzang po rnams su stsal bar bgyi'o// lha rdzas kyi bza' ba mchog dang lha rdzas kyi nor gyi phung pos bang mdzod rna ma btu gang bar bgyi'o// shin tu
252a5: char ches pa gcad par bgyi'o/ / char dkon pa na char dbab par bgyi'o// dus ma yin pa'i char gcad par bgyi'o// dus su char ba'i rgyun 'byung bar bgyi'o// lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs dang lha rdzas kyi 'bras bu sna tshogs nye bar bsgrub par
