293b4: chab 'tshal zhing don ma mchis par sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ba tsam dubs kyi/ nams kyang bsgrub pa dag mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur bas rtag par nan tan brtson 'grus kyis tshul khrims yongs su dag par bsrung nas dgub rnam
293b5: pa lnga dang / sha chang 'tshal bar mi bgyi'o// gal te dbyen tshig dang / g.yo sgyu'i tshig dang / phrag dog gi cho ga smra bar gyur tam/ dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / rig sngags kyi cho ga rku ba'i nongs pa 'di dag byung bar gyur na sangs rgyas dang byang chub
293b6: sems dpa' thams cad kyis spong bar mdzad pas/ 'di skad du ngas khyed spangs pa ma yin yang gzigs shing yongs su bsdu ba'i 'os ma yin no// zhes gsungs par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das gang zag de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa
293b7: thams cad kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa bshig pa dang / dkon mchog gsum dang yang dag pa'i chos dang / dge ba'i mtshan nyid thams cad la skur cing 'jig par bgyid pa lags pas/ de lta bu'i gang zag de dag ni rtag par lha'i bu'i bdud
293b8: dang / 'dre gdon thams cad dang / mu stegs can rnams dang / bi na ya ka rnams dang / khams gcig tu bsdu ba dang / las gcig la gnas pa dang / gtan tu skabs ma mchis par gyur pa lags pas/ 'phags pa rnams kyis yongs su

294a1: skyob par mi mdzad cing rtag par sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa dang / lha dang drang srong thams cad kyis spod par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi lags so// lam sun 'byin cing chos 'jig par bgyid pa'i bar
294a2: zag de lta bu de dag gdugs mtshan du rtag par gzungs 'di rjes su dran par bgyid kyang / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gang zag de dag rnams kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur bar mthong lags te/ de ltar mi 'grub pa de yang bdag gis nongs par
294a3: lags kyi/ de dag rang nyid kyi nongs skyon lags pas don de'i slad du gzungs 'di yi cho ga dang / glegs pam de dag gis mthong zhing thos par yang mi bgyi/ 'don cing 'dzin du stsal bar yang mi bgyi ste/ gang dag tshangs par spyod pa longs
294a4: su dag pa bsrung ba dang / / byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems dang ldan par sems can la snying brtse zhing byang chub yongs su gnyer bar bgyid pa dag gis yi ger bris nas klog pa dang / 'don pa dang yongs su 'dzin par gyur na/ yum kyi gzungs
294a5: kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'grub par 'gyur bas so/ / chos kyi cho ga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po lags pa'i slad du rig sngags 'dzin par yang dag
294a6: pa'i sems dang / brtson 'grus kyi sems kyis lus kyi yan lag dang / nying lag dang / rus pa dang / sha dang / rtsa rgyas dang / rkang dang / mgo dang / mig la sogs pa yang yongs su spangs nas gzhan dag la stsal te/ chos 'di yongs su gnyer nas
294a7: rtag par nan tan brtson 'grus kyis mngon par bsgrub par 'tshal na rin po che dang / 'bru dang / dar zab dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / sman dang / nor rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par grol ba'i yum gyi gzungs dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag
294a8: rgya'i gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyi ched du gtong ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ / slob dpon gyi bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems rtse gcig tu bsgrub par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rnam par grol ba'i gzungs kyi chos 'di ni slad mi 'dus tha ma'i tshe/

294b1: sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyis nas/ yang dag pa'i spyod pa dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus dang / lta bas bzod pa'i phyogs dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam mngon par 'grub par bgyid cing
294b2: de dag dus 'di nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar dran mas kyang ldog par mi 'gyur bar bgyid pas so/ / dkyil 'khor de yang gtsug lag khang gi nang ngam/ mi 'am/ chab mi 'bab pa'am/ nags tshal gyi
294b3: drung du yang drang ste/ / nyen 'khor kun tu khru gang yan chad na shing gi rtsa ba dang / dogs ngan pa dang / mo mo dang / gor ma dang / rus pa la sogs pa ci mchis pa bgos te/ bsal nas/ dogs bzang po las rmang khru ga tsam du blangs te/ brdungs nas
294b4: mnyam por bgyis la pa lang gi lci ba dang / spos chab dogs ser po dang bsres nas 'demer bgyis te/ legs par byug cing zhal zhal bgyis nas gling lngar bgo bar bgyi'o// de la dbus kyi gling ni zheng du khru gsum tsam du ba byis te/ dbus po
294b5: nar khru do gru bzhi lham 'bar mchis pa'i rin po che'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgya rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa cig bri bar bya'o/ / gzhan yang 'khor lo'i dbus su rin po che'i pad ma 'a bye ba 'dab ma sum bcu rtsa gnyis mchis pa khru gang ba cig bri bar bgyi'o//
294b6: gzhan yang 'khor lo'i tha ma 'khor bar 'od 'bar ba bri bar bya'o// de'i rjes la gling gi grwa bzhir pad ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang pad ma re re'i steng du yid bzhin gyi nor bu re re bris nas/ nor bu bzhi po'i steng du 'ong 'bar ba bri bar
294b7: bgyi'o/ / gzhan yang 'dab ma sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i pad ma de'i steng du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs tsan dan dkar po las bgyis bcig bzhag par bgyi'o// de nas gling gnyis pa ni zheng du khru gar
294b8: bar bgyis nas sngar grwa bzhir pad ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o/ / gzhan yang pad ma de dag re re'i steng du ri rab lhun po'i stan rim pa gsum mchis pa gsum gsum bris nas bya shar mtshams kyi stan la ni dbang phyug chen po'i lha bri'o// shar lho'i mtshams

295a1: kyi gnas ni lham tha can poza'o/ / smyon pa mtshams kyi stan la ni tsangs pa chen po zo gon byang mtshams kyi snyan la ni ba byi bribar bya'o/ ga/ zhan yang ngos pazhing ni rin pa'i'i ma tog dang / phreng ba bcung ga zi bar bgyi/ nas ning
295a2: gsum pa ni nang du 'a par gyis te/ sagazhi sngon po la gser gyi thig pakyi ba'aba' shig bri bar bgyi'o// nas gling gzhi pa ni nang du khru gang bar bgyis te/ ngos bzhi stsal bar chad nyi shu rtsa brgyad nga byas par chad dum bu re re'i nang du yang bang sa la
295a3: bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o/ / gzhan yang go rims bzhin du pad ma de dag re re'i steng du yang rdo rje tho ba dang / rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang / dgra sta'i phyag rgya dang / gri'i phyag rgya dang / la gri'i phyag rgya dang / drug gi phyag rgya dang / chu gri'i phyag rgya dang / zhags pa'i rtsa
295a4: rgya dang / dbyig pa thogs pa'i phyag rgya dang / gdugs kyi phyag rgya dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang / gshin rje'i dbyig pa'i phyag rgya dang / bi na ya ka'i phyag rgya dang / mtshon cha'i phyag rgya dang / 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang / sug pa lag pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i byan/
295a5: rgya rnams so sor bris nas phyag rgya de dag kun la yang 'od 'bar ba dag bri bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang lho phyogs kyi chabaskor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni 'thab bral gyi lha bri'o// nub phyogs kyi cha bskor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni chu lha bri'o// byang
295a6: phyogs kyi chab skor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni ku be ra bri'o/ / shar phyogs kyi chab skor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni lha gzhon nu bri bar bgyi'o// de nas gru bzhi'i gnas so sor ni rgyal po chen po bzhi khro gnyer can g.yog 'khor dang bcas
295a7: pa bri bar bgyi'o/ / de nas gling lnga pa ni khru gang bar bgyis te/ ngos bzhi kun tu 'bras bu'i ljon shing dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / rin po che'i ljon shing rnam pa sna tshogs bri bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang grwa bzhi kun tu rin po che'i ri rab lhun po re re
295a8: bri bar bgyi'o/ / rabasgo bzhir ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chababri bar bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi slad nang gi gling rnams kyis gzhi ni kha dog sngon por bgyi'o// gzhan yang slad nang gi gling rnams kyi nub phyogs kyi chab sgo'i lho'i ngogs zur la sngags

295b1: mkhan 'azung zhing 'jug pa'i chabasgo gcig dbye bar bgyi'o/ / gzhan yang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bgyis pa gcig dbus su spangs te kha shar phyogs su blta bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang mig stong lag tu
295b2: dang ldan pa'i mad sde glegs pa cig padam 'dabs sum bcu rtsa gnyis mchis pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng dug zhaganas gzugs bkris pa de'i mdun du gzhan yang tsan dan kar po'i tshechi bzhal thubacu dag dang / zhal bas rnam pa
295b3: dang / bas gar gsum dang / shing tog la sogs pas bkang ba'i sgo bu 'i thus la dang / spos chab ze gang dang / bum pa dang tshon sna tshogs dang / me tog dang / ldan shing gi pha lag la sogs pas la brgyan pa ny-i shu rtsa lnga dang / tog dang phreng bas
295b4: sA nas nyi shu nyi shu dang / mar me nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / brug spos dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / de la sogs pa'i spos de ba tshe nyi shu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs bris pa'i 'phan dang / dar tshon sna tshogs las bgyis pa'i 'ban spyir phreng nyi shu rbany+dza
295b5: bsham par bgyi'o/ / 'di ltar mchod pa bgyid pa'i zhal sdeng dang / snod spyad dang / bum pa la sogs pa de dag thams cad kyang gser dang / dngul dang / khar ba la sogs pa las bgyis pa las sbyar bar bgyi'o// gal te yang dag par ma mchis
295b6: nabastan ma yang rung lags so/ / 'di ltar yo byad de dag thams cad kyang slad nang gi gling rnams ngos bzhir chos bzhin du bri zhing dgram par bgyi'o// gdan dang me tog sna tshogs gzugs shing gtong bar bgyi'o// 'bras sa lu'i me tog dang //
295b7: grangs dkar dang / me tog nam pas tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gtor bar bgyi'o// zhal zas de dag kyang gdugs cig bzhin dugasar du bgyis pa / bzang po las mchod pa par bgyi'o// sngags mkhan de yang 'thung 'jug gi tshe khrus yongs
295b8: pu dag par bgyis nas byug spos kyis byug ste/ / gos sar pa gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas tsan dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ru sa dang / ga bur la sogs pa bsres te/ gdugs gcig la dus gsum du byang chub

296a1: sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bgyis pa la mchod par bgyi'o/ / nang gi gling gsum pa'i nang du mig stong pa'i gzugs bzhag pa'i mdun du rang byang chub sems
296a2: dpa'i sdom pa gsum po dag yang dag par blang bar dam bca' bar bgyi'o/ / gdugs mtshan du slad rol gyi gling gi nub phyogs kyi chab sgor dkyil mo dkrung bcas te/ mchis nas gdugs gcig la yum gyi gzungs lan stong rtsa brgyad par/
296a3: tshad ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis nas gdugs nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bsam pa gtugs te mchod par bgyi'o// gzhan yang dus drug du dkyil 'khor gyi nub ngos kyi zur gyi chab sgo nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas gling
296a4: gsum pa'i nub phyogs kyi chab sgor 'greng ste/ sngar bstan pa'i phyag rgya dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa nas bcu gnyis pa sangs rgyas spyan 'dren pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar gyi phyag rgya kun bgyis nas sngags lan bdun bzla bar
296a5: bgyi'o/ / phyag rgya bcu gnyis pa'i bar du bgyis legs nas kyang bdag nyid byang chub chen po'i smon lam shin tu brtan pa las phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o// zhes smon lam btab nas g.yar 'dren par bgyid na/ thams cad nye bar mchis
296a6: par 'gyur bas lus drang por bsrang ste mchis nas nges pa'i sems kyis lha 'dri thams cad sgrub cing mchod pa ma mchis par mig sder mchis so snyam du 'du shes nye bar gzhag ste/ tha dad pa'i yul la mi dmigs par lus po che'i
296a7: sngags snga ma lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 'don par bgyid na/ de'i mtshan mo gzugs bgyis pa de las 'od zer chen po byung nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid gdon mi 'tshal bar mngon sum du lung ston par 'azung
296a8: te/ lus bstan nas mchi ba'i tshe kun dga' ba'i lus kyi byad gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ dga' zhing 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis rnal 'byor pa de la ci zhig dgos gang zhig smon ces 'dri bar 'gyur bas/ de'i tshe sngags mkhan gyis

296b1: 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin gyi chos yongs su gnyer ba dang / gzhan yang dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags kyi cho ga thams cad mngon par 'grub pa dang / 'dre gdon thams
296b2: cad gdul zhing ngag nyan par 'gyur bar 'tshal lo zhes lan gdab par bgyi'o/ / de ltar smon pa rnams grub nas kyang bdag nyid rig par bgyi// gzhan dag la brjod par mi bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di ni bal ras sam/ btso ras la ri mos
296b3: bris te/ bgyis na yang rung lags so// smon pa thams cad 'grub par 'tshal na chab kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis la a ga ru bsregs ste/ lus po che'i sngags snga ma lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bcu pa smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub pa'i
296b4: phyag rgya snga ma bgyis na/ smon pa thams cad bsams pa bzhin du 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so// gal te skye bo mang po thams cad dga' bar 'gyur bar 'tshal na rab tu dga' ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya snga ma bgyis
296b5: nas lus po che'i sngags kyis til 'brul lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gdab par bgyi'o/ / yang na sngags lan re bzlas nas/ lan re zhugs kyi nang du dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na thams cad yid bzhin du dga' bar 'gyur lags so// gnod
296b6: sbyin rnams dga' bar 'tshal na gnod sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba'i ljon shing gi yal ga blangs te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas kun dga' ra bar bor na dga' bar 'gyur lags so// mi ma rungs pa dgrar gyur pa gdul bar
296b7: 'tshal na gang khong len 'bog la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas sngags lan rabazla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan brgyartsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na skabs su mchi zhing thul par 'gyur lags so/ / dre gdon gdul dka'
296b8: bzhig chis na gu gul dang / yungs dkar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab te/ sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor bar lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na 'dre gdon thams cad rang dul bar 'gyur lags so// yul

297a1: phyogs su rims na dbyung bar gyur na chab kyi dkyil la bar gru bzhi pa bgyis nas/ ba mar bzang po la lan bcu rtsa brgyad sngags btab ste// sngags lan nga bzla zhang lanar zhugs su dang ba lan steng rtsab rgyad chang bar bgyis na rams
297a2: nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / yang na chab nyung zad cig blangs te rams kyis thebs pa 'tshal du phul na 'phral du 'tshe bar 'gyur lags so// sngan yul ge byin zhes bgyi bar rims na dbyung nas gang rims kyis btab pa de dag gdugs na/
297a3: gcig gam gnyis las mi 'da' bar 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par gyur to// de'i tshe bram ze tsan ti zhes bgyi ba zhig snying rje chen po skyes nas cho ga'i sgo 'di bshams nas yul khams cig gi rims kyis thebs pa thams cad gsos pas thams
297a4: cad zhi bar gyur te/ rims gtong ba'i 'dre gdon gyi rgyal po yang de'i tshe yul nas byung bar gyur pa'i slad du sman yon che bar rig par bgyi lags so// gal te pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis gtses par gyur tam/ tshem rkun dang / 'khrug pa
297a5: byung bar gyur na lus kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya dang po bgyis te/ rig sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na dgra dang chom rkun de dag thams cad rang gi ngang gis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la
297a6: la zhig las kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang gis tshebs su nye ba'i tshe 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya snga ma bgyis te/ gdugs re bzhin du mchod pa bgyis nas a ga ru bsregs te/ rag sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas de'i
297a7: ming nas lan re 'don par bgyid na las kyi sgrib pa de dag yongs su bskrad par 'gyur lags so/ / sngon yul ba rA na ser khyim bdag gcig gnas pa las bu gcig las ma mchis pa de lo bcu drug las mi thub par gyur nas/ lo bcwa
297a8: lnga lon pa dang / khyim bdag khyo shug mya ngan gyis rong nyams par gyur to// de'i tshe bram ze zhig sgo kun tu rgyu zhing zas slong ba las khyim bdag de mthong nas ci'i phyir mi bde bar gyur ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag gis lo rgyus de dag rgyas

297b1: bar bshad do/ / de nas bram zes khyim bdag de la mya ngan ma byed par bdag gis bsgo ba bzhin du byos shig dang / khyod kyi bu tshe ring bar 'gyur ro zhes smras nas// de'i tshe bram ze des cho ga'i sgo 'di nyid zhag bdun tshang bar bgyis pa dang gshin
297b2: rjes khyim bdag de la khyod kyi bu'i tshe'i tshad lo bcu drug las mi thub pas/ lo bcwa lnga lon te lo cig las ma lus pa las/ deng dag pa'i rkyen dang phrad pas lo brgya thub par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'di rang 'ongs nas bsgo ba yin no// zhes smras pa dang /
297b3: de'i tshe khyim bdag khyod shug rab tu dga' ning mgu par gyur pas// khyim gyi nor gyi mchis pa bteg ste/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun la phul bas chog 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i rig par bkyi lags so//
297b4: sngar 'dus pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por la nu gsum zhugs pa zhig lags ted kyil 'khor mi 'tshal te/ phyag rgya bgyis nas rig sngags bzlas brjod pagyis pa tsam gyis smod pa rnams mi 'grub pa gang yang
297b5: mamachis la myur du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par yang 'gyur lags so/ / bud med gang la la zhig bu btsa' ba'i tshe/ sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur na/ chab mngal lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis bkab ste 'tshal du stsal na nges par bde
297b6: bar 'gyung zhing bye dang bu mo bcas pa gang lags pa de dag kyang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur/ / dge bsna tshogs kyis brgyan nas sngon bsod nams bsags pa'i mthub skyab mang po kun gyi snang du sdug par 'thung / rtag
297b7: bar ma nang du langs spyong khyad par du 'phags pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur lags so/ / sems can gang lal zhig mig nad kyis bebs te sdug bsngal zhing mi bde bar 'gyur na/ sngags maben gyis byang chub sems dpa' mig stod dang ldan
297b8: ba'i phyag chubagyis nas sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig ga zlas te mig la phyag rgyas btab par gyur na mig kyang 'tsho bar 'gyur ga/ zung kun des gang bag de lha'i mig thob par 'byur bas stan mas gsal bar mthong zhing 'ongs spyod mchog la 'ongs spyad par

298a1: 'gyur lags so/ / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzungs bri ba'i cho ga ni ras dkar po khru bcu drug pa 'am/ khru nyi shu pa yang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus ni 'dzam bu'i gas/
298a2: gyi kha dog can du bgyis te/ gdong la mig gsum mchis pa sug pa lag pa stong dang ldan zhing sug pa lag pa stong po de dag re re'i mthil du yang mig re re bri'o// sug pa lag pa chen po yang dag pa nyid ni bcwa brgyad mchis te/ sngar sug pa gnyis kyis
298a3: ni snying dkar thal mo sbyor bar bgyid do/ / sdug pa gcig gis ni rdo rje'i thob thogs so// yang gcig gis ni rtse gsum pa thogs so// yang gcig gis ni glegs pam thogs so// yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i phyag rgya thogs so// yang cig gis ni
298a4: mkha sil thogs so/ / yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i nor bu thogs so// yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i 'khor lo thogs so// yang gcig gis ni pad ma kha bye ba thogs so// yang gcig gis ni zhags pa thogs so// yangag gi gis ni lcang ma'i lcug ma
298a5: thogs so/ / yang gcig gis ni 'od zer kha dog lnga 'byin par bgyid do yang cig gis ni bgrad phred thogs so// yang cig gis ni ril bu thogs so yang cig gis ni zil dngar yongs su gtong ba'i lag tu ston to// yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i char sna tshogs 'bebs shing
298a6: mi 'jigs pa'i lag tu ston to/ / yang gnyis ni lte ba'i thad kar g.yon pa g.yas pas mnan nas mthil bkan te mchis so// sug pa lag pa gzhan dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag thams cad ni sprul pa'i sug pa lags te/ sug pa
298a7: de dag kun kyang so so nas mtshon cha dang / phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pas/ kha cig ni sug pa lag pa'i phyag rgya brkyang pa nyi tshe ba yang mchis te/ so so nas mi mthun pas snying po'i mdo las/ ji skad du byang chub sems dpa' de ni lha'i
298a8: rin po che sna bdun gyi mgo rgyan thogs so/ / lag ngar la ni gdub 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan to// lus la ni phreng ba thogs shing lha'i rin po che'i gos gya nom pa dag bgos pa yin no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o// tshon rtsi de dag gi nang

298b1: ru ko ba'i sbyin stsal bar mi bgyi'o/ / kun tu ri'i khu ba dang sbyar bar bgyi'o// gang dag yum gyi gzungs kyi cho ga bgyid par 'tshal na sngar de'i gzugs ri mor bri'o// gzugs ri mor bri bar yang nges par chos bzhin du bgyi 'tshal bas ri mo 'bri ba'i gnas
298b2: khang nyen 'khor kun tu tsan dan dkar po'i chab kyis dogs la byugs te/ dkyil 'khor bgyi'o// gzhan yang ri mo mkhan 'byung 'jug gi tshe// khrus bgyis nas gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos te/ nyin re bzhin sdom pa brgyad yang dag par blang bar bgyi'o//
298b3: chos bzhin du gzugs bris lags nas kyang / ri mo mkhan chos bzhin du ma bgyis par dogs par gyur na/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa cig yid la ji ltar mos pa bzhin du bgyis te/ ba dan dang / me tog dang / zhal zas dang / zas dkar gsum dang / me
298b4: tog dang / spos chab dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis kun tu khyab par bkram nas mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/ rnal 'byor pa dang / ri mo mkhan gang lags pa des gdugs gcig la dus gsum du gzugs bris pa'i mdun du nongs pa rnams 'thol
298b5: bshags na/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tshang ba'i mtshan mo mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bris pa las 'od zer chen po byung nas/ nyi zla zil gyis mnan te/ 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang / tshang
298b6: ma mchis pa thams cad thogs pa ma mchis par gsal bar bgyid pas/ rnal 'byor pa dang / ri mo mkhan gang lags pa de dag dang / sems can gang dag 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad shin tu lci ba'i kha na ma tho ba ci mchis pa dus gcig tu zhu
298b7: byang nas yongs su dag par 'gyur lags so/ / cho ga 'di bsgrub pa gang lags pa des sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma gtogs lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gis
298b8: sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi cha de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis kyang phyag stong spyan stong po 'di dag bstan nas/ bdud chen po rnams 'dul pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das deng bdag gis kyang lag stong dang mig stong po 'di dag

299a1: bstan nas bdud chen po rnams bkul ba lags te/ sug pa lag pa stong po de dag kyang so so nas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po re re mngon par sprul nas bskal par zad po rabs stong gi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po bgyid par gyur pa
299a2: mig stong po de dag kyang so so nas sangs rgyas re re mngon par sprul nas bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stong dang mtshungs par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i lus bdud 'dul ba'i nang nas
299a3: mchog tu gyur pa lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa// legs so legs so// ngas kyang byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus bskal pa mthar thug pa'i bar du khyod kyi yum
299a4: gyi gzungs 'di byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzungs// // bam po gsum pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
299a5: gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur pa sathal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang mig snying lag
299a6: stong dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya mngon par sgrub par bgyid pa mchis lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas kyang rjes su yi rang gis khyod kyis shod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
299a7: smras pa dang / nam byang chub sems dpa' rgyu sa gzigis dag byug gis rig sngags 'di smras pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi bar gyi lha'i gnas thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu
299a8: rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ / 'og min gyi lha dang / dbang phyug chen po yang mi bde bar shin tu skrag par gyur to// 'dre ga don mdus pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur pas/ ku tse 'don cing shar nub tu byer nas 'gro ba'i gnas yang

299b1: mi rnyed par gyur to/ / de nas sprul pa'i lus kyis 'khor mang po rnams dang 'dre gdon ma rungs pa rnams la khyed gal te bdag gi rig sngags kyi rjes su me 'brang zhing 'gal bar byas par gyur na mgo tshal bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo'o// bcom
299b2: ldan 'das rig sngags 'dis ni ri rnams 'joms par bgyid cing rgya mtsho chen po skams par bgyid do/ / rig sngags 'dis ni lha ma yin gyi dpung rnams bcom nas yul rnams bsrung bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'das ni 'dre gdon ma rungs pa
299b3: thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / sem drangs pa thams cad tshar gcod par bgyid do// rig sngags 'dis ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'joms shing dul bar bgyid lags sa// rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'dod
299b4: cing yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na/ gang zag de'i mthu stobs brjod kyis mi lang ngo // rig sngags 'di 'don pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa de dag btsun zhing dbang phyug dang ldan pa dang / nam 'tsho'i bar du rgyal pos byams shing yid du mchi ba dang /
299b5: smon ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// gang la la zhig phyir rgol ba'i bdud gdul bar 'tshal na spos gu gul bsregs te/ bdag gi lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa cig bzlas brjod pakyi'o// skye bo mang po thams cad kyis bdag la
299b6: byams par 'tshal na lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa cig sngags kyis btab ste/ g.yar khar bcas na byams shing bkur bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid spobs pa dang shes rab dang ldan par 'tshal na// shu dag la lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ snying kar
299b7: bskus na thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur te/ yum gyi gzungs kyi snying po'i phyag rgya bgyi'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te// sug pa
299b8: lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad de sbyar nas mthe bong gnyis mdun du brkyang bar bgyi'o/ / phyag rgya 'dis ni bdag kyang srung shing gzhan yang srung bar bgyid do// phyogs gang dang gang du mchi yang rung ste/ mtshams dgum par 'tshal bas chab gtsang ma 'am
299b9: thal pa gtsang ma la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/ gang du mchis pa'i gnas der chab tham/ thal ba snyim pa gang sngar rang gi lus la gtor nas de'i rjes la phyogs bzhir chos bzhin du gtor na/ de nyid mtshams su 'grub par 'gyur lag so//

300a1: rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'dre srin ma rungs pa dang / log pa'i gdon mang po rnams kyis gtses par gyur na bal po se'u yi yal ga dang / grib logs kyi lcang ma'i yal ga blangs te/ rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod
300a2: bgyis nas nang ba la zhus nad gang yang rung ste/ mi 'tsho ba ma mchis lags so// rig sngags ni 'di lta ste// na mo sarba bud d+hA/ d+harma saM g+hA ya/ na mo A rA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twa ya s+ya/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya s+ya/ tad+yaH/ si bi si bi kA la si bi
300a3: pa la sha ba ni swA hA/ / rig sngags kyi phyag rgya 'dis ni log pa'i lta ba'i mu stegs can rnams 'dul bar bgyid do// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag par gdugs dang po 'char ba'i tshe dang / gdugs kyi gung dang gdugs pas
300a4: de'i tshe lan nyi shu rtsa cig bzlas brjod bgyis na/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu la mchod pa bgyis pa dang / bye brag tu gyur pa ma mchis pas nam du yang bud med kyi dngos po len par mi 'gyur/ tshe 'das nas kyang ngan song
300a5: gsum po dag dang gtan tu 'bral zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i phyag gis spyi bo la blugs te/ khyod nga'i zhing du skye bar 'gyur bsam 'jigs shig ces bka'
300a6: stsal bar 'gyur/ tshe 'di nyid la yang glo bur du 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhing / 'dre gdon dag gis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur lags so// de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
300a7: kha na ma tho ba yongs su spyod pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas 'di ltar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa mdun du brgyar ste/ sor mo lnga so sor phye nas mdun du phul te sor mo lnga char bsgreng ngo // de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe
300a8: bo lag mthil du bkug ste/ sor mo gzhan bzhi ni khu tshur du gangs nas rna ba g.yas pa'i thad kar bzhag ste/ lus po che'i sngags bzlas nas 'dzub mo ni phan tshun chu bar bgyi'o// phyag rgya ni gdugs cig la dus ga la ba gyis par 'tshal

300b1: bas/ dus cig gi tshe yang lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang / shin tu lci ba bzhi'i kha nas thob rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur lags so// sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje bskyed par 'gyur na kha na
300b2: mtho ba thams cad kyi rtsab bsregs nas/ tshe 'das pa'i rjes la yang sangs rgyas rnams dang mjal bar 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu yang 'khor los bskur ba'i rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur// gzhan yang bas pa ma mchis pa'i gter zhe
300b3: bgyi ba'i gzungs dang / ye shes mnyam pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzhan yang mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur// gzhan yang tshe 'di nyid la mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce la sogs pa bro 'tshal bar mi 'gyur zhing lus kyi nad
300b4: thams cad kyang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/ / sngon gyi las dang / kha na mtho ba rnams kyang zhu byang bar 'gyur lags so// gal te than babyung ba/ ra gyur na til 'bru yog po'i 'bras bu'i mar dang sbyar te/ ril bu bgyis nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis
300b5: btab ste/ chabardzing du bor na dgung char 'bab par 'gyur lags so// gal te char ches na 'bras sa lu brdos pa'i me tog yungs 'bru'i mar dang sbyar te/ ri lu bgyis nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab te/ chabardzing du bor na dgung char 'chad par
300b6: 'gyur lags so/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud rnams btul ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sor mo snol mar btang ste// g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan te/ khu tshur
300b7: dam du bcangs te spyi bor bzhag nas lus po che'i sngags bzlas brjod bgyis na/ khon pa'i dgra thams cad rang dul bar 'gyur lags so// cho ga 'di bgyid pa gang lags pa des ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du tshes nyi shu dgu'i mtshan
300b8: mo tsan dan dkar po'i phye ma'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ me tog sna tshogs bkram nas yongs su dag par khrus bgyis te/ gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos nas bog por thogs te/ a ga ru bsregs la kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas na
300b9: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag stong mig stong dang ldan pa spyi bo la mchis par 'du shes nye bar bzhag ste/ lus po che'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na 'di dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'i phan yon dang po

301a1: byaH/ / mchog lags so// gzhan yang yungs dkar til gyi 'bras bu dang cig tu bsres te brdungs nas phye mar bgyis te/ po gsum gyis cung zad cig blangs nas lan cig sngags kyis btab te zhugs su der ba dgung bdun tshang bar bgyis pa/
301a2: gdugs re la yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na/ slad kyis ci bgyi'o// tshal mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so// de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'jigs pa ma mchis pa chen po'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags ste//
301a3: 'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis bshibs te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yas pa bkan te lag dar g.yon pa bteg nas pus mo'i steng du bzhag par bgyis te/ sug pa lag pa g.yon pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas/ rtag par ring bsrel gyi mdun du lus
301a4: po che'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ myur du sems can la mi 'jigs pa stsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thob par 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang shing kun dang / yungs dkar dang / shu dag dang / ta ta pa'i ri lu blangs te dngos po 'di dag
301a5: zhugs kyi nang du bor te bsreg par bgyi'o/ / 'di dag bsreg pa yang sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar 'am/ dkyil 'khor 'am/ gnas gtsang ma dag du bsregs nas lus po che'i sngags bzlas te/ sngags la na re bzla zhing lan re bsreg pa
301a6: brgya rtsa rgyad tshang par bgyis nas spos dang / me tog dag gis rig sngags la mchod pa bgyis na/ ci dang ci smon pa rnams yid bzhin du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gal te rig sngags gzhan gyis ma thub pa dag sngags 'dis
301a7: btab nas thams cad thub cing 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ / gal te rmi ltas mthong bar 'tshal na sngags 'di bzlas nas phyag rgya ba gyis te mig la btab na ci dang ci mthong bar 'tshal ba de dag thams cad rmi lam du mthong bar 'tshal ba lag so//
301a8: bsod nams ma mchis pa gang dag ci bgyi'o// tshal yid bzhin du 'grub par mi 'gyur na/ gdugs de bzhin rig sngags 'di la na rgyartsa brgyad 'don pa dgu bdun du tshang bar gyur na ci dang ci smon pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur lags so//

301b1: bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas su rgya mtsho'i chos kyi mdun sar chos ston pa na/ klu mang po rnams sdug bsngal chen po rnams myong bar 'gyur bar mthong ba dang / klu mang po rnams la snying che nas de dag sdug bsngal las
301b2: yang dag par bzla ba dang / sems can mang po rnams sdug bsngal dang bral zhing mkhon pa'i dgra ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du chos bstan pa las de'i tshe klu'i bu mos chos 'di gnyer ba'i slad du nor bu rin po che mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
301b3: rib cig phul ba dang / bdag gis ni de la yum gyi gzungs 'di rgya cher bstan pas sdug bsngal gyi bgegs rnams dang / bral bar 'gyur lags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chu shel gyis rig sngags 'di yongs su 'dzin pa dag la phan
301b4: gdags shing bgegs yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir sngags 'di smras so/ / bi ma le ma hA bi ma le u ha le/ mA hA u ha le/ hu ma le/ ma hA hu ma le/ sa hA le/ ma hA sa ha le/ tsi le te swA hA// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig phyogs gang
301b5: druganas kyang rung ste/ / byang chub sems dpa' mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i chos kyi cho ga 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na/ bdag kyang rtag par de bdag gi rjes su 'brang ste/ yongs su bsrung bar bgyid pas bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyi bar dag
301b6: gigi gtse bar mi 'gyur lags so/ / gang la la zhig brel zhing phongs par gyur tam/ pha rol gyi dgras tses sa ma/ chom rkun dag gis gnod pa bgyid par 'gyur na/ tshon sna lnga'i sku dpal lan nyi shu rtsa cig sngags kyis btab ste// sngags lan
301b7: reb za zhing mdud pa re re mdud nas/ dpung pa g.yon pa la mdud par bgyi'o// gzhan yang sug pa g.yon pa'i srin lag dang / gung mo dang / 'dzub mo rnams khu tshur bcangs te/ mthe bos steng du mnan nas mthe chung chom rkun gyi phyogs su kha bstan
301b8: tesngags 'di lan rgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na thams cad rangagyes nas gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/ / sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gdas ril gnas te/ chos ston pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i yul la gnas

302a1: pa'i sgo bo rnams sems can ci sha khrag 'ba' shig 'tshal zhing / dge ba'i sems ci yang ma mchis pa mthong ba dang / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de thabs la mkhas pas phan gdags shing sems can gdul ba'i ched du rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus
302a2: de ma thag tu yul de dag du mchis nas/ mig stong dang lag stong dang ldan pa'i sa bdud gtul ba'i lus mngon par bstan te/ yum gyi gzungs mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya bgyis pa dang / de'i tshe srin po'i yul gyi rgyal po dag gi thad du mchis nas/
302a3: nongs pa sol bshags te/ phyag bgyis pa dang / bdag gis kyang mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas/ de bla na ma mchis pa'i lam mngon par grub par gyur lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mngon par grub
302a4: pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis gshibs te snying kar thal mo sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis snol mar btang zhing / g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan nas lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/ cho ga rnam pa sna
302a5: tshogs gang bgyid kyang rung ste/ thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so// de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'gro ba drug po dag sdug bsngal gyi bgegs las yongs su skyob pa'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni
302a6: 'di lags te/ 'gro ba drug gi sems can sdug bsngal las yongs su skyob par 'tshal na 'khor lo'i phyag rgya spyad por bgyi ste/ 'di ltar sor mo bcu'i rtse mo phan tshun phrad par bgyi ste/ lag dar gyi tshigs dang / lag mthil ni dbye bar bgyi'o// sor
302a7: mo rnams kyi bar yang tshon gang tsam mchis par bgyis te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' de 'gro ba drug po dag tu gnas nas sdug bsngal gyi bgegs las yongs su bzlas pa zhes bgyi te/ 'di ltar phyag rgya'i 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis thams cad
302a8: sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur pas so/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas sngar sug pa g.yon pa brkyang ste/ sor lnga car bkan nas bus mo

302b1: g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag go/ / de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas brkyang te/ sor mo lnga car kha sbub nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i steng du mnan par bgyi'o// 'di ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya dang 'dra ste// 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / dra/
302b2: ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mtshungs par phyag rgya 'dis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ba lags pas/ phyag rgya 'dis ni las kyi sgrib pa thams cad sel bar bgyid do// rnal 'byor pa bsam gtan sgom pa gang dag
302b3: ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du ma gyur na gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du dgon pa'i gnas su mchis nas gzungs 'di bzlas te/ phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas/ sems rtse cig tu sangs rgyas rnams mig sngar sngon sum du bzhugs par yid la bgyis te
302b4: gdugs tshan cig la dus drug tu 'thol bshags bgyis na/ sangs rgyas rnams kyang mngon sum du 'gyur zhing / bsod nams kyi phung po chen po tshad ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa rnams kyang 'thob par 'gyur lags so//
302b5: de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dgug pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo bzhi khu tshur bcad par bgyi'o// de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pas
302b6: g.yon pa'i mthe bo khu tshur bcangs pa bzhin bcangs nas lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bo lag pa g.yas pa'i chang ba'i gong du rtse mo phyung nas sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i 'dzub mo ni phan tshun du rgyu bar bgyi'o/ / sngags ni 'di lta ste// oM ku tsi
302b7: ku tsi ku la ri/ tsa ri tsa ri tsa ri le swA hA// gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang sngags 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mchis nyal kar phyag rgya 'di bgyis te/ sngags 'di lan re bzlas shing / snying kar phyag
302b8: rgyalan re bgyi ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar gyur na/ / sems la ci dang ci 'dod pa rnams rmi lam du rig cing mthong bar 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig rtag par phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas/ sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na sdig pa thams cad
302b9: byang nas byang chub kyi sems stong par mi 'gyur bas/ gang zag de mtshan mo mchis nyal ba'i tshi ga yar lam na rgya cher 'phel zhing bkra shis par 'gyur// g.yar lam na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas lung ston pa dang / mngon par

303a1: rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba'i bar dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / lha rnams kyang rtag tu nye bar mchis nas/ rim gro bgyid cing yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur lags so// de la byang chub sems dpa'
303a2: mig stong dang ldan pas lha dang / klu dang 'dre gdon sde brgyad po dgug pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis pa shibs te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bo lag mthil du bkug nas/ sor mo bzhi khu tshur bcangs te/
303a3: snying kar bzhag go// de'i rjes la sug pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis te/ lag pa g.yas pa rna drung du btang nas 'dzub mo phan tshun du rgyu bar bgyi'o// sngags ni 'di lta ste na mo ni la ka Na Tha/ na mo Ar+yA sha pa ta swA hA/ na mo Ar+yA sha pa la swA hA/
303a4: e hi e hi swA hA// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs dang / phyag rgya 'di len tam 'dzin tam klog gam/ 'don par bgyid na/ myur tu tshe rabs bdun tshun chad kyi sngon gyi gnas kyi dngos po rjes su dran par 'gyur/ sbrul dug
303a5: pas zin par mi 'gyur ro/ / dug gis mi tshugs par 'gyur// mtshon gyis gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur// rgyal pos gshe bar mi 'gyur/ nams kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig gdugs de bzhin
303a6: du rig sngags 'di 'don par bgyid na/ 'dri srin sde brgyad po rnams rig sngags 'don pa'i drung du nye bar mchis nas/ rig sngags 'don pa nyan par bgyid do// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'dre gdon gyis zin par gyur na/ skud
303a7: pad bo la sngags kyis ste/ rigasngags pan m+bu 'i mdu bar ma dung de/ dud pa bzhi brgyan gra tshang bar kyis nas de'i ma la du btags na de'i na se la par 'thur lags so// gas te yul gang du gas ngan dang / rim
303a8: dbyung ste/ yul mi mang du gum par gyur na/ rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba dang / rdzing dag tu pad ma stong rtsa brgyad blangs te/ pad ma re re la sngags lan re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du bor te bas par bsregs na rims nang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur

303b1: lags so/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags ste/ dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i gung mo mthe bo'i rtse mo dang sbyar te bkan la sor mo gzhan gsuM
303b2: brkyang nas pus mo g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag par bgyi'o/ / de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas/ sug pa lag pa pus mo g.yas pa'i steng du khwa spun du bzhag par bgyi'o// gang la la zhig rtag par phyag rgya 'di kyis
303b3: nas lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa cig bzlas brjod bgyis na/ smon lam rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / sdug bsngal rnams kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mi dge ba bcu dang
303b4: mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i dngos sdig phun sum tshogs par bgyis pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling gis ci mchis pa de dag thams cad rdul phra rab tu bgyis la/ rdul phra rab de re re yang skal pa re re mngon par byung bar gyur na// gang zag de
303b5: dngos sdig rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis pa'i dbang gis bskal pa'i grangs de snyed kyi bar du sems can dmyal bar lhung nas sdug bsngal myong zhing gtan tu 'byung ba'i dus ma mchis pa zhig lags na yang / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis
303b6: r ing bsrel dang bcas pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar zla ba dkar po'i ngo ches bcwa lnga la gdugs mtshan cig zas bkum ste phyag rgya mdud nas rig sngags stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas na gong du bstan pa'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad byang bar
303b7: 'gyur te/ gal te byang bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na/ de lta bu'i gnas ma mchis lags so// de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la rang dbang thob pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ langs nas 'greng
303b8: ste sngar sug pa g.yon pas sug pa rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bo la btsir nas khu tshur bcangs pa bzhin du bgyi'o/ / de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pas g.yon pa'i lag ngar gyi steng du btsir nas/ lus po che'i sngags lan bdun 'don par gyis

304a1: u0f7f/ / na/ ngag tshod brgya stong du mar mchi 'tshal na yang dka' ba ma mchis par 'gyur lags so// sngags 'don pa'i tshesgra yang 'byung bar mi bgyi'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' mig sbyong dang ldan pas rdza dum
304a2: rang ba thob pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sngar sdug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos mthe'a'u chung gi srin mo'i snying du dag par bgyi'o// de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis nas/ sor mo gzha
304a3: gsum ni so sor yin par bskyed ste/ lag dar gyi tshogs sbyar nas spyi bo'i steng du gzhag ste/ lus pa che'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na/ drang srong 'phur te mchi ga dang 'dra bar rang dbang du mchi bar 'gyur lag so//
304a4: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems rtse gcig tu spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya 'di lags te/ sug pa gnyis nam mkha' la thal mo sbyar te/ lag dar gyi tshigs sbyar nas badzub mo gnyis ni phan tshun chub pa gyi'o// sngags ni 'di ste ste/
304a5: oM a ru lid te li/ lo ka bi do ya/ sarba ya dra/ pra mar d+ha na kar ya bu ru sA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / tshangs pa chen po de dag dang / lha dang klu dang /
304a6: gnod sbyin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis bsung pal mngon par bstod do// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa thogs pa mi mnga' bo
304a7: thugs rje chen po'i sems rgya char yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ / cho ga da ba bas pa// / rdzogs s+ho//
304a8: chen gyi lo ts+tsha yan chos thub gyis rgya de ba las skur te gtan la ba ga// oM yeng+ka nA Ne pra b+ha bA te b+he na ta thA ga to h+ya pra dad te/ bAn n+ya yon ro d+ha e ban+d+ha tI ma hA shra ma NaHdga'o//
